<p>nanu 'dvandvatatpuruṣayoruttarapade nityasamāsavacanam iti <b>mahāvārttikakāraḥ</b>, ayamapi
ca tatpuruṣa eveti kasmādihāpi samāso na bhavati ?</p>
<p>uttarapadopādānāt । ya uttarapada evāmnāyate so'tra tatpuruṣo grahītavyaḥ, yathā
'dva‍yahnajātaḥ', 'pañcagavadhana' iti । dvandvaḥ punaranuttarapada eveti bahuvrīhiviṣayeṇottarapadena sarva
eva gṛhyate । kimarthaṃ punarevamucyate yāvatā bahulagrahaṇenaiva siddham, samudāyavṛttyāvavayavānāṃ
mā kadācid vṛttirbhūditi ।</p>
<p>tathāpi na vak‍tavyam । iha dvau pakṣau (<b>1</b>) <b>vṛttipakṣaś‍ca</b> (<b>2</b>) <b>avṛttipakṣaś‍ca</b> । yadā
vṛttiḥ tadā sarveṣāṃ vṛttiḥ, yadā tu na vṛttistadā sarveṣāmavṛttiriti ।</p>
<p>naivam । astyatra viśeṣaḥ । tathāhi pañcagavapriya ityādau nāsya pañcasaṃkhyāmātraṃ priyaṃ,

<pb n="051"/>
nāpi gomātram, kiṃ tarhi pañcasaṃkhyopalakṣitāḥ kāś‍cideva gāvaḥ, yathā pañcāmrāḥ saptarṣaya
iti । tacca dvigau pūrvamasati durupapādameva bhavati । etena chatropānahapriya ityetadapi
vyākhyātam, tatrāpi yugapadadhikaraṇavacanadvandvamantareṇa nābhivāñchitasiddhiḥ । na
hyasyopananmātrameva priyam apituchatramapi, upānacchabdādeva ca paraḥ priyaśabdo niśamyamānaḥ
na dvandvaṃ vinā chatramupagrahītuṃ śaknoti । tasmādanākṣepa iti ।</p>
<p>'susūkṣmajaṭakeśādinā ca mattabahumāttaṅgaṃ vanam' ityādāvapyanekameva padamityuktaṃ
bhavati । atrāpi mattā bahava eva mātaṅgā ityāpi na bhavati ।</p>
<p>kiṃ kāraṇam ?</p>
<p>'bahugaṇavatuḍati' saṃkhyā (1.1.23) iti bahuśabdasya saṃkhyāvācitvāt,
saṃkhyāpūrvasya ca karmadhārayasya, dvigutvāt, dvigoḥ punaḥ 'taddhitārthottarapadasamāhāre'— (2.
1.51) ṣveva bhāvāt, yathā'pañcakapālaḥ, trilokaharmyam, pañcapūlī' iti ।</p>
<p>kathaṃ tarhi 'saptarṣayaḥ pañcāmrā' iti ?</p>
<p>'diksaṃkhye saṃjñāyām' (2.1.50) iti saṃjñāyāmeva tad bhavati ।</p>
<p>nanu ca mā bhūt taddhitārtha upapadaṃ vā, tathāpi 'bahumātaṅgami'—ti samāhāre
bhaviṣyati—bahavo mātaṅgāḥ samāhṛtāḥ bahumātaṅgam, tataś‍ca 'mattaṃ bahumātaṅgamasmin vane
tanmattabahumātaṅgaṃ vanamiti bahuvrīhirbhaviṣyati ।</p>
<p>ucyate ।</p>
<p>atha samāhāra iti kaḥ śabdārthaḥ ?</p>
<p>nanu samāṅpūrvād‍dharateḥ karmaṇi ghañ 'samāhriyata iti samāhāra' iti ।</p>
<p>yadyevaṃ pañca kumāryaḥ samāhṛtāḥ pañcakumāri, daśakumāri iti</p>
<p>'gostriyorupasarjanasya' (2.1.48) iti hrasvatvaṃ na prāpnoti ।</p>
<p>samāhārasyaikatvāt dvigurekavacanam (2.4.9) ityetadapi vak‍tavyaṃ bhavati ।</p>
<p>evaṃ tarhi bhāvasādhano bhaviṣyati samāharaṇaṃ samāhāra iti ।</p>
<p>atha bhāvasādhanena kimabhidhīyate ?</p>
<p>yat tadauttarārdhyam ।</p>
<p>kaḥ punaḥ pañcagavaṃ, pañcapūlītyādau gavādīnāṃ samāhāraḥ ?</p>
<p>yat tad ārjanaṃ, krayaṇaṃ, bhikṣaṇam, apaharaṇam vā ।</p>
<p>yadyevaṃ vikṣipteṣu pūleṣu carantīṣu goṣu na sidhyati ।</p>

<pb n="052"/>
<p>tarhi samabhyāśīkaraṇaṃ samāhāraḥ ।</p>
<p>evamapi pañcagrāmī, ṣaṇṇagarī ityāderanupapattiḥ ।</p>
<p>kiṃ kāraṇam?</p>
<p>abhyāśīkaraṇārthe samāhāraśabde samiti samantādityabhividhau varttate,
āṅābhimukhye, haratirdeśāntaraprāpaṇe iti ।</p>
<p>nāvaśyaṃ haratirdeśāntaraprāpaṇe eva varttate । kiṃ tarhi ? sādṛśye'pi, māturanuharati
pituranuharatīti ।</p>
<p>athavā— 'pañcagrāmī, ṣaṇṇagarīti nedamityevāvatiṣṭhate, avaśye hyasau tataḥ
kiñcidākāṅkṣati, kriyāṃ guṇaṃ vā । yadākāṅkṣati tadekaṃ, sa samāhāra iti ।</p>
<p>ayaṃ tarhi bhāvasādhane sati doṣaḥ, pañcapūlī ānīyatāmiti dravyasyānayanaṃ na
prāpnoti ।</p>
<p>naiṣa doṣaḥ । tad yathā 'gauranubandhyaḥ' 'ajo'gnīṣomīya' iti jātau coditāyāṃ
tatrā'saṃbhavādālambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanādīni dravye bhavanti ihāpi bhāvānayanasyāsaṃbhavād
dravyasthānayanaṃ bhaviṣyati ।</p>
<p>avyatirekād vā । na hi samūhibhyaḥ samāhāralakṣaṇaḥ samūho vyatirik‍to bhavati ।
evaṃ tarhi bahumātaṅgamiti samāhāre eṣa doṣo bhavati— 'akārāntottarapado dviguḥ striyāṃ
bhāṣyata' iti pañcapūlītivad īkārāntatvaṃ prāpnoti । na vā'yaṃ pātrādiṣu paṭhyate, yena
'catuṣpātra—tribhuvanādivat tanniṣedho bhaviṣyati; nāpyābanto yena 'pañcakhaṭvī pañcakhaṭvam'
ityādivad vikalpo'vakalpeta ।</p>
<p>nanu dvigāvapīkāro na dṛśyate yathā ekaputraḥ ekabhikṣeti ।</p>
<p>nāyaṃ dviguḥ ।</p>
<p>kintarhi? 'pūrvakālaikasarvajaratpurāṇe—(2.1.49) tyādinā karmmadhārayaḥ ।
kiṃ ca bhoḥ । saṃkhyāpūrvo'pi dvigurna bhavati ?</p>
<p>vāḍham, tasya taddhitārthottarapadasamāhāreṣveva bhāvāt । na ceha taddhitārtha uttarapadaṃ vā
vidyate, na caikasya samāhāraḥ saṃbhavati ।</p>
<p>yadā tu sāmarthyātiśayādekasminnapi samūhāropaṇam, tadā, bhavatyeva,
yathā— 'ekāpūpī ekaśāṭīti । kiṃ punardvigusaṃjñā pratyayottarapadayorbhavati ? evaṃ tāvat ।
etarhītaretarāśrayatvādaprasiddhiḥ ।</p>

<pb n="053"/>
<p>kathamitaretarāśrayatvam?</p>
<p>dvigunimitte pratyayottarapade, pratyayottarapadanimittā ca dvigusaṃjñeti ।</p>
<p>evaṃ tarhi 'artha' iti vakṣyāmi</p>
<p>arthe cet taddhitānutpattirbahuvrīhivat । tatra yathā 'citraguḥ śabalaguḥ' iti
bahuvrīhiṇok‍ta— tvānmatvarthasya matvarthīyo na bhavati, evaṃ dvaimāturaḥ pāñcanāpitiḥ' ityādau
taddhitārthasya dvigunok‍tatvāt taddhitotpattirna prāpnoti ।</p>
<p>yathecchasi tathā'stu । astu tāvat pratyayottarapadayoriti ।</p>
<p>nanūktamitaretarāśrayatvādaprasiddhiriti, naiṣa doṣaḥ, nedaṃ tulyamanyairitaretarāśrayaiḥ,
śabdanityatvāt ।</p>
<p>nanu ca na saṃjñā nityā ।</p>
<p>kiṃ tarhi? śabdaḥ ।</p>
<p>yadyevaṃ bhāvinī saṃjñā vidhāsyate । tad‌yathā— 'kaś‍cit tantuvāyamāha asya sūtrasya
śāṭakaṃ vayeti ।</p>
<p>sa paśyati yadi śāṭako na vātavyaḥ, atha vātavyo na śāṭakaḥ । śāṭako
vātavyaś‍ceti vipratiṣiddham । bhāvinī tu khalvasya saṃjñābhipretā; sa manyate — 'vātavyam,
yasminnute śāṭaka ityetad‌bhavatī'—ti । evamihāpi— 'tasmin dvigurbhavati
yasyābhinirvṛttasya pratyaya uttarapadamityete saṃjñe bhaviṣyataḥ iti ।</p>
<p>athavā punastvartha iti ।</p>
<p>nanu cok‍tam 'arthe cet taddhitā'nutpattirbahuvrīhivadi'—ti ।
naiṣa doṣaḥ । nāvaśyamarthaśabdo'bhidheya eva varttate, kiṃ tarhi, syādarthe'pi । tad yathā— 'dārārthaṃ
bhikṣāmahe, janārthaṃ bhikṣāmahe; dārā naḥ syuḥ janā naḥ syuriti । evamihāpi taddhitārthe dvigurbhavati
taddhitaḥ syāditi । dvigorvā lugvacanaṃ jñāpakam (vā.5); yadayaṃ 'dvigorluganapatye' (4.1.88)
iti dvigostaddhitasya lukaṃ śāsti, tajjñāpayati— 'utpadyate dvigostaddhita' iti ।</p>
<p>yadyevam samāhārasamūhayoraviśeṣāt samāhāragrahaṇamanarthakam, 'tasya samūha'
(4.2.37) iti taddhitārthe/naiva kṛtatvāt । tathāhi 'samāhāraḥ samūha'
ityaviśiṣṭāvetāvarthau । tatra samūha iva samāhāre'pi taddhitārthe dvigurityeva bhaviṣyati । yadi
taddhitārthe dvigurbhavatītyucyate, taddhitotpattiḥ prāpnoti । utpadyatām lugbhaviṣyati ।
lukkṛtāni prāpnuvanti । kāni punastāni? 'pañcapūlī' 'daśapūlī' iti ।</p>

<pb n="054"/>
<p>aparimāṇabistācitakambalyebhyo na taddhitaluki (4.1.22) ṅīppratiṣedhaḥ
prāpnoti; 'pañcagavaṃ daśagavamiti 'gorataddhitaluki (5.4.92) iti ṭac na prāpnoti ।</p>
<p>naiṣa doṣaḥ, aviśeṣeṇa dvigo ṅībbhavatītyuktvā 'aparimāṇabistācitakambalyebhyaḥ
samāhāre iti vakṣyāmi; aviśeṣeṇa ca goṣṭac bhavatītyuktvā dvigoḥ samāhāre iti
vakṣyāmi; tadubhayamapi niyamārthaṃ bhaviṣyati 'samāhāra eva nānyatre'—ti ।</p>
<p>evaṃ tarhi abhidhānārthaṃ samāhāragrahaṇam; samāhāreṇābhidhānaṃ yathā syānna taddhitārthena ।</p>
<p>yadi syāt ko doṣaḥ syāt ?</p>
<p>taddhitotpattiḥ prasajyeta ।</p>
<p>prasajyatām, lugbhaviṣyati । lukkṛtāni prāpnuvanti ।</p>
<p>sarvāṇi parihṛtāni ।</p>
<p>na sarvāṇi parihṛtāni । 'pañcakumāri, daśakumārī'—ti luk taddhitaluki (1.2.49)
iti ṅīpo luk prasajyata iti ।</p>
<p>nanu ca yadi taddhitārthe dvigurityucyate 'pañcakhaṭvaḥ, daśakhaṭvaḥ' iti matvarthe'pi
dvigusaṃjñāyāṃ 'dvigoḥ' (4.1.21) itikāraḥ prāpnoti । bahuvrīhisaṃjñayā dvigusaṃjñāyā
bādhitatvānna bhaviṣyati; samānādhikaraṇānāṃ matvarthe bahuvrīhirbhavati ।</p>
<p>yadyuttarapade dvigurityucyate, uttarapadoktirvak‍tavyā । iyamucyate — 'uttarapadena
parimāṇinā dvigoḥ samāsavacanam (vā09); 'dvau māsau jātasya dvimāsajāta:', dve ahanī
jātasya dva‌‍yahnajāta' iti ।</p>
<p>kimucyate parimāṇinaiveti, na punaranyatrāpi; tad yathā 'pañcagavapriyaḥ pañcagavadhana'
iti । anyatra samudāyasya bahuvrīhitvāduttarapadaṃ prasiddhameva (vā.10); tathāhi—
'anekamanyapadārthe (2.2.24) samasyate, bahuvrīhiś‍ca samāse । bhavati ।</p>
<p>atha dvandvasya kā vārttā ? dvandvo'grato viśeṣeṇa vyākariṣyata iti ।</p>
<p>atha bahubhirbahuvrīhiḥ — (vesaṃ. 1.21)</p>
<p><b>cañcadbhujabhramitacaṇḍagadābhighātasañcūrṇitoruyugalasta suyodhanasya'</b> iti ।
tatra cañcad‍bhyāṃ bhujābhyāṃ bhramitāyāś‍caṇḍāyā gadāyā abhighātena
sañcūrṇitamūruyugalamasyeti vigrahaḥ । na caitad vācyam, samānādhikaraṇānāmeva bahuvrīhi,
'saptamīviśeṣaṇe bahuvrīhau (2.2.35) iti jñāpakena vaiyadhikaraṇye'pi bahuvrīheḥ smaraṇāt ।

<pb n="055"/>
etena sarvapadapradhāno dvandvo'pi vyākhyātaḥ, yathā '<b>sūryā'nalā'nilahimāṃśu—
dhaneśaśakrapretādhināthavaruṇāḥ karuṇāspadaṃ naḥ</b>' (māyurājasyodāttarāghave 2.29) iti ।</p>
<p>nanu cānyapadārthe bahuvrīhiḥ smaryate । tatra 'citragurdevadatta' iti devadattāderanuprayogo na
prāpnoti; nahi caitrādiśabdaprayogādavadhṛteṣu caitrādiṣu punaś‍caitrādiśrutayaḥ prayujyante ।
naivam; citraguśabdaḥ citragavīnāṃ svāmisāmānyamabhidhatte । tatrā'vaśyaṃ viśeṣārthinā
viśeṣo'nuprayoktavyaḥ ।</p>
<p>citraguḥ kaḥ?</p>
<p>devadatta iti ।</p>
<p>yatra tvasādhāraṇaviśeṣaṇādibhirviśeṣa eva samāsastatrānuprayogo na bhavatyeva; yathā
trilocanaḥ śūlapāṇiriti । evaṃ tarhi, sāmānyavacanānāmanuprayogasyā'prāptiḥ । yathā—
'citragu sarvam', 'citragu viś‍vam' iti । sāmānyamapi yathā viśeṣaḥ, tathāhi yathā
citraguśabdādiprayoge viśeṣāntarāṇāṃ nivṛttiḥ tathā sarvādiśabdaprayoge viśeṣāṇāṃ nivṛttiḥ
pratīyate ।</p>
<p>yadi vā, 'citrā gāvo'sya devadattasyoti ṣaṣṭhyarthasya samāsenā'bhidhānāt ṣaṣṭhī
nā'nuprayujyate, sambandhī tu na samāsopādāna ityanuprayujyate ।</p>
<p>evaṃ tarhi vibhaktyarthābhidhāyino bahuvrīhipadasya devadattādibhirdravyavacanaiḥ
sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na prāpnoti ।</p>
<p>mublopād bhaviṣyati ।</p>
<p>maivam; matupo'pi saṃbandhārthatvāt dravyavacanairasāmānādhikaraṇyameva ।</p>
<p>na ca bahuvrīhervibhaktyarthābhidhāyino matuppratyayo vidhātuṃ śakyate; sa hi
prathamāsamarthādastyupādhirvidhīyate; na ca vibhaktyarthavṛtterbahuvrīhipadasyāstyādikriyābhiḥ
sāmānādhikaraṇyena sambandho bhavati ।</p>
<p>atha abhihitaḥ so'rtho'ntarbhūtaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ saṃpanna iti sāmānādhi
/?/karaṇyamupapatsyate ।</p>
<p>tanna; abhihito'pyasau yato yatretyādivanna svarūpaṃ hāsyati ।</p>
<p>evaṃ tarhi, yathā— 'jātau padārthe jāteḥ kāryamucyamānamasaṃbhavāt tatsahacaritāsu
vyaktiṣu niviśet tathā bahuvrīhyarthe saṃbandhe sāmānādhikaraṇyakriyāyogādikāryaṃ prayujyamānaṃ
tadāśraye bhaviṣyati; evaṃ ca so'yamityupacaritasaṃbandheṣu saṃbandhiṣu

<pb n="056"/>
bahuvrīhipadairabhidhīyamāneṣu, śuklādiviśeṣaṇānāmivāśrayato liṅgavacanānyapi na
virotsyante ।</p>
<p>yadivā 'anyapadārtha' ityarthagrahaṇasāmarthyāt sadravyasya saliṅgasya sasaṃkhyasya
copādānaṃ bhaviṣyati, na vibhaktyarthamātrasya ।</p>
<p>kathaṃ punararthaśabdopādānādayamartho labhyate ?</p>
<p>śrūyatām— 'anyapada itīyatyucyamāne pade vṛttyasaṃbhāvāt padasahacaritāṃ yāṃ
kāñcidarthamātrāṃ padaśabdo lakṣayet padatvasya vā nimittatvena pratyāsannopakāriṇaṃ vibhaktyarthaṃ
pratyāyayet; so'yamevaṃ siddhe samīhite yadarthagrahaṇaṃ karoti tenaitat jñāpayati 'yāvānarthaśruteḥ
padaviṣayo'rthaḥ pratīyate, tāvān sarvo'pi tyāganimittā'bhāvādupādīyata iti ।</p>
<p>api ca, padamarthasya paricchedāyopādīyate; arthā hi prakṛtyādīnāṃ sāmānyena
prasak‍tāḥ padenāvacchidyante padāvadhiko'rtha upādeya iti; tatra yathā vākyārthasyānāśrayaṇa—
mādhikyāt tathā padārthaikadeśasyāpi, nyūnatvāt । tadevamarthagrahaṇasāmarthyāt saliṅgaḥ
sasaṃkhyaḥ sadravyaś‍ca samarthaḥ padārtha upādīyate ।</p>
<p>nanu ca bahuvrīhiṇā samastapadārthābhidhāne tathā sambandhābhidhāyikā ṣaṣṭhī na
prayujyate tathā saṃkhyābhidhāyinaḥ svādayaḥ, liṅgābhidhāyinaṣṭāvādayo vā na prayujyeran ?</p>
<p>ucyate— ekādipadairiva vṛttipadairabhihitā'pi na saṃkhyā saṃkhyākāryaṃ vighnayiṣyati;
na hi ṣaṣṭhyādividhāna iva vacanavidhāvanabhihitādhikāro vidyate, karmādayaś‍ca
kārakaviśeṣāḥ pratyāyayitavyā ityavaśyavidheyā dvitīyādayaḥ; prathamā tu vacanagrahaṇa—
sāmarthyāt 'na kevalā prakṛtiḥ prayok‍tavyā' iti samayād vā prāthamikakalpikī
bhaviṣyati ।</p>
<p>syādetat,</p>
<p>yathā abhihitā ekatvādayo vacanavyavasthānimittaṃ tathā'bhihitaḥ sambandho'pi
ṣaṣṭhīnimittaṃ bhavati । tadayuktamanabhihitādhikārāt । api ca, sambandhopasarjanaṃ
prātipadikārtho vṛttiśabde— nābhidhīyate; na cāyaṃ ṣaṣṭhīviṣayaḥ, tasyāḥ
prātipādikārthopasarjane saṃbandhe vidhānāt । ṭābādayastu svārthikatvādabhihite'pi
liṅgobhavanti, taduktam— 'siddhaṃ tu striyāḥ prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt svārthe ṭābādaya, iti
(mabhā. 4.1.1 vārtti. 21) ।</p>
<p>yadi vā'nya eva vākyārtho vṛttyarthāt । tathāhi— 'citrā gāvo'syeti

<pb n="057"/>
anyapadārthopasarjanāś‍citragavyo vākyenābhidhīyante, citraguriti punarvṛttau gavārthopasarjanaḥ
svāmī pratīyate; tatra yadā nirjñātaparādhīnatānāṃ citragavīnāṃ svāmiviśeṣā—
'vacchedāyā'nyapadārtha upādīyata 'asyaitā gāva' iti tadā bahuvrīhirna bhavati । yadā tu
tāś‍citrā gāvaḥ svāmino viśeṣābhidhānāya pratyavamṛśyante gavīnāmāsāmayaṃ svāmī'—ti
tadā bahuvrīhirbhavati citraguḥ, śabalaguriti । tāmeva ca svāmiviśeṣaṇatāṃ sphuṭamupadarśayanto
nidarśayanti—'yasya citrā gāvaḥ sa citraguḥ, yasya śabalāḥ sa śabalaguriti ।</p>
<p>upalakṣaṇaṃ cā'tra ṣaṣṭhī । tena karmakarttṛpravacanenā'prathamāyā api
bahuvrīhirvak‍tavyaḥ—'ūḍho ratho'nena ūḍharatho'naḍvān uddhṛta odanaḥ asyā uddhṛtaudanā़
sthālī, upahṛtaḥ paśurasmai upahṛtapaśū rudraḥ, ārūḍho vānaro'mum ārūḍhavānaro vṛkṣaḥ,
prāptā atithayo'smin prāptātithirgrāmaḥ, siddhaḥ sādhako'nayā siddhasādhakā vidye—'ti ।</p>
<p>atha aprathamāyā iti kimardham ?</p>
<p>iha mā bhūd— 'vṛṣṭe deve gata' iti ।</p>
<p>atha iha kasmānna bhavati— 'vṛṣṭe deve gataṃ paśye'—ti ?</p>
<p>bahiraṅgā'tra prathamā ।</p>
<p>yadyevaṃ ṣaṣṭhyādyantaraṅgatve 'citragordevadattasye'—tyādau punaḥ ṣaṣṭhyādayo na syuḥ ।
bāhyaṃ sambandhinamapekṣya bhaviṣyanti ।</p>
<p>atha yathā citraguprabhṛtibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ tathā 'yato yatre'—tyādibhyaḥ
pañcamīsaptamyādayo'pi kasmānna bhavanti?</p>
<p>ucyate— 'tasilū—tralādibhiḥ pañcamīsaptamyādīnāmabhihito'rthonantarbhūtaḥ ।
citraguprabhṛtiṣu tu bahuvrīhiṇā'bhihitaḥ so'rtho'ntarbhūtaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ saṃpannaḥ iti ।</p>
<p>atheha bahuvrīhiḥ kasmānna bhavati 'pañcabhirbhuktamasya' ?</p>
<p>bahuvrīhiḥ samānādhikaraṇānāmeveti smaraṇāt ।</p>
<p>yadyevam— 'astikṣīrā, uccairmukhaḥ, abhāryaḥ, praparṇaḥ, uṣṭramukhaḥ, candravadanā,
keśacūḍaḥ, suvarṇā'laṅkāraḥ, candraśekharaḥ, śūlapāṇiḥ, kaṇṭhekālaḥ, urasilometi
bahuvrahisaṃjñā na prāpnoti । tathāhi— ādyeṣu caturṣu pūrvapadamavyayam, tasyā'sattvavācitvāt
sattvabhūtaiḥ kṣīrādibhiḥ saha sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ nāsti; madhyameṣvapi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣya—
bhāvānupapatterna sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ghaṭato; antyeṣu tu saptamyanta—prathamāntayo—
rasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vyaktameneti ।</p>

<pb n="058"/>
<p>naivam ।</p>
<p>eteṣvapi sāmānādhikaraṇyopapatteḥ । tatra</p>
<p>astīti nipāto vibhaktipratirūpa iti kālaṃ puruṣaṃ saṃkhyāṃ sādhanaṃ ca na
vyabhicarati । uccaiḥśabdasyāpi sattvavacanatvaṃ dṛśyate 'kiṃ punaryastathoccaiḥ (megha. 17)
iti । ataeva etābhyāmastitoccastvamiti bhāvapratyayā api । abhārya ityādiṣu dadhyo
danādivanmadhyamapadalopo vyavasthitavibhāṣayā vṛttiviṣaye draṣṭavyaḥ । tenāyamarthaḥ sampadyate—</p>
<p>asti kṣīramasyāḥ astikṣīrā gauḥ,</p>
<p>uccairmukhamasya uccairmukho maitreyaḥ,</p>
<p>avidyamānā bhāryā asya abhāryaḥ, avidyamānabhāryo vā,</p>
<p>prapatitāni parṇāni asya praparṇaḥ, prapatitaparṇo vā ।</p>
<p>'uṣṭramukhaḥ	candravadane—'tyetayostu	uṣṭracandraśabdau
bhūyo'vayavasāmānyayogātiśayā— dabhedopacāreṇa mukhaviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavantau gauṇī
vṛttimanubhavataḥ ।</p>
<p>nanu kimuṣṭramukhayormithaḥ sādṛśyam?</p>
<p>uṣṭraśabdeneha uṣṭramukhamabhidhīyate, avayave'pyavayavivad upacāro draṣṭavya iti ।
keśacūḍaḥ, suvarṇālaṅkāraḥ, ityetayostu keśasaṃghāte keśaśabdo varttate, suvarṇavikāre tu
suvarṇaśabda, kāraṇe kāryopacārāt ।</p>
<p>'candraśekharaḥ, śūlapāṇiḥ' ityatra candraśūlopalakṣitau śekharapāṇī candraśūla—
śabdābhidheyau । yathā 'kuntān praveśaya yaṣṭīḥ praveśaye' ti ।</p>
<p>'kaṇṭhekāla urasilomā' ityetayostu kaṇṭhe sthitaḥ kāla asya, urasi jātāni
lomānyasye—ti padāntaram adhyāhriyate; yathā dvāraṃ dvāramityukte apāvriyatāṃ saṃvriyatāṃ
veti । etena subadhikāre'stikṣīretyupasaṃkhyānam (2.2.24 vā., mabhā.)</p>
<p>avyayānāṃ bahuvrīhirvak‍tavyaḥ, ( " )</p>
<p>saptamyupamānapūrvapadasyottarapadalopaś‍ca ( " )</p>
<p>samudāyavikāraṣaṣṭhyāś‍ca ( " )</p>
<p>prādibhyo dhātujasya vā ( " )</p>
<p>ityapi na bhavati । ( " )</p>

<pb n="059"/>
<p>nanu parigaṇanārthamapyetadavaśyaṃ vak‍tavyam,</p>
<p>naivam, kriyamāṇe'pi hi parigaṇane yatrābha़idhānaṃ nāsti na tatra samānādhikaraṇānāmapi
bahuvrīhiḥ, tad‌yathā pañca bhuktavanto'syeti । (mabhā. 2.2.24 vā. 10, 16)</p>
<p>evaṃ tarhi matvarthagrahaṇaṃ kariṣyate—' samānādhikaraṇānāṃ matvartha bahuvrīhirbhavatīti;
tathā'pi ūḍho ratho'nena ūḍharatho'naḍvān, dakṣiṇasyāś‍ca pūrvasyāś‍ca diśo yadantarālaṃ sā
dakṣiṇapūrvā, putreṇa saha saputraḥ, keśeṣu keśeṣu ca gṛhītvā pravṛttaṃ yuddhaṃ keśākeśi,
daṇḍaiś‍ca daṇḍaiś‍ca prahṛtya daṇḍādaṇḍi, trirdaśaite tridaśāḥ, ityevamādibhiravyāptireva ।</p>
<p>tasmāt sudūramapi gatvā'bhidhānamevāśrayitavyam । abhidhānalakṣaṇā hi
kṛttaddhitasamāsā iti kṛtaṃ parigaṇanena ।</p>
<p>atha tridaśā iti ko'sya vigrahaḥ ?</p>
<p>trirdaśaite tridaśā iti । saṃkhyāsamāse sujantasya saṃkhyetyaprasiddhiḥ' iti (2.2.25
vārttika—1) na hi atkārāntā saṃkhyā'sti ।</p>
<p>astu tarhi ayameva vigrahaḥ— 'trirdaśaite tridaśā' iti । nanu cok‍taṃ saṃkhyāsamāse
sujantasya saṃkhyetyaprasiddhiriti, naiṣa doṣaḥ, sujantasya saṃkhyetyaprasiddhiḥ, na cā'tra
samāse sujantaṃ paśyāmaḥ ।</p>
<p>kiṃ tarhi ?</p>
<p>vākye suc dṛśyate, samāse tu na dṛśyate ?</p>
<p>abhihitatvāt,</p>
<p>abhihitaḥ sujarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>kena ?</p>
<p>samāsena । kiṃ ca bhoḥ sujarthe samāsa ucyate ?</p>
<p>naivam, sāmarthyādiha sujartho gamyate ।</p>
<p>katham ?</p>
<p>yāvatā saṃkhyā saṃkhyayā saṃkhyāyate, sa ca kriyābhyāvṛttyartha uktaḥ samāseneti
kṛtvā suj na bhaviṣyati ।</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>prakṛtiḥ prātipadikarūpā'pyeṣopadarśitā ।</l>
  <l>svarūpaṃ pratyayādīnāṃ pṛthak pṛthagathocyate ॥ 49 ॥</l>
</lg></b>

<pb n="060"/>
<p>(<b>2. pratyayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>tatra <b>pratīyate'nenārtha iti pratyayaḥ</b> ।</p>
<p>sa tridhā <b>1. dhātupratyayaḥ 2. pratyayapratyayaḥ 3. prātipadikapratyaya</b> iti । teṣu—
(<b>1. dhātupratyayāḥ—</b>)</p>
<p><b>sanādayaḥ, tibādayaḥ, tumunādayaḥ, tavyādayaḥ, ṇvulādayaḥ, uṇādaya</b>ś‍ceti
dhātupratyayabhedāḥ । tatra—</p>
<p>(<b>sanādayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>icchāprayojakavyāpārādikriyāsu kriyāsamabhihārādiṣu ca ye vidhīyamānāḥ
kriyāvacanatvād bhūvādivadeva pratyayāntaramapekṣante te sanādayaḥ । yathā— cikīrṣati,
adhyāpayati, pāpacyate, gopāyati, ṛtīyate, kāmayate iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>tibādayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>kriyāpradhānāḥ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kriyāyāṃ ca ye vihitāḥ sādhyarūpāpannakriyābhidhāyitvena
pratyayāntaraṃ nāpekṣante te tibādayaḥ । yathā 'vrajati devadattaḥ, pacyate odanaḥ, rajyati
vastram, lūyate kedāraḥ, corasya rujati, āsyate yuṣmābhiḥ' iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>tumunādayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>anupātikriyā— kriyābhidhāyino'sattvabhūtārthāḥ sādhyabhāve ye vidhīyante te tumunādayaḥ ।
yathā—'pak‍tumicchati, bhuktvā vrajati, adhītya snāti, pāyaṃpāyamāste, coraṅkāramākrośati,
cakāsāñcakāra iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>tavyādayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>prāyeṇa bhāvakarmmaṇoḥ kartrādiṣu ca ye vidhīyante te tavyādayaḥ । yathā— gantavyaṃ bhavatā,
karaṇīyaḥ kaṭaḥ, kṛtaṃ bhavatā, lūyamānaḥ kedāraḥ, durgamo mārgaḥ, vāstavyo loka' iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>ṇvulādayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>prāyeṇa karttari karmādiṣu ca ye vidhīyante te ṇvulādayaḥ । yathā— pācakaḥ pumān somaṃ
pavamānam, pacanyavāgūm, kanyāmalaṅkariṣṇuḥ, pādahārakaḥ paṅkaḥ, priyaṅkaraṇaṃ śīlam iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>uṇādayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>sarvakārakeṣu siddhabhāve ca ye vidhīyamānāḥ prāyeṇa dravyavacanatvaṃ labhante te
uṇādayaḥ । yathā— śīto vāyuḥ, vatsalā dhātrī, tīkṣṇaṃ dātram, vṛddha upādhyāyaḥ, ramyaḥ
prāsādaḥ, pāko varttata iti ।</p>

<pb n="061"/>
<p>(<b>2. pratyayapratyayāḥ —6</b>)</p>
<p><b>yadādayaḥ, ghādayaḥ, mabādayaḥ, phagādayaḥ, yujādayaḥ, ḍhagādayaś‍ca
pratyayapratyayabhedāḥ ।</b></p>
<p>(<b>yadādayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>teṣu bhavāpatyasvārthamatvarthādiṣu subantebhyo ya utpadyante te yadādayaḥ । yathā—
apsavyaḥ, pūrvāha‍ṇenam, cirantanam, āmuṣyāyaṇaḥ, tvayakā, śubhaṃyuḥ iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>ghādayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>prakarṣā'pakarṣa—kutsā—praśaṃsādiṣu tiṅantebhyo ya utpadyante te ghādayaḥ । yathā—
pacatitarām, gacchatitamām, jalpatikalpam, spṛśatideśyam, pacataki, pacatirūpam
iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>mabādayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>nirvṛttasvārthamatvarthādiṣu kṛdbh‍yo utpadyante te mabādayaḥ yathā— kṛtrimam, pākimam,
sāṃrāviṇam, vyāvakrośī, jitvarī, śyainaṃpātā iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>phagādayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>jīvad‍vaṃśya—praśastakutsitasvārthādiṣu apatyāditaddhitāntebhyo ya utpadyante te
phagādayaḥ । yathā— gārgyāyaṇaḥ, dākṣāyaṇaḥ vārṣyāyaṇikaḥ ābhijityaḥ kauñjāyanya iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>yujādayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>siddhabhāva—tācchīlyopādhikartrādiṣu ṇijādidhātupratyayāntebhyo ya utpadyante te
yujādayaḥ । yathā— kāraṇā, aṭāṭyā, yāyajūkaḥ, sāsahiḥ, yāyāvaraḥ, cikīrṣuḥ iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>ḍhagādayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>apatyādyartha—svārtha—śakti—saṃkhyādiṣu strīpratyayāntebhyo ya utpadyante te
ḍhagādayaḥ । yathā— gāṅge‍yaḥ, yauvateyaḥ, vārāṇaseyaḥ, suvadhūkaḥ, nadyām, khaṭavāyāṃ, yuvatayaḥ
iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>3. prātipadikapratyayāḥ —6</b>)</p>
<p><b>ṭābādayaḥ, svādayaḥ, tasilādayaḥ, kādayaḥ, aṇādayaḥ,</b> kyajādayaś‍ceti
prātipadikapratyayabhedāḥ । teṣu —</p>

<pb n="062"/>
<p>(<b>ṭābādayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>prakṛtiliṅgābhidhāyinaḥ prātipadikād‍ya utpadyante te ṭābādayaḥ । yathā— khaṭvā,
sudāmā, kārīṣagandhyā, brahmabandhūḥ, kumārī yuvatiḥ iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>svādayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>prakṛtyarthasaṃkhyābhidhāyinaḥ prātipadikādeva ya utpadyante te svādayaḥ । yathā—
kuṇḍam, kuṇḍe, kuṇḍābhyām, kuṇḍebhyaḥ, kuṇḍayoḥ, kuṇḍeṣu iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>tasilādayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>śaktimātrābhidhāyinaḥ sopādhiśaktyabhidhāyino vā subantaprātipadikāt svārthādiṣu ya
utpadyante te tasilādayaḥ । yathā— yataḥ, yatra, kadā, purastāt, bahuśaḥ, purutrāvasati iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>kādayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>kutsā—praśaṃsā'tiśayā'natiśayādyupādheranupādheś‍ca subantādeva prātipadikāt
svārthādiṣu ya utpadyante te kādayaḥ । yathā— aśvakaḥ, yuṣmakābhiḥ, vaiyākaraṇarūpaḥ,
paṭutaraḥ kuṭīraḥ, tārtīyīkam iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>aṇādayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>samarthaprātipadikāt sambandhikārakabhāveṣu ya utpadyante te aṇādayaḥ । yathā—
aupagavaḥ, tāvakīnaḥ, ākṣikaḥ, vāmadevyam, brāhmaṇatvam, paurāhityam iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>kyajādayaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>karmādikārakopahita—kriyecchācāra—cvyarthādiṣu samarthādeva prātipaṃdikād ya utpadyante te
kyajādayaḥ । yathā— citrīyate, putrakāmyati, śyenāyate, lohitāyati, kaṇḍūyate, muṇḍayati' iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>3. upaskāraḥ</b>)</p>
<p><b>prakṛtipratyayānāmupasargopagrahāgamalopavarṇavikāravikaraṇādirūpaḥ saṃskāraṃ
upaskāraḥ ।</b></p>
<p>sa ca tridhā <b>(1) prakṛtyupaskāraḥ, (2) pratyayopaskāraḥ,
(3)ubhayopaskāraś‍ceti ।</b></p>
<p>te punarbhūṣaṇa—samavāyā'—dhyāhāra—vaikṛta—yat‍na—pratiyat‍nabhedāt pratyekaṃ
ṣaṭprakārā bhavanti । tatra—</p>

<pb n="063"/>
<p>(<b>1. prakṛtyupaskārāḥ —6</b>)</p>
<p>1. <b>prakṛterbhūṣaṇarūpa</b> nirarthakopasargasvārthaka—vaikalpikādayaḥ । yathā—
adhyāgacchati, paryāgacchati, pralambate, nikhañjati iti; yāvakaḥ, ṣāṅguṇyam,
aupayikam, mānasam iti; ālī, mṛdavī, kamaṇḍalūḥ, cañcūḥ iti ।</p>
<p>2. <b>samavāyarūpāḥ</b> sārthakopasargasankyaṅādayaḥ । yathā—āśāste, pratiṣṭhate, sumanāyate,
durmanāyate, iti। jugupsate, gopāyate, ṛtīyate, kāmayate iti । putrīyati,
putrakāmyati, śyenāyate, muṇḍayati iti ।</p>
<p>3. <b>adhyāhārarūpāḥ</b> sahābhidhāyakopasargadvirvacanasuḍāgamādayaḥ । yathā—adhīte, adhyeti,
anurudhyate, saṃgrāmayate iti; jañjapyate, saṃpanīpadyate, arāryate, undidiṣati iti ।
upaskurute, apaptat, āsthat, madhvasyati iti ।</p>
<p>4. <b>vaikṛtarūpā</b> varṇavyatyaya—viparyayāpāyādayaḥ । yathā—niṣiñcati, praṇayati, yanti, uśanti
iti; taruḥ, siṃhaḥ, sikatā, sak‍‌tava iti; santi, gh‍nanti, dyanti, samagata iti ।</p>
<p>5. <b>yat‍narūpā</b> upacaya—prasava—saṃvṛtyādayaḥ । yathā—yauti, medyati,dīvyati, nigūhati
iti; kīryate, pūryate, saudhātakiḥ, svāyambhuvam iti; āsta, āste, avocat,
ghaṭayati iti ।</p>
<p>6. <b>pratiyat‍narūpāḥ</b> viśeṣādeśavidhiniṣedhādayaḥ । yathā—āha, aghasat, vadhyāt,
adhyagīṣmahi iti; japyaḥ, pitryam, sanam, gavyam, nāvyam iti; titauḥ,
praugam, kokūyate, kathayati iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>2. pratyayopaskārāḥ —6</b>)</p>
<p>1. <b>pratyayasya bhūṣaṇarūpā iḍasugīkagādayaḥ</b> । yathā sahitā, vāritā bhruvai, bhrūṇām iti;
devāsaḥ, pārayāmasi, tāriṣat, bhavāti iti; tārtīyīkam, pītvāya, tvayakā,
pacataki iti ।</p>
<p>2. <b>samavāyarūpāḥ</b> syasicsīyuḍādayaḥ । yathā kariṣyati, akariṣyat, vak‍tā, bravītiṃ
iti, apākṣīt apīpacat, aśiṣat, alikṣat iti; kṛṣīṣṭa, kuryāt, kurvīta,
karavāmahai iti ।</p>
<p>3. <b>adhyāhārarūpāḥ</b> pratyayārthaviśeṣakopasargamap‍tarabādayaḥ । yathā— sumanāyate, durmanāyate,
abhimanāyate, abhiṣeṇayati iti । kṛtrimaṃ sāṃrāviṇam, vyāvahāsī, kauñjāyanyaḥ
iti; pacatitarāṃ, pacamānaḥ, sarveṣām, vṛkṣāṇāmiti ।</p>

<pb n="064"/>
<p>4. <b>vaikṛtarūpāḥ</b> ādeśa—sarvādeśapratyayādeśādayaḥ । yathā—gārgyāyaṇaḥ, cāndramasāyaniḥ,
kauberakaḥ, gaudheraḥ, kauleyaka iti, pavanaḥ, pāvakaḥ, vṛkṣasyaḥ, vṛkṣaiḥ iti; veda,
viveda, vidvān, viddhi iti ।</p>
<p>5. <b>yatnarūpā</b> luglumpanavilumpanādayaḥ । yathā—pacat, juhoti, pañcālāḥ, dadhi iti ।
dadṛśe, adrākṣīt, kārakaḥ, kāmaṇḍaleya iti । ag‍nicit, śubhaṃyāḥ, mūlakhāḥ,
aś‍vati' iti ।</p>
<p>6. <b>pratiyat‍narūpāḥ</b> viśeṣādeśavidhiniṣedhādayaḥ । yathā—tasthau, veda, praśādhi, jīvatāt,
iti; udapādi, rāṣṭriyaḥ, āg‍neyaḥ, s‍traiṇam iti; subhrūḥ, supreyasī, vyatihasanti,
vyatigacchanti iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>3. ubhayopaskārāḥ —6</b>)</p>
<p>1. <b>ubhayorbhūṣaṇarūpā</b> yuṣmatprabhṛtiprayogādayaḥ । yathā— tvaṃ pacasi, yuvāṃ pacathaḥ, yūyaṃ
pacatha, ahaṃ pacāmi, āvāṃ pacāvaḥ, vayaṃ pacāmaḥ, vāyurvāti, devo varṣati,
bhajyate śākhā svayameva, avakirate hastī svayameva, bhūṣayate kanyā svayameva,
brūte kathā svayameveti ।</p>
<p>2. <b>samavāyarūpā</b> vikaraṇādayaḥ । yathā— bhavati, corayati, dīvyati, sunoti, tudati,
tanoti, ruṇaddhi, krīṇāti, svayaṃ namate, dugdhe, tapyate tapaḥ lūyate kedāraḥ, iti ।</p>
<p>3. <b>adhyāhārarūpā</b> dviruktyādayaḥ। yathā— pāyaṃpāyam pacatipacati, grāmo grāmo
ramaṇīyaḥ, mūle mūle sthūlāḥ, agre agre sūkṣmāḥ, pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ puṣyati, prathamaṃ prathamaṃ
pacyate, jyeṣṭhaṃ jyeṣṭhamupaveśaya, māṣaṃ māṣaṃ dehi, uparyuparyāste, ahirahiḥ, budha
yasva budhyasveti ।</p>
<p>4. <b>vaikṛtarūpā</b> vānāvādayaḥ । yathā— grāmo vām, grāmo nau, grāmo vaḥ, grāmo naḥ, grāmaste,
grāmo me, grāmastvā rakṣat, grāmo mā rakṣat, haiyaṅgavīnam, mātulaḥ, kṣatriyaḥ,
śrotriyaḥ iti ।</p>
<p>5. <b>yat‍narūpā</b> anuprayogādayaḥ । yathā— agnisāt saṃpadyate bhasmasād bhavati, brāhmaṇasāt
syāt, devatrākaroti, martyatrāgacchati, manuṣyatrāvasati, śuklībhavati,
paṭapaṭākaroti, cakāsāṃcakāra kārayāmāsa, bibharāmbabhūva, vidāṃkurvantu iti ।</p>
<p>6. <b>pratipayat‍narūpā</b> vidhyanuprayogādayaḥ । yathā— raipoṣaṃ puṣṇāti, samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣati,
jīvagrāhaṃ gṛh‍ṇāti, puruṣavāhaṃ vahati, ūrdhvaśoṣaṃ śuṣkaḥ, cūḍakanāśaṃ naṣṭaḥ,

<pb n="065"/>
odanapākaṃ pakvaḥ, suvarṇanidhāyaṃ nihitaḥ, lunīhi lunīhityevāyaṃ lunāti,
adhīṣvādhīṣve— tyevāyamadhīte, bhrāṣṭamaṭa maṭhamaṭa, khadūramaṭetyevāyamaṭati,
'saktūn piba, dhānāḥ khāda odanaṃ bhuṅkṣvetyevāyamabhyavaharati iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>4. upapadam</b>)</p>
<p><b>upaskāraviśeṣa eva prakṛtisamīpoccāritaṃ padamupapadam ।</b></p>
<p>tat tridhā <b>1. tiṅupapadam, 2. kṛdupapadam, 3. subupapadaṃ</b> ca ।</p>
<p>(<b>1. tiṅupapadam —6</b>)</p>
<p>teṣu prathamaṃ kriyārūpam, kārakarūpam, nāmarūpam, avyayarūpam, nipātarūpam
upasargarūpaṃ ca । teṣu—</p>
<p><b>kriyārūpaṃ</b> yathā— ehi manye rathena yāsyati na marṣayāmi yat tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet ।</p>
<p><b>kārakarūpaṃ</b> yathā— aś‍vena saṃcarate, dāsyā saṃprayacchate ।</p>
<p><b>nāmarūpaṃ</b> yathā— kālo yad bhuñjīta bhavān ।</p>
<p><b>avyayarūpaṃ</b> yathā— kathaṃ nāma tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, namate daṇḍaḥ svayameva ।</p>
<p><b>nipātarūpaṃ</b> yathā— yāvad bhuṅkte, purā vrajati</p>
<p><b>upasargarūpaṃ</b> yathā— parākramate parājayate iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>2. kṛdupapadam —6</b>)</p>
<p>dvitīyamapi kriyārūpam, kārakarūpam, nāmarūpam, avyayarūpam, nipātarūpam
upasargarūpaṃ ca । teṣu —</p>
<p><b>kriyārūpaṃ</b> yathā— bhok‍tuṃ vrajati, bhojako vrajati, godāyo vrajati, karttumicchati iti ।</p>
<p><b>kārakarūpaṃ</b> yathā— kumbhakāraḥ, uttānaśayaḥ, śayyotthāyam, mūlakopadaṃśam iti ।</p>
<p><b>nāmarūpaṃ</b> yathā— kālo bhok‍tum, samayo bhok‍tum, brahmabhūyam, brahmodyam iti ।</p>
<p><b>avyayarūpaṃ</b> yathā— divākaraḥ, doṣākaraḥ, mṛṣodyam, īṣatpānaḥ iti ।</p>
<p><b>nipātarūpaṃ</b> yathā— alaṃkṛtvā, khalu kṛtvā, yāvad‍vedam anyathākāramiti ।</p>
<p><b>upasargarūpaṃ</b> yathā— prajayī, prasavī, vikatthī, nirākariṣṇuḥ iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>3. subupapadam —6</b>)</p>
<p>tṛtīyaṃ kriyārūpam kārakarūpaṃ nāmarūpam avyayarūpam, nipātarūpam
karmapravacanīyarūpaṃ ceti । teṣu —</p>
<p><b>kriyārūpaṃ</b> yathā— na tvāṃ tṛṇāya manye, saṃtāpāya prabhavati, goṣu duhyamānāsu
gataḥ, krośataḥ prāvrājīditi ।</p>

<pb n="066"/>
<p><b>kārakarūpaṃ</b> yathā— carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ hanti dantayorhanti kuñjaram, keśeṣu
prasitaḥ, brāhmaṇeṣu bhuñjāneṣu vṛṣalā āsate, vṛṣaleṣvāsīneṣu
brāhmaṇā bhuñjate iti ।</p>
<p><b>nāmarūpaṃ</b> yathā— gavāṃ svāmī, annasya hetorvasati, pitrā sadṛśaḥ, śivaṃ
prajābhya iti ।</p>
<p><b>avyayarūpaṃ</b> yathā— samayā grāmam, sahacchātreṇa, namo devebhyaḥ, dakṣiṇāhi
grāmāt iti ।</p>
<p><b>nipātarūpaṃ</b> yathā— he devadatta? hā devadattam, vinā viṣṇumitreṇa, ṛte
yajñadattāditi ।</p>
<p><b>karmapravacanīyarūpaṃ</b> yathā— vṛkṣamanu vidyotate, upārjunaṃ yoddhāraḥ, adhi brahmadatte
pañcālāḥ, adhi pañcāleṣu brahmadatta iti ॥</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>prakṛtipratyayāvevamupaskāraś‍ca darśitaḥ ।</l>
  <l>kramādupapadasyāpi svarūpamupavarṇitam ॥ 50 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
  <l>avyayāni nipātāś‍ca gatayaś‍ca nirūpitāḥ ।</l>
  <l>karmapravacanīyāś‍ca sopasargāḥ prakāśitāḥ ॥ 51॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
  <l>na kevaleha prakṛtiḥ prayujyate na kevalāḥ suptiṅajaṇkyajādayaḥ ।</l>
  <l>bhavatyupaskāra ihā'pṛthagdvayordvayārthamevopapadaṃ prayujyate ॥ 42 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>iti mahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śṛṅgāraprakāśe
prakṛtyādiprakāśo nāma
॥ prathamaḥ prakāśaḥ</b> ॥ 1 ॥*</p>
<lg><l>prakāśa eṣo'dya sanātanena vyadhāyi nūnaṃ vitataprakāśaḥ ।</l>
  <l>praś‍leṣabandhādupamucya tat‍tatpraghaṭṭarājatpravibhak‍tagātraḥ ॥</l></lg>
<!-- NOTES pg=066!-->
evamatra prathamaprakāśe dvādaśasu śabdabhedeṣu prathame catvāro bhedā nirūpitāḥ । madhyavarttinaś‍catvāro dvitīye
draṣṭavyāḥ । antimāś‍catvāro punastṛtīye । evaṃ śabdabhedāya prakāśatrayamadhikriyate ।

<pb n="067"/>
<p>atha</p>
<p><b>śṛṅgāraprakāśe dvitīyaḥ prakāśaḥ</b></p>
<p>prātipadikaprakāśaḥ</p>
<p>(<b>5. prātipadikam</b>)</p>
<p><b>prātipadikaṃ tridhā—</b></p>
<p>1. <b>vibhak‍tāvayavam,</b></p>
<p>2. <b>avibhak‍tāvayavam</b>1</p>
<p>3. <b>anukaraṇaṃ</b> ca । tatra2</p>
<p><b>1. vibhak‍tāvayaṃ tridhā— 1. kṛd‍rūpam, 2. taddhitarūpam, 3. samāsarūpaṃ</b> ca । teṣu —</p>
<p>(<b>1. kṛd‍rūpam vibhak‍tāvayam</b>)</p>
<p><b>bhāva—kārakā'bhidhāyino dhātupratyayāḥ kṛtaḥ</b> । tatra—</p>
<p>(<b>bhāvaḥ —6</b>)</p>
<p><b>dhātvartha evā'pūrvāparībhūto bhāvaḥ</b> । yadāha— (vāpa. 3.8.12)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>kālānupāti yad rūpaṃ dhātvarthasya kriyeti tat ।</l>
  <l>parito yat paricchinnaṃ tad‍bhāva iti kathyate ॥ 1 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>sa (bhāva) iha ṣoḍhā saṃbhavati— 1. <b>siddhaḥ, 2. sādhyaḥ, 3. siddhāsamāptaḥ,
4. sādhyā'samāptaḥ, 5. siddhasādhyaḥ, 6. sādhyasiddhaś‍ce</b>ti । teṣu—</p>
<p>(<b>1. siddhaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>udbhūtapratyayāṃśatvena kriyā'nudrekāt sattvabhūtatve liṅgasaṃkhyādyupagrāhī
'kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kṛti' (2.3.65) iti sambandhavibhak‍ternimittaṃ <b>siddhaḥ</b> । yathā—
'āś‍caryamidamodanasya ca pāko brāhmaṇānāṃ ca prādurbhāvaḥ, bhedikā kāṣṭhānāṃ devadattasya,
cikīrṣā yajñadattasya kaṭasya' iti । atra 'ubhayaprāptau karmaṇi (2.3.66) eveti niyame
ubhayoḥ prāptiryasmin kṛti' iti vyākhyānāt (mabhā. 2.3.66) akākārayoś‍ca
niyamapratiṣedhāt karttaryapi ṣaṣṭhyeva bhavantī bhāvasya siddhatāṃ dyotayati ।</p>
<!-- NOTES pg=067!-->
1. dra. pṛ0 119 । 2. dra. pṛ0 120 ।

<pb n="068"/>
<p>(<b>2. sādhyaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>udbhūtaprakṛtyaṃśatvena kriyodrekādasattvabhūtatve liṅgasaṃkhyādyanupagrāhī kartṛkarmaṇoḥ
kārakavibhaktereva nimittaṃ <b>sādhyaḥ</b> । yathā— odanaṃ bhok‍tuṃ yāti, svādhyāyamadhītya snāti,
payaḥ pāyaṃpāyamāste iti । ataeva 'na lokāvyayakhalarthatṝnām' (2.3.69) ityādinā
ṣaṣṭhī niṣidhyate ।</p>
<p>(<b>3. siddhāsamāptaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>siddha eva taddhitānubandhī <b>siddhāsamāptaḥ</b> । yathā — vyāvakrośī, sāṃkūṭinam,
kṛtrimam iti । atra</p>
<p>yathā 'ābhijityaḥ, kauñjāyanyaḥ' ityādāvaṇādyabhihito'pyapatyārthaḥ, taittirīyāḥ
chāgaleyinaḥ ityādau chaṇādyabhihito'pi proktārthaḥ, svārthikādhyetṛveditṛviṣaya—
taddhitotpattimantareṇa na samāpyate, tathā vyatihārābhividhyupādhiko ṇajinuṇuktaḥ śuddhaś‍ca
ktryabhihita siddho'pi bhāvaḥ svārthikanirvṛttāthīyitaddhitotpattimantareṇa na samāpyata iti
siddhāsamāpto bhavati ।</p>
<p>(<b>4. sādhyāsamāptaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>sādhya evānuprayogānubandhī <b>sādhyāsamāptaḥ</b> । yathā cakāsāñcakāra vidāṅkurvantu,
raipoṣaṃ puṣyati iti । atra</p>
<p>yathā śuklībhavati, paṭapaṭākaroti ityādāvabhūtatad‍bhāvādiṣu cvyādyantam, lunīhi
lunīhi ityevāyaṃ lunāti, bhrāṣṭramaṭa maṭhamaṭa khadūramaṭetyevāyamaṭati ityādiṣu
kriyāsamabhihārādiṣu loḍantam anabhivyakta padārthakatvādasamāptaṃ svārthābhivyaktaye
kṛbhvādyanuprayogaṃ yathāvidhyanuprayogaṃ cāpekṣate tathā āmantaṃ ṇamulantaṃ cā'nabhivyakta—
padārthakatvādasamāptaṃ sādhyarūpameva svārthābhivyaktaye kṛbhvādyanuprayogaṃ yathāvidhyanuprayogaṃ
cāpekṣate ityetaduk‍to bhāvaḥ sādhyā'samāpte । bhavati । tadāha — āma iva
ṇamulo'pyasamāptārthatvāccādivadanuprayogaḥ siddha evaṃ । yathāvidhyarthaṃ tu vacanaṃ 'kaṣādiṣu
yathāvidhyanuprayogaḥ' (3.4.46) iti । tena cakāsāñcakāra itayādinā'yamartho bhavati
cakāsti sma, vidantu, rāyaḥ puṣyannamuṃ puṣyati iti । ataeva kriyāviśeṣaṇenaiva siddhamiti
na kecit ṇamulprakaraṇamārabhante ।</p>

<pb n="069"/>
<p>nanu ca,</p>
<p>kriyāviśeṣaṇānāṃ karmatā napusakatā ca; kathaṃ ca puṣereva puṣiḥ karma bhavati। na
hyātmanaivātmā vyāpyate, na hi suśikṣito'pi vaṭuḥ svaṃ skandhamāroḍhuṃ śaknoti।</p>
<p>naivam।</p>
<p>'nāgarakavṛttaṃ vartteta, viś‍vajitā yajete'—tyādau sāmānyaviśeṣayoranaikātmayena
vyāptyavacchedayorūpalambhāt samānyapuṣerevā'vayavapuṣiḥ karma bhavati। na ca
kriyāviśeṣaṇānāṃ karmataiveti niyamaḥ; kriyā hi yathā sādhyāyamānatvāt karma,
tathotpadyamānatvāt kartryapi bhavati। tataś‍cobhayathā'pi kriyāviśeṣaṇāniyojyanteraipoṣaṃ
kṛtvā puṣyati, raipoṣaṃ yathā bhavatyevaṃ puṣyatīti।</p>
<p><b>(5. siddhasādhyaḥ)</b></p>
<p>siddha eva sādhyadharmayogī <b>siddhasādhyaḥ।</b> yathā— āś‍carye gavāṃ
doho'śikṣitenā'gepālena, sadhu khalu payasaḥ pānaṃ yajñadattena, vicitrā hi sūtrasya kṛtiḥ
pāṇininā iti। atra ubhayaprāptau karmaṇyeva ṣaṣṭhīti (3.2.8) karttari tṛtīyāmnānāt
siddho'pyayaṃ vivakṣātaḥ sadhyo'pi bhavatīti jñāyate।</p>
<p>anye tvanyathā siddhasādhyaṃ varṇayanti—uṣṭrāsikāmāste, pañca vārān bhuṅkte pañca
prayogan pacati iti। tatroṣṭrāsikāvāraprayogāṇāṃ kriyāviśeṣāvṛttyanuṣṭhāna—
rupatvenāpṛthagbhāvāt kriyābhikhyāpय़ānāṃ dvitīyādarśanādabhedavivakṣātaḥ siddhānāmapi
kriyāvadeva sādhyatvamavagamyate। tadāha—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>tatsvabhāvaviśeṣatvād vyāpyā noṣṭrāsikā'nayā।
sādhyatve tvāsanaikātmyāt phalataḥ karma kathyate ॥2॥</l></lg></b>
<b><lg>
  <l>so'yamityabhisaṃbandhādabhede dharmadharmiṇoḥ।
kriyāyā iva sādhyatvaṃ vārādīnāṃ na duṣyati ॥3॥</l></lg></b>
<p>tena uṣṭrāsikāmāsta ityādīnāmayamarye bhavati— 'uṣṭravadāste, pañcāvṛttiṃ
bhujikriyāṃ karoti, pañca pākānnirvartayati' iti।</p>
<p><b>(6. sādhyasiddhaḥ)</b></p>
<p>sadhya eva siddhadharmayogī <b>sadhyasiddhaḥ।</b> yathā— karttavyaṃ bhavataḥ, kāryaṃ bhavataḥ,
kṛtaṃ bhavata iti। atra 'na lokāvyayaniṣṭhākhalarthatṛnām' (2.3.69) iti lādīnāṃ

<pb n="070"/>
sādhyārthābhidhāyitvāt kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ṣaṣṭhīniṣedhe, 'kṛtyānāṃ karttari vā' (2.3.71),
'ktasya ca varttamāne' (2.367), 'napusake bhāve kta upasaṃkhyānam' (2.367 vārttika),
ityādibhiḥ punaḥ ṣaṣṭhīvidhānāt pakṣe vivaśkṣātaḥ siddhārthābhidhāyitvamavagamyata
ityetaduktto bhāvaḥ sadhyasiddho bhavati। na cā'tra kṛtyānāṃ niṣedho na śrūyate, yataḥ—
'khalarthatṛnām' ityatra khalarthetyanena kṛtya—kta—khalarthāḥ śatṛ—śanaccānaśaś‍ca
saṃgṛhyante; tṛnnityanena punastṛnneveti। ata eva niṣṭhādibhāvasyeva kṛtyabhāvasya karmaṇyapi
ṣaṣṭhī na bhavati। yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>gatamastaṃ yathā'rkeṇa yathā'bhyuditamindunā।
tathā mānena śaithilyamāgantavyaṃ mṛgīdṛśaḥ ॥4॥</l></lg></b>
<p>kathaṃ punaḥ sakarmakād bhāvapratyayaḥ?</p>
<p>tena hyakarmakād bhavitavyam; yadāha 'laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve cā'karmakebhyaḥ' (3.4.
69), 'tayoreva kṛtya—kta—khalarthāḥ' (3.4.70); na hi bhavati kṛtaṃ kaṭaṃ devadatteneti।</p>
<p>ucyate— naitadantaraṅgaṃ dravyakarma, apitu 'kālādhvabhāvagantavyāḥ karmasaṃjñā
hyakarmaṇām' (mabhā. 14.51) iti bahiraṅgeṣu kālādikarmasu gantavyalakṣaṇaṃ gatyarthakarma;
bahiraṅgatā ca 'kālādhvanoratyantasaṃyoge' (2.3.5) ityanena dvitīyāvidhānena, bhāvasya ca
kālādabhedena, gantavyasya tu 'gatyarthakarmaṇi dvitīyācaturthyai—(2.3.12) iti
punardvitīyāgrahaṇena jñāyate; anyathā hi karmaṇi dvitīyāyāḥ siddhatvāt gatyarthakarmaṇi
caturthī cetyeva brūyāt।</p>
<p>yasyaiva ca dravyakarmaṇorantaraṅgasyābhāvenākarmakaḥ tasyaiva bhāvena sakarmako bhavati
ato vidyamānamapi kālādikarma nākarmakavyapadeśaṃ vighnayati।</p>
<p>anye tvanyathā sādhyasiddhaṃ varṇayanti— 'uṣṭrāsikā āsyante' hataśāyikāḥ
śayyante, yavāgvāḥ pākāya vrajati iti। atra āsikāśāyikayogakhyātābhihita—
kriyātmakatvāt pākasya vrajñikriyāsādhyatvāt, satyapi sādhyatve liṅga saṃkhyāsambandhi
vibhaktiyogād vivakṣātaḥ siddhatvamapi gamyata ityayaṃ sādhyasiddho bhavati। tathāpi
'uṣṭrāsikā āsyante, hataśadikāḥ śayyanta' ityamūbhyāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣopacarita rūpo
bhāvātmaiva pratyāyyate। sa ākhyātābhyāṃ sāmānyarūpeṇa, ṇvulantābhyāṃ viśoṣarūpeṇa।
bahuvacanaṃ tu kutsātiśayārtham; yā hi nāma uṣṭrasya kuysāvatyo bahuprakārajuṣo bahvya

<pb n="071"/>
āsikā; yāś‍ca hatānāmatiśayavatyastathābhūtā eva bhūyasyaḥ śāyikāḥ pratītāḥ,
tābhirviśeṣarūpābhiriyamāsikā śāyikā copamānopameyasambandhajanitabhedā'bheda—
parigrahāllakāreṇāpi sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvena kutsātiśayārthaṃ bahutvenaiva pratyāyyate, bahutvena
vinā sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvānupapatteḥ, tenoṣṭrāsikā ivāsanāni, hataśāvikā iva śayanāni
kriyante bhavantīti vā vākyārtho bhavati ।</p>
<p>nanvevamuṣṭrāsikādīnāṃ vāraprayogādānāñca karmateva napuṃsakatāpi prāpnoti; yathā— 'mṛdu
pacati, praśastaṃ pacatīti । ucyate—</p>
<p>tridhā khala <b>kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ</b> bhavati —</p>
<p><b>1. bāhyam, 2. ābhyantaram 3. bāhyābhyantaraṃ</b> ca । tatra—
<b>bāhyaṃ</b> dharmarūpaṃ vārādi;
<b>ābhyantaraṃ</b> viśeṣarūpamuṣṭrāsikādi,
<b>bāhyābhyantaraṃ</b> guṇarūpaṃ mṛd‌vādi । teṣu—</p>
<p><b>bāhyam</b> 'so'yamityabhisambandhād', abhedopacāreṇāvicalitasvarūpameva pradhānaṃ
viśiṃṣat kathamiva svaliṅgaṃ jahyāt?</p>
<p><b>ābhyantaraṃ</b> tu viśeṣāṃśaparigrahādāviṣṭaliṅgasaṃkhyaṃ kathamivānyaliṅgaṃ gṛh‍ṇīyāt?</p>
<p><b>bāhyābhyantaraṃ</b> tu guṇatvāt svaliṅgavirahe 'guṇavacanānāmāśrayato liṅgavacanānī'—ti
viśeṣyaliṅgagrāhyeva bhavati; tatra sādhyaikasvabhāvatvādaliṅgasaṃkhyāyāḥ kriyāyā viśeṣaṇatve
mṛd‌vādīnāṃ napuṃsakatvameva nyāyyam । uṣṭrāsikā—vārādīnāṃ tu nityamāviṣṭaliṅgatvād
viśeṣāṃka śaparigrahāt kriyāviśeṣaṇatve'pi na napuṃsakaliṅgatā ।</p>
<p>atha 'pākāya vrajati, edhebhyo vrajati' iti kriyāyā randhanāya sthālītivat
tādarthyacaturthyantaḥ siddha eva kasmānna vijñāyate ? naivam, 'bhāvavacanāś‍ca' (3.3.11) iti
tādarthya eva pratyayotpatteḥ, 'tumarthācca bhāvavacanāt' (2.3.15) iti svārtha eva
caturthīvidhānāt । kimarthaṃ punaridam?</p>
<p>bhāvehi ghañādayaḥ siddhā eva, tādarthye caturthī । kriyārthopapadena tumunā'smin viṣaye
ghañādayo mā bādhiṣataḥ; vāsarūpavidhiś‍cā'tra 'tumun‌ṇvulau' (3.3.10) iti
ṇvulgrahaṇānnāvatarati ।</p>
<p>atha yathaidhānāharttuṃ vrajati edhebhyo vrajatīti kriyārthopapadasya ca karmaṇi sthāninaḥ
(2.3.14) iti caturthī, tathā pākaṃ karttuṃ vrajati pākāya vrajatīti yadi bhavet ko doṣaḥ

<pb n="072"/>
syāt? na kaś‍cit । kiṃ tvetat pṛcchāmi — sa pākaḥ siddhaḥ sādhyo vā ? yadi siddhaḥ
kiṃ karttuṃ vrajati ? atha sādhyaḥ kriyārthopapadeṣu tumunā ghañādayo bādhyante ।</p>
<p>atha tumarthatvena sādhyābhidhāyinaś‍caturthyantatvena cāsattvabhūtārthāḥ pākāyetyādiṣu
ghañādayaḥ, kathaṃ yavāgvā ityādeḥ saṃbandhavibhak‍ternimittaṃ bhavati ?</p>
<p>śabdaśaktireṣā yat kasyacideva kenacit kenacideva kasyacit sambandhaḥ । tad‌yathā
abhinne'pyarthe 'prajāgaritā'pararātrāni'—ti tṛno bāhya karmopasargakarmayogāj jñāyate 'na
jāgarūka iti' uktasya; 'ūrīkaroti pākādikami'—tyūryādīnā mekāneka viśeṣasthayā
karotikriyayā bhavati saṃbandhaḥ, na tadarthaviṣayaiḥ pacādibhiḥ, sūryamapi na paśyantyasūryaṃpaśyā
rājadārā iti vyavahitāmapi sūryakarmikāṃ dṛśikriyāṃ nañ niṣedhati, na sūryasattām; evaṃ
na punargīyante apunargeyāḥ ś‍lokāḥ, śrāddhaṃ na bhuṅkte aśrāddhabhojī brāhmaṇa iti, tathā
lavaṇaṃ na bhuṅkte alavaṇabhojī bhikṣuḥ ityasūryaṃpaśyādivadasāmarthye'pi nañsamāso
dṛśyate;na tvakiñcitkurvāṇa iti, evam 'amāṣaṃ haramāṇaḥ, agādhādutsṛpta' iti ।</p>
<p>api ca 'payaḥ pāyaṃ pāyaṃ', payaḥ pītvā pītvā, grahamanu praveśamanu praveśam,
gehamanupraviśyānupraviśya ityābhīkṣṇyavīpsayoḥ padadvirvacanaṃ prayojayanti ṇamulādayaḥ, na
pācyate dviśo dehīti yaṅśasādayaḥ lolūyata iti dvirvacanamantareṇāpi
kriyāsamabhihāramavagamayati yaṅantam na lunīhi lunīhīti loḍantam; kṛtapūrvī kaṭam,
adhītī vyākaraṇam iti vṛttivaśenojjhitakarmābhidhānaśak‍tayaḥ karmavibhaktiṃ na vighnayanti
niṣṭhādayaḥ; grāmaṃ gantumanāḥ, kaṭaṃ karttukāma iti nivṛtticchinnā api karmaṇi dvitīyā meva
prayojayanti tumunādayaḥ ubhayaprāptau karmaṇyeveti niyame'pi vicitrā sūtrasya kṛtiḥ pāṇineḥ
iti śabdānāmanuśāsanamācāryasya iti samāsasya karttari sambandhavibhaktimapyu pādadate
ktinādayaḥ, sādhyārthābhidhāyino'sattvabhūtārthā api yavāgvāḥ pākāyeti karmaṇi
sambandhavibhaktyeva saṃbadhyante ghañādayaḥ iti taduktabhāvaḥ sādhyasiddho bhavati । (iti
bhāvavimarśaḥ । atha kārakavimarśaḥ ।</p>
<p>(kha. <b>kārakābhidhāyino dhātupratyayāḥ</b>)</p>
<p><b>kriyānimittaṃ kārakam</b> । tadapi ṣoḍhā —</p>
<p><b>1. karttā, 2. karma, 3. karaṇam, 4. saṃpradānam, 5. apādānam, 6. adhikaraṇaṃ</b>
ceti । tatra—</p>

<pb n="073"/>
<p>(<b>1</b>) <b>karttā — svatantraḥ, hetuḥ, karmakarttā</b> ca । teṣu —
(<b>svatantraḥ</b>) kriyāyāḥ svecchayā karaṇādīni yaḥ prayuṅkte, na tu taiḥ prayujyate, sa
svatantraḥ । yathā— putraṇetrasya darśakaḥ, purāṃ bhetteti ।</p>
<p>(<b>hetuḥ</b>) tameva kriyāprayuktaṃ yaḥ prayuṅkte sa hetuḥ । yathā— rājānaṃ yodhitavān
rājayudhvā dhanuṣmān, nakhāni mocayanti nakhamucāni dhanūṣīti ।</p>
<p>(<b>karmakarttā</b>) karmaiva svātantryeṇa vivakṣitaṃ karmakarttā । yathā— svayameva pacyante
pacelimā māṣāḥ, svayameva bhajyante bhaṅgurāṇi kāṣṭhāni iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>2</b>) <b>karma — nirvartyaṃ, vikāryaṃ, prāpyaṃ</b> ca । teṣu —
(<b>nirvartyam</b>) yadasajjanyate sad‌vā prakāśyate tannirvartyam । yathā—
karttavyaḥ kaṭaḥ, uccāryaḥ śabdaḥ iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>vikāryam</b>) yasya prakṛtyucchedo guṇāntaraṃ votpadyate tad vikāryam । yathā—bhuk‍ta
odanaḥ, lūyamānaḥ kedāraḥ iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>prāpyam</b>) kriyākṛtaviśeṣā'navagatau karttuḥ kriyayā'nāsthitamāsthitaṃ vā
yadāpyate tat prāpyam । yathā— 'durdarśaḥ prabhuḥ, suyāno mārga iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>3</b>) <b>karaṇaṃ— bāhyam, ābhyantaraṃ, bāhyābhyantaraṃ</b> ca । teṣu—
(<b>bāhyam</b>) karttuḥ śarīrād bahirupalabhyamānaṃ bāhyam । yathā— āśitaṃ bhavaṃ
bhak‍tam, dhṛtodakaḥ karakaḥ iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>ābhyantaram</b>) tadivaparītamābhyantaram । yathā— priyaṃkaraṇaṃ śīlam, vaśīkaraṇaṃ
prema, iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>bāhyābhyantaram</b>) ubhayaguṇayogi bāhyābhyantaram । yathā— darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ, saṃvananaṃ
sāma iti ।</p>
<p>(4) <b>saṃpradānaṃ— dadātikarmāpyam, karmamātrāpyaṃ, kriyāpyaṃ</b>, ca । teṣu</p>
<p>(<b>dadātikarmāpyam</b>) samyak pradīyate'smai ityanvarthasaṃjñāyā viṣayo dadātikarmāpyam ।
yathā— dīyate'smai dānīyo brāhmaṇaḥ, devā deyāsurasmai devadāyo ḍimbha iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>karmamātrāpyam</b>) 'karmaṇā yamabhipraiti saṃpradānam' (1.4.32) iti pāribhāṣika—
saṃjñāmātraviṣayaḥ karmamātrāpyam । yathā—dāśyate'smai deyamiti dāśaḥ
kaivarttaḥ, gāṃ hanti tasmai āgatāyeti goghno'tithiḥ iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>kriyāpyam</b>) karmaśabdena kriyāyā apyupādānāt kriyayā yadāpyate tat kriyāpyam ।</p>

<pb n="074"/>
<p>yathā— ś‍lāghante'smai janā iti ś‍lāghyo rājā, spṛhayantyasmai lokāḥ
spṛhaṇīyo vibhava iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>5</b>) <b>apādānam — nirdiṣṭaviṣayam, upāttaviṣayam apekṣitakriyaṃ</b> ca । tatra—</p>
<p>(<b>nirdiṣṭaviṣayam</b>) 'dhruvamapāye'pādānam' (1.4.24) iti nirdiṣṭaviṣayam ।
yathā— prapatano giriḥ, prasravaṇaḥ śailaḥ iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>upāttaviṣayam</b>) bhītrārthā(1.4.25)diyogoktamupāttaviṣayam ।
yathā— 'bhayānako dviṣām, prabhavaḥ saṃpadām' iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>apekṣitakriyam</b>) avadhimātrārthamapekṣitakriyam ।
yathā— avadhiḥ parvataḥ, maryādā samudraḥ, iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>6</b>) <b>adhikaraṇaṃ — vaiṣayikam, aupaś‍leṣikam, naimittikaṃ</b> ca । teṣu —</p>
<p>(<b>vaiṣayikam</b>) vividhamanekaprakāraṃ jātiguṇakriyādravyādibhiḥ sinotīti । viṣayo
deśakālādiḥ, viṣaya eva vaiṣayikam । yathā— nipibantyasmin gavādaya
iti nipānaṃ jalāśayaḥ, rājāno dhīyante'syāṃ rājadhānīnagaram iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>aupaś‍leṣikam</b>) upaś‍leṣo'vaṣṭambhaḥ, tasmai prabhavatyaupaś‍leṣikam । yathā— iṣavo
dhīyante'smin iṣudhiḥ upāsaṅgam, śerate'syāṃ śayyā paryaṅkaḥ ।</p>
<p>(<b>naimittikam</b>) nimittameva naimittikam । yathā— rajyante'smin sāmājikamanāṃsīti
raṅgaḥ prekṣā, prasīdantyasmin nayanamanāṃsīti prāsādaḥ saudham iti ।</p>
<p>tadatedubhayamapi1 — <b>1. śuddham, 2. saṃkīrṇam, 3. upādhimat, 4. rūḍhimat,
5. saṃbandhi, 6. anubandhi</b> ceti <b>ṣoḍhā</b> viprathate । tatra—</p>
<p>(<b>1. śuddham</b>) arthāntarairasaṃsparśaḥ śuddhiḥ ।</p>
<p>sā bhāvānāṃ yathā— odanasya pākaḥ, alaṃ kṛtvā, khalu sthitvā iti ।</p>
<p>kārakāṇāṃ yathā— apāṃ straṣṭā, varṣaśatasya pūrakaḥ, some pavamāna iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>2. saṃkīrṇam</b>) saṃparkaḥ saṃkaraḥ ।</p>
<p>sa bhāvānāṃ yathā— kālo bhok‍tum, alaṃ bhok‍tum, bhojaṃ bhojaṃ vrajatīti ।</p>
<p>kārakāṇāṃ yathā— gamanamarhati gamyā yoṣit, jetuṃ śakyate jayyaḥ śatruḥ,
pak‍tuṃ vrajati, pācako vrajati iti ।</p>
<!-- NOTES pg=074!-->
1. 'bhāva—kārakā'bhidhāyino dhātupratyayāḥ' dra. pṛ. 67

<pb n="075"/>
<p>(<b>3. upādhimat</b>) bāhyam, ābhyantaram, ubhayaṃ vā śāstropāttaṃ viśeṣaṇamupādhiḥ ।
sa bhāvānāṃ yathā— bhavataḥ śāyikā, upasaro gavām, samajaḥ paśūnāmiti ।
kārakāṇāṃ yathā— tundaparimṛjo'lasaḥ, stamberamo hastī, dṛtihariḥ paśuḥ iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>4. rūḍhiḥ</b>) guṇavacanatve dravyavacanatvaṃ rūḍhiḥ । sā
bhāvānāṃ yathā— mṛgayā, vāsanā, parivrajyeti ।
kārakāṇāṃ yātha— kumbhakāraḥ, paṅkajam, amāvāsyeti ।</p>
<p>(<b>5. saṃbandhaḥ</b>) niyogataḥ pratiyogyapekṣaḥ saṃbandhaḥ । sa
bhāvānāṃ yathā— bhuktvā vrajati, bhok‍tumicchati, aprāpya nadīṃ parvata iti ।
kārakāṇāṃ yathā— caṅkramyamāṇo'dhīte, adhīyāno vasati, godāyo vrajati ।</p>
<p>(<b>6. anubandhaḥ</b>) anuṣaṅgo'nubandhaḥ । sa
bhāvānāṃ yathā— sārāviṇaṃ varttate, raipoṣaṃ puṣyati, cakāsāñcakāra iti ।
kārakāṇāṃ yathā— agniṣṭomayājī, uṣṭrakośī, śatadāyī—ti ।</p>
<p>(<b>kṛtaḥ</b>) athaitadabhidhāne triprakārāḥ <b>kṛto</b> bhavanti —
<b>1. bhāvavacanāḥ, 2. kārakavacanāḥ, 3. bhāvakārakavacanāśca</b> । teṣu —</p>
<p>(<b>1</b>) athujādayaḥ, ṇvulādayaḥ, ṇajādayaḥ, tumunādayaḥ, sayādayaḥ, ṇamulādayaś‍ca
<b>bhāvavacanāḥ</b>,</p>
<p>(<b>2</b>) ṇvulādayaḥ, aṇādayaḥ, uṇādayaḥ, kvinādayaḥ, śatrādayaḥ, tṛnādayaśca
<b>kārakavacanāḥ</b></p>
<p>(<b>3</b>) tavyādayaḥ, tavāyādayaḥ, ktādayaḥ, khalādayaḥ, lyuḍādayaḥ, ghañādayaś‍ca
<b>bhāvakārakavacanāḥ</b> । tatra—</p>
<p>(<b>1. bhāvavacanāḥ</b> —6)</p>
<p>bhāvavacaneṣvanupādhau siddhabhāve <b>athujādayaḥ</b> । yathā— nandathuḥ, yajñaḥ, svapnaḥ, kriyā,
kaṇḍūyā, vrajyā iti ।</p>
<p>atraiva rogādyupādhimati <b>ṇvulādayaḥ</b> । yathā— arocako bādhate, pravāhikātaḥ karoti, bhavata
āsikā, ikṣubhakṣikāṃ me dhārayasi, kāṃ tvaṃ kārimakārṣīḥ, akaraṇiste vṛṣalaḥ iti ।</p>
<p>siddhāsamāpte <b>ṇajādayaḥ</b> । yathā— vyāvakrośī varttate, vyāvahāsīṃ kurvanti, sāṅkūṭinaṃ
varttate, sāṃrāviṇaṃ kurvanti, karaṇena nirvṛttaṃ kṛttrimam, pākena nirvṛttaṃ paktrimam iti ।</p>
<p>sādhyarūpe <b>tumunādayaḥ</b> । yathā— bhok‍tuṃ vrajati, bhok‍tuṃ jānāti, bhuktvā vrajati,

<pb n="076"/>
apamitya yācate, svāduṅkāraṃ bhuṅkte, coraṅkāramākrośati ।</p>
<p>tumartha eva chandoviṣaye <b>sayādayaḥ</b> । yathā— vakṣe rāyastvā, dṛśe viś‍vāya sūryam, agniṃ
devā vibhājaṃ nāśaknuvan, vilupaṃ nāśaknuvan, īś‍varo'bhicaratoḥ, īś‍varo vilikhaḥ iti ।</p>
<p>sādhyā'samāpte <b>ṇamulādayaḥ</b> । yathā— samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣati, raipoṣaṃ puṣyati, cakāsāñcakāra,
bibharāmbabhūva, cakāsāmās, vidāṅkurvantu iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>2. kārakavacanāḥ —6</b>)</p>
<p>kārakavacaneṣvanudrik‍takriyāṃśāḥ karttaryeva <b>ṇvulādayaḥ</b> । yathā— kārakaḥ, sraṣṭā, nandanaḥ,
priyaḥ, yajvā jaranniti ।</p>
<p>sopapadāḥ kartrādi<b>ṣvaṇādayaḥ</b> । yathā— kāṇḍalāvaḥ, pādahārakaḥ, subhaṅkaraṇam, goghnaḥ,
śambhuḥ, goṣṭhaḥ iti ।</p>
<p>nirupapadā rūḍhimanta <b>uṇādayaḥ</b> । yathā— kāruḥ, dātram dhātrī, dāsaḥ, bhīṣma iti ।</p>
<p>ubhaye'pi lopavantaḥ <b>kvinādayaḥ</b> । yathā— dhṛtaspṛk, sadṛk, arthabhāk, śubhaṃyuḥ, prāṅ,
yuṅ iti ।</p>
<p>karttaryevodriktakriyāṃśāḥ <b>śatrādayaḥ</b> । yathā— yavāgūṃ pacan, somaṃ pavamānaḥ, āśiṣaṃ
dāś‍vān, vedamanūcānaḥ, bhuk‍tavānodanam, grāmaṃ gamī' iti । ta eva
tācchīlyādyupādhimanta<b>stṛnādayaḥ</b> । yathā— jāgaritānapararātrān, muṇḍayitāraḥ
śrāviṣṭhāyanāḥ vadhūmūḍhām, alaṅkariṣṇuḥ, katīha kavacamud‍vahamānāḥ, śataṃ dāyī,
edhānāhārako vrajati iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>3. bhāvakārakavacanāḥ —6</b>)</p>
<p>bhāvakārakavacaneṣūdrik‍tānudrik‍tākriyāṃśāḥ <b>tavyādayaḥ</b> । yathā— karttavyaṃ bhavatā, karaṇīyaṃ
bhavatā, kāryaḥ kaṭobhavataḥ, kṛtyaḥkaṭo bhavataḥ, vāstavyo bhavān, brahmabhūyaṃ bhavata iti ।</p>
<p>ta evacchandoviṣayā<b>stavāyādayaḥ</b> । yathā—paridhātavai, paristaritavai, avacakṣe, avagāhe,
didṛkṣeṇyaḥ, kartvaṃ haviḥ iti ।</p>
<p>udrik‍takriyāṃśāḥ <b>k‍tādayaḥ</b> । yathā— bhuk‍taṃ bhavatā, bhujyamānaṃ bhavatā, bhokṣyamāṇaṃ bhavatā,
bhuṅkta odanaṃ bhavān, bhuk‍ta odano bhavatā, evaṃ bhokṣyamāṇa iti । ta eva
vyaktakālāḥ <b>khalādayaḥ</b> । yathā— svāḍhyaṃbhavaṃ bhavatā, sūtthānaṃ bhavatā, prāśitaṃbhavaṃ
bhavatā, durāḍhyayaṃbhavaṃ bhavatā, īṣatpānaḥ somo bhavataḥ, āśitambhavaṃ bhak‍tam iti ।
anudrik‍tākriyāṃśāḥ prāyo guṇavacanā <b>lyuḍādayaḥ</b> । yathā— vyāsasya vacanam,

<pb n="077"/>
pāṇineruktiḥ, chātrasya hasitam, idhmānāṃ vraś‍canaṃ janānāṃ bhaktiḥ, rājñāṃ mata iti ।
ta eva prāyodravyavacanā <b>ghañādayaḥ</b> । yathā— paryāyaḥ kriyāṇām, viparyāyaḥ kālasya,
saṃgrahaḥ śāstrāṇām, adhītaḥ svādhyāyaḥ, adhigata upāyaḥ, śreyānupādhyāya iti ॥</p>
<p>(<b>2. taddhitarūpaṃ vibhak‍tāvayam</b>)</p>
<p><b>bhāva—kāraka—sambandhi—svārthābhidhāyino'dhātupratyayāstaddhitāḥ</b> ।</p>
<p>(<b>1. bhāvastaddhitāḥ</b>) tatra <b>bhāvo</b> dvidhā— <b>antaraṅgo bahiraṅgaś‍ceti</b> । tayoḥ —
(<b>antaraṅgaḥ</b>) <b>śabdasyārthe pravṛttinimittamantaraṅgaḥ</b> । yadāha 'yasya guṇasya hi bhāvād dravye
śabdaniveśaḥ sa tasya bhāvaḥ, tadabhidhāne tvatalau' ।</p>
<p>tasyopasaṃgrahāya saṃgrahakāraḥ paṭhati—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>śabde tāṃ jātiṃ śabdamevā'rthajātau
jātiḥ śuklādau dravyaśabde guṇaṃ tam ।</l>
  <l>kṛt‍tatsaṃyogaṃ yogi cābhinnarūpaṃ
vācyaṃ vācyeṣu tvādayo bodhayanti ॥ 5 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 5, 5.1.119)
<p>tataḥ sa ṣoḍhā'bhivyajyate 1. jātiḥ, 2. guṇaḥ, 3. svarūpam, 4. saṃbandhaḥ,
5. saṃhatiḥ, 6. abhinnarūpamiti । teṣu—</p>
<p><b>jāti</b>ryathā— gotvam, śuklatvam, mānuṣyakam, straiṇam, pauṃsnam, brāhmaṇyam iti ।</p>
<p><b>guṇo</b> yathā— śuklatvam, śīghratā, mradimā, mādhuryam, ārjavam, vaidagdhyamiti ।</p>
<p><b>svarūpaṃ</b> yathā— ḍitthatvam, ākāśatvam, candratvam, sūryatvam, diktvam,
tadātvamiti ।</p>
<p><b>saṃbandho</b> yathā— pācakatvam, kāṇḍalāvatvam, daṇḍitvam, aupagavatvam,
rājapuruṣatvam, puruṣavyāghratvam iti ।</p>
<p><b>saṃhati</b>ryathā— dhavaravadiratvam, narasiṃhatvam, śuklakṛṣṇatvam, kṛṣṇaśāratvam,
nīlotpalatvam, gaurakhadiratvam iti ।</p>
<p><b>abhinnarūpaṃ</b> yathā— sattvam, vidyamānatvam, gargatvam, pañcālatvam, padārthatvam,
paṅkajatvam iti ।</p>
<p>nanu ca</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>jātiguṇājjātiguṇe dhavakhadirādau svajātisaṃghāte ।</l>
  <l>ḍitthādau ca sva (sve) rūpe kṛt‍tatsaṃyoge tu saṃbandhe ॥ 6 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(dau ca sva = dau sve'—iti tūtprekṣyeta)</p>

<pb n="078"/>
<p>tvādaya iti smṛtiḥ ।</p>
<p>kathamabhinnarūpādāvapi bhavati ?</p>
<p>ucyate— kṛttaddhitasamāseṣu sambandhābhidhānam, anyatra rūḍhyabhinnarūpā'vyabhicarita—
saṃbandhebhyaḥ । ata evoktam <b>'kṛt tatsaṃyogaṃ yogi cābhinnarūpam'</b> iti ॥</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>avadherapi vācyatvaṃ tvādīnāmiṣyate budhaiḥ ।</l>
  <l>gotvāddhi gauritijñānamabhidhānaṃ ca jāyate ॥ 7 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>te hyevamāhuḥ 'tasya bhāvastvatalau' (5.1.119), bhavato'smādabhidhānapratyayāviti
bhāvaḥ ।</p>
<p>tadasat, na hi gotvaṃ gauriti jñānasyotpattāvapādānatāṃ janayat 'janikarttuḥ
prakṛtiḥ' (1.4.30), 'bhuvaḥ prabhavo' (1.4.31) vā bhavati; yathā— śṛṅgāccharo jāyate,
himavato gaṅgā prabhavatīti । jñānaṃ tvātmana eva jāyate, manasaivod‍bhavati । tadāha—
'vyāpakatvādapyātmano yugapajjñānānutpattirmanaso ('ṇutvasya) liṅgam, nāhamadrākṣam,
nāhamaśrauṣam, nāhamajñāsiṣam, anyatra me mano'bhūditi । nimittatvaṃ tu gauriti jñānotpattau
śabdasyeva gotvāderapīṣyata eva । tatra yathā samavāyinaḥ ś‍vaityāt ś‍vaityabuddheḥ ś‍vete
ś‍vaityabuddhiḥ, tathā samavāyino gotvād gobuddhergavi gotvabuddhiḥ, te parasparaṃ kāraṇabhūtā
iti ।</p>
<p>abhidhānaṃ tu <b>śabdaḥ</b> । sa ca yenoccāritenārthaḥ pratīyate । tasyāpi na
gotvamavadhirbhavati । śabdo hi ākāśādeva jāyate, mukhādeva prabhavati, na gotvādeḥ ।
tadāhuḥ <b>'mukhe hi śabdamupalabhāmahe bhūmāvartham'</b> (śābarabhāṣyam 1.1.5) iti । yadāpi
nityaḥ śabda iti mataṃ tadāpi śabdasya gotvādayo vācyā viśeṣyāḥ pratyāyyā eva
bhavanti । tatra ca śabdasya gotvādīnāṃ vācyatve viśeṣyatve vā karmataiva, nāvadhitvam ।
pratyāyyatve tu vipariṇāmaviparivarttapakṣayorvakṣyamāṇanyāyena pratyuta śabdasyaivā'vadhitvam ।
adhyāsastu sādṛśyādupādherupādhisādṛśyābhyāṃ vā saṃbhavati; yathā— śuktikādau rajatādeḥ,
sphaṭikādau raktādeḥ, pratibimbādau mukhāderiti । tatra yo yadadhyāsyate, yo
yadadhyāste vā, sa tasyādhikaraṇaṃ karma vā syānna tvavadhiḥ; gotvaṃ nimittamupādāya gośabdo
gāmadhyāste gavi vā'dhyāsyate । tadiṣyata eva 'yasya guṇasya hi bhāvād dravye śabdaniveśaḥ
tadabhidhāne tvatalau' iti ॥</p>

<pb n="079"/>
<p>(<b>bahiraṅgaḥ</b>) dhātvartharūpaḥ kṛdabhidheyo <b>bahiraṅgaḥ</b> । so'pi ṣoḍhā—
<b>1. bhāvarūpaḥ, 2. kārakarūpaḥ, 3. saṃbandhirūpaḥ, 4. bhāvaviśiṣṭaḥ,</b>
<b>5. kārakaviśiṣṭaḥ, 6. saṃbandhiviśiṣṭa</b>ś‍ceti । tatra —</p>
<p>(<b>1. bhāvarūpaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>pravṛttinimittatulyo bhāvarūpaḥ — brāhmaṇasya karma brāhmaṇyam, purohitasya paurohityam,
stenasya steyam, sakhyuḥ sakhyam, dūtasya dūtyam, vaṇijo vāṇijyamiti ।</p>
<p>(<b>2. kārakarūpaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>kārakaistulyakakṣyaḥ kārakarūpaḥ । yathā— rājānamarhati rājavad vṛttam ।
āprayojanakālaṃ bhavati ākālikī pravṛttiḥ, śyenasyeva pāto'syāṃ varttate śyainaṃpātā
kriyāṃ, daṇḍaḥ praharaṇamasyāṃ krīḍāyāṃ dāṇḍā, (4.2.57) mahimāstyasyāṃ mahiminī
samasyā, vaṭakaṃ prakṛtamasyāṃ vaṭakamayī yātreti (mabhā. 5.2.82) ।</p>
<p>(<b>3. sambandhirūpaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>rūḍhe dravyabhūtaḥ sambandhirūpaḥ । yathā— cāṣāṇāṃ samūhaḥ cāṣam, nāṭyānāmāmnāyo
nāṭyam, bhṛgvaṅgirasāṃ vivāho bhṛgvaṅgirasikā, kākolūkasya vairaṃ kākolūkikā,
avīnāṃ saṃghāto'vikaṭaḥ, teṣāmeva vistāro'vipaṭaḥ iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>4. bhāvaviśiṣṭaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>atarkitopanatacitrīkaraṇādisadṛśo bhāvaviśiṣṭaḥ । yathā— kākasya cāgamanaṃ
yādṛcchikam, tālasya ca pātaḥ । tena tālena patatā kākasya vadhaḥ । evameva
devadattasya cāgamanaṃ dasyūnāṃ copanipātaḥ, taiś‍ca tasya vadhaḥ । tatra yo devadattasya
dasyūnāṃ ca samāgamaḥ sa kākatālasamāgama ivetyeka upamārthaḥ, yaś‍ca devadattavadhaḥ sa
kākavadha iveti dvitīya upamārthaḥ ।</p>
<p>tatra prathamaḥ samāsārthaḥ kākatālamiti, dvitīyaḥ pratyayārthaḥ kākatālīyamiti ।
samāsaś‍cāyamasmādeva jñāpakād yadāha 'samāsācca tad‍‌viṣayād (5.3.106)
ākasmika ivārthe cho bhavati । tad‍‌viṣayādityatra hi tadityanena 'ive pratikṛtau' (5.
3.96) iti ivārthaḥ । evam</p>
<p>ajākṛpāṇīyam (kāśikā 5.3.106), andhakavarttakīyam (kāśikā 5.3.106),
ghuṇākṣarīyam, ardhajaratīyam, gomayapā/vā—yasīyam (gaṇaratna. 3.3.196) iti ।</p>

<pb n="080"/>
<p>(<b>5. kārakaviśiṣṭaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>kārakāvacchinnaḥ kārakaviśiṣṭaḥ । yathā— matasya karaṇaṃ matyam, pīlūnāṃ pākaḥ
pīlukuṇaḥ, janasya jalpo janyaḥ, śivasya bhavanaṃ śivatātiḥ, nāsāyā avanatiḥ
avaṭīṭaḥ (5.2.31), dhane kāmaḥ dhanaka iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>6. saṃbandhiviśiṣṭaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>sambandhinā'vacchinnaḥ saṃbandhiviśiṣṭaḥ । yathā— halyaḥ, karṣaḥ, saudhaḥ saṃkocaḥ,
pauruṣeyo vadhaḥ, ātharvaṇa āmnāyaḥ, vaido ghoṣaḥ, chāndogyo dharmaḥ iti ।
upādhirapi saṃbandhyeva bhavati । yathā— gārgikayā vikatthate, kāṭhikayā adhikṣipati,
gārgikāmanvavetaḥ, gārgikāmavagatavān, kāṭhikāmavagatavān iti । dhātvartho'pibhāva eva ।</p>
<p><b>kriyāpi</b> hyupamānena parītā paricchinnā sādhyasiddhabhāvo bhavati ।
sa tridhā— <b>1. bhāvaviśiṣṭaḥ, 2.kārakaviśiṣṭaḥ, 3.saṃbandhiviśiṣṭaś‍ceti ।</b> teṣu—</p>
<p><b>1. bhāvaviśiṣṭo</b> yathā— brāhmaṇena tulyamadhīte brāhmaṇavat, rājñā sadṛśaṃ varttate rājavat,
jaḍasya tulyaṃ brūte jaḍavat, sūrya iva prakāte sūryavat, pitā yathā pālayati
pitṛvat, gururivānuśāsti guruvaditi ।</p>
<p>atra brāhmaṇādisthāsu adhyayanakriyāsu sāhacaryād vṛttiḥ, jātidravyayoranyatareṇa
kriyāyāḥ sādṛśyānupapatteḥ । yadāha— 'tena tulyaṃ kriyā ced vatiḥ' (5.1.115);
teneti tṛtīyāsamarthāt tulyamityetasminnarthe vatipratyayo bhavati tat‍tulyaṃ kriyā
cet sā bhavati । arthaparaṃ caitat; tena sadṛśetyādiprayogeṣvatṛtīyāntādapi bhavati ।</p>
<p><b>2. kārakaviśiṣṭo</b> yathā— rājñeva vyavahṛtamanena rājavat, devamiva bhavantaṃ paśyāmi
devavat, asineva dātreṇa cchinatti asivat, brāhmaṇāyeva yadā devadattāya dadāti
brāhmaṇavat, parvatādivāsanādavarohati parvatavat, pitarīva gurāvācarate pitṛvat ।</p>
<p>atra punaridameva sūtramanyathā vyākhyāyate— 'tena kārakaviśeṣeṇa tulyaṃ yathā
bhavati । evaṃ cet kriyā bhavati bhāvotpanne'pi hi pratyaye kadācit pratyayamukhena
kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati, kadācit prakṛtimukhena । yathā— tīvraḥ pākaḥ, tīvraṃ pākam
iti ।</p>
<p><b>3. sambandhiviśiṣṭo</b> yathā— brāhmaṇasyevā'dhyayanamasya brāhmaṇavat, rājavad raudraṃ
vṛttamasya rājavat, jaḍasya sadṛśaṃ vacanamasya jaḍavat, sūryasyeva prakāśo'sya

<pb n="081"/>
sūryavat, pituryathā pālanamasya pitṛvat, gurostulyamanuśāsanamasya guruvat iti ।
atra tu 'tatra tasyeva' (5.1.116) ityanena vatiḥ । nanu ca 'tena tulyami'—
(5.1.115) tyanenaiva siddhe kimarthaṃ 'tatra tasyeva' iti sūtrasyārambhaḥ?
dravyaguṇayotulyayoḥ pratyayo na labhya iti । yathā— mathurāyāmiva pāṭaliputre
prāsādā madhurāvat, brāhmaṇasyeva kṣatriyasya śuklā dantā brāhmaṇavat iti ।
yadyevaṃ pūrvasūtre kriyāgrahaṇaṃ na kariṣyate । sāhacaryācca kriyāyāmiva dravyaguṇayoḥ
prātipadikaṃ varttiṣyate । tataś‍ca maitreyatulyā gāvaś‍caitrasya, brāhmaṇena tulyā dantāḥ
kṣatriyasya iti vigṛhya pūrvasūtreṇaiva vatiḥ setsyatīti ।
tadasat ।</p>
<p>evaṃ hi gavayena tulyo'naḍvān ityatrāpi pratyayaḥ prasajet, ivārthe tu pratyaye
saptamīṣaṣṭhyantābhyāmeva vidhīyamāne gavaya ivā'naḍvānityatra pratyayaprasaṅgo na
syāt; saptamyantaṣaṣṭhyantayorhi bāhyaṃ sambandhinamapekṣya ivaśabdaprayogo bhavati, na
punarivārthāpekṣayeva; ivaśabdo hyupamānopameyalakṣaṇasaṃbandhadyotakaḥ, na tu sambandhi—
rūpābhidhāyī । tasmād gavayena tulyo'naṅvānityatrāpi mā bhūt pratyayaprasaṅga iti
pūrvasūtre kriyāgrahaṇam । tasmiṃś‍ca kṛte dravyaguṇayostulyayoḥ pratyayo na syāditi
saptamīṣaṣṭhyantābhyāmivārthe 'tatra tasyeva' iti vatirvidhīyate ।</p>
<p>atha 'tadarham' (5.1.117) iti kimartham ?</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>arhato yā kriyā karttustatrāpi vatiriṣyate ।</l>
  <l>upamānāvivakṣāyāṃ tad‌vidhānaṃ na labhyate ॥ 8 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
  <l>upamānopameyatvamanyasyānyena vā saha ।</l>
  <l>avasthābhedabhinnatvādekasyāpyātmanaiva vā ॥ 9 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3 vṛttiḥ ।)
<p>tatrānyasyānyena yathā— avaiyākaraṇo'pyayaṃ vaiyākaraṇavad brūte; yoṣidapyeṣā
puṃvad‌vak‍tīti; avasthābhedabhinnatvādekasyāpyātmano yathā— vaiyākaraṇaḥ kenaciducyate
vaiyākaraṇavad brūhīti; yoṣidapyucय़te strīvad vadeti । vaiyākaraṇo'pyavajñayā
kadācid — vaiyākaraṇavad brūte । śrūyate hi— yarvāṇastarvāṇo nāma sākṣātkṛtadha
/?/rmmāṇa ṛṣayo babhūvuḥ । te hi 'antarvedyāmeva na mlecchitavyam, ato'nyatrāvajñayā'
iti 'yad‌vā nastad‌vā na' iti vak‍tavye yarvāṇastarvāṇa ityūcuḥ {mabhā.1.1.1 (9)} ।
yoṣidapi kadācidāśritaprāgalbhyāt puṃvad‌vakti yathocyate—</p>

<pb n="082"/>
<b><lg>
  <l>sarasvatīva karṇāṭī vijayāṅkā jayatyasau ।
yā vaidarbhagirāṃ bhūmiḥ kālidāsādanantaram ॥ 10 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
  <l>asyaupamyadvayasyāpi vivakṣāto'parigrahe ।</l>
  <l>vatiḥ kathamivārthīya iti matvāyamucyate ॥ 11 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3 vṛttiḥ)
<p>tatra 'rājavad vṛttamityatra yadā evaṃvidhā arthavivakṣā— 'pṛthvādinā rājñā tulyaṃ vṛttam
anena rājñā rājavad vṛttaṃ rājñe'—ti tadā''dyenaiva sūtreṇa siddhaḥ pratyayaḥ; yadā tvetādṛśī
vivakṣā—'rājña iva pṛthorasya vṛttaṃ rājavad‌vṛttaṃ rājña iti tadā dvitīyasūtreṇa । yadā tvidaṃ vṛttaṃ
rājānamevā'rhati nānyamityupamānopameyabhāvābhāve rājavad vṛttamiti prayogastadā 'tadarham'
ityanena vatirvidhīyata iti nānarthakaḥ sūtrārambhaḥ ॥</p>
<p>anye tu 'tena tulyaṃ kriyā ced vatiḥ' ityatra dvitīyavyākhyānapakṣe kriyāyāḥ kriyā
viśeṣaṇaṃ na saṃbhavatīti kārakaviśiṣṭabhāvapakṣaṃ 'tadarham' ityanena saṃvāhayati, rājānamarhati
yad vyavaharaṇam, devamarhati yad darśanam, asimarhati yacchedanam, brāhmaṇamarhati yad‌dānam,
parvatamarhati yadavarohaṇam, pitaramarhati yat pāratantryam taducyate rājavat, devavat, asivat,
brāhmaṇavat, parvatavat, pitṛvaditi । rājñeva vyavahṛtamityādibhistu tasyārthaḥ pradarśita' iti ॥</p>
<p>(<b>2. kārakastaddhitāḥ</b>)</p>
<p><b>kāraka</b>mapi bhāvavadevā'ntaraṅgaṃ bahiraṅgaṃ ca ।</p>
<p>tayorākhyātābhidheya<b>mantaraṅgam</b>, anākhyātābhidheyaṃ <b>bahiraṅgam ।</b></p>
<p>(<b>antaraṅgabhedeṣu</b>)	<b>karttā, hetukarttā, karmakarttā, karma</b> ceti;</p>
<p>(<b>bahiraṅgabhedeṣu</b>)	<b>karaṇaṃ saṃpradānamapādānamadhikaraṇaṃ</b> ceti । (dra. pṛ॰ 84)</p>
<p>(<b>karttā</b>) tatrā'ntaraṅgabhedeṣu <b>karttā 1. śuddhaḥ 2. miśraḥ 3. saṃkīrṇa</b>ś‍ca । teṣu —</p>
<p>1. kriyākārakāntarāsaṃpṛk‍taḥ <b>śuddhaḥ।</b> yathā iṣṭamanena iṣṭī yajñe, kṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ kaṭo'nena
kṛtapūrvī kaṭamiti ।</p>
<p>2. kriyāntarasaṃpṛk‍to <b>miśraḥ।</b> yathā— vyākaraṇaṃ vetti adhīte vā vaiyākaraṇaḥ, śaś‍vad
bhavaḥ śāś‍vatikaḥ iti ।</p>
<p>3. kriyākārakāntarasaṃpṛktaḥ <b>saṃkīrṇaḥ।</b> yathā— śālayāṃ praveśamarhati śālīnaḥ
adhṛṣṭaḥ, kūpe prakṣepaṇamarhati iti kaupīnamakāryam ।</p>

<pb n="083"/>
<p>(<b>hetukarttā</b>) <b>hetuḥ</b> 1. ātmasthakriyaḥ, 2. parasthakriyaḥ, 3. parātmasthakriyaś‍ceti । teṣu —</p>
<p><b>1. ātmasthakriyo</b> yathā— pārāyaṇaṃ varttayati pārāyaṇikaḥ, cāndrāyaṇaṃ varttayati
cāndrāyaṇikaḥ iti ।</p>
<p><b>2. parasthakriyo</b> yathā— vātaṃ śamayati vātikaṃ tailam, pittaṃ kopayati paittikamiti ।</p>
<p>3. <b>parātmastha</b>kriyo yathā— yathāmukhaṃ darśayate yathāmukhīna ādarśaḥ, saṃmukhaṃ darśayate
saṃmukhīnaḥ preyāniti ।</p>
<p><b>karmakarttā</b> 1. anudrik‍takarmāṃśaḥ 2. udrik‍takarmāṃśaḥ, 3. anudrik‍todrik‍takarmāṃśaś‍ca ।</p>
<p><b>1. anudrik‍takarmāṃśo</b> yathā— akṣadyūtena nirvṛttamākṣadyūtikaṃ dhanam, pākena nirvṛttaṃ
pākimam,</p>
<p>māṇikam (5.4.29) iti । (māṇika iti rāghavaḥ)</p>
<p><b>2. udrik‍takarmāṃśo</b> yathā— vasante puṣpyanti vāsantyaḥ kundalatāḥ, ṣaṣṭirātreṇa
pacyante</p>
<p>ṣaṣṭikāḥ śālaya iti ।</p>
<p><b>3</b>. <b>anudrik‍to</b>drik‍takarmāṃśo yathā— vaśaṃ gato vaśyaḥ, śīrṣacchedamarhati śīrṣacchedya iti ।</p>
<p><b>karma</b> 1. nirvarttyam 2. vikāryam 3. prāpyaṃ ca । tatra —</p>
<p><b>1</b>. (<b>nirvarttyam</b>) yad asajjanyate, sad vā prakāśyate tannirvarttyam । yathā— urasā
nirmita aurasaḥ putraḥ, pāṇininā prok‍taṃ pāṇinīyaṃ vyākaraṇam iti ।</p>
<p><b>2</b>. (<b>vikāryam</b>) yasya prakṛtyucchedo guṇāntaraṃ vā vidhīyate tad vikāryam । yathā viṣeṇa
vadhyo viṣyaḥ śatruḥ, kusumbhena raktaṃ kausumbhaṃ vastramiti ।</p>
<p><b>3</b>. (<b>prāpyam</b>) āsthitamanāsthitaṃ vā kriyayā yadāptumiṣyate tat prāpyam । yathā nāvā
tāryo nāvyo hradaḥ, ayānayaṃ neyaḥ ayānayīnaḥ śāra (5.2.1 nyāsa.) iti ।</p>
<p>nanu śāro'pyāsthitaḥ kasmānna bhavati ?</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>tyāgarūpaṃ prahātavye prāpye saṃsargadarśanam ।</l>
  <l>āsthitaṃ karma yat tatra dvairūpyaṃ bhajati kriyā ॥ 12 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.135)
<p>yathā panthānaṃ gacchati garttamuttaratīti ।</p>
<p>śārastu prāpya eva । yathā ajāṃ nayati grāmam, vahati bhāramiti ।</p>
<p>nanvevaṃ grāmasya prāpyatā prāpnoti, nājādeḥ ।</p>

<pb n="084"/>
<p>kaḥ punarāha na prāpnotītiḥ kintu akathitatvena tatra kriyāvyāpyatvād dvitīyaiva, na
pratyayāntaram 'gāṃ dogdhi payaḥ, pauravaṃ gāṃ yācata' iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>bahiraṅgam</b>) bahiraṅgabhedeṣu <b>karaṇam</b> bāhyamābhyantaraṃ, bāhyābhyantaraṃ ca । teṣu—</p>
<p>1. <b>bāhyam</b> yathā— supāṃ vyākhyānaḥ saupaḥ, lalāṭasya bhūṣaṇaṃ lalāṭikā ।</p>
<p>2. <b>ābhyantaraṃ</b> yathā— matasya karaṇaṃ matyam, caturṇāṃ pūraṇaś‍caturthaḥ iti ।</p>
<p>3. <b>bāhyābhyantaraṃ</b> yathā— samidha ādhīyante'nena sāmidhenyo mantraḥ, sa eva
hṛdayasya bandhano hṛdya prati ।</p>
<p><b>saṃpradānam</b> — dadātikarmāpyaṃ, karmamātrāpyaṃ kriyāpyaṃ ca ।</p>
<p>(<b>dadātikarmāpyam</b>)</p>
<p>saṃpradīyate bhojanādikamasmai ityanvarthasaṃjñakaṃ dadātikarmāpyam । yathā— agrabhojanaṃ
niyuktamasmai dīyate āgrabhojanikaḥ, pañcāsmai vṛddhirvā, āyo vā, lābho vā,
śulkaṃ vā, upadā vā dīyante pañcakaḥ puruṣa iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>karmamātrāpyam</b>)</p>
<p>karmaṇā yamabhipraiti sa saṃpradānam (1.4.33) iti pāribhāṣikasaṃjñakaṃ karmamātrāpyam ।
yathā—'rāṣṭramasmai nirdiśyate rāṣṭriyo rājanyaḥ, kaliṃ kurvantyasmai kāleyaṃ
gandhadravyam iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>kriyāpyam</b>)</p>
<p>karmaśabdena kriyāyā apyabhidhānāt kriyayāpi yamabhipraiti sa saṃpradānamiti
kriyā''pyam । yathā—'alaṃ karmāsmai nirdiśyate alaṅkarmīṇaḥ anyūnaḥ, na ṣaḍakṣāṇi
asmai bhavanti aṣaḍakṣīṇo mantra' iti ।</p>
<p><b>apādānam</b>— nirdiṣṭaviṣayam, upāttaviṣayam, apekṣitakriyaṃ ca । teṣu</p>
<p>(<b>nirdiṣṭaviṣayam</b>)</p>
<p>dhruvamapāye'pādānam (1.4.24) iti nirdiṣṭaviṣayam । yathā—agniḥ patatyasmād
āgneyo grāvā, nadyaḥ syandante asmānnādeyaḥ śaila iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>upāttaviṣayam</b>)</p>
<p>bhītrārthādiyogoktamupāttaviṣayam । yathā—kukṣiṃ rakṣanti asmāt kaukṣeyakaḥ kṛpāṇaḥ,

<pb n="085"/>
mud‌gā bhavantyasmānmaud‌gīnaṃ kṣetram iti । yathā—</p>
<p>avadhimātrārthamapekṣitakriyam । yathā karṇasya mūlaṃ karṇajāham, pakṣasya mūlaṃ
pakṣati'—riti</p>
<p><b>adhikaraṇam</b>—vaiṣayikam, aupaś‍leṣikam, naimittikaṃ ca । teṣu</p>
<p>(<b>vaiṣayikam</b>)</p>
<p>vividhamanekaprakāraṃ jāti—kriyā guṇa dravyādibhiḥ sinotīti viṣayo
deśakālādiḥ । viṣaya eva vaiṣayikaḥ, yathā—gāvaḥ santyasmin gomān deśaḥ, pauṣī
paurṇamāsyasmin pauṣo māsa iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>aupaś‍leṣikam</b>)</p>
<p>upaś‍leṣo'vaṣṭambhaḥ, tasmai prabhavati aupaś‍leṣikam । yathā— daṇḍino'syāṃ santi
daṇḍimatī śālā, viṃśatirihādhikā viṃśaṃ śatam iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>naimittikam</b>)</p>
<p>nimittameva naimittikam । yathā—pūrṇo māso'syāṃ paurṇamāsī rātriḥ, parikhā'tra syāt
parikheyo deśaḥ iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>kārakastaddhitāḥ</b>)</p>
<p><b>kārakaṃ</b> cāntaraṅgabahiraṅgabhedād dvirūpamapi prakṛtyupādheḥ</p>
<p><b>1. kārakaviśiṣṭam, 2. akārakaviśiṣṭam, 3. saṃbandhaviśiṣṭam,
4. nipātaviśiṣṭa</b>ñceti caturdhā nirdhāryate । teṣu —</p>
<p>karma <b>karmaviśiṣṭaṃ</b> yathā— ayānayaṃ neyaḥ ayānayīnaḥ śāraḥ,</p>
<p><b>karaṇaviśiṣṭaṃ</b> yathā— cakṣuṣā gṛhyate cākṣuṣaṃ rūpam,</p>
<p><b>adhikaraṇaviśiṣṭaṃ</b> yathā— strughne kṛto vā labdho vā krīto vā straughnaḥ,</p>
<p><b>apādāna</b>viśiṣṭaṃ yathā— tantrādacirāpahṛtastantrakaḥ paṭaḥ iti ।</p>
<p><b>kartṛviśiṣṭaṃ</b> yathā— aś‍vairuhyata āś‍vo rathaḥ । kartṛviśeṣaṇamapi karttaiva
caturbhiruhyate cāturaṃ śakaṭam । api ca— (kāśikā 4.2.13)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>kaumārī sā bhaved bhāryā yāṃ kumāraḥ prapatsyate ।</l>
  <l>prapadyate kumārī yaṃ sa kaumāro mataḥ patiḥ ॥ 13 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>saṃpradānaviśiṣṭaṃ</b> tu kārakaṃ nāsti ।</p>

<pb n="086"/>
<p>karttā <b>karmaviśiṣṭo</b> yathā— śrāddhamanenā'dya bhuk‍taṃ śrāddhikaḥ । kriyāviśeṣaṇamiti—
śabdopasaṃhāraṃ ca karmaiva । tadviśiṣṭo yathā— pratikūlaṃ varttate
prātikūlikam, māśabda, ityāha māśabdika iti;</p>
<p><b>karaṇaviśiṣṭo</b> yathā—akṣairdīvyati ākṣikaḥ ।</p>
<p><b>adhikaraṇaviśiṣṭo</b> yathā—prāvṛṣikaḥ prāvṛṣi bhavaḥ prāvṛṣeṇyaḥ ।</p>
<p><b>apādānaviśiṣṭo</b> yathā—piturāgataṃ pitryaṃ dhanam iti ।</p>
<p><b>karttṛviśiṣṭaḥ</b> karttā nāsti ।</p>
<p>karaṇaṃ <b>karmaviśiṣṭaṃ</b> yathā— grīvāyāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ graiveyaṃ rukmadāma । evaṃ</p>
<p><b>sampradānamapi</b> yathā— māṃsamebhyo niyuktaṃ dīyate māṃsikāḥ pitaraḥ ।</p>
<p><b>apādānaṃ karttṛviśiṣṭaṃ</b> yathā— brīh‌yo bhavantyasmād braiheyaṃ kṣetram । evam</p>
<p><b>adhikaraṇamapi</b> yathā— śarkarāḥ santyasmin śarkarilo deśaḥ । tadeva</p>
<p><b>karmaviśiṣṭaṃ</b> yathā— padamasmin dṛśyaṃ padyaḥ kardamaḥ ।</p>
<p><b>karaṇaviśiṣṭama</b>pi yathā— daṇḍaḥ praharaṇamasyāṃ daṇḍā krīḍā iti ।</p>
<p>karaṇādayo'sya viśiṣṭā na vidyante ॥</p>
<p>karmakartroreva <b>akārakasaṃbandhinipātairviśeṣaṇayogaḥ</b> । sa</p>
<p><b>karmaṇo'kārakeṇa</b> yathā— māsāya bhūto māsikaḥ, saṃvatsaramadhīṣṭaḥ sāṃvatsarika
iti । <b>karttu</b>ryathā— saṃtāpāya prabhavati sāṃtāpikaḥ, varṣaṃ bhūto bhāvī vā vārṣika
iti ।</p>
<p><b>karmaṇaḥ sambandhino</b> yathā— vākyapade adhikṛtya kṛto grantho vākyapadīyaḥ,
kalāpiṣu udibhadyamānakalāpeṣu deyamṛṇaṃ kālāpakam iti ।</p>
<p><b>kartu</b>ryathā tittiriṇā prok‍taṃ vidanti adhīyate vā taittirīyāḥ, pūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhuktaṃ pītaṃ
vā ebhiḥ pūrviṇaḥ iti ।</p>
<p><b>karmaṇo nipātena</b> yathā— yathākathācaṃ kriyate yāthākathyamidam (kāśikā 5.1.98),
bahirdṛśyate bāhyam iti ।</p>
<p><b>karttu</b>ryathā ārād bhava ārātīyaḥ, sākṣād draṣṭā sākṣī iti ।</p>
<p>nanu, kriyayā'pi karmaṇaḥ kartturvā viśeṣaṇayogaḥ saṃbhavati । tad yathā— pākena
nirvṛttaṃ pākimam; apamityā (nirvṛttam) āpamityakam, yācitena (nirvṛttaṃ) yācitakam

<pb n="087"/>
iti; yathā ca sus‍nātaṃ pṛcchati (4.4.1. vāpa.3) saus‍nātikaḥ prabhūtamāha prābhūtikaḥ,
kṛtaṃ(taḥ) pūrvamanena kaṭaḥ kṛtapūrvī kaṭam iti (5.2.87 kāśikā) ।</p>
<p>ucyate kriyā'pi prākṛtaṃ karmaiva । atastadviśiṣṭayorapi karmakartroḥ
karmaviśiṣṭatvameva bhavati ।</p>
<p>nanu ca 'nirvṛttami' tyetasya kathaṃ karmatā?</p>
<p>idaṃ hyanudrikte karmāṃśe karttari vā prayujyamānaṃ dṛśyate ।</p>
<p>naivam</p>
<p>antarbhūta—ṇyarthatvenāsya sakarmakatvamapi manyante । tathā ca <b>kātyāyanaḥ</b> —</p>
<p>(vararuciḥ)</p> <b><lg><l>uttāraṇāya jagataḥ prapitāmahena</l>
  <l>tasmāt padāt tvamapi rajjuriva pravṛttā ॥ 14 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>mallanāgo'</b>(kāmasūtrakṛd vātsyāyano') pyāha 'nāgarakavṛttyā varttete —ti (kāmasū.
1.4.1) ।</p>
<p>atha 'kṛtapūrvī kaṭam' iti katham? na hyanenā'pi prayogeṇa bhavitavyam ।</p>
<p>kiṃ kāraṇam?</p>
<p>dvitīyayā tāvannotpattavyam ।</p>
<p>tat kutaḥ?</p>
<p>ktenā'bhihitam ।</p>
<p>pratyayenāpi notpattavyam ।</p>
<p>kiṃ kāraṇam ?</p>
<p>asāmarthyāt । kathamasāmarthyam? sāpekṣamasamarthaṃ bhavatīti ।</p>
<p>ucyate— nāyaṃ karmaṇi ktaḥ, apitu bhāve । bhāvasādhanena ca kṛtaśabdena yocyate
kriyā tayepsitaṃ kaṭādi karma anabhihitameveti ।</p>
<p>tatra yathā 'grāmaṃ gato devadatta' iti dhātu—niṣṭhābhyāmabhidhīyamānayoḥ
kriyākartrorgrāmādikarmabhirabhisambandho bhavati, evaṃ kṛtapūrvīti kṛtaśabdena taddhitena
vā'bhidhīyamānayoḥ kriyākartro kaṭādikarmabhirabhisambandho bhavatiḥ tathāhi— kṛtaṃ
pūrvamanenetyasminnarthe kṛtapūrvīśabdastaddhitānto vartate; tena ca pūrva kṛtavānityayamarthaḥ
saṃpadyate । evaṃ ca sāpekṣatvābhāvānnāstyasāmarthyam । asti ca karotivācyakriyāpekṣaṃ kaṭasya
karmatvamiti taddhitadvitīyotpattyornānupapattiḥ । taduktam— (vāpa.vṛtti—67) iti ।</p>

<pb n="088"/>
<b><lg>
  <l>avigrahā gatādisthā yathā grāmādikarmabhiḥ ।</l>
  <l>saṃbadhyate kriyā tada‍‍vat kṛtapūrvyādiṣu sthitā ॥ 15 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>yadā tu kṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ kaṭo'neneti vigrahaḥ, tadāpi na doṣaḥ, yato yadyapi
kṛtādiśabdāḥ karmaṇi vyutpadyamānāḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāt kaṭādikarmaviśeṣaṃ nirbhuñjate,
tathāpi netthambhūtā eva pratyayamutpādayanti, vṛttīnāṃ viśeṣapratyāyanāsāmarthyāt; ato
vṛttiviṣaye'napekṣitaviśeṣa— karmāntarbhūtakarmasāmānyo'nya eva kṛtaśabdo bhavati ।</p>
<p>avivakṣitakarmāṇo'ntarbhūtakarmāṇaś‍cā'karmakā eva jāyante, yathā— tasmād
dīkṣito na dadāti na pacati na juhoti iti । evamakarmakatve'ntarbhāvābhidhāyyeva,
taccānapekṣatvāt sāmarthye sati pratyayamutpādayati । pratyayārthaś‍ca karttā kriyayā prakṛtyarthena
yadīpsati tat karma anabhihitaṃ pratyayena, tato dvitīyā bhavati । taduktaṃ bhāṣye
(2.3.65)— 'yo'sau kṛtakaṭayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ sa utpanne pratyaye nivarttate; asti ca karoteḥ
kaṭena sāmarthyamiti dvitīyā bhaviṣyati kṛtapūrvī kaṭamiṭi' । <b>harira</b>pyāha—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>viśeṣakarmasambandhe vinirbhukte kaṭādibhiḥ ।</l>
  <l>viśeṣanirapekṣo'nyaḥ kṛtaśabdo'vakalpate ॥ 16 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
  <l>akarmakatve satyevaṃ ktāntaṃ bhāvābhidhāyi yat ।</l>
  <l>tena kriyāvatā kartrā yogo bhavati karmaṇām ॥ 17 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(vāpa. 3.65—66 vṛttiḥ) iti ।</p>
<p>yadi vā śās‍traprakriyābhyāsabādhitamatīnāmevāyamabhimānaḥ vākyārthe vṛttayo
bhavantī—ti । paramārthatastu vṛttivākyayoranyatvameva manyante, arthaviprakarṣāt । yathāhi—
vākye yaḥ kaṭādisambandhaḥ sa vṛttau nāsti, tasyāntarbhūtakarmaṇaḥ kṛtaśabdasya
bhāvābhidhāyitvāt । taduktam— (vāpa.3.64 vṛttiḥ)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>viśeṣaḥ śrūyamāṇo'pi pradhāneṣu guṇeṣu vā ।</l>
  <l>śabdāntaratvād vākyeṣu vṛttau nityaṃ na vidyate ॥ 18 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>bhāṣyakāro'pyāha (2.3.65)— 'nedamubhayaṃ yugapad bhavati vākyaṃ ca pratyayaś‍ca;
yadā vākyaṃ na tadā pratyayaḥ, yadā pratyayaḥ sāmānyena tadā vṛttiḥ । tatrā'vaśyaṃ
viśiṣārthinā viśeṣo'nuprayok‍tavyaḥ 'kṛtapūrvī kaṭami'—ti । evamadhītamanena, adhītaṃ
vyākaraṇamanena' iti vā adhītī vyākaraṇe ityapi vyākhyātam ।</p>

<pb n="089"/>
<p>(<b>3. sambandhitaddhitāḥ</b> (ṣaṣṭhī))</p>
<p>sambandhī dvidhā— <b>pradhānaṃ guṇabhūtaś‍ca ।</b></p>
<p>tayoḥ prathamāntābhidheya <b>pradhānam ।</b></p>
<p>sa tridhā— <b>1. dravyarūpaḥ, 2. guṇarūpaḥ 3. abhinnarūpaś‍ca</b> । teṣu —</p>
<p>(<b>1. dravyarūpaḥ</b>) 'tasyā'patyam' (4.1.92) ityādirāśrayavacano <b>dravyarūpaḥ ।</b></p>
<p>sa dvidhā <b>nirapekṣaḥ sāpekṣaś‍ca</b> । tayoḥ —</p>
<p><b>nirapekṣo</b> yathā— vasiṣṭhasyāpatyaṃ vāsiṣṭhaḥ, pāṇineḥ śiṣyaḥ pāṇinīyaḥ,
pañcālānāṃ rājā pāñcālaḥ, pṛthivyā īś‍varaḥ pārthivaḥ, pāṭalāyāḥ puṣpaṃ pāṭalam,
jambyāḥ phalaṃ jāmbavam iti ।</p>
<p><b>sāpekṣo</b> yathā— pituḥ pitā pitāmahaḥ piturbhrātā pitṛvyaḥ, māturmātulaḥ,
bhrāturapatyaṃ bhrātṛvyaḥ, svasuḥ svastrīyaḥ iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>2. guṇarūpaḥ</b>) 'tasyedam' (4.3.120) ityādirāśritavacano guṇavacano guṇarūpaḥ ।</p>
<p>sa dvidhā <b>ṣaṣṭhīviśeṣyaḥ aṣaṣṭhīviśeṣyaś‍ca</b> । tayoḥ —</p>
<p><b>ṣaṣṭhīviśeṣyo</b> yathā— yuṣmākamiyaṃ gauḥ yauṣmākī gauḥ, devadattasya bhūtapūrvo
devadattarūpyo rājā, putrasya nimittaṃ putrīyaḥ saṃyogaḥ, vidiśāyā adūrabhavaṃ vaidiśaṃ
nagaram, mūrvāyāḥ vikāro maurvaṃ bhasma (4.3.135), dūrvāyā avayavo daurvaḥ
kāṇḍaḥ iti ।</p>
<p><b>aṣaṣṭhīviśeṣyo</b> yathā— vatsebhyo hito vatsīyo godhuk (5.1.5), aṅgārebhya
imāni aṅgārīyāṇi kāṣṭhāni (5.1.12), śaraṇe sādhu śaraṇyo rājā
(4.4.98, 5.3.103), ākarṣe kuśala ākarṣako dhūrttaḥ (5.2.64),
puṣpairvittaḥ puṣpacaṇaś‍campakaḥ, (5.2.26), sūryeṇaikadṛk saurī balākā
(4.3.112, taisaṃ 5.5.16)</p>
<p>(<b>3. abhinnarūpaś‍ca</b>) prakṛtyaikacchāyo'bhinnarūpaḥ ।</p>
<p>sa dvidhā— <b>liṅgasaṃkhyānugrāhī liṅgasaṃkhyopagrāhī</b> ca । tayoḥ—
lugabhidheyo <b>liṅgasaṃkhyānupagrāhī</b> । yathā— gargasyāpatyāni gargāḥ (2.4.64),
pañcālasya rājānaḥ pañcālāḥ (4.1.180), atrerapatyāni atrayaḥ (2.4.65),
kusumbhyāḥ puṣpaṃ kusumbham, badaryāḥ phalaṃ badaram (3.4.163), lavaṇena saṃsṛṣṭo
lavaṇaḥ sūpa iti ।</p>

<pb n="090"/>
<p>lubabhidheyo <b>liṅgasaṃkhyopagrāhī</b> । yathā— pañcālānāṃ nivāsaḥ pañcālā janapadaḥ
(1.2.52, 4.2.8) varaṇāḥ santyasmin varaṇā nagarī (4.2.82),
śirīṣāṇāmadūrabhavaḥ śirīṣoḥ1 grāmaḥ (1.2.51),kiñca godaunāma, hradau,
tayoradūrabhavo grāmo godau (1.2.52) । harītakyādiṣu punarvyaktimevopagṛh‍ṇāti, na
vacanam, harītakyā phalāni harītakyaḥ ।</p>
<p>khalatikādiṣu vacanameva na vyaktim— khalatiko nāmādriḥ tasyādūrabhavāni
khalatikaṃ vanāni (1.2.51) iti ।</p>
<p>nanu ca vasiṣṭhasyāpatyamityādau bhinnādhikaraṇatvād dvayamevāśrayate pitaraṃ putraṃ ca ।
tathāhi ubhayamapi saṃbandhādabhyadhikaṃ pratīyāte— pituś‍cāmī putrāḥ svamiti, tat kasmāt
ekasmādeva ṣaṣṭhī taddhito vā?</p>
<p>ucyate— yadyapyayamubhayādhikaraṇaḥ, tathāpyeka eva, bhede hi nobhayādhikaraṇa ekaḥ
syāt, sambandhadvayaprasaṅgāt ।</p>
<p>so'yameko'nekāśrayaḥ, ekaś‍caiva vibhaktyocyate, ekasmādeva ca
taddhitotpattirbhavati ।</p>
<p>evamapi pitureva ṣaṣṭhīti niyamo na syāt ।</p>
<p>kaḥ punarāha niyama iti, yāvatā mātuḥ pitā mātāmaha ityapi bhavati ।</p>
<p>kutaḥ punaridaṃ yadekadā tu svāminaḥ, anyadā tu svasmād vibhaktiḥ taddhito veti?</p>
<p>saṃbandhasya padanyāsātirekāt । niyogato hi pitāputrayorekasya prādhānyamanyasyo—
pasarjanatvam, tulyatve sambandhā'bhāvāt । tatra na pradhānaṃ putrādi guṇānurodhena pravarttitumarhati;
upasarjanaṃ tu pitrādi yathā pradhānā'nugrahastathā''tmanaṃ nirvarttayati, svarūpāvasthitau
pradhānārthā'siddheḥ ।</p>
<p>ato'pradhāne saṃbandhasyādhikaḥ padanyāsaḥ । tatra ṣaṣṭhī taddhitotpattirvā bhavati । sā
caikatvāt saṃbandhasya putragatamapyenamabhidhatte । yadā tu mātuḥ pitā mātāmaha iti vivakṣātaḥ
prādhānyaviparyayaḥ tadā apatyādyutpannayā ṣaṣṭhyā dviṣṭho'pyasāvabhihita iti na sā, taddhito
vā pitṛśabdāt । taduktam— (vāpa. 3.7.157)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>dviṣṭho'pyasau parārthatvād guṇeṣu vyatiricyate ।</l>
  <l>tatrābhidhīyamānaśca pradhāne'pyupayujyate ॥ 19 ॥</l></lg></b> iti
<!-- NOTES pg=090!-->
1. 'śirīṣā' ityeva bahuvacanāntaḥ pāṭhaḥ sarvatra ।

<pb n="091"/>
<p>evaṃ 'tenaikadik' (4.3.112), 'tadarthaṃ vikṛteḥ prakṛtau (5.1.12),</p>
<p>'tasya nimittam' (5.1.38), tena vittaś‍cuñcupcaṇapau (5.2.26),</p>
<p>'tsmai hitam' (5.1.5), vapupprakaraṇe 'yuṣmadasmadbhyāṃ chandasi sādṛśya
upasaṃkhyānam' (5.2.39 vārtti. kāśikā), ityādiṣu ṣaṣṭhyantā api
dviṣṭhatvādekavibhaktivācyatvenāvagantavyāḥ ।</p>
<p>nanu ca tṛtīyādīnāṃ vyatirekavibhaktitvāt ṣaṣṭhīvadeva bhavatu sambandhābhidhāna—
sāmarthyāt, prathamāyāḥ punaravyatirik‍taprātipadikārthābhidhāyinyāḥ kathamivaitadupapadyate—
'tvamiva tvāvān' ahamiva māvān' iti । atraike varṇayanti—'tvāvataḥ purūravasaḥ', 'yajñaṃ
viprasya māvataḥ', 'na tvāvām̐ anyo divyo na pārthivaḥ' (ṛve. 8.46.1, 1.142.2,
7.32.23) iti prathamāntāyāḥ prakṛteḥ pradhānabhūte'pi saṃbandhini prayogadarśanāt
pratyayo'vagamyate ।</p>
<p>anye tvāhuḥ (vāpa. 3, vṛttiḥ, kaiyaṭo helārājādayaḥ)—tvamiva tvāvān, ahamiva
māvān ityupamānamatra prathamāntaṃ prakṛtyarthaḥ, upameyaṃ pratyayārthaḥ । na tatra
tāvadavacchedakatvādupamānaṃ pradhānam । avacchedakādapyupamānāt ṣaṣṭhī notpadyate,
vyatirekahetorasaṃbhavāt; ivaśabdo hyasattvabhūtābhidhāyitvānna vyatirekādhāyakaḥ,
sādṛśyadyotako hyasau । anyaś‍ca na kaś‍cidiha vyatirekahetuḥ śrūyate । ataś‍ca gauriva
gavaya ityādāvivā'tra ṣaṣṭhyā abhāvaḥ, vyatirekahetau tu sati ivaśabdaprayoge upamānāt
ṣaṣṭhyutpadyate— 'devadattasyeva yajñadattasya dantā' iti । taduktam—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>ivaśabdaprayoge tu bāhyāt saṃbandhino vinā ।</l>
  <l>nādhikyamupamāne'sti dyotakaḥ sa prayujyate ॥ 20 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(vāpa. 3.14.545vṛttiḥ)</p>
<p>mā bhūt ṣaṣṭhī, prathamayā'pi na bhavitavyameva, upamānasyāvacchedakatvenā—
pyādhikyāt/?/kaḥ punarāha—'anadhika eva prātipadikārthe prathame'—ti; pāṭaliputrād rājakaṃ	
sapta yojanāni, saptasu vā yojaneṣu iti adhvanaḥ prathamā saptamī ca smaryate, saṃbodhane ca
prathamaiva vidhīyate; dhik devadattam, hā devadattam iti ca dvitīyāviṣaye prathamāprayogo
dṛśyate । yathā— 'hā dhik kaṣṭamaniṣṭamastakarūṇaḥ ko'yaṃ vidheḥ prakramaḥ' (māmā. 5.24)
'kanyāntaḥpurameva hā praviśati kruddho munirbhārgavaḥ' (mavīca. 2.20) iti ।</p>

<pb n="092"/>
<p><b>ṣaṣṭhyantābhidheyo guṇabhūtaḥ</b>।</p>
<p>sa tridhā <b>1. bhāvaviśiṣṭaḥ, 2. kārakaviśiṣṭaḥ, 3. sambandhiviśiṣṭaś‍ca ।</b> teṣu—
(1) bhāvenāvacchinno <b>bhāvaviśiṣṭaḥ।</b>
sa dvidhā <b>mukhyena upādhinā</b> ca। tayoḥ—
<b>mukhyena</b> yathā—kṛṣirasyāstīti kṛṣīvalaḥ (5.2.112), māyāvī (5.2.121)
āmayāvī (5.2.122), dayāluḥ (5.2.122), śraddhāluḥ (3.2.158) iti।
<b>upādhinā</b> yathā— mṛdaṅgo vādyate iti śilpamasya mārdaṅgikaḥ (4.4.55), apūpāḥ
kriyanta iti śilpamasya āpūpikaḥ, māsaṃ brahmacaryamasya bhikṣoḥ māsikaḥ, asti
paraloka iti matirasya sādhorāstikaḥ, nāsti narakādikamiti matirasyāsādhoḥ
sa nāstikaḥ, diṣṭameva prabhavatīti matirasya jigīṣoḥ daiṣṭika iti।</p>
<p>(2) kārakeṇāvacchinnaḥ <b>kārakaviśiṣṭaḥ।</b></p>
<p>sa dvidhā— <b>svatantreṇa asvatantreṇa</b> ca। tayoḥ—
<b>svatantreṇa</b> yathā— dhanamasyāstīti dhanavān vadānyaḥ (5.2.130), pañcamo'sya māso
jātasya varttate pañcamī bālakaḥ (5.1.16), tārakāḥ sañcātā asya tārakitaṃ nabhaḥ
(5.2.36), samayaḥ prāpto'sya sāmayikaṃ karma (5.1.104), 'ekamanyat
karmādhyayane vṛttamasya aikānyikaḥ (4.4.64) iti।</p>
<p><b>asvatantreṇa</b> yathā— lavaṇaṃ paṇyamasya lāvaṇikaḥ (4.4.52), vāsudeve bhaktirasya
vāsudevakaḥ (4.3.98), dhanuḥ praharaṇamasya dhānuṣkaḥ (4.4.57), prasthaḥ
