aś‍vaghāsaḥ, aś‍vasuram, 'athāto dharmajijñāsā' (pūrvamīmāṃsādarśanaṃ 1.1.1), iti
caturthīsamāsaḥ। tatkathamucyate prakṛtivikāratādarthya eva caturthyāḥ sāmārthyamiti?</p>

<pb n="133"/>
<p>acāryapravṛttirjñāpayati yadayaṃ balirakṣitagrahaṇaṃ karoti। yathājātīyakānāṃ ca samāse
balirakṣitagrahaṇamapunarūktaṃ bhavati, tathājatīyakānāṃ samāsaḥ। vikṛtīnāmeva caturthyantānāṃ
prakṛtibhiḥ saha samāse balirakṣitagrahaṇamapunarūktaṃ bhavati, na tādarthyamātre।
aś‍vaghāsādayastu ṣaṣ‍ṭhīsamāsā bhaviṣyanti। yaddhi yadarthaṃ bhavati ayamapi tatrābhisambandhaḥ,
tasyedamiti tad‍yathā guroridaṃ yad‍gurvarthamiti। tādarthyaṃ hi sambandhaviśeṣaḥ। viśeṣe
cāvaśyameva sāmānyaṃ saṃbhavati। na caitat karmādiṣvapi na dṛśyate, na māṣāṇāmaś‍nīyāt,
kṣutaṃ te sarvamevaitaditi।</p>
<p>nanu ca varapradeyā kanyeti yadi dadātiprayoge'pi na saṃpradānam, sampradāne'pi na
caturthe, ko'nyastayorviśeṣo bhaviṣyati?</p>
<p>kaḥ punarāha nātra saṃpradānam? saṃpradāna evaiṣā caturthyarthe ṣaṣ‍ṭhī। dṛśyate hi
saṃpradānādau ṣaṣ‍ṭhīcaturthyeraviśeṣeṇa prayogaḥ, tad‍yathā 'himavato hastī'
'purūṣamṛgaś‍candramase', 'na vā are jāyāyai kāmāya jāyā priyā bhavati ātmanastu kāmāya
jāyā priyā bhavati, cirāya dṛṣ‍ṭaḥ cirarātrāya dṛṣ‍ṭaḥ', 'rocate mama ghṛtaṃ saha mud‍gaiḥ śālayo
dadhiśaraṃ kramukāś‍ca', ghṛtameva mamāpi rocate śrṛtaśītaṃ ca saśarkaraṃ payaḥ iti।</p>
<p>atha māsajāto'yamiti kiṃpradhāno'yaṃ samāsaḥ?</p>
<p>uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ। sadharmaṇā'nenānyairūttarapadārthapradhānairbhavitavyam। anyeṣu cottara—
padārthapradhāneṣu yaivāsāvantarvarttinī vibhaktistasyāḥ samāse'pi śravaṇaṃ bhavati। tad‍yathā—
rājñaḥ purūṣo rājapuruṣaḥ iti। iha punarvākye ṣaṣ‍ṭhī, samāse prathamā। kenaitagadevaṃ bhavati?
yo'sau māsajātayoḥ abhisaṃbandhaḥ sa samāse nivarttate, abhihitaḥ so'rtho'ntarbhūtaḥ
prātipadikārthaḥ saṃpanna iti, tatra 'prātipadikārthe prathamā' (2.3.46) iti prathamā bhavati।</p>
<p>na tarhīdānīmidaṃ bhavati māsajātasyeti।</p>
<p>bāhyaṃ sambandhinamapekṣya bhaviṣyati।</p>
<p>nanu ca 'kālāḥ parimāṇinā' (2.2.5) ityanenāyaṃ samāsaḥ। na ca jātasya māsaḥ
parimāṇam, apitu triṃśadarātrasya, yathā droṇo badarāṇāṃ davadattasyeti na devadattasya droṇaḥ
parimāṇam, apitu badarāṇām। tadāha 'kālasya yena samāsastasyāparimāṇitvādanirdeśa'
(mabhā. 2.2.5 vā—1) iti।</p>

<pb n="134"/>
<p><b>(kālapadārthaḥ)</b></p>
<p>kiṃ punarbhavān kālaṃ manyate ?</p>
<p><b>yena mūrttīnāmupacayā apacayāś‍ca lakṣyante ।</b></p>
<p><b>tasyaiva tarhi kayācit kriyayā yuktasyāhariti (nāma) bhavati, rātririti ca ।</b></p>
<p><b>kayā kriyayā ?</b></p>
<p>ādityagatyā । tayaivāsakṛdāvṛttayā māsa iti ca bhavati, saṃvatsara iti ca bhavati ।
yadyevaṃ bhavati jātasya māsaḥ parimāṇam, kiṃ nu māsau jātasyetivat māso jātasya,
māsā jātasyeti prāp‍noti ।</p>
<p>naivam । māsajāta ityuk‍te dvitvādisaṃkhyāviśeṣasyānupalambhāt । yatra tūpalabdhe—
rnimittamasti tatra bhavatyeva, yathā—dvau māsau jātasya dvimāsajātaḥ, evaṃ trimāsajāta iti ।</p>
<p>kathaṃ punaḥ kārakāṇāṃ samāsa ityupapannaṃ bhavati ? teṣāṃ hi kriyayaivābhisaṃbandhaḥ । na ca
kriyāvācinaḥ subantatvamasti; subantayorevāntarbhūtakriyāviśeṣayorbhaviṣyatīti cet, naivam,
dravyāṇāṃ kriyopajanitaḥ sambandhaḥ śeṣaviṣayo bhavati, na kārakaviṣayaḥ । svabhāvasiddhaṃ hi
dravyaṃ siddhavadabhidhīyamānaṃ dravyāntaraṃ prati ātmapratilambhe nirākāṅkṣaṃ, na karmādibhāvaṃ
bhajate । na ca samāsaprakaraṇe kārakāṇi samasyanta iti vacanamasti ।</p>
<p>ucyate— mā bhūd vacanam, arthaṃtastu gamyate, yadāha 'dvitīyā śritā'—dibhiḥ
samasyate kaṣ‍ṭaṃ śritaḥ kaṣ‍ṭaśrita iti । tatra śrita ityupāttakriyāviśeṣaparicchinnaḥ karttā,
abhyantarīkṛta—sādhyasādhana—saṃbandha—kriyāntarasambandhārhaḥ svāśrayaviṣayāsu bāhyāsu
kriyāsu śak‍tyantarairapi virūddhaikārthasamavāyaḥ kaṣ‍ṭādīnyupasarjanībhūtayā
śrayatikriyayā'pekṣate । tataś‍ca śrayatikriyayā saṃbandhāt kaṣ‍ṭe karmatvamiti
śrayaṇakriyāpūrvakaḥ kaṣ‍ṭaśritayorabhisaṃbandho bhavati । tasmin svavṛttyavayavārthaśaktya—
nugṛhīte'rthāntare prādurbhūte tadabhidhāyī śabdaḥ samāsasaṃjñāṃ labhate । evaṃ 'vṛkād bhīto
vṛkabhīta' ityatrāpi 'pañcamī bhayena' (2.1.37) iti vṛkasya bhaye 'bhītrārthānāṃ bhayahetuḥ'
(1.4.25) ityapādānatvāt sati sāmarthye, abhyantarīkṛtakriyākārakasaṃbandhaḥ samudāyaḥ
samāsasaṃjñāṃ labhate ।</p>
<p>nanu ca, na vṛkasya bhītaṃ prati apādānatvam, apitu bhayaṃ bhītiḥ ityetāni ।</p>
<p>ucyate— yathā māso jātasyeti māsākhyaḥ kriyākalāpaḥ prathamakukṣigarbha—
viyogākhyasya janmano'vadhibhāvena paricchedako bhavati, janma pratilabdhāṃ vā sattāṃ

<pb n="135"/>
samāvṛttyā parimitena jātamapekṣate tathehāpi vṛkādityayamapādānaśabdo bhayamātrasyaivā—
vacchedako bhaviṣyati, na bhītasya।</p>
<p>yadi vā yathā kaṣ‍ṭaśrita ityatropātta—śrayati—kriyāsaṃbandhāt kaṣ‍ṭe karmatvamiti
śrayaṇakriyāpūrvakaṃ kaṣ‍ṭena saṃbadhyate, tathehāpyupāttabhayakriyāvacchinnaḥ karttā bhayakriyā—
saṃbandhād vṛkasyāpādānatvamiti bhayakriyāpūrvakaṃ vṛkena saṃbhantsyata iti।</p>
<p>bhavatu yatropasarjanībhūtāyā api kriyāyāḥ śravaṇaṃ, yatra tu kriyā na śrūyate tatra kathaṃ
śaṅkulākhaṇḍa iti?</p>
<p>pratīyamānā bhaviṣyati। tathāhi śṅkulākhaṇḍa ityukte kṛta iti pratīyate। tadetad
dyotayatannāha 'tṛtīyā tatkṛtena1 guṇavacanena' (2.1.30) iti।</p>
<p>nyāsāsiddhatvād vacanānarthakyamiti cet, na, vacanasya niyamārthatvāt—'yatraiva kṛta
ityādi gamyate tatraiva samāsaḥ, anyatra mā bhūdi'ti।</p>
<p>evaṃ ca gamyamāna—karotikriyopagṛhītakaraṇakartṛkaṃ tṛtīyāntena śaṅkulādinā
khaṇḍādīnāṃ guṇamuktavatāṃ matublopādinā dravyavacanānāṃ tṛtīyāntārthakṛtatve sati
sāmarthyamavasīyate, na tūktavaiparītye, yathā ākṣṇā kāṇaḥ, pādena khañjaḥ iti।
tadevamākṣip‍ta karotikriyā'vacchinnaḥ kriyāntarasambandhārhaḥ khaṇḍaśabdārtho
gamyamānopasarjanībhūtayā karotikriyayā śaṅkulādīnapekṣamāṇaḥ karaṇabhūtaiḥ karttṛbhūtairvā
śaṅkulādibhiḥ sambadhyate। tadvacanaś‍ca samudāyo'bhyantarībhūtakriyākārakasaṃbandhaḥ
samāsasaṃjño bhavati।</p>
<p>atheha kasmānna bhavati 'dadhnā paṭuḥ' 'ghṛtena paṭuḥ' iti?</p>
<p>asāmarthyāt।</p>
<p>kathamasāmarthyam?</p>
<p>sāpekṣamasamarthaṃ bhavati। na hi dadhnaḥ paṭunā sāmarthyam।</p>
<p>kiṃtarhi! bhujinā, dadhnā bhuṅkte paṭuriti।</p>
<p>ihāpi tarhi na prāpnoti śaṅkulayā khaṇḍa iti, atrāpi na śaṅkulāyāḥ khaṇḍena
sāmarthyam kiṃ tarhi? karotinā, śaṅkulayā kṛtaḥ khaṇḍa iti।</p>
<p>tatkṛteneti vacanād bhaviṣyati।</p>
<p>vacanāditi ced, atheha guṇavacanetyucyamāne kathaṃ matublopād dravyavacanena
khaṇḍādinā pratīyate?</p>
<!-- NOTES pg=135!-->
<p>1. mabhā. 2.1.30 tatkṛtārtheneti sūtrapāṭhaḥ।</p>

<pb n="136"/>
<p>iha tṛtīyā tatkṛtena guṇeneti siddhe yad‍vacanagrahaṇaṃ karoti tasyaitat prayojanam ।
evaṃ yathā vijñāyeta guṇamuktavān guṇavacanaḥ, khaṇḍaguṇavān khaṇḍaḥ, pāṇḍuguṇavān pāṇḍuḥ
(mabhā, 2.1.30) iti ।</p>
<p>yadyevam— nārthastatkṛtagrahaṇena bhavati, bhavati hi śaṅkulāyāḥ khaṇḍena sāmarthyam ।
asāmarthyādiha na bhaviṣyati dadh‍nā paṭuri— (mabhā. 2.1.30)—ti ।</p>
<p>idaṃ tarhi tatkṛtasya prayojanam— dravyavacanaiḥ kārakasamāse tadanurūpā
kriyā'dhyāharttavyeti । tad‍yathā akṣeṣu prasak‍taḥ śauṇḍaḥ akṣaśauṇḍa iti ।</p>
<p>atha dravyavacanaisyatkṛtasamāse guṇavacanenetyapi kimartham ?</p>
<p>iha mā bhūd—dhānyena dhanavān, gobhirvapāvāniti ॥</p>
<p>atha aśrāddhabhojīti ko'yaṃ samāsaḥ ?</p>
<p>asamarthanañ‌tatpurūṣaḥ । (mabhā. 2.1.1) ।</p>
<p>kiṃ punarihā'sāmarthyam ?</p>
<p>pūrvottarapadayormitho'napekṣā । tathāhi aśrāddhabhojīti bhujikriyayā nañaḥ sambandhaḥ, na
śrāddhena । na hi tasyāyaṃ niyamo na śrāddhaṃ bhok‍tavyamiti, apitu śrāddhaṃ na bhok‍tavyamiti ।
yatra hi varttipadārthasamavāyinī kriyā'bhidhīyamānā pratīyamānā vā svabhāvato nivṛttā nañā
dyotyate 'apācakaḥ, abrāhmaṇa' iti, tatraiva sāmarthyam । yatra tu bāhyakriyayā nañaḥ
saṃbandhastatrā'sāmarthyameva । yathā sūryamapi na paśyanti asūryaṃpaśyā rājadārāḥ, na
punargīyante apunargeyāḥ ś‍lokāḥ, lavaṇaṃ na bhuṅkte avalaṇabhojī bhikṣuriti ।</p>
<p>nanvevam— avayavārthavyatirik‍tasamudāyārthābhāve'rthavattvābhāvāt kathaṃ
prātipadikaṃsaṃjñā ?</p>
<p>samāsagrahaṇāditi ced anarthake kṛtārthatvānniyamā'nupapattiḥ । tataś‍cārthavato
vākyasyāpi prātipadikatvaprasaṅgaḥ ।</p>
<p>nanu ca asūryalalāṭayodṛśitapoḥ (3.2.36), ityanenāsamarthanañsamāsānāṃ
sādhutve jñāpite 'akiñcitkurvāṇa', 'amāṣaṃharamāṇaḥ', agādhādutsṛp‍ta/ṣ‍ṭam (mabhā. 2.1.1.)
ityādīnāmapi mā bhūt samāsa ityasūryaṃpaśyādayaś‍catvāra evā'samarthasamāsāḥ parigaṇyante,
(mabhā.2.1.1.) parigaṇanasāmarthyādeva prātipadikasaṃjñāpi bhaviṣyati, tathāpyanarthakatvādā—
śrayā'bhāve, saṃkhyākarmādyabhāve teṣā vācikā dyotikā vāpi vibhak‍tayo notpadyeran ?</p>

<pb n="137"/>
<p>naivam, samudāyastāvadānarthakye'pi 'na kevalā prakṛtiḥ prayok‍tavyā' iti
niyamādavaśyamevāvyayādivad vibhaktimātramapekṣate, avayavastvarthavattvāt saṃkhyākarmā—
derāśrayatvena tāṃ viśiṣ‍ṭāmevāṅgīkaroti । tataś‍ca yathā''turānāturayorekabhojana—
pratipattāvāturāṇāṃ bhojanamanāturo'pi pratipadyate tathā'vayavārthā'nugrahārthako'pi samudāyo
vibhaktiviśeṣameva pratipatsyata iti na kaś‍cid doṣaḥ ।</p>
<p>nanu 'asatyekārthībhāve vyapekṣādharmāḥ kathaṃ na nivarttante ?'</p>
<p>ke punaste ? <b>'viśeṣaṇayogaḥ, samuccayaḥ, saṃkhyāviśeṣa'</b> iti (śrṛ.pra. 7) । tatra—</p>
<p>brāhmaṇasya śobhanaṃ 'śrāddhaṃ na bhuṅkta' iti <b>viśeṣaṇayogaḥ,</b></p>
<p>śrāddhaṃ na bhuṅkte balimāmantraṇaṃ ceti <b>samuccayaḥ,</b></p>
<p>śrāddhaṃ śrāddhāni vā bhuṅkte iti <b>saṃkhyāviśeṣayogaḥ ।</b></p>
<p>te ca vākya evopalabhyante, na tvaśrāddhabhojīti vṛttau, na
hyaśrāddhabhojī(jo)brāhmaṇasya śobhanamityādi । tat kathamucyate nāstyatraikārthībhāva iti ?</p>
<p>naivam । aśrāddhaśabdo hyatrā'samarthaḥ, na tvaśrāddhabhojiśabdaḥ । aśrāddhabhoji—
viṣayāś‍caite viśeṣaṇayogadayaḥ pratīyante, nāśrāddhaviṣayā iti ।</p>
<p>nanu ca yadyaśrāddhaśabdaḥ samudāyārthābhāvādanarthakaḥ, aśrāddhabhojiśabdo'pyarthavada—
narthakasaṃghātatvādanarthakaḥ prāp‍noti ।</p>
<p>astvānarthakyam । vākyaviṣayāstu dharmā bhaviṣyanti tac‍cānarthakyamapi pariharttavyam
idaṃ ca varihriyate, śabdaśaktireṣā yadabhinne'pyarthe kenacicchabdenābhidhīyamāne
viś‍oṣaṇādiyogo bhavati, kenacinna bhavati । tatra vākye'samarthasamāsapadānāmavidyamānamāpi
vṛttau śabdāntaratvā— dastyekārthābhidhāyitvamiti ।</p>
<p>nanu ca, yadyasāmarthye'pi vacanāt samāsaḥ 'kimadya me vas‍traṃ nīlamutpalamāli
karṇe, neha kaś‍cit purūṣo vyāghraḥ sarati pallīm, paśya sakhi । kaṣ‍ṭaṃ śritaḥ priyo me
gurūkulam; kiṃ te śaṅkulayā khaṇḍo devadatta utpalena; gaccha tvaṃ yūpāya dārū śobhanaṃ
śaile, nivarttasva vṛkād bhayaṃ devadattasya yajñadattāt, bhāryā rājñaḥ purūṣo devadattasya;
sak‍tastvamakṣeṣu śauṇḍaḥ pibati pānāgāre' ityādāvapi samāsaḥ prāp‍noti; sa tarhyatrāpi
vacanād 'viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa', 'dvitīyā śritādibhiḥ', 'tṛtīyā tatkṛtena', caturthī
tadarthena', pañcamī bhayena', 'ṣaṣ‍ṭhī subantena', 'sap‍tamī śauṇḍādibhiḥ' samasyata iti ।</p>

<pb n="138"/>
<p>viṣama upanyāsaḥ; parigaṇanādīnyasāmarthya eva samāsārthamārabhyante । yathā 'kṛtapūrvī
kaṭami' tyādyarthaṃ 'pūrvādiniḥ' (5.2.86), sapūrvāc‍ca (5.2.87) iti । 'viśeṣaṇaṃ
viśeṣyeṇa' ityevamādīni tu 'samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ' (2.1.1) iti sāmarthye satyupādīyante ।
sāmarthyaviṣayapradarśanārthameva ca 'viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa' iti prathamāyāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ
dvitīyāyāṃ ca śritādiniyamaḥ, tṛtīyāyāṃ tatkṛtādivacanam, caturthyāṃ prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ,
pañcamyāṃ bhayādiparigaṇanam, ṣaṣ‍ṭhyāṃ pūraṇādiniṣedhaḥ, sap‍tamyāṃ śauṇḍādinirdeśa
ityupapadyate । tena yatra viśeṣaṇādiṣu sāmānādhikaraṇyāderabhāvastatrāsāmarthyāt samāso na
bhavati ॥</p>
<p>abrāhmaṇo'yamiti ko'yaṃ samāsaḥ ? samarthanañtatpurūṣaḥ ।</p>
<p>kiṃ pradhāno'yam ?</p>
<p>uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ । abrāhmaṇamānatetyukte brāhmaṇamātrasyānayanaṃ prāp‍noti ।</p>
<p>naiṣa doṣaḥ । idaṃ tāvadayaṃ praṣ‍ṭavyaḥ—atheha rājapurūṣamānayetyuk‍te purūṣamātrasyānayanaṃ
kathaṃ na bhavati rājā'tra viśeṣakaḥ prayujyate tena rājaviśiṣ‍ṭasyā''nayanaṃ bhavaṣyiti ।</p>
<p>ihāpi nañ—viśeṣakaḥ prayujyate, tena nañviśiṣ‍ṭasyānayanaṃ bhaviṣyati ।</p>
<p>kaḥ punarasau ?</p>
<p>nivṛttapadārthakaḥ । yadā punarasya padārtho nivarttate tadā kiṃ svābhāvikī nivṛttiḥ ?
āhosvid vācanikī ?</p>
<p>kiṃ cāp‍taḥ ? yadi svābhāvikī kiṃ nañ prayujyamānaḥ karoti ?</p>
<p>tarhi vācanikī bhaviṣyati; kiṃ ca pratikīlavat । tatra yathā kīla āhanyamānaḥ
pratikīlaṃ nivarttayati, evaṃ nañ prayujyamānaḥ padārthaṃ nivarttayati ।</p>
<p>yadyetannaño māhātmyaṃ syāt, na jātucid rājāno hastyaś‍vaṃ bibhṛyuḥ, netyeva brūyuḥ ।</p>
<p>evaṃ tarhi svābhāvikī nivṛttiḥ, nañ‌nimittā tūpalabdhiḥ, tad‍yathā santamasāndhakāre
dravyāṇāṃ pradīpanimittaṃ darśanam, na ca teṣāṃ pradīpo nivarttako bhavati । yadi punarayaṃ
nivṛttipadārthako nañ, kimarthaṃ brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ prayujyate ?</p>
<p>evaṃ yathā vijñāyeta 'asya padasyārtho nivṛtta' iti,</p>
<p>neti hyuk‍te saṃdehaḥ syāt kasya padārtho nivarttata iti; tatrāsaṃdehārthaṃ brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ
prayujyate । yadi vā sarva ete śabdāḥ avayaveṣvapi varttante brāhmaṇaḥ, kṣatriyaḥ, vaiśyaḥ, śūdra iti ।</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>tapaḥ śrutaṃ ca yoniś‍ca tatra brāhmaṇakāraṇam ।</l>
  <l>tapaḥśrutābhyāṃ yo hīno jātibrāhmaṇa eva saḥ ॥ 51 ॥</l>
</lg></b>

<pb n="139"/>
<p>tathā gauraḥ, kapilaḥ, piṅgalakeśaḥ ityetānapyantarān brāhmaṇye guṇān bruvanti ।
samudāyeṣu ca vṛttāḥ śabdā avayaveṣvapi varttante । tad‍yathā pūrve pañcālāḥ, uttarāḥ kurava
iti । evamayaṃ samudāye brāhmaṇaśabdo vṛtto'vayave'pi varttate guṇe jātau ca । guṇe tāvad
abrāhmaṇo'yaṃ yastiṣ‍ṭhan mūtrayatīti, abrāhmaṇo'yaṃ gacchan bhakṣayatīti ।</p>
<p>api ca kālaṃ kalmāṣaṃ māṣarāśivarṇamāpaṇe āsīnaṃ dṛṣ‍ṭvā'dhyavasyati nāyaṃ
brāhmaṇaḥ, abrāhmaṇo'yamiti nirjñātaṃ tasya bhavati, guṇakṛtā cārthasya nivṛttiḥ । atha jātau
jātihīne saṃdehād durūpadeśād‍vā'nyo brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ pravarttate । saṃdehāt tāvad gauramayaṃ
śucyācāraṃ piṅgalaṃ kapilakeśaṃ dṛṣ‍ṭvā'dhyavasyati brāhmaṇo'yamiti । tataḥ paś‍cādulabhyate nāyaṃ
brāhmaṇaḥ abrāhmaṇo'yamiti । tatra durupadeśo brāhmaṇaśabdo varttate । jātikṛtā cārthasya nivṛttiḥ ।</p>
<p>nanu ca —nañ‌vyavacchedāya brāhmaṇādiśabdaprayoge samāsasya pūrvapadapradhānatā
prāp‍noti ?</p>
<p>naivam । avyayasaṃjñāprasaṅgāt avyayaṃ hyasya pūrvapadam ।</p>
<p>naiṣa doṣaḥ । pāṭhenāvyayasaṃjñā kriyate, na ca naña‌samāsastatra paṭhyate । mā bhūdavyayeṣu
pāṭhaḥ; tathāpyabhidheyavalliṅgavacanāni bhavanti; yaś‍cehārtho'bhidhīyate na tasya
liṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ yogo'sti । nedaṃ vācanikam— aliṅgatā, asaṃkhyatā vā । kiṃ tarhi?
svābhāvikametat । tatra kimasmābhiḥ śakyaṃ vak‍tum, yannañaḥ prāk samāsālliṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ
yogo nāsti, samāse ca bhavati ।</p>
<p>yadi vā guṇavacanānāmāśrayato liṅgavacanāni bhavanti । yadasau dravyaṃ śrito bhavati
guṇaḥ samāso vā, tasya yalliṅgaṃ vacanaṃ ca tad guṇasyeva samāsasyāpi bhavati ।</p>
<p>ucyate iha trayī gatiḥ 1. kadācinnañarthenottarapadārtho viśeṣyate,</p>
<p>2. kadācinnañartha uttarapadārthena,</p>
<p>3. kadācinnañarthottarapadārthābhyāmanyaḥ padārtha iti । tatra—</p>
<p>(1) yadā nañarthottarapadārthābhyāmanyapadārtho viśeṣyate tadā 'samānādhikaraṇānāṃ bahuvrīhiḥ',
'nañarthaś‍ca viśeṣyo bhavatī' ti <b>ṣaṭ samāsārthabhedā</b> jāyante — 1. atyantābhāvaḥ,
2. anatyantābhāvaḥ, 3. anyatarābhāvaḥ, 4. tādātmyābhāvaḥ, 5. saṃbandhā'bhāvaḥ,
6. pradhvaṃsābhāva iti । yathā— arūpo vāyuḥ, anudārā kanyā, akiñcanaḥ pumān,
apiśācaḥ kuḍyaḥ, aghaṭaṃ bhūtalam, anaṅga kāma iti ।</p>

<pb n="140"/>
<p>(2) yadā tūttarapadārthena nañartho viśeṣyate tadā pūrvapadārthapradhānastatpuruṣaḥ ।
nañarthopādheś‍ca ṣaṭ samāsārthabhedā jāyante— <b>1. prāgabhāvaḥ, 2. sāmarthyābhāvaḥ,
3. āvaś‍yakatā'bhāvaḥ, 4. itaretarābhāvaḥ, 5. sattā'bhāvaḥ, 6. bhāvābhāva</b> iti ।
yathā— anutpanno ghaṭaḥ, apradhṛṣyaḥ subhaṭaḥ, abhūṣitaḥ kāntaḥ, avarṣā (mabhā. 2.2.6)
hemantaḥ, asacchaśaviṣāṇam, anudbhinnaḥ pravāla iti ।</p>
<p>(3) yadā tu nañarthenottarapadārtho viśeṣyate tadottarapadārthapradhānastatpuruṣaḥ, padārthasya ca
nañarthopādhe ṣaṭ samāsabhedā jāyante, yathā— 1. tadabhāvaḥ, 2. tadanyaḥ,
3. tatsadṛśaḥ, 4. tad‌viruddhaḥ, 5. tadapakṛṣṭaḥ, 6. tadutkṛṣṭa iti । yathā—
ananyaḥ, anatriḥ, abrāhmaṇaḥ, asitaḥ, amanuṣyaḥ, amānuṣaḥ iti ।
nanu ca, anyapadārthatatpuruṣayoranyatrāpi nañ‌samāso dṛśyate । yathā
makṣikāṇāmabhāvo'makṣikamiti ।</p>
<p>nāyaṃ nañ‌samāsaḥ, kintarhi 'avyayaṃ vibhakti' (2.1.6) ityādinā
avyayamabhāvārthe samasyate, avyayībhāvaś‍ca samāso bhavati । yathā nivātaṃ niśītam iti ।</p>
<p>kiṃ punaramī nañ‌samāsārthā anyapadārthādiṣu vyavatiṣṭhante uta saplavante?
kecid vyavatiṣṭhante pradhvaṃsābhāvādayaḥ । tad‌yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>bhavedabhīṣmamadroṇaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrabalaṃ katham ।</l>
  <l>yadi tattulyakakṣo'tra bhavān dhuryo na yujyate ॥ 60 ॥</l></lg></b> (vesaṃ. 3.25)
<p>yathā ca anudarā kanyā, alomikā eḍaketi ।</p>
<p>kecit tu saṃplavante prāgabhāvādayaḥ । tad‌yāthā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>ajanmā puruṣastāvadapumān paśureva vā ।</l>
  <l>yāvallīlāvatīvakraprekṣitārthaṃ na budhyate ॥ 61 ॥</l></lg></b> (iti) ।
<p>yathā ca — aneke, aneka iti ।</p>
<p>nanu ca — ekaśabdo bahvarthaḥ । tad‌yathā—</p>
<p>(1) ekaḥ ko'pi sa kumbhasaṃbhavamuniḥ ityutkarṣārthaḥ । tatra—</p>
<p>(2) eke tāvadāhuriti pakṣāntarārthaḥ,</p>
<p>(3) eka evāyamāvayoḥ svabhāva iti tulyārthaḥ,</p>
<p>(4) naikaḥ śayītetyasahāyārthaḥ,</p>
<p>(5) ekamevedaṃ śabdabrahmetyabhedārthaḥ,</p>
<p>(6) ekaḥ dvau bahava iti saṃkhyārthaḥ ।</p>

<pb n="141"/>
<p>tatkasyeha grahaṇam?</p>
<p>saṃkhyārthasya।</p>
<p>utkarṣādīnāṃ kasmānna bhavati ?</p>
<p>anabhidhānāt। tadayathā amitra ityuk‍te pūrvapadārthapradhānatatpuruṣe śatrukareva pratīyate, na
tvasūryaḥ, evamaneka ityukte bahava eva pratīyante, na punaranutkarṣādimantaḥ। etena
tatpuruṣasyottarapadaprādhānye satyaneka ityapi vyākhyātam।</p>
<p>kathaṃ punarekasya pratiṣedhe bahūnāṃ sampratyayaḥ syāt ?</p>
<p>prasajyāyaṃ kriyāguṇau tataḥ paś‍cānnivṛttaṃ karoti। tad yathā— āsaya, bhojaya,
śāyaya anekamiti।</p>
<p>syādetat, yatra kriyāguṇau prasajyete, yatra tu khalu na prasajyete tatra tu
kathamanekastiṣṭhati iti ?</p>
<p>bhavatyevaṃjātīyateṣvapi ekasya pratiṣedhe bahūnāṃ sampratyayaḥ। tad yathā— na na ekaṃ
priyam, na na ekaṃ sukhamiti।</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>prakṛtipratyayau tredhā tridhopaskārabhak‍tayaḥ।
tridhaivopapadaprātipadikānāṃ vibhak‍tayaḥ॥ 62॥</l></lg></b>
<b><lg>
  <l>tridhopasarjanaṃ tredhā samāsa iti kīrttitaḥ।
prātipādasaśabdo'yamathānvākhyeya ucyate॥ 63॥</l></lg></b>
<b><lg>
  <l>padamiha trividhaṃ pratipādyate trividhameva ca vāk‍yamatha tridhā।
vyavahṛtiḥ khalu śabdanibandhanā yadanayorubhayoḥ prititiṣṭhati॥ 64॥</l></lg></b>
<p><b>iti mahārājādhirājabhojadevaviracite śrṛṅgāraprakāśe</b></p>
<p><b>prātipadikādiprakāśo nāma</b></p>
<p><b>॥ dvitīyaḥ prakāśaḥ॥ 2॥</b></p>
<p>revāprasādena sanātanena bhojādṛtenaiṣa prakāśa—lekhaḥ।</p>
<p>svayaṃ svahastād vihito'tra mūlaṃ kṛpā mahākālamaheś‍varasya॥</p>

<pb n="142"/>
<p>atha</p>
<p><b>śrṛṅgāraprakāśe tṛtīyaḥ prakāśaḥ</b></p>
<p>prakṛtyādiśabdaprakāśaḥ</p>
<p><b>(9. padam)</b></p>
<p><b>tatra padyate'nenārtha iti padam।</b></p>
<p>tat tridhā 1. kriyārūpam, 2. kārakarūpam, 3. upaskārarūpañca। teṣu—</p>
<p>sādhyārthābhidhāyi <b>kriyārūpam।</b></p>
<p>sādhanārthābhidhāyi <b>kārakarūpam।</b></p>
<p>sādhyasādhanayorbhūṣaṇādibhūtamupaskāram।</p>
<p>teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ ṣaḍbhedatvāt padasyāṣṭādaśa bhedā bhavanti। teṣu—</p>
<p><b>(1. kriyārūpaṃ padam)</b></p>
<p>(1) bhāvapadam, (2) karmapadam, (3) karttṛpadam, (4) bhāvakarmapadam,
(5) bhāvakarttṛpadam, (6) karmakarttṛpadaṃ ceti <b>kriyārūpa</b>—padabhedāḥ। teṣu—</p>।
<p><b>(1) bhāvapadaṃ yathā—</b></p>
<p>pacyate, apāci, pakṣyate devadattena; āsyate, āsi, āsiṣyate bhavatā; bhidyate,
abhedi, bhitsyate kusūlena; śrāyate, aśrāyi śrāyiṣyate yavāgvā;
evaṃ śrāyiṣīṣṭa, śaśre, aśrāyiṣyataudanena; ghāniṣīṣṭa, jaghne, aghāniṣyata hastinā;
grāhīṣīṣṭa, jagṛhe, agrāhiṣyata grāheṇa; dārśiṣīṣṭa, dadṛśe, adarśiṣyata preyaseti।</p>
<p><b>(2) karmapadaṃ yathā—</b></p>
<p>pacyate odanaḥ sūdena, āsyate māso bhṛtakena, gamyate grāmaḥ pānthena, supyate
krośaḥ śiśunā, akāri kaṭaḥ kuśalena, arodhi gaurgopālena, adohi dhenurvallavena,
atāpi pṛthivī rājñā, anvatātapta kitavaḥ karmaṇā, anubabhūve kambalaḥ kareṇa,
pakṣyate yavāgūrbhiṣajā, lapsīṣṭa bhikṣā tāpasena।</p>
<p>evaṃ kariṣyate kāritā kāriṣīṣṭa kaṭaḥ, ghāniṣyate ghānitā ghāniṣīṣṭa śatruḥ,
grāhiṣyate grāhitā grāhīṣaṣṭa granthaḥ, darśiṣyate darśitā darśiṣīṣṭa preyāniti।</p>

<pb n="143"/>
<p><b>(3) karttṛpadaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<p>pacati caitraḥ, āste maitraḥ, tapati suvarṇaṃ suvarṇakāraḥ, tapyate tapasyāpasaḥ, sṛjati
mālāṃ mālikaḥ, sṛjate dharmaṃ dhārmikaḥ, udasarji svaṃ vadānyaḥ, udapādi sasyaṃ
bhūmiḥ parivārayante vṛkṣaṃ kaṇṭakāḥ, śoṣayate vrīhīnātapaḥ, saṃyujyate gṛhamedhī
bhāryayā, pacyate salohitaṃ phalamudumbaraḥ, tathā adīpi, adīpiṣṭa vahniḥ, ajani
ajaniṣṭa dhūmaḥ, abodhi abuddha prasuptaḥ, apūri apūriṣṭa kāmaḥ, atāyi atāyiṣṭa
dharmaḥ, āpyāyi, āpyāyiṣṭa loka iti।</p>
<p><b>(4) bhāvakarmmapadaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<p>icchāmi bhuñjīta bhavān, icchāmi bhuṅktāṃ bhavanā, kāmaye yat sa bhuñjīta, prārthaye
yadi sa bhañjīta, saṃbhāvayāmi bhuñjīta bhavān, samarthayāmi bhokṣyate bhavān, śraddadhe
nābhuṅkta bhavān, avakalpayāmi nābhokṣyata bhavān, na śraddhadhe nanu bhavān vṛṣalaṃ
yājayet, nāvakalpayāmi tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayiṣyati, na marṣayāmi tatrabhavān
vṛṣalamayāyajiṣyat, vigarhe api tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayati, smarasi devadatta
kaśmīreṣu vatsyāmaḥ, abhijānāsi kaliṅgeṣu yadavasāma, abhijānāsi kaliṅgeṣu
śaś‍vadavasāma, smarasi kaśmīreṣu vatsyāma, tatraudanaṃ bhokṣyāmahe, abhijānāsi yat
kaliṅgeṣvavasāma yat tatraudanamabhuñjmahi; ehi manye rathena yāsyasi, jāne supto
vihāyasā gacchāmi, paś‍ya mṛgo dhāvati, iha paś‍yāmaḥ karmaṇi dvivacana—
bahuvacanānyudāhniyante iti।</p>
<p><b>(5) bhāvakarttṛpadaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<p>corasya rujati, corasyāmayati, corasya bādhate, corasya pīḍayati, corasya dahati,
corasyātaṅkayati, corasya spṛśati, corasya śoṣayati, corasya mardayati, corasya
moṭayati, coraṃ jvarayati, coraṃ saṃtāpayati। tathā— bhavati pacati, bhavati pakṣyati,
bhavatyapākṣīt, bhavedapi bhavet, syādapi syāt, nāsti rame, ayūyujastvamasi,
asi tvamīśiṣe, asti gacchāmo vayam, astyatra kāñcid gāṃ paś‍yati, asi
bhavatu gamyate, bhavatu sādhayāma iti।</p>
<p><b>(6) karmakarttṛpadam</b> yathā—</p>
<p>rajyati vastraṃ svayameva, kuṣyati pādassvayameva, avakirate hastī, avākīrṣṭa vā

<pb n="144"/>
svayameva, grathnīte mālā, agrathiṣṭa vā svayameva, cīkīrṣate kaṭaḥ, acikīrṣata
vā svayameva, namate daṇḍaḥ anaṃsta vā svayameva, ucchrayate daṇḍaḥ, udaśiśriyata
vā svayameva, brūte kathā, avocata vā svayameva; prasnute gauḥ prāsnoṣṭa vā
svayameva; āhate gauḥ (3.1. 89 kāśikā), āvadhiṣṭa vā svayameva। anurundhe
gauḥ anvaruddha vā svayameva, akṛta kaṭaḥ svayameva (3.1. 62 kāśikā) iti।</p>
<p>anye punaramīṣāmapi karmakarttṛtvaṃ manyante—</p>
<p>bhidyate kusūlaḥ, svayameva, bhidyate rajjuḥ svayameva, lūyate kedāraḥ svayameva,
pacyate phalaṃ svayameva, bhajyate kāṣṭhaṃ svayameva, kuṣyate pādaḥ svayameva, adohi
gauḥ svayameva, arodhi gauḥ svayameva, ahāvi haviḥ svayameva, akāri kaṭaḥ
svayameva, tathā bhūṣayate kanyā svayameva, maṇḍayate kanyā svayameva, dohayate gauḥ
svayameva, ārohayate hastī svayameva, darśayate rājā svayameva, abhivādayate
guruḥ svayameva, lāvayate kedāraḥ svayameva, pācayate odanaḥ svayameva, bhedayate
kusūlaḥ svayameva, kārayate kaṭaḥ svayameva, gaṇayati gaṇaḥ svayameva, smarayati
vanagulmaḥ svayameva'iti। āhuś‍ca—</p>
<p>karmavat karmmaṇā tulyakriyaḥ (3.1. 87), karmavadabhāve yagātmanepadaciṇ (vad)bhāvāḥ
prayojanam (3.1. 87 kāśikā) acaḥ karmakarttari (3.1. 62), duhaśa‍ca (3.1.
63), na rudhaḥ (3.1. 64), na duh‍snunamāṃ yak‍ciṇau (3.1. 89), yak‍ciṇoḥ
pratiṣedho hetumaṇṇiśribruñāmupasaṃkhyānam (3.1. 89 vā. 1), bhūṣākarmakirādi (3.
1. 87), ṇi—śrantha—grantha—bruñātmanepadā—karmakāṇāmupasaṃkhyānam (3.1. 89 vā)।</p>
<p>tat tu samyak। tathāhi 'bhidyate kusūlassvayameva, akāri kaṭaḥ svayamevetyādiṣu
karmaṇyeva yak‍ciṇau, svayaṃśabdāttu karmakarttukatvapratītiḥ। arodhi gaussvayameveti rudherapi
karmavivakṣāyāṃ ciṇ bhavatyeva arodhi gaurgopāleneti। yadā tu gorātmanepada eva karmakarttutvaṃ
tadā arodhi gaurgopāleneti। yadā tu gorātmanepada eva karmakarttṛtvaṃ tadā'rodhi gaurātmanaiveti
bhavati। ya evārtha ātmanaiveti sa svayameveti। arodhīti cok‍te nāśrute karttṛvācini
padāntare karmakarttutvaṃ gamyate। tasmādihāpi karmaṇyeva ṇic। bhūṣayate kanyā svayamevetyādiṣu
tu 'ṇoraṇau yat karma ṇau cet sa karttā'nādhyāye' (1.3. 67) iti phalavati karttaryevātmanepadam।
kutastyā tarhyeteṣu karmakarttṛtāprasiddhiḥ ?</p>

<pb n="145"/>
<p>śrūyatām— karmapadeṣu tāvat—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>kriyamāṇaṃ tu yat karma svayameva prasiddhyati।
sukaraṃ svairguṇaiḥ karttuḥ karmakartteti taṃ viduḥ॥1॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>karttupadeṣu bhūtapūrvakatvāt tadavadupacāra iti। tathāhi kanyādayo lāvaṇyātiśayādibhi—
rātmabhūṣāyai prasādhanādīn prayuñjate। prayuñjate ca māghādayo mahākavayaḥ—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>ākuñcitaprohanirūpitakramaṃ
kareṇurārohayate niṣādinam॥2॥ (māgha. 12.5)</l></lg></b>
<b><lg>
  <l>sa santataṃ darśayate gatasmayaḥ
kṛtādhipatyāmiva sādhu bandhutām॥ 3॥ (kirātā. 1. 10) iti</l></lg></b>
<p>phalamanayoḥ sukhāsikā lokarañjanaṃ ca। anyathaiko hastipakaiḥ pīḍyeta, dvitīyo
dudarśe iti nābhigamyate।</p>
<p>acetaneṣvapi kriyāphalavivakṣāyāṃ tu dṛś‍yate 'parivārayante vṛkṣaṃ kaṇṭakāḥ, śoṣayate
vrīhinātapa' iti। etena karaṇena tulyakriyaḥ karttā karmavad bhavatītyapi va vaktavyaṃ
bhavati। parivārayanti kaṇṭakairvṛkṣaṃ manuṣyāḥ, parivārayante kaṇṭakāḥ svayameveti। tathā
'duhipacyoḥ sakarmakayoḥ karttā bahulaṃ karmavad bhavatīti na vak‍tavyam। dugdhe gauḥ payaḥ
svayameva, payo muñcatīti gamyate। tasmādudumbarassalohitaṃ phalaṃ pacyata iti karmataiva
kriyāviśeṣaṇavivakṣitā। udumbaraśabdo'tra phalavṛttiḥ, udumbaraṃ tat kālena pacyate salohitaguṇaṃ
yathā bhavati lohitena pākena sambadhyata iti yāvat karttṛtvavivakṣāyāṃ ca pacatyātmānāmiti।
tathā yujeḥ ś‍yan karttari vak‍tavyam, māsaṃ yujyate brahmacārīti। karttṛtvavivakṣāyāṃ tu
daivādikatvaṃ na setsyati, karmatvavivakṣāyāṃ tu karmatvaṃ yathā; karttṛtvaṃ tu svayaṃ śabdena
gamyata ityalamatiprasaṅgena॥</p>
<p>kṛdantamapi khalu kriyārūpaṃ vidyate। tatra—</p>
<p><b>bhāvo</b> yathā— iha tairyātam, iha tairāsitam, iha tairbhuktam, iha taiḥ pītam; kṛtaṃ bhavatā,
prasuptaṃ bhavatā, sukṛtaṃ bhavatā, susik‍taṃ bhavatā, bhūtaṃ bhavatā, prabhūtaṃ bhavatā,
bhaviṣyamāṇaṃ bhavatā, bhūyamānaṃ bhavatā, bhavitavyaṃ bhavatā, bhavanīyaṃ bhavatā, bhavय़ṃ
bhavatā, avaś‍yaṃ bhāvyaṃ bhavatā, āśitabhavaṃ bhavatā, īṣadāḍhyambhavaṃ bhavatā,
durāḍhyaṃbhavaṃ bhavatā, svāḍhayaṃbhavaṃ bhavatā, īṣadutthānaṃ bhavatā, sūtthānaṃ bhavatā iti।</p>

<pb n="146"/>
<p><b>karma</b> yathā— prakṛtaḥ kaṭo bhavatā, kṛtaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ kariṣyamāṇo bhavatā, khalu kaṭaḥ
karttavyaḥ, kṛtyaḥ, karaṇīyaḥ, kāryaḥ; īṣatkāryaḥ, īṣatkaraḥ kriyārtho bhavatā,
īṣadāḍhyaṃkaraḥ svāḍhyaṃkaraḥ, īṣatpānaḥ somo bhavatā, supānaḥ, duṣpānaḥ;
duśśāsano'ribhirbhavān suyodhanaḥ, duryodhanaḥ, durdarśanaḥ, durdharṣaṇaḥ, durmarṣaṇaḥ, īṣallabhyo
janairbhavān, sulabhaḥ, durdarśaḥ iti।</p>
<p><b>karttā</b> yathā—kṛtavān kaṭam, upeyivān grāmam, vidvān vyākaraṇam, adhīyan pārāyaṇam,
dhārayannupaniṣadam, dviṣānnitihāsam, kurvan kaṭam, kaṭaṃ kurvāṇaḥ; viditā janāpavādān
prajāgaritāpararātrān, kanyāmalaṅkariṣṇuḥ, divamutpatiṣṇuḥ, grāmamāgāmukaḥ,
yoṣāmabhilāṣukaḥ, odanaṃ bubhukṣuḥ, śriyamāśaṃsuḥ, dādirgāḥ, papissomam, avaś‍yaṃdāyī,
śataṃdāyī, grāmaṅgāmī, grāmamāgāmī, kaṭaṃ kārako vrajati, odanaṃ pācako vrajatīti।</p>
<p><b>bhāvakarma</b> yathā— kriyāḥ kriyante, vidhayo vidhīyante, uṣṭrāsikā āsyante,
hataśāyikāśśayyante, arhati bhavānikṣubhakṣikām, ikṣubhakṣikāṃ meṃ dhārayasi, vyāvahāsīṃ
vidadhate (3.3. 43 kāśikā), sāṃkūṭinaṃ kurvanti, utsavamāmantrayai, samājamāmantrayai,
āmantraṇamāmantrayai, mantraṇaṃ nimantrayai, kāṃ tvaṃ kārimakārṣīḥ (3.3. 110), kāṃ
kārikām kāṃ kṛtim kāṃ kriyām, kā kṛtyām; kiṃ kṛtam, sarvāṃ kārimakārṣam,
sarvāṃ kārikām, sarvāṃ kṛtim, sarvāṃ kriyāṃ, sarvāṃ kṛtyām, sarvaṃ kṛtamiti।</p>
<p><b>bhāvakarttā</b> yathā— brahmabhūyaṃ varttate, brahmahatyā na bhavati, pāko varttate, tyāgo bhavati,
sāṃrāviṇaṃ varttate, ākhūttho bhavati (3.2. 4 mabhā.), anveṣaṇā varttate, vyāvabhāṣī
bhavati, samajaḥ paśūnām, udajaḥ paśūnām, gavāmupasaraḥ (3.3. 71), ṛtūnāṃ
paryāyaḥ, bhavata āsikā, bhavataḥ śāyikā, abhyūṣakhādikā varttate, ikṣubhakṣikā
udapādi, śirorttirvarttate (3.3. 108), pravāhikā na bhavati, śirorogaḥ śirobādha
/?/te, arocako na bhavati, nigrāhaste vṛṣala (3.3.45 kāśikā), avagrāhaste
vṛṣala, ajananiste vṛṣala (3.3. 112), abhavaniste vṛṣala bhūyāditi।</p>
<p><b>karmakarttā</b> yathā— svayaṃ dhauto pādau, svayaṃ vilīnamājyam, akṛṣṭapacyāśśālayaḥ
(3.1. 114), pacelimā māṣāḥ {3.1. 96(1)}, bhidelimāni kāṣṭhāni, bhidurā
bhūḥ, chidurā rajjuḥ, bhaṅguraṃ kāṣṭham, ārohayamāṇo hastī, lūyamānaḥ kedāraḥ,

<pb n="147"/>
bruvāṇā kathā, bhūṣamāṇā kanyā, grathnānā strak, śrathnānā strak, cikīrṣamāṇaḥ
kaṭaḥ, avakiramāṇo hastī, nayamāno daṇḍaḥ ucchrāyamāṇo daṇḍaḥ, duhānā dhenuḥ,
prasnuvānā dhenuḥ, rundhānā gauḥ āghnānā gauḥ, rajyad vastram, kuṣyan pāda iti।</p>
<p>anye punaramīṣāmapi <b>karmakarttṛtvaṃ</b> manyante—prakṛtaḥ kaṭaṃ bhavān, prakṛtaḥ kaṭo
bhavatā, yātaḥ panthānaṃ bhavān, yātaḥ panthā bhavatā, āsīno māsaṃ bhavān, āsīno māso
bhavatā, bhuṅkte odanaṃ bhavān, bhukta odane bhavatā, adhiśayitaḥ khaṭvāṃ bhavān,
adhiśayitā khaṭvā bhavatā, ārūḍho vṛkṣaṃ bhavān, ārūḍho vṛkṣo bhavatā, āśliṣṭaḥ priyāṃ
bhavān, āśliṣṭā priyā bhavatā, upasthitaḥ sūryaṃ bhavān, upasthitaḥ sūryo bhavatā,
upāsito'gniṃ bhavān, upāsito'gnirbhavatā, anūṣito guruṃ bhavān (3.4. 72 kāśikā),
anūṣito gururbhavatā, anujāto māṇavako māṇāvikām, anujātā māṇāvikā māṇavakena,
anujīrṇo vṛṣalīṃ devadattaḥ, anujīrṇā vṛṣalī devadattena iti। tanna samyag vāk‍yabhedāt॥</p>
<p>nanu ca bhāvanākṣepalabdhaḥ karttā na tiṅvācyaḥ।</p>
<p>tat kathamucyate karttṛpadaṃ, bhāvakarttṛpadaṃ, karmakarttṛpadaṃ ceti।</p>
<p>tathāhi— anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ śabdasyābhidhānaśaktiḥ kalpyate। bhāvanākṣepeṇa ca
pratīyate; karttari na tatra pratyayasyānvayavyatirekau kalpyate, yathā jātyākṣepeṇa vyakteḥ
pratītau na tāṃ prati śabdasya vācakaśaktikalpanopapattimatī।</p>
<p>kathaṃ punaḥ kartturanabhidhāne pratyayasya vacanapuruṣabhedo yujyate?</p>
<p>yathaiva nātmanepadeṣu।</p>
<p>jātyabhidhānapakṣe jāteraliṅgasaṃkhyāyā api tadādhāravyaktyāśrayāṇi liṅgavacanāni
pravarttante, tathaiva bhāvanāyā abhede'pi। tathā kartrāśrayo vacanapuruṣabhedaḥ prapatsyatīti।</p>
<p>na ca karttari lakāraḥ smaryata iti vācyam, yataḥ 'karttari kṛt (3.4. 67),
'laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve cākarmakebhyaḥ' (3.4. 69), 'varttamāne laṭ' (3.2. 123), 'lasya
(3.4. 77, 78) 'tibādayaḥ (1.4. 101), tiṅstrīṇi trīṇi prathamamadhyamottamāḥ
tānyekavacanadvivacanabahucānyekaśaḥ yuṣmadi XXX madhyamaḥ, asmadhuttamaḥ, śeṣe prathamaḥ
(1.4. 102—108), bhāvakarmaṇorātmanepadam (1.3. 13), śeṣāt karttari parasmaipadam
(1.3. 78) ityādivāk‍yānāṃ ' dv‍yekayordvivacanaikavacane (1.4. 22), 'bahuṣu bahuvacanam'
(1.4. 21) iti saṃkhyāvidhānena sahaikārthaviṣayatvādekavāk‍yatā vyākhyātā। eko hi

<pb n="148"/>
pacatītyādiśabdastairvyākriyate। tatraiṣa vākyārtho bhavati— kartturekatve ekavacanaṃ tibityādi,
kartturdvitve dvivacanaṃ tasityādi, kartturbahutve bahuvacanaṃ jhītyādi। evaṃ ca bhāvanākṣipta—
karttṛsaṃkhyāyāmeva lakāraḥ smaryate na karttari।</p>
<p>ucyate, yadi bhāvanākṣiptakarttṛsaṃkhyā lakāreṇocyate, devadattenāsyata iti
bhāvābhidhāyino'pi karttṛsaṃkhyāyāmevābhidhānaṃ prāpnoti, ubhayatrāpi karttṛsadbhāvāt। yenaiva
hi nimittena pacatītyādau karma saṃkhyābhidhānamāsādayati tenaiva prayogāntare'pyāsādayet।
kataṃ ca karttaryabhidhīyamāne tad‌viśiṣṭasaṃkhyābhidhānaṃ yuk‍tam ?</p>
<p>atha saṃkhyāmātramabhidhīyate na viśeṣaḥ; tarhi puruṣādibhedapratīteranupapattiḥ। tadviśiṣṭā—
bhidhānaṃ ca tadabhidhānapurassareṇa nyāyyam, nā'gṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśeṣyabuddhirvarttata iti nyāyāt
na ca śabdenāsaṃspṛś‍yamāno'pi karttā sannidhimātreṇa saṃkhyāṃ viseṣāyitumutsahate, saṃkhyāyā
dharmarūpatvād dharmiṇā kartturavacchedakatvena saṃsparśo yujyate। karaṇādīnāmapi sānnidhya—
dharmitvāt tathātvopapatteḥ। kiñca lakāreṇābhihitayorbhāvanāsaṃkhyayoruttarakālo bhāvanākṣip‍taḥ
karttā labhyate। tato'sya pūrvabhāvād bhāvanāsamakālamabhihitayā saṃkhyayā aviśeṣāt
sarvakārakāṇāmavacchedaḥ prāpnoti। paś‍cācca karttākṣip‍taḥ kathaṃ bhāvanāsamakālamabhihitāṃ
saṃkhyāmātmani nirundhyāt ?</p>
<p>atha saṃkhyāvadabhāvanāpratītisamakālameva karttā pratīyate; na tarhyākṣepalabhyaḥ, apitu
saṃkhyāvallakāreṇābhidhīyata eveti।</p>
<p>kiñca devadattādipadena pacatītyādessāmānādhikaraṇyadarśanāt saṃkhyāvān karttaiva
lakāreṇābhidhīyate। yadi punaḥ karttṛssaṃkhyānamekatvādikaṃ lakāro brūyāt tadā devadattasya
pacatītyevaṃ prayogaḥ syāt yathā devadattasyaikatvamiti। atha na saṃkhyānamucyate lakāreṇa,
kintu saṃkhyeya eva devadattādirabhidhīyate। devadattaḥ pacatītyekatvasaṃkhyāvacchinnaḥ pākaṃ
karotityarthaḥ। evaṃ caṃ saṃkhyeye'bhidhīyamāne karttaivābhihito bhavati।</p>
<p>na ca kartrabhidhāne'pi śakteḥ kārakatvāt samānādhikaraṇā'nupapattiriti vācyam,
śaktirhi lakāreṇāpyabhidhīyamānā guṇadravyaparatantraivābhidhīyate। yathā—'śuklaḥ paṭaḥ, śuk‍lā
śāṭī'—ti।</p>
<p>api ca bhavanto'pi karma lakāravācyaṃ manyante, tadanupapannam। yathaiva hi
bhāvanākṣepalabhyatvāt kartturavācyatvaṃ tathā karmaṇo'pi bhavitumarhati।</p>

<pb n="149"/>
<p>athānākṣepāt karmaṇo vācyatvam। evaṃ ca sati kartturapi tathātvopapattiḥ। na hi
kriyākṣepe kartṛkarmaṇorviśeṣamupalabhāmahe। yathaiva hi kartrā vinā kriyā na pratīyate evaṃ
karmaṇāpi। na sarvatra karmasambandha iti cet, yatrā'sti tatra katham ? atha karmaṇo'pi
kriyākṣepalabhyatvāt tadgatā'pi saṃkhyaivocyate lakāreṇa। kathamidānīṃ karttṛkarmā'nabhidhāyako
lakāraḥ k‍vacit karttṛgatāṃ saṃkhyāmabhidhatte; k‍vacit karmagatāmiti viśeṣo bhavati? na ca
viśeṣaṇaṃ nāstīti vācyam, yataḥ pacatītyatra ullasitena karttṛrūpatvena pacyata ityatra
rūpagṛhītakarmaniṣṭhatvena pratītirūtpadyate। kiṃ ca lakāraṇe karttṛkarmaṇoranabhidhāne devadattaḥ
pacatītyanabhihite karttari tṛtīyā, odanaḥ pacyata iti karmaṇi dvitīyā prāpnoti।</p>
<p>athaivamucyate karttṛkarmmasaṃkhyayorabhihitatvānna bhaviṣyato vibhaktī। kṛdanteṣu
tarhyaniṣṭaprāptiḥ saṃkhyāyāḥ kṛtyabhidhānāt। tatra pak‍va odana iti dvitīyā, paktā devadatta
iti tṛtīyā prāpnoti।</p>
<p>nanu cobhayaṃ vibhak‍tyarthaḥ saṃkhyā karmmādayaś‍ca। tatra yathā''khyāteṣu saṃkhyāyā
abhihitatvāt karttṛkarmmaṇordvitīyātṛtīye na bhavataḥ, tathā kṛdanteṣu kārakasyā'bhihitatvāt
saṃkhyā, saṃkhyāyā dvitīyādayo na bhaviṣyanti।</p>
<p>syādetat। yadyabhihite pratiṣedhaḥ syāt, anabhihite tvayaṃ vidhiḥ sāmarthyaikavāk‍yatābhyāṃ
paryudāsāśrayaṇāt। tatra tiṅnteṣu saṃkhyābhidhāne'pyanabhihitatvāt kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kārakavibhaktiḥ
prāpnoti। kṛdanteṣu kārakābhidhāne'pi anabhihitatvāt saṃkhyāyāḥ kārakavibhak‍tayaḥ prāpnuvanti।
api ca 'devadattaḥ pacan, devadattaḥ pacamāna' iti śatṛśānacoḥ karttari ca saṃkhyāyā
apyanabhidhānāt tṛtīyā na prāpnoti ? atha śatṛśānacoḥ karttṛnabhidhānamāśrīyate tiḍaḥ
kimaparāddham ? tasyāpi lādeśatvāt śatṛśānacoḥ kṛttvāt, 'karttari ca kṛt' (3.4. 67)
iti vacanāt; kartturabhidhānāditi cet karmaṇaḥ kathamodanaṃ pacyamāna iti। atha sthānino
lakārasya karmaṇi vidhānāt tadādeśatvācca śānacaḥ karmābhidhānaṃ bhaviṣyati। tathāhi 'laḥ
karmaṇi ca bhāve cākarmakebhyaḥ' (3.4. 69) iti, 'bhāvakarmaṇoḥ' (1.13.13),'ātmanepadam
(1.3. 12) iti vā karmaṇi lakāro vidhīyate। evaṃ sati yatrāpi tiṅo'pi vidhīyante
tatrāpi karmaṇi prāpnoti। tataś‍ca karttaryati kenāpavāryate ?</p>
<p>tatrāpi 'karttari kṛt'(3.4. 67), 'śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam' (1.3. 78) iti
karttari lakāro'pi vidhīyate। taduktam—</p>

<pb n="150"/>
<b><lg>
  <l>ātmanepadarūpeṇa sarvatraiva hi karmaṇi ।</l>
  <l>lakārassyāt tathaivāyaṃ karttaryapi bhavenna kim ॥ 4 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>na ca karttari yā karmaṇi yā saṃkhyā tatra tiṅo bhavantītyāśrayitumucitam । na hi
'laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve cākarmakebhyaḥ' (3.4.69) ityasya 'dvyekayordvivacanaikavacane'
(1.4.22)'bahuṣu bahuvacanam' (1.4.21) ityanenaikavāk‍yatvaṃ vidyate, bhāve'pi lakārasya
vidhānāt । na ca bhāvasya sādhyatvena saṃkhyāyogo'sti । nāpi 'svaujasa' (4.1.2)
ityādervidhānasya saṃkhyāvibhaktividhānena sahaikavāk‍yatvam asaṃkhyebhyo'pyavyayebhyassubutpatteḥ ।
āha ca <b>mahāvārttikakāraḥ</b> 'sup‍tiṅoraviśeṣavidhānād dṛṣṭaviprayogācca niyamārthaṃ vacanam
{1.4.21(1)} iti । <b>mahābhāṣyakāro'</b>pyāha— 'sup‍tiṅo'viśeṣeṇotpadyante, utpannānāṃ niyamaḥ'
iti । tasmānna kartṛkarmasaṃkhyāyāṃ lakāravidhiḥ, apitu karttṛkarmaṇorevetyabhyupagantavyam ।</p>
<p>kathaṃ punassarvakārakasannidhāne lakāreṇa karttṛkarmaṇorevābhidhānam ?</p>
<p>ucyate, tayoreva prādhānyāt । tatra karttuḥ prādhānyam, karaṇādīnāṃ tadadhīnavṛttitvāt
karmaṇastu tadarthatvameva tatpravṛtteḥ । yadi vā karttṛkarmavyāpārābhidhāyino dhātoḥ para upajāyamāno
lakāraḥ karttṛkarmaṇī evābhidadhāti ।</p>
<p>atha kathaṃ karttṛkarmavat kālādikamapi nābhidadhāti? viṣayabhedāt ।
tathāhi <b>ṣaḍarthāstiṅantena pratīyante</b> — (3.1.67 mabhā.)</p>
<p><b>1. kriyā, 2. kālaḥ, 3. upagrahaḥ, 4. kārakaṃ, 5. puruṣaḥ, 6. saṃkhyeti ।</b></p>
<p>teṣu 'kriyākālātmanepadanimittāni prakṛtirabhidhatte, pratyayaḥ sādhanaṃ saṃkhyāṃ puruṣaṃ ca ।
tatra prakṛtyabhidheyeṣu kriyā pradhānam, kālopagrahau viśeṣaṇam । pratyayābhidheyeṣu sādhanaṃ
pradhānaṃ, saṃkhyāpuruṣau viśeṣaṇam ।</p>
<p>kathaṃ punaḥ saṃkhyā kārakasyaiva viśeṣaṇam, na kriyākālopagrahapuruṣāṇām ?</p>
<p>ucyate, kriyāyāḥ sādhyatvenāpariniṣpannatvāt kālasya ca kriyāto'vyatirekāt,
vyatireke'pi vā kriyāvacchedakatvenopasarjanatvāt । upagrahasyāpi gandhanādeḥ kriyādharmatve—
nā'pariniṣṭhitatve anidantānirdeś‍yatvādasaṃbandhaḥ saṃkhyāyāḥ । puruṣastu prathamādiḥ sādhanameva,
nānyaḥ kaś‍cit । ataḥ kārakeṇaiva saṃkhyābhisaṃbadhyate, na kriyādibhiriti । tadevaṃ tiṅvācyatvena
karttuḥ karttṛpadaṃ, bhāvakarttṛpadaṃ, karmakarttṛpadaṃ ceti yaduk‍taṃ tadupapannameveti ।</p>

<pb n="151"/>
<p><b>(2. kārakarūpaṃ padam)</b></p>
<p><b>karttṛpadaṃ, karmapadaṃ, karaṇapadaṃ, saṃpradānapadam, apādānapadam adhikaraṇapadaṃ</b> ceti
kārakarūpabhedāḥ। tatra kartrādayaḥ kārakaprastāve'grataḥ prapañcayiṣyante; iha tu
saṃbandhāvicchedā leśata udāhriyante। teṣāṃ —</p>
<p><b>(karttṛpadam)</b></p>
<p><b>karttā</b> trijhā <b>1. svatantraḥ 2. asvatantraḥ 3. karmakartta</b> ceti।</p>
<p><b>(1. svatantraḥ)</b> tatra (svatantraḥ) kriyāyāṃ svecchayā karaṇādikārakāṇi yaḥ prayuṅakte, na tu taiḥ
prayujyate saḥ svatantraḥ। sa dvidhā <b>1. svavibhaktivācyaḥ, 2. paravibhaktivācyaś‍ceti।</b></p>
<p>tayoḥ svavibhaktivācyo yathā— (māgha. 10.25)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>mānabhaṅgapaṭunā suratecchāṃ tanvatā prathayatā dṛśi rāgam।
lebhire sapadi bhāvayatāntaryoṣitaḥ praṇayineva madena ॥ 5 ॥</l></lg></b>
<p>paravibhaktivācyo yathā—(māgha. 10.33)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>cārutā vapurabhūṣayadāsāṃ tāmanūnanavayauvanayogaḥ।
taṃ punarmakaraketanalakṣmīstāṃ mado dayitasaṅgamabhūṣaḥ ॥ 6 ॥</l></lg></b>
<p><b>(2. asvatantraḥ)</b> yo'nyaprayuktaḥ kriyāsu vyāpriyate so'svatantraḥ। so'pi dvidhā—
<b>1. udbhūtavyāpāraḥ 2. anudbhūtavyāpāraś‍ca।</b></p>
<p>tayorudbhūtavyāpāro yathā—(kirātā. 1.31)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>guṇānuraktāmanuraktasādhanaḥ kulābhimānī kulajāṃ janādhipaḥ।
paraistvadanyaḥ ka ivā'pahārayenmanoramāmātmavadhūmiva śriyam ॥ 7 ॥</l></lg></b>
<p>anudbhūtavyāpāro yathā—(kirātā 9.71)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>cittanirvṛtividhāyi viviktaṃ manmatho madhumadaśśaśibhāsaḥ।
saṅgataṃ ca dayitaiḥ sma nayanti prema kāmapi bhuvaṃ pramadānām ॥ 8 ॥</l></lg></b>
<p><b>(3. karmakarttā)</b> karmakarttāpi dvidhaiva—</p>
<p><b>1. udrikttakarmāṃśaḥ, 2. anudrikttakarmāṃśaś‍ca।</b></p>
<p>tayorudrikttakarmāṃśo yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>etaducchvasitapītamaindavaṃ soḍhumakṣamamiva prabhārasam।
muktaṣaṭpadavirāvamañjasā bhidyate kumudamānibandhanāt ॥ 9 ॥ (kusaṃ. 8.70)</l></lg></b>

<pb n="152"/>
<p>anudriktakarmāṃśo yathā—(kirātā. 1.18)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>udārakīrtterudayaṃ dayāvataḥ praśāntabādhaṃ diśato'bhirakṣayā।
svayaṃ pradugdhe'sya guṇairupasnutā vasūpamānasya vasūni medinī ॥ 10 ॥</l></lg></b>
<p><b>(karmapadam)</b></p>
<p>kartuḥ kriyayā'nanyārthayā yadāpyate tat karma। tadapi tridhā—</p>
<p><b>1. nirvarttyam 2. vikāryam 3. prāpyaṃ</b> ca। teṣu—</p>
<p><b>(1) nirvartyam — 'yadasajjāyate sad vā janmanā tat prakāśate' ॥ 11 ॥</b> (vāpa. 3.7.49)
tayoḥ prathamaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.236)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>ayamāndolitaprauḍhacandanadrumapallavaḥ।
utpādayati lokasya prītiṃ malayamārutaḥ ॥ 12 ॥</l></lg></b>
<p>dvitīyaṃ yathā—(māgha.10.15)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>santameva ciramaprakṛtatvādaprakāśitamadidyutadaṅge।
vibhramo madhumadaḥ pramadānāṃ dhātulīnamupasarga ivārtham ॥ 13 ॥</l></lg></b>
<p><b>(2) vikāryamapi</b> dvidhā prakṛtyucchedāt guṇāntarādhānācca।</p>
<p>tatra prathamaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.72)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>krodhaṃ prabho! saṃhara saṃhareti yāvad giraḥ khe marutāṃ caranti।
tāvat sa vahnirbhavanetrajanmā bhasmāvaśeṣaṃ madanaṃ cakāra ॥ 14 ॥</l></lg></b>
<p>dvitīyaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.27)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>tāṃ pulomatanayā'lakocitaiḥ pārijātakusumaiḥ prasādhayan ।
nandane ciramayugmalocanaḥ saspṛhaṃ suravadhūbhiraikṣyata ॥ 15 ॥</l></lg></b>
<p><b>(3) prāpyamapi</b> dvidhaiva kathitam akathitaṃ ca।</p>
<p>tatra yat kṛtya—kta—khala—rthādibhira—bhidhīyate tat <b>kathitam।</b>
yat tairnābhidhīyate <b>tadakathitam</b>। tayorādyaṃ yathā— (kirātā. 8.6)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>nipīyamānastabakā śilīmukhairaśokayaṣṭiś‍calabālapallavā।
viḍambayantī dadṛśe vadhūjanairamandadaṣṭoṣṭhakarāvadhūnanam ॥ 16 ॥</l></lg></b>
<p>dvitīyaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.29)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>tāmasmadarthe yuṣmābhiryācitavyo himācalaḥ।
vikriyāyai na kalpante sambandhāḥ sadanuṣṭhitāḥ ॥ 17 ॥</l></lg></b>

<pb n="153"/>
<p>(<b>karaṇapadam</b>)</p>
<p>kriyāsiddhau sādhakatamatvena yadavyavahitaṃ vyāpriyate tat <b>karaṇam ।</b> tadapi tridhā —
<b>1. bāhyam 2. ābhyantaraṃ 3. bāhyābhyantaraṃ</b> ca ।</p>
<p>(<b>1</b>) teṣu <b>bāhyaṃ</b> dvidhā— <b>vyavadhāyakam avyavadhāyakaṃ ca ।</b>
tayorādyaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 7.14)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>dhūpoṣmaṇā tyājitamārdrabhāvaṃ keśāntamantaḥkusumaṃ tadīyam ।</l>
  <l>paryakṣipat kācidudārabandhaṃ dūrvāvatā pāṇḍumadhūkadāmnā ॥ 18 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>dvitīyaṃ yathā— (raghu. 6.3)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>vaidarbhanirdiṣṭamasau kumāraḥ klṛptena sopānapathena mañcam ।</l>
  <l>śilāvibhaṅgairmṛgarājaśāvastuṅgaṃ nagotsaṅgamivāruroha ॥ 19 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>2</b>) <b>abhyantaramapi</b> dvidhā kartturbhinnamabhinnaṃ ca ।</p>
<p>tayorbhinnaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 8.32)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>śilāghanairnākasadāmuraḥsthalairbṛhanniveśaiś‍ca vadhūpayodharaiḥ ।</l>
  <l>taṭāntanītena vibhinnavīcinā ruṣeva bheje kaluṣatvamambhasā ॥ 20 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>dvitīyaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.39)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>prayuk‍tasatkāraviśeṣamātmanā na māṃ paraṃ saṃpratipattumarhasi ।</l>
  <l>yatassatāṃ sannatagātri! saṅgataṃ manīṣibhiḥ sāptapadīnamucyate ॥ 21 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>3</b>) <b>bāhyābhyantaramapi</b> dvidhā bahirmukham antarmukhaṃ ca ।</p>
<p>tayorādyaṃ yathā—(māgha. 5.2)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>gatayā puraḥ pratigavākṣamukhiṃ dadhatī ratena bhṛśamutsukatām ।</l>
  <l>muhurantarālabhavamastagiressavituś‍ca yoṣidamimīta dṛśā ॥ 22 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>dvitīyaṃ yathā—(māgha. 5.2)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>bibhratau madhuratāmatimātraṃ rāgibhiryugapadeva papāte ।</l>
  <l>ānanairmadhuraso vikasadbhirnāsikābhirasitotpalagandhaḥ ॥ 23 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>saṃpradānapadam</b>)</p>
<p>kriyākāryatvenāvadhāritaṃ karmaṇā kriyayā vā saṃyogaṃ yadanubhavati tat <b>sampradānam</b> ।
tat tridhā <b>1. dadātikarmavyāpyam, 2. karmamātravyāpyam, 3.kriyāvyāpyañceti ।</b> teṣu—</p>

<pb n="154"/>
<p>(<b>1</b>) <b>dadātikarmavyāpyaṃ</b> dvidhā 1. svatvasyā'nivṛttau 2. nivṛttau ca
tayorādyaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.19)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>cumbanādalakacūrṇadūṣitaṃ śaṅkaro'pi nayanaṃ lalāṭajam ।</l>
  <l>ucch‌vasatkamalagandhaye dadau pārvatīvadanagandhavāhine ॥ 24 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>dvitīyaṃ yathā—(vikramo. 3.14)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>dātuṃ vā prabhavasi māmanyasyai karttumeva vā dāsam ।</l>
  <l>nāhaṃ punastathā tvaṃ yathā hi māṃ manyase bhīru ॥ 25 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>2</b>) <b>kriyākarmavyāpyaṃ</b> dvidhā dadātyarthaviṣayam adadātyarthaviṣayaṃ ca ।
tatra prathamaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 5.28)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>śrīmallatābhavanamoṣadhayaḥ pradīpāḥ śayyā navāni haricandanapallavāni ।</l>
  <l>asmin ratiśramanudaś‍ca sarojavātāḥ smarttuṃ diśanti na divaḥ surasundarībhyaḥ ॥ 26 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>dvitīyaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.60)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>śaśaṃsa tasmai praṇipatya nandī śuśrūṣayā śailasutāmupetām ।</l>
  <l>praveśayāmāsa ca bharturenāṃ bhrūkṣepamātrānumatapraveśām ॥ 27 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>3</b>) <b>kriyāvyāpyamapi</b> dvidhaiva, pāribhāṣikamapāribhāṣikaṃ ca ।</p>
<p>tayoḥ prathamaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 9.35)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>na srajo rurucire ramaṇībhyaś‍candanāni virahe madirā vā ।</l>
  <l>sādhaneṣvapi raterupadhatte ramyatāṃ priyasamāgama eva ॥ 28 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>dvitīyaṃ yathā-(kusaṃ. 7.86)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>itthaṃ vidhijñena purohitena prayuktapāṇigrahaṇopacārau ।</l>
  <l>praṇematustau pitarau prajānāṃ padmāsanasthāya pitāmahāya ॥ 29 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>apādānapadam</b>)</p>
<p>tatra kartrā karmaṇā vā kriyājanyameva dhrauvyeṇa yadvibhāgamavagāhate <b>tadapādānam</b> ।
tattridhā — <b>1. nirdiṣṭaviṣayam 2. upāttaviṣayam 3. apekṣitakriyaṃ</b> ceti ।</p>
<p>(<b>1</b>) teṣu <b>nirdiṣṭaviṣayaṃ</b> dvidhā— <b>ujjhitam anujjhitaṃ</b> ca ।</p>
<p>tayorādyaṃ yathā—(raghu. 16.48)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>svedānuviddhārdranakhakṣatāṅke sandaṣṭa bhūyiṣṭhaśikha kapole ।</l>
  <l>cyutaṃ na karṇādapi kāminīnāṃ śirīṣapuṣpaṃ sahasā papāta ॥ 30 ॥</l>
</lg></b>

<pb n="155"/>
<p>dvitīyaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 9.11)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>auṣasātapabhayādapalīnaṃ vāsaracchavivirāmapaṭīyaḥ ।</l>
  <l>sannipatya śanakairiva nimnādandhakāramudavāpa samāni ॥ 31 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>2</b>) <b>upāttaviṣayama</b>pi dvidhā— <b>heyamupādeyaṃ</b> ca ।</p>
<p>tayorādyaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 8.7)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>karau dhunānā navapallavākṛtī vṛthā kṛthā mānini mā pariśramam ।</l>
  <l>upeyuṣī kalpalatābhiśaṅkayā kathaṃ nu vitrasyati ṣaṭpadāvalī ॥ 32 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>dvitīyaṃ yathā—(raghu. 17.1)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>atithiṃ nāma kākutsthāt putramāpa kumudvatī ।</l>
  <l>paś‍cimād‌yāminīyāmāt prasādamiva cetanā ॥ 33 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>3</b>) apekṣitakriyamapi dvidhaiva— sāmānyāpekṣaṃ viśeṣāpekṣaṃ ca ।
tayorādyaṃ yathā—(māgha. 10.21)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>mā punastamabhisīsaramāgaskāriṇaṃ madavimohitacittā ।</l>
  <l>yoṣidityabhilalāṣa na hālāṃ dustyajaḥ khalu sukhādapi mānaḥ ॥ 34 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>dvitīyaṃ yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>kuto bhavānadhvaga! citrakūṭād dṛṣṭastvayā śrīlalitasvabhāvaḥ ।</l>
  <l>kiṃ tena mugdhe madanotsave'smin kāmaṃ tvayā veśmani lekhayāmi ॥ 35 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>adhikaraṇapadam</b>)</p>
<p>kartrā karmaṇā vyavahitaṃ <b>kriyādhāro'dhikaraṇam ।</b>
tattridhā—<b>1. vaiṣayikaṃ, 2. aupaśleṣikaṃ, 3. naimittikaṃ</b> ca । teṣu —</p>
<p>(<b>1</b>) <b>vaiṣayikaṃ</b> dvidhā — dravyavaiṣayikaṃ guṇavaiṣayikaṃ ca ।
tayorādyaṃ yathā— (māgha. 9.45)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>kadalīprakāṇḍarucirorutarau jaghanasthalīparisare mahatī (ti) ।</l>
  <l>raśanākalāpakaguṇena vadhūrmakaradhvajadviradamākalayat ॥ 36 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>dvitīyaṃ yathā— (nīti.52)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>vipadi dhairyamathābhyudaye kṣamā sadasi vākpaṭutā yudhi vikramaḥ ।</l>
  <l>yaśasi cābhirucirvyasanaṃ śrutau prakṛtisiddhamidaṃ hi mahātmanām ॥ 37 ॥</l>
</lg></b>

<pb n="156"/>
<p><b>(2) aupaśleṣikamapi</b> dvidhā— ekadeśikamabhivyāpakaṃ ca ।</p>
<p>tayorādyaṃ yathā— (māgha. 10.39)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>svarśabhāji viśadacchavicārau kalpite mṛgadūśāṃ suratāya ।</l>
  <l>sannatiṃ dadhati peturajasraṃ dṛṣṭayaḥ priyatame śayane ca ॥ 38 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>dvitīyaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 9.63)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>rāgakāntanayaneṣu nitāntaṃ vidrumāruṇakapolataleṣu ।</l>
  <l>sarvathāpi dadṛśe vanitānāṃ darpaṇeṣviva mukheṣu madaśrīḥ ॥ 39 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>3</b>) <b>naimittikamapi</b> dvidhaiva— <b>śuddhaṃ saṅkīrṇaṃ</b> ca ।</p>
<p>tayorādyaṃ yathā—(gāsa. ve. 734)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>kaḍue/kaha de dhūmaṃdhāre abbhuttaṇamaggiṇo samappihii ।</l>
  <l>muhakamala—cubaṇālehaḍammi pāsaṭṭhie diare ॥ 40 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg><l>(kaṭuke/kathaṃ sakhi dhūmāndhakāre'bhyuttejanamagneḥ samāpsyate ।</l>
  <l>mukhakamalacumbanalampaṭe pārś‍vasthite devare॥)</l></lg>
<p>dvitīyaṃ yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>ihādhītī pūrve dhṛtadharaṇibhāraḥ kamaṭharā—
ḍapāṃ nāthenāsmādgiriśataśaraṇyena paṭhitāḥ ।</l>
  <l>tataḥ prāptā dūrīkṛtabhuvanatāpairjaladharai—
ssatāṃ tu svopajña satatamupakāropaniṣadaḥ ॥ 41 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>karttā</b>)</p>
<p>pravṛttaprayojakastu nimittaviśeṣo hetuḥ <b>kartā</b> ca bhavati ।</p>
<p>so'pi tridhā— <b>1. prerakaḥ, 2. anukūlaḥ, 3. pratyāyaka</b>ś‍ca ।</p>
<p>(1) tatra prerako dvidhā— vyavahito'vyavahitaśca ।</p>
<p>tayo<b>rvyavahito</b> yathā— (raghu. 6.83)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>sā cūrṇagauraṃ raghunandanasya dhātrīkarābhyāṃ karabhopamorūḥ ।</l>
  <l>āsañjayāmāsa yathāpradeśaṃ kaṇṭhe guṇaṃ mūrtamivānurāgam ॥ 42 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>avyavahito</b> yathā— (māgha. 10.16)</p>
<b>
<lg><l>sāvaśeṣapadamuktamupekṣā srastamālyavasanābharaṇeṣu ।</l>
  <l>gantumutthitamakāraṇataḥ sma dyotayanti madavibhramamāsām ॥ 43 ॥</l>
</lg></b>

<pb n="157"/>
<p>(<b>2</b>) <b>anukūlo</b>'pi dvidhā— siddhaḥ, sādhyaś‍ca ।</p>
<p><b>siddho</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>gehājireṣu navaśālikaṇāvapātagandhānubhāvasubhageṣu kṛṣīvalānām ।</l>
  <l>ānandayanti musalollasanāvadhūtapāṇiskhaladvalayapaddhatayo vadhūṭyaḥ ॥ 44 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>sādhyo</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>suṇṇammi giriggāme vaṇamahisa—visāṇa—bhagga—vai—veḍhe ।</l>
  <l>gahavai—dhūā daṃsaṇa—maṇorahā/harā maṃ pasāeī ॥ 45 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg><l>(śūnye girigrāme vanamahiṣaviṣāṇabhag‍navṛtiveṣṭe ।</l>
  <l>gṛhapatiduhitā darśanamanorathā/harā māṃ prasādayati॥)</l></lg>
<p>(<b>3</b>) <b>pratyāyako</b> dvidhā— adṛṣṭaprayojyakriyo, dṛṣṭaprayojyakriyaśca ।
tayoḥ kaṃsaṃ ghātayati, puṣyeṇa candraṃ yojayatītyādira<b>dṛṣṭaprayojyakriyaḥ</b> ।</p>
<p>sa yathā —</p>
<b><lg><l>śailairbandhayati sma vānarahṛtairvālmīkirambhonidhiṃ</l>
  <l>vyāsaḥ pārthaśaraistathāpi na tayoratyuktirudbhāvyate ।</l>
  <l>vāgarthau ca tulādhṛtāviva tathāpyasmatprabandhānayaṃ</l>
  <l>loko dūṣayituṃ prasāritamukhastubhyaṃ pratiṣṭhe! namaḥ ॥ 46 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>ārātri vivāsamācaṣṭe rātrīrvivāsayati, māhiṣmatyāṃ sūryamudgamayati, ityādirdṛṣṭa—
prayojyakriyaḥ । sa yathā—(māgha. 11.5)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>vipulataranitambābhogaruddhe ramaṇyāḥ śayitumanadhigacchañ jīviteśo'vakāśam ।</l>
  <l>ratiparicayanaśyannaidratandraḥ kathañcid gamayati śayanīye śarvarīṃ kiṃ karotu ॥ 47 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>kathaṃ punaḥ kaṃsaṃ ghātayati kathakaḥ, baliṃ bandhayati gāthaka ityādau prayojakavyāpāreṇa
ṇijutpattiḥ? ucyate—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>śabdopahitarūpāṃstān buddherviṣayatāṃ gatān ।</l>
  <l>pratyakṣamiva kaṃsādīn sādhanatvena manyate ॥ 48 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.7.5)
<p>teṣāṃ cotpattiprabhṛti āvināśāt samṛddhimācakṣāṇaḥ parānapi tathaiva pratyāyayati ।
tathā hi vaktāro bhavanti 'gaccha hanyate kaṃsaḥ, kiṃ gatena hataḥ kaṃsa' iti । evaṃ rātriṃ
vivāsayatītyādāvapi tathā pratyāyanamavagantavyam । ayaṃ ca sūtrānārambhapakṣe nyāyaḥ । sūtrārambhapakṣe
tu ākhyānāt kṛtastadācaṣṭe kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpatiḥ prakṛtivacca kārakam ityudāhṛtaṃ
purastāt ।</p>

<pb n="158"/>
<p>athāyaṃ ṇijartho dhātvarthatvenāvacchidyamānaḥ kiṃ sākṣādavacchidyate? evaṃ bhavitumarhati;
na hyanyadihopalabhyate । tadanupapannam । kriyayoḥ sādhyatvena svasādhanāpekṣayā paraspareṇa
sambandhaḥ । astu tarhi karturvyavadhānena । ayuktaṃ caitat । dhātvartho hi kartṛvyāpārarūpaḥ,
so'nupalabhyamānamapi kartāramākṣipya tad‍dvāreṇa pratyayārthaṃ viśeṣayati ।</p>
<p>na caivaṃ sati preraṇānarthakyaṃ, yato vicchedamāśaṅkamānaḥ kriyāyāṃ pravṛttamapi prerayati ।
yatrāpyapravṛtta eva pravartyate tatrāpi yogyatvādva‍uddhisthaṃ kriyāsambandhaṃ gṛhītvā prayuṅkte ।
buddhinibandhano'pi kriyākartrossambandha upapadyate । tadāpyākhyānāt kṛtastadācaṣṭa
ityādyupasaṃkhyānaṃ 'na vā sāmānyakṛtatvāddhetuto hyaviśiṣṭam' iti buddhinibandhanatvenaiva
pratyākhyātam । tadā ca buddhikaṃso buddhivāsudevena hanyata ityevaṃbhūtabuddhiviṣayaṃ
prayojakavyāpāramāśritya punarbauddha eva prayojakavyāpāro'ṅgīkṛtaḥ । atho'rthākṣiptakartṛsaṅgatāyā
dhātvabhihitāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ pratyayārthatvena preraṇādinā sambandha iti । ata eva pravṛtto'pi
preṣyamāṇe loḍādipratyayotpatteḥ kartṛtvasyāpāyāt । nanu kathamapravṛttabāhyayogaḥ kartṛtvamupeyāt ।
praiṣasādhyaṃ ca kartṛtvaṃ kathaṃ nāma tataḥ prāgeva bhavet ? ucyate; nedaṃ bāhyaprayogapravṛttyadhīnaṃ
kartṛtvamabhidhīyate । kriyāyāṃ tu sambadhyamānatvena vivakṣitāyāṃ tatsādhyatānāntarīyakaḥ
sāmarthyaprāpitasannidhānaḥ kartā sthita eva prayojakavyāpāreṇa bāhyaprayogasiddhyarthameva
viṣayīkriyate । anyathā prayojakavyāpārāpekṣakartṛtve prayojakottarakālamevāsya kartṛtvaṃ bhavediti
na saṃprati kartṛtvābhāve tannibandhano loḍādirupapadyate । tasmātpacatītyādinā yaḥ pacati sa
pākaṃ prati pravartayatviti kathitaṃ bhavati । kriyāsāmarthyādenaṃ nirjñātaṃ kartāraṃ praiṣyatayā—
bhidheyabhāvena lakāro'bhiniviśate । tathā hi— so'yaṃ pākādidhātvarthasāmarthyādavagataḥ kartā
sādhanatvārthasya bāhyaprayogasaṃpattyarthapreṣaṇādivyāpāraviṣayīkṛtaḥ pratyayenābhidhīyata ityāmananti ।</p>
<p>bhavatu nāma kriyāprāpitasannidhānaḥ kartā । sa tu niyata eva puruṣaḥ kathaṃ jñāyate,
yenaivamucyate yastvaṃ pacasi sa pākaṃ pravartayeti । ata eva bhāṣye sakriyasya kartuḥ prayoge
ṇicamabhidhāya dravyamātrasya prayoge loṭa utpattirabhihitā—pṛcchatu mā bhavān, anuyuṅktāṃ
mā bhavān iti । ucyate dravyamātramapi preṣyamāṇaṃ kriyāsādhanayogyameva preṣyate, na kāṣṭhakuḍyādi ।
nanvevaṃ ṇico loṭaś‍ca viṣayasaṅkara prāp‍noti? nāsti saṅkaraḥ; yasyāvagatamasakṛt pramāṇāntareṇa
kriyākartṛtvamasāveva sambhāvitakriyo ṇijviṣayaḥ । adṛṣṭakriyāsāmarthyaṃ tu yogyameva dravyamātraṃ
loḍ‍‌viṣaya iti । tena pacetyayamarthaḥ yastvaṃ pacasi pākārhaḥ pāke śaktaḥ sa tvaṃ pravartaya
pākamiti । evaṃ ca kriyākartṛtvena yogyatayā jñāyamānasya prayoge pravartyamānatvāt

<pb n="159"/>
karturevādhikāra ityuktaṃ bhavati । kiṃ ca 'vidvacchūrābhijātakartṛke rājye bhavānadhikṛta'
ityādivacanabhaṅgibhirayamevārthassamarthyate ।</p>
<p>yadi tarhi na kartādhikriyate nāyaṃ matimān viśiṣṭameva puruṣamevaṃprakāre'—
dhikāre'nurundhīta yameva kañcitpuruṣamupādadīta ।</p>
<p>athavā ete loḍādiviṣayāḥ praiṣādiviṣayāḥ । te kasya dharmabhūtāḥ, tatraiva te varṇayanti
'prayok‍tuḥ (iti)'; prayoktā hi preṣaṇādibhirabhimatasiddhaye'bhilāṣāt puruṣaṃ pravartayati; sa
ca k‍vacit preṣayan, k‍vacidadhyeṣayan, k‍vacidāmantrayamāṇa iti śabdasyaite vyāpārā ityapare ।</p>
<p>preṣaṇā hi sarvavidhyādisādhāraṇarūpā । sā ca śabdavyāpāraḥ, nimantraṇādayastu
pramāṇādinibandhanāstadviśeṣāḥ । tathā hi — idaṃ nimantraṇaṃ, iyamanujñā, ayaṃ prāptakāla iti
prakaraṇāderavagamyate ।</p>
<p>anyanmataṃ prayojyavyāpāraviśeṣāḥ; te cāsaṃviditāḥ; sa tu puruṣo liṅādiprayogād
bhojanādikriyāsu nimantraṇādyavasthāntaramātmānaṃ manyate nimantrito'hamadhyeṣito'hamiti ।</p>
<p>anye tvāhuḥ — vidhireka evārthaḥ pratyayasya । sa ca yajetetyāderyathārūpo'vagamyate
tathārūpa eva । kaṭaṃ kuru; iha karotyarthātmake vidhivaddhātvarthānuyāyinīti kārakāṇāmabhi—
saṃbandhaḥ । yataḥ karotyarthātmakavyāpāreṇa kārakāṇāṃ viśeṣa upajāyamāna upalabhyate; kurvan
hi kārako bhavati ।</p>
<p>anye tvāhuḥ — yo'yaṃ pākādiko viśeṣa itaretaravailakṣaṇyenopalabhyamānaḥ
pratiniyataphalajanakaḥ, yatraiva phalasādhakatvāt karaṇāni pravartante tasyaiva tu vyāpārātmakatvāt
kriyārūpatāpi saṃpannaiveti ।</p>
<p>aparamataṃ — tanna vivek‍tuṃ śakyam iha kārakāṇi vyāpriyante, na vyāpriyanta iti,
ubhayātmake vastuni viśiṣṭopādhirūpasya anirdhāritatvādekatrāpi pravṛttimupayat kārakamitaratrāpi
pravṛttamivopalabhyate ।</p>
<p>athāpare bruvate ubhayātmakameva hi kriyārūpaṃ vastu kārakaissaṃpadyate । ata eva 'kārakāṇāṃ
pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā' ityetadbhāvanāpakṣe'pi saṅgacchate, na cāsmābhissakaladhātvarthānuyāyi—
karotyartharūpā bhāvanā aṅgīkriyate, yaditthamadhyagīṣata kṛbhvastayaḥ kriyāsāmānyavacanāḥ,
kriyāviśeṣavacanāḥ pacyādaya iti । kiṃtu pratyayavācyatvamasyā anukṛṣyate ।</p>
<p>nanu ca bhāvanāpakṣeṃ kārakāṇāmiti bahuvacanānupapattiḥ, kartureva hi vyāpāro bhāvanā,
na kārakāṇāmucyate । kartaiva kārakaśabdenoktaḥ, na punaritarakaraṇādi । kartṝṇāṃ tu kriyābhedena
bahuvacanam ।</p>

<pb n="160"/>
<p>kathaṃ punaridaṃ jñāyate ? yato bhujikriyāmūrīkṛtyedamabhidhatte । anyathā kārakāṇi śuṣkaudane
pravartante anyathā māṃsaudana iti kartaiva śuṣkaudane mandaprasthānena pravartate, māṃsaudane saṃrambheṇātaḥ
karturmandatāsaṃrambhapradarśanaṃ jñāyate । kartaiva parigrahītā, yasya buddhyanuṣaṅgāt tathāpravṛttiḥ ।</p>
<p>nanu ca śuṣkaudanamāṃsaudanayoḥ karaṇādhikaraṇādīnāmapi tadbhedanimittaṃ bahuvacanaṃ bhaviṣyati ।</p>
<p>naivam; vidyamānamapi kārakāntaraṃ kāṃsyapātrādiśuṣkamāṃsaudanayormandanayā saṃrambheṇa
vā pravartate । yadāpi sakalakārakavyāpāraḥ kriyeti pakṣastadāpi pradhānatvāt kartaiva
kārakaśabdenocyate, tasya ca sarvakriyāviśeṣaviṣayatvenānapāyāt prayogapravṛttihetutvācca ।
karma punaḥ yadyapi tadarthatvāt pravṛtteḥ pradhānaṃ tathāpi tasyāsarvaviṣayatvānna kārakāṇāmiti
bahuvacanena saṅgrahaḥ । yadyevaṃ kartṛśabda eva kasmānna kṛtaḥ? karmaṇi lakārāṇāṃ tasya
vyudāso mā bhūt । tena yatra saṃbhavati karma tatrāṅgīkṛtameva tu tadapekṣayā bahuvacanam ।</p>
<p>nanu ca saṃrambhādipradarśanādacetanavyāpārasya kriyātvaṃ na prāp‍noti ।</p>
<p>naivam; saṃrambhādeḥ kartṛvilabhaṇatvāt । ataḥ kartṛvyāpāraḥ kriyeti siddham ।
nanvevaṃ sati bhāṣyaṃ na saṃgacchate 'kaḥ paceḥ pradhānārthaḥ, yā'sau taṇḍulānāṃ viklittiḥ'
iti । ārthaṃ prādhānyamāśritya <b>tadbhāṣya</b>mityavirodhaḥ । yattadarthaḥ 'preṣaṇaṃ, adhyeṣaṇaṃ vā sa sarvaḥ
pacyartha' iti । evaṃ ca pacatītyākhyātasya viklittyupasarjanaṃ vikledanamartho bhavati ।</p>
<p>anye tu kārakāṇāmiti bahuvacanaṃ sarvakārakavyāpāratvena vyācakṣate, yasmātsarva—
kārakavyāpārābhidhāyitvaṃ dhātūnāṃ dṛśyate । tathā ca devadattasya kāṣṭhaissthālyāmodanasya ca
pācakaḥ ityādau sarvāṇyeva kārakāṇi dhātvarthasya viśeṣaṇam; nātra kasyaciduṇabhāvaḥ
pradhānabhāvo vā avagamyate ।</p>
<p>ākhyātāstarhi sarvakārakavyāpārāḥ kimiti nāvagamyante? prādhānyātkartṛkarmaṇoreva
lakārotpatteḥ tadvyāvyāpāra evākhyātātpratīyate ।</p>
<p>kiṃ punassarveṣāṃ kārakāṇāmekā pravṛttiḥ? āhosvit pratikārakaṃ bhinnāḥ pravṛttayaḥ kriyeti ।
na tāvadādyaḥ pakṣaḥ, sarveṣāmekasyāḥ pravṛtterasaṃbhavāt । na hi yaiva kāṣṭhānāṃ pravṛttissaiva
devadattasya sthālyādeś‍ca saṃbhavati, tasmātpratikārakaṃ bhinnāḥ pravṛttayo dhātunā
yugapadabhidhīyamānāḥ kriyetyucyante ।</p>
<p>athavā punarastvekaikā sarvakārakāṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ kriyā । tathā hi sarvaireva kārakairekā
pravṛttirupajanyate sarvāṇyeva hi phalajananāya pravartante । kiñcittu kenacidrūpeṇa janayatītyavāntara—
bhedātkaraṇādivyapadeśaḥ, ekaś‍cānekatra vṛttirjātivadupapadyate । viśeṣād‍vāsyāḥ
phalajananarūpatvaṃ, na punaradhiśraṇādirūpateti ।</p>

<pb n="161"/>
<p><b>(3. upaskārarūpaṃ padam)</b></p>
<p><b>viśeṣaṇādirūpaṃ nipātādirūpaṃ, ākhyātādirūpaṃ, saṃbodhanādirūpaṃ, hetvādirūpaṃ
cetyupaskārarūpā</b> । ete cāgrata upaskārārthaprastāve prapañcato varṇayiṣyanta iti neha
pratanyante (dra. pṛ. 265) । saṃbandhāvicchedārthaṃ tu leśata udāhriyante । tatra —</p>
<p><b>viśeṣaṇādayaḥ</b> kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ, kārakaviśeṣaṇaṃ, upasargaś‍ca; yathā— sādhu pacati,
bhīṣmamudāraṃ darśanīyaṃ kaṭaṃ karoti, ehi manye rathena yāsyatīti ।</p>
<p><b>nipātāḥ</b> karmapravacanīyāḥ avyayāni ca, yathā— ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca vṛtrahan, asāṃprataṃ
jetumityādayaḥ ।</p>
<p><b>ākhyātāni</b> kṛtastaddhitāś‍ca, yathā— smarasi devadatta kaś‍mīreṣu vatsyāmaḥ, raipoṣaṃ
puṣyati, brāhmaṇavad bravīti ।</p>
<p><b>sambodhanādayaḥ</b> āmantraṇamavadhibhāvo liṅgaṃ ca, yathā— he devadatta, bhuktā vrajatīti,
sa iti । saṃbandhādayaś‍śeṣa iti, upapadam, sahārthaś‍ca, yathā— rājñaḥ, puruṣaḥ, kuśalaṃ
devadattāyeti, putreṇa sahāyāta iti ।</p>
<p><b>hetvādayo</b> heturlakṣaṇaṃ tādarthyaṃ ca, yathā— vidyayā yaśaḥ, kamaṇḍalunā chātraḥ,
yūpāya dārviti ।</p>
<p>kathaṃ punarayaṃ hetuḥ kārakād viśiṣyate ?</p>
<p><b>dravyādiviṣayo hetuḥ kārakaṃ niyatakriyam</b> ॥ 49 ॥ (vāpa. 3.7. 25)</p>
<p>yathā— bījena sasyaṃ, tapasā kṛśaḥ, annena vasati, vratena brāhmaṇyam । kārakaṃ
yathā— devadattaḥ śraddhayā tīrthe hemaśataṃ niṣkaṃ brāhmaṇāya dadāti । yadyevaṃ dravyādiviṣayatvena
sahārthatvād hetorabhedaḥ prāp‍noti ।</p>
<p>sahārtho'pi dravyādiviṣayatvena kriyāyāmaniyata eva bhavati । yathā— putreṇa saha
gomān, putreṇa saha sthūlaḥ, putreṇa sahāgacchati, putreṇa saha brāhmaṇa iti ।</p>
<p>naivam; na hi sahārthasya dravyādīn prati niva(rva)rtanabhāvaś‍śabdenocyate । hetoḥ
punarāśritavyāpārasyāpi tṛtīyādibhiḥ so'pi vidhīyata iti kriyāviṣayaḥ karaṇātkathaṃ
bhidyata iti cet,</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>kriyāyai karaṇaṃ tasya dṛṣṭaḥ pratinidhistathā ।</l>
  <l>hetvartho'pi kriyāheturna ca pratinidhīyate ॥ 50 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3. 7. 26)
<p>tarhi tādarthyādabhedaḥ ।</p>
<p>kimidaṃ tādarthyaṃ nāma ?</p>

<pb n="162"/>
<p>kāryasya kāraṇaṃ prati prayojakatvaṃ tādarthyam; viśiṣṭaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva iti
yāvat । yaddhi yadarthaṃ tanniyogatastasya kāraṇaṃ yathā aṅgulīyāya kanakamiti ।</p>
<p>kathaṃ tarhi hetorna bhidyate ?</p>
<p>yataḥ kāraṇasya kāryaprasavayogyatā hetutvam; kāryasya kāraṇaṃ prati prayojakatvaṃ
tādarthyamiti । ayaṃ ca viśeṣaḥ kāryavācina eva tādarthye caturthī kāryavācino nimittavācinaś‍ca
hetostu tṛtīyeti ।</p>
<p>yadyevaṃ hetulakṣaṇayorhetulakṣaṇā tṛtīyā kanakāt prāp‍noti ।</p>
<p>na ca tādarthyacaturthyā bādhyate, viṣayabhedāt; kāryavācino hi tṛtīyā, caturthī
kāraṇavācina iti ।</p>
<p>kathaṃ ca saṃbandhe vidhīyamānā caturthī kāryaśabdādeva, na kāraṇaśabdāt ।</p>
<p>api ca bhinnādhikaraṇatvāt saṃbandhasya, yathā rājñaḥ puruṣa iti dviṣṭhamapi saṃbandhaṃ
rājaśabdādutpadyamānā ṣaṣṭhī upādhatte । tathā kāryopajanita— vyatirekādutpadyamānā caturthyubhayamapi
saṃbandhamupādhāsyate iti ।</p>
<p>naivam; tasmai tadarthamiti sarvanām‍nā yo'rthaḥ pratipadyate sa eva svakāraṇāpekṣayā
prāpitavyatirekaś‍caturthyā saṃbadhyate । yathā— yadarthamasya mantraḥ tadanenādhigatamiti sarvanāmārtha
eva kāryayogī, tathehāpi tacchabdopātta evārthaḥ prayojanatayā vipariṇataḥ; tadarthaṃ śabdo
nābhidhīyate ।</p>
<p>bhāvapratyayānto'pyasau kāryagatameva rūpaṃ viśeṣeṇācaṣṭe, kāryasya kāraṇaṃ prati
prayojakatvaṃ tādarthyamiti । tatkathaṃ kārakasya tādarthyavibhaktirāśaṅkyeta ? kāryasthayā'pi
caturthyobhayagatasyāpi saṃbandhasyāvagatatvāt avyatiriktapratipadikārthābhinnaḥ kāraṇaśabdād
bhavati, na tu vyatirekalakṣaṇā tṛtīyeti । ayaṃ ca hetutādarthyayorviśeṣaḥ ।</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>prātilomyānulomyābhyāṃ heturarthasya sādhakaḥ ।</l>
  <l>tādarthyamānulomyena hetutvānugataṃ tu tat ॥ 51 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.7. 27)
<p>vāsenādhīte, adhyayanena vasatīti, yā ca yūpāya dāru, adhyayanāya vasatīti ।
yastu manyate tadarthatā tadarthatā tadviṣayasya pārarthyarūpā, kāryaprasavayogyatā hetuḥ, ananyārthasya
tādarthyam, tasya tadviṣayasyeti ananyārthasyeti viśeṣaṇadvayamapārtham, ubhayatrāviśeṣāt ।
yadi tāvadarthasyānanyārthatā tādarthyam tadasat । kanakasya valayādāvapi sāmarthyaṃ, saṅghātāt ।
athoktidharmeṇa, taddhetāvapi samānam । na hi vidyāyā yaśohetutāṃ muk‍tvā kāryāntarayogyatāṃ
brute । pārārthyarūpetyapi na vacanīyaṃ, kāryaprasavayogyatetyanenaiva gatārthatvāt । nanu ca naṭasya

<pb n="163"/>
śrṛṇotītyādai kāryaprasavayogyasyāpi naṭādeḥ pārārthyena vivakṣāyāṃ mā bhuddhetutvamiti viśeṣaṇaṃ
kriyate । naivam; yathā upādhyāyādadhīta iti upādhyāyādeḥ parārthatvena kārakatvaṃ,
prayojakatvameva ca tādarthyamiti ।</p>
<p>atha lakṣaṇasya kā vārtā ? lakṣaṇamapi tādarthyavaddhetuviśeṣa eva । siddho hi hetuḥ
kārako jñāpakaś‍ca । tatra kārakasya svavyāpārānāśrayaṇe heturityākhyā, jñāpakasya lakṣaṇamiti;
padārthāntaraparicchedahetutā hi lakṣaṇārthaḥ। taduktam—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>anāśrite tu vyāpāre nimittaṃ heturiṣyate ।</l>
  <l>āśrayāvadhibhāvaṃ tu lakṣaṇe lakṣaṇaṃ viduḥ ॥ 52 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3. 7. 24)
<p>k‍vacittu heturapi lakṣaṇaṃ bhavati; yathā 'śākalyasya saṃhitāmanu prāvarṣat,
anaḍud‌yajñamanvasiñcat, prajāḥ parjanya iti । etena vṛkṣaṃ prati vidyotate (vidyud) iti
dravyalakṣaṇam, jaṭābhistāpasa iti itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇam, akṣṇā kāṇa iti vikāralakṣaṇaṃ,
vātāya kapilā vidyudityutpātalakṣaṇaṃ, goṣu duhyamānāsu gata iti bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ, pacannāsta
iti kriyālakṣaṇaṃ ca vyākhyātamiti ।</p>
<p><b>(10. vāk‍yam)</b></p>
<p><b>ekārthaparaḥ padasamūho vāk‍yam</b> । tat tridhā—</p>
<p><b>1. saṃskṛtam,</b></p>
<p><b>2. prākṛtam,</b></p>
<p><b>3. apabhraṃśaś‍ca । tatra—</b></p>
<p><b>(1. saṃskṛtam)</b></p>
<p><b>saṃskṛtaṃ</b> śrautam, ārṣaṃ, laukikaṃ ca । teṣu —</p>
<p><b>śrautaṃ</b> dvidhā <b>mantrabrāhmaṇa</b>bhedāt । tatra —</p>
<p><b>mantro</b> yathā— (taiā. 10.1. 7)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>tadevāg‍nistad vāyustat sūryastadu candramāḥ ।</l>
  <l>tadeva śukramamṛtaṃ tadāpassa prajāpatiḥ ॥ 53 ॥ tad brahma ।</l></lg></b>
<p><b>brāhmaṇaṃ</b> yathā— (bṛu. 4.3.33)</p>
<p>śaṃ yo manuṣyāṇāṃ rāgadvaḥ samṛddho bhavati । tatrānyeṣāmadhipatiḥ sarveṣāṃ</p>
<p>manuṣyakaiḥ kāmaissaṃpannatamaḥ । sa manuṣyāṇāṃ parama ānandaḥ ।</p>

<pb n="164"/>
<p><b>ārṣaṃ</b> dvidhā <b>smṛtiḥ purāṇaṃ</b> ca । tayoḥ</p>
<p><b>smṛti</b>ryathā— (manu. 3.13)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>śūdraiva bhāryā śūdrasya sā ca svā ca viśaḥ smṛte ।</l>
  <l>te ca svā caiva rājñastu tāś‍ca svā cāgrajanmanaḥ ॥ 54 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>purāṇaṃ</b> yathā— (vāyupu. 67.65)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>hiraṇyakaśipurdaityo yāṃ yāṃ sāci vyudaikṣata ।</l>
  <l>bhaya bhrāntaisturaiś‍cakre tasyai tasyai diśe namaḥ ॥ 55 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>laukikaṃ</b> dvividhaṃ <b>kāvyaṃ śāstraṃ</b> ca ।</p>
<p>tayoḥ <b>kāvyaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>kasya no kurute mugdhe!pipāsākulitaṃ manaḥ ।</l>
  <l>ayaṃ te vidrumacchāyo marumārga ivādharaḥ ॥ 56 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>śāstraṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>prakāmadhavalaṃ yasyāś‍cakṣuḥ paryantapakṣmalam ।</l>
  <l>navanītopamaṃ tasyā bhavati smaramandiram ॥ 57 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>(2. prākṛtam)</b></p>
<p><b>prākṛtaṃ</b> tridhā <b>sahajaṃ, lakṣitaṃ ś‍liṣṭaṃ</b> ca । teṣu—</p>
<p><b>sahajaṃ</b> dvidhā <b>saṃskṛtasamaṃ deś‍yaṃ</b> ca । tayoḥ —</p>
<p><b>saṃskṛtasamaṃ</b> yathā— (māmā. 6. 10)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>sarale! sāhasarāgaṃ parihara rambhoru! muñca saṃrambham ।</l>
  <l>virasaṃ virahāyāsaṃ voḍhuṃ tava cittamasahaṃ me ॥ 58 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>deś‍yaṃ</b> yathā— (asādhyasaṃskṛtā gāthā)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>vippa api āpu āṇuṇāhaṃ ṣaḍarasamaṃ parihasanteī ।</l>
  <l>vāsaara viṇaḍio visaṃ lalaṃsva ṇāvesi ॥ 59 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>lakṣitaṃ</b> dvidhā <b>mahārāṣṭraṃ śaurasenaṃ</b> ca । tayoḥ—</p>
<p><b>mahārāṣṭraṃ</b> yathā— (seba. 1.1)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>ṇamaha avaṅaḍhiatuṃgaṃ avasāriavitthaaṃ aṇoṇaagahiraṃ ।
appalahuaparisaṇhaṃ aṇāaparamatthaaḍaṃ mahumahaṇaṃ ॥ 60 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(namata avardhitatuṅgamaprasāritavismṛtamanavanatagabhīram ।
apralaghukupariś‍lakṣṇamajñātaparamārthaprakaṭaṃ madhumathanam ॥)</p>

<pb n="165"/>
<p><b>śaurasenaṃ</b> yathā— . . . . . . . .</p>
<p><b>ś‍liṣṭaṃ</b> dvidhā paiśācaṃ māgadhaṃ ca । tayoḥ <b>paiśācaṃ</b> (bṛhatkathāmaṅgalam) yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>panamatha panaya—pakuppita—ko/golī—calanagga—lagga—patibiṃbaṃ ।</l>
  <l>tasasu nakha—tappanesuṃ ekātasa tanu—thalaṃ luddaṃ/ruttaṃ ॥ 61 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
  <l>(praṇamata praṇayaprakupitagaurīcaraṇāgralag‍napratibimbam ।</l>
  <l>daśasu nakhadarpaṇeṣu ekādaśatanudharaṃ rudram ॥)</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>māgadhaṃ</b> yathā—(vesaṃ. 3.1.)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>hada-māṇuśa-maṃśa—bhoaṇe kuṃbha—śahaśśaṃ vaśāhiṃ śaṃcide ।</l>
  <l>aṇiśaṃ a pibāmi śoṇidaṃ valiśaśadaṃ śamale huvīadu ॥ 62 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
  <l>(hatamānuṣamāṃsabhojanaṃ kumbhasahastraṃ vasābhiḥ sañcitam ।</l>
  <l>aniśaṃ ca pibāmi śoṇitaṃ varṣaśataṃ samaro bhavatu ॥)</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>(3. apabhraṃśaḥ)</b></p>
<p>apabhraṃśas‍tridhā <b>uttamo, madhyamaḥ kaniṣṭha</b>ś‍ca ।</p>
<p><b>(uttamaḥ)</b> teṣvāvantyalāṭīyādiruttamaḥ । tatra—</p>
<p><b>āvantyo</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>ekadu asaloṇī ala āharaṇasusaṃṭhī acchi
upalaṃpaṭaṃ vīvaukahiṃmalaṃ bhaṭṭaevaṭapi amaie ।</l>
  <l>uṇajāṇiuṃ virahāturaṇujūri aemajjha
harodāvaṇudiṇṇuvahiṇe viṇṇūri a e ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>lāṭīyo</b> yathā—</p>
<p><b>hirau haranta ho corahoe bhujidaṃhuhale jappiupaṇavva sacchile viloi augaṇe ।</b></p>
<p><b>ehu puṇu piṇaghaṇatthaṇi saṃghaṭṭau k‍kapaṇu jaṃ candāṇaṇe dijjai aharaho dantapaṇā/vaṇu ॥</b></p>
<p>(hṛdayaṃ harataś‍caurasyaiṣa eva daṇḍo hale, yat priya eṇaśāvākṣi gṛhītvā lāgito gale ।</p>
<p>eṣa punaḥ pīnaghanastane saṃghaṭṭaḥ ko yac‍candrānane dīyate'dharāya dantavraṇaḥ ॥)</p>
<p><b>(madhyamaḥ)</b> ābhīragaurjarādiḥ <b>madhyamaḥ</b> । tayoḥ —</p>
<p><b>ābhīro</b> yathā—(dra. 8. 28)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>laviyapphau vīududvaḍākau hahāṇa ecchāsi ।</l>
  <l>puttahomatthajibhu jaḻadahiḍāṃ ujaṃ me pi javi āāsi ॥ 65 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<!-- NOTES pg=165!-->
1. imāmārabhya sapta gāthā HOS-53 granthe anyathaiva mudritāḥ । kulakarṇipāṭhastu dīyate ।

<pb n="166"/>
<p><b>gaurjaro</b> yathā—(dra. 8.7)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>ava akhkho ñcī samudrutari siladuhi garukāṇi ।</l>
  <l>mando hi e pilahi aua jaṃparuc‍caite va āṇi ॥ 66 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>kāś‍mīrapaurastyādiḥ <b>kaniṣṭhaḥ</b> । tayoḥ <b>kāś‍mīro</b> yathā—(dra. saka. pṛ. 692)</p>
<p>kaṃvali āla e kaṃ te kuducchaladantahi viṭhi suddhi emaṃ ivi ālasīlati ।</p>
<p>sava aṃgāpidusarāsahi khavāci duṃ phalinantekī āāsaṇa adasi ॥</p>
<p><b>paurastyo</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>mahaṇāhi akuṭuṃbi sāmaiṃdīhirerabhāu japihuri ।</l>
  <l>viṇṇaujāntāṃ vav‍irivāmek‍keredhūje vāsāṃ hāvāthi ॥</l>
  <l>āṃkhījaṇukaṇāṃsahuṃkājāthitehātheṃcita udūkarāe ।</l>
  <l>vala ācchaiṇī jīva upātharusa aṇai bhavaṇahiṃ vāccharaṃ ॥ 68 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>(vāk‍yamekādaśadhā)</b></p>
<p>tadetat samastamapi <b>vāk‍yajātamākhyātopādheḥ ekādaśaprakāraṃ</b> viprathate । tadyathā—
ekākhyātamanekākhyātamāvṛttākhyātamanuvṛttākhyātaṃ vipariṇatākhyātamekārthākhyātaṃ
samuccitākhyātaṃ kṛdabhihitākhyātamapekṣitākhyātamekāntarākhyātaṃ nirantarākhyātamiti । teṣu</p>
<p><b>(1) ekākhyātaṃ</b> yathā— <b>vāgarthāviva</b> (raghu.1.1) (pṛ. 499)</p>
<p><b>(2) anekākhyātaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>yadeva rocate mahyaṃ tadeva kurute priyā ।</l>
  <l>iti vetti na jānāti tat priyaṃ yat karoti sā ॥ 70 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>(3) āvṛttākhyātaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>jayatyamalakaustubhastabakitāṃsapīṭho hari—
rjayanti mṛgalocanāś‍caladapāṅgadṛṣṭikramāḥ ।</l>
  <l>tato jayati mallikā tadanu sarvasaṃvedanā—
vināśakaraṇakṣamo jayati pañcamasya dhvaniḥ ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>(4) anuvṛttākhyātaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>caranti caturambhodhivelodyāneṣu dantinaḥ ।</l>
  <l>cakravālādrikuñjeṣu kundabhāso guṇāś‍ca te ॥ 72 ॥</l>
</lg></b>

<pb n="167"/>
<p><b>(5) vipariṇatākhyātaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>so'smiñjayati jīvātuḥ pañceṣoḥ pañcamadhvaniḥ ।</l>
  <l>te ca caitre vikīrṇailātak‍kolīkelayo'nilāḥ ॥ 73 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>(6) ekārthākhyātaṃ</b> yathā—(raghu. 1. 54)</p>
<p><b>tāmavātārayat pat‍nīṃ rathādavatatāra ca</b> ॥ 74 ॥</p>
<p><b>(7) kṛdabhihitākhyātaṃ</b> yathā— (mahā. droṇa. 184. 86)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>tataḥ kumudanāthena kāminīgaṇḍapāṇḍunā ।</l>
  <l>netrānandena candreṇa māhendī digalaṅkṛtā ॥ 75 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>(8) adhyāhṛtākhyātaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>yaś‍ca nimbaṃ paraśunā yaś‍cainaṃ madhusarpiṣā ।</l>
  <l>yaś‍cainaṃ gandhamālyābhyāṃ sarvatra kaṭureva saḥ ॥ 76 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>(9) anapekṣitākhyātaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>kiyanmātraṃ jalaṃ vipra!jānudagh‍naṃ janādhipa ! ।</l>
  <l>tathāpīyamavasthā te na hi sarve bhavādṛśāḥ ॥ 77 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>(10) ekāntarākhyātaṃ</b> yathā— (bhaṭṭi. 13. 27)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>tene'dribandho vavṛdhe payodhistutoṣa rāmo mumude kapīndraḥ ।</l>
  <l>tatrāsa śatrurdadṛśe suvelaḥ prāpe jalānto jahṛṣuḥ plavaṅgāḥ ॥ 78 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>(11) nirantarākhyātaṃ</b> yathā— (bhaṭṭi. 13. 28)</p>
<b><lg>
  <l>bhremurvavalguḥ nanṛturjaharṣurjagussamutpupluvire niṣeduḥ ।</l>
  <l>āsphoṭayāṃcakrurabhipraṇedū rejurnananduviyayusmamīyuḥ ॥ 79 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>nanu ca nirantarākhyātaṃ samuc‍citākhyātamekārthākhyātamāvṛttākhyātamityādayo
vāk‍yavikalpā nopapadyante; <b>vāk‍yakāro</b> hi manyate nāstyeva tiṅantayossaṃbandhaḥ; tathā ca
'tiṅṅatiḍaḥ' (8.1.28) ityatra 'atiṅvacanamanarthaka samānavāk‍yādhikārād'
{8.1. 28(1)} ityatiṅvacanaṃ pratyācaṣṭe । na hyekatra vāk‍ye dve tiṅante sta iti । evaṃ
<b>vāk‍yalakṣaṇaṃ</b> karoti— <b>ākhyātaṃ sāvyayakārakaviśeṣaṇaṃ vāk‍yam</b> । tatrākhyātagrahaṇaṃ na
kartavyam; na hyavyayakārakaviśeṣaṇapadāni nibandhanamantareṇāvatiṣṭhante। ākhyātamevaiṣāṃ
nibandhanamiti labdhe, vyākhyāne punarākhyātagrahaṇaṃ āśritasaṅkhyākhyātapadaparigrahartham,

<pb n="168"/>
yatraikamākhyātapadamavyayakārakaviśeṣaṇapadāni sannipan‍ti, <b>tad‌vāk‍yaṃ</b> yathā syāt ।
anekākhyātapadaprayoge tu vāk‍yasaṃjñā mā bhūdityanāśritasaṅkhyātapadāśaṅkānirāsārtham '<b>ekatiṅ
vāk‍yam</b>' iti vacanāntaramārabhate ।</p>
<p>tatredaṃ vicāryate— kimekāsmin vāk‍ye dvayostiṅantayossaṃbandha eva nāsti, uta
satyapi saṃbandhe dvitīyaṃ na prayujyate ekatiṅ vāk‍yamiti pūrvācāryasamayādanu kiñcidāha —
satyapi tiṅantayossaṃbandhe tiṅantāmantritanighātayuṣmadasmadādeśaplutādikāryavyavasthārtha—
mekatiṅvāk‍yamiti <b>pāribhāṣikameva vāk‍yalakṣaṇaṃ kriyate</b> ।</p>
<p>kiṃ kāraṇam ?</p>
<p>samānavāk‍yārthāt padāduttarayostiṅāmantritayornighātassmaryate । yuṣmadasmadoḥ vāṃnāvādaya
(8.1. 20) ādeśā vidhīyante । 'vākyasya ṭeḥ pluta udāttaḥ' (8.2.82) iti
vāk‍yācāmantyasya plutaśśiṣyate iti । tac‍ca tadopapadyate yadaikatiṅvāk‍yamiti pāribhāṣikaṃ
vāk‍yalakṣaṇaṃ kriyate । anyathā 'samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ' (2.1.1) iti padānāṃ parasparāsāmarthye
vāk‍yasya cāparisamāptau sarvathā na prāp‍noti । tathā hi 'nadyāstiṣṭhanti kūle, vṛkṣasya
lambate śākhāyāṃ, kaḥ priye mayi kopaḥ ? kā subhaga priyā te ?śālīnāṃ te odanaṃ
dāsyāmīti me mātā bravīti, āgaccha bho devadatta kugrāmaṃ gacchāvaḥ, grāmaṃ yadi yāsi re
māmapi pratīkṣasva ।' atra tiṣṭhatinā kūlamabhisaṃbandhāt, nadīḥ lambanena śākhā, na vṛkṣaḥ;
ka ityanena kopo, na priyā; ketyanena tu priyā, na subhagaḥ; te iti yuṣmadarthena odanaṃ,
na śālayaḥ; me ityasmadarthena mātā, na vacanam; āgaccha devadatta, grāmaṃ yadi yāsi re,
ityetāvati vāk‍yayoraparisamāp‍tiḥ, kiṃ tarhi ? gacchāvo, māmapi pratīkṣasveti । tataś‍ca
nighātādikāryāṇāmaprāp‍tiḥ । ekatiṅparasya tu padasamudāyasya vāk‍yatve paramparayā
yathākathañcidabhisaṃbandhe nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśā yujyante । 'yuktayukte copasaṅkhyānam' iti
yuktena vaktavyaṃ bhavati । evaṃ sākāṅkṣasyāpi padakadambakasya ekatiṅavacchedena vāk‍yatvapratītau
'vāk‍yasya ṭeḥ p‍luta' iti vāk‍yācāmantyasyodāttaḥ p‍luta iti siddho bhavati ।</p>
<p>kaś‍cittu brūte—nāstyeva tiṅantayossaṃbandhaḥ । sa hi tiṅanteṣūpakalpyamānaḥ
ṣoḍhaivāvakalpate—viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasambandhaḥ, sādhyasādhanasambandhaḥ, lakṣyalakṣaṇasambandhaḥ,
hetuhetumatsasambandhaḥ, avadhyavadhimatsambandhaḥ, samuc‍cayādisambandhaś‍ceti । tatra viśeṣaṇa—
viśeṣyasaṃbandhassāmānādhikaraṇyena vā syāt vaiyadhikaraṇyena vā । na tāvat sāmānadhi—

<pb n="169"/>
karaṇyena, pacati paṭhatītyetayoratyantamarthabhedāta; na hi padārthayorantyantabhede'bhede vā
viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva upapadyate । na hi bhavati āmraś‍cūto'ś‍vattha iti, yatra tu nātyantabhedo
abhedo vā tatropapadyate, yathā nīlamutpalamiti ।</p>
<p>nanu yathā prapacati stokaṃ pacati ityādāvupasargeṇa stokādinā vā''khyātāṃ viśeṣyate,
tathā''khyātāntareṇāpi kasmānna viśeṣyate ? naivam; atra yathā nīlavīraśabdau nīlatvavīratve
viśeṣaṇarūpeṇābhidadhatau utpalaṃ puruṣaṃ ca sāmānyenopagṛh‍ṇītaḥ । na tūtpalapuruṣasāmānyayorvā
niyatau bhavataḥ, utpalapuruṣaśabdāvapyutpalapuruṣau viśeṣyarūpeṇā— bhidadhatau nīlatvaṃ vīratvaṃ
ca sāmānyenopagṛh‍ṇītaḥ; na tu tatsāmānyayostadviśeṣaṇayorvātmānaṃ niyamayataḥ ।
parasparopaś‍leṣakṛtayorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo bhavati । na vaitat pacati paṭhatītyetayorupapadyate; na
hi nīlotpalādivat pacati; paṭhatiṃ, pacatiṃ vā paṭhatirupagrahītuṃ śak‍noti ।</p>
<p>nanu cātyantamabhinnārthabhinnārthayoś‍ca dṛś‍yate viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ । abhinnārthayoryathā
adhīte, adhyeti । bhinnārthayoryathā pratiṣṭhate, prasmarati । naivam, adhīte, adhyetītyetayoryadyapi
dhāturupasargaṃ na vyabhicarati, vyabhicaratyevopasargo dhātum, ataśśak‍yate'nvayavyatirekā—
bhyāmarthabhedaḥ kalpayituṃ, yadartho'yamadhiranyatra dṛṣṭastadartha ihāpi bhavitumarhati । ayaṃ
cādhiranyatroparibhāvārtho dṛṣṭaḥ, yathā adhyāste, adhirohatīti; te manyāmahe asya sa evārtha
iti । tasmādadhīḍeva śabdakriyo jñānakriyaś‍ceti, adhiśabdastvetamevārthamuparibhāvena viśinaṣṭi ।
viśiṣṭārthavatāṃ śabdānāṃ vidhipūrvaṃ vā śabdānāṃ tathādhītārthaviṣayametadvijñānamiti
etāvānevārtho'dhinā vibhajyate । iha tarhi kathaṃ pratiṣṭhate, prasmarati iti । na hyatra satyapi
kevalaprayoge tiṣṭhateḥ smaratervā pacativatsāmānyābhidhāyitvam । kiṃ tarhi ? virodhinyeva kriyā
gamyate vrajikriyā smaraṇanivṛttiś‍ca । vyaktaṃ ca pratiṣṭhata ityanena sthānaprārambho nocyate; kiṃ
tarhi ?gamanameva; prasmaratītyanenāpi smaraṇārambho nocyate, api tu smaraṇāṃnārambha eveti ।</p>
<p>naiṣa doṣaḥ । praśabdo'yaṃ prapacatītyādiṣu ādikarmavacanatvena nirjñātaḥ; asya
viśeṣatodṛṣṭādanumānādikarmavacanatvamanumīyate । tiṣṭhatiś‍ca devadattastiṣṭhatītyādau
kriyāvacanāddhātutvena nirjñātaḥ; ato'sya sāmānyatodṛṣṭādanumānādgamanārthatvamapi vijñāyate ।
bahvarthā api dhātavo bhavanti, vapiḥ prakiraṇe dṛṣṭaśchedane 'pi pravartate keśānvapatīti ।
īḍatiś‍ca । īḍatiś‍ca stutau dṛṣṭaḥ preraṇe'pi pravartate, agvirvā ito varṣamīṭṭe; karotirapūrvaprādurbhāve
dṛṣṭo nirmalakaraṇe'pi vartate; pādau kuru, ṣaṣṭhaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ kuru, unmṛdāneti gamyate । tathā kaṭe kuru,

<pb n="170"/>
aś‍mānamitaḥ kuru, nikṣipāvākṣipeti gamyate । ayamapi ca dhātutvādanekārtho bhavitumarhati ।
etena smaratirapi vyākhyātaḥ । na caitanna dṛṣṭaṃ viruddhārthāvarthau tulyarūpeṇa śabdenābhidhīyete ।
tadyathā— sannikarṣaviprakarṣayordṛṣṭamārācchabdenābhidhānam— '<b>ārācchatrumapabādhasva dūram</b>'
(ṛve. 10. 42. 7)'<b>dūrāddavīyo apasedha śatrūn</b>' (ṛve. 6. 47. 29) । atastiṣṭhatireva gamanārthaḥ,
smaratireva smaraṇānivṛttikriyaḥ; tadviśeṣaś‍copasarga iti yuktamuktaṃ vastunoratyantabhede'bhede vā
viśeṣaṇāviśeṣyabhāva iti । yadāha—"<b>sambhave vyabhicāre ca viśeṣaṇamarthavadbhavati</b>" iti ।</p>
<p>nāpi vaiyadhikaraṇ‍yenākhyātamākhyātasya viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati, prādhānye'sati
asattvabhūtārthatvāt । iha rājñaḥ puruṣa iti bharaṇādikriyānimitto vyatireko viśeṣa—
sambandhanam । na ca prādhānyasyaiva rājārthasyopajāyate; na ca tathākhyātārthasya prādhānyaṃ
sattvābhāve vā sambhavati । yatrāpi ca kriyāpadaṃ śrūyate mātuḥ smarati sarpiṣo jānīte iti
tatrāpi sā kriyā sādhyāsyetyanena rūpeṇāśrīyamāṇasattvabhūtasyāpradhānasya mātrāderarthasya
vyatireka upajāyate; śrūyamāṇakriyāviśeṣasambandhanimittaṃ bhavati । na caitadākhyātasyopapadyate,
sattvabhūtatvādeva nimittānirdeś‍yatayāsyeti vyapadeśābhāvāt । yatkhalu pariniṣṭhitasvabhāvamasya
tasyeti sarvanāmapratyavamarśayogyaṃ tadviśeṣaṇatayā k‍vacidupayujyate vā na vā ?
yatpunarātmanaivā'parisamāptarūpe tadviparītaṃ, tatkathamivānyasya viśeṣaṇatvaṃ yāyāt ?</p>
<p>nanvidānīmeva prapacati, stokaṃ pacatītyasattvabhūtayoḥ praśabdastokaśabdayo—
rviśeṣaṇatvamuktam । naivam; anyathā tadupapatteḥ, upasargāṇāṃ kriyāviśeṣaṇānāṃ vā
sattvabhūtānāmapyananyaviṣayatvenaiva kriyāṃ prati guṇabhāvo bhavati । tathā hi—yo'sau kriyābhūto
dharmaḥ prārambhādiḥ; taṃ kriyārthamiva kriyānupraviṣṭamasatvabhaūtamabhidadhat praśabdo'bhivyañjayati ।
yadi vā yathākṣinikocādayo'bhidadhata evārthān pradarśayanti, evaṃ kriyāsthān, prārambhādīnana—
bhidadhata eva prādayo'vadyotayanti । dṛś‍yate anadhīyamānasyāpyarthasyātmasthasyāvadyotanaṃ,
yathā dāṇḍā krīḍeti; 'tadasyāṃ praharaṇamiti krīḍāyāṃ ṇo' (4.2. 57) vihitaḥ krīḍāmabruvan
praharaṇatvaṃ daṇḍatvamavadyotayati । tasmāt prapacatītyatra pacimeva saṃdigdhaṃ viśeṣa eva
sthāpayannasattvārtho'pi praśabdo viśeṣaṇatvaṃ labhate । evaṃ stokaśabdo'pi kriyābhūtaṃ
dharmapakarṣādikaṃ kriyārthamiva asattvabhūtaṃ kriyānupraviṣṭamabhidadhānaḥ kriyānurodhādevā—
sattvabhāvamāpannaḥ kriyāviśeṣaṇatvaṃ bhajate ।</p>

<pb n="171"/>
<p>na caivamākhyātāntarasthaṃ viśeṣaṇamākhyātamabhivyañjayitumabhidhātuṃ vā śaknoti,
dvayorapi prādhānyena parasparānapekṣatvāt । bhavatu copasargāderasattvārthasyāpi nīlotpalādivadeva
sāmānādhikaraṇyena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ; vaiyadhikaraṇye tu vyatirekāpekṣāyāṃ
kathamivaitadbhavati ? na hi aparinippannatvenātmalābha eva kṣīṇasyāparopakāriṇaḥ karaṇādayo
vyatirekā yujyante । ato vaiyadhikaraṇyenāpi na tiṅantayorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvassambandho
bhavati । sādhyasādhanabhāvo'pi nopapadyate, sa hi kriyayoḥ kartṛtve karmatve vā syāt;
sādhyaṃ hi vastūtpadyamānatvena kartā karma ceti । na caitadubhayamapi kriyāyāḥ kriyāntaraṃ prati
yujyate । tiṅantena hi kriyātmotpattiṃ prati prayatamānakārakākāṅkṣāpi prakṛtyā prayogeṣu
viniveśitasvarūpā'bhidhīyate । ato'pratibdhātmarūpatvena kriyāyāssādhanaparavaśatvena
tadavaruddhatvāditareṇa kriyātmanā sambandhasattvenāsyāḥ kartṛrūpatā karmarūpatā vā sambhavati,
yataḥ pariniṣpannarūpasyātmalābhanirapekṣasya siddhātmanassādhanābhāvo ghaṭate, na
tūktaviparītātmana iti । kriyāyāś‍cāyameva svabhāvaḥ, yaduta sādhanādhīnatvena
sādhyasvabhāvāyāḥ pratītiḥ । yā ca sādhyasvabhāvā sā kathamivānyasmin sādhye sādhanabhāvaṃ
gacchet, yena kartrītyucyate ? yā ca sādhanādhīnatvena sādhyasvabhāvā sā kathamiva kriyā
sādhyeta, yena karmetyucyate ? yadi ca syāt pariniṣpannarūpadravyavadevedaṃtayā nirdiśyeta । na
ca nirdiśyate, ato'nidantayā nirdeśādapi na sādhanam । avasthārūpaś‍ca sādhanadharmo
vyāpāraśabdavācyaḥ kriyā । sā kathamivātmasiddhaye tathābivadhameva dharmāntaramapekṣeta ?
anapekṣitayoś‍ca kathamiva mithassambandhopapattiḥ ?</p>
<p>na ca kriyāyāḥ kimapi tadavaśiṣyate yatsādhanairasādhitaṃ kriyāntarasya sādhyaṃ bhaviṣyati ।
tadevamitaretarānāyattarūpayorasambandha eva kriyayoḥ । na ca nirvartamānalabdhātmakaṃ vastu
