taṇḍulānāvapatīti । evaṃ kārakāntaravyāpāreṣvapi draṣṭavyam ।</p>
<p>nanu devadattāderbhautiko vyāpāraḥ ātmavyāpārapūrvako bhavitumarhati ।</p>
<p>naitadevam, na hyātmano vyāpāraḥ kaś‍cidasti, icchādveṣapūrvakaprayat‍naśādeva sa
bhautikavyāpārakāraṇatāṃ pratipadyate । calatīti pratītivat pacatīti pratītirapi pratyakṣa—
kriyālambanaiveti ।</p>
<p>atrānumeyakriyāvādinassamādadhate—</p>
<p>astu nāma devadattādikārakanikaraparispandasamudāyaḥ kriyā । kintu pacatītyādā—
vadhiśrayaṇāvacapanavicaṭanādīnāṃ samudāyaṃ kimāyuṣmān kriyeti manyate ।</p>
<p>omiti brumaḥ ।</p>
<p>kimartham̐ sarvāṇyeveti ?</p>

<pb n="209"/>
<p>pṛcchāmi cāyuṣmantaṃ kimadhiśrayaṇādayaḥ kriyāvyapadeśamekaśo vā lakṣeran ? na
tāvadekaśaḥ, kramarūpābhāvāt । etacca tatkriyāyāḥ kriyātvaṃ yaduta sādhenaissādhyamānatā
kramarūpopādānaṃ ca । na caikasya kramassaṃbhavati, avaś‍yābhidheyaś‍cetadupāttakramassādhya—
tayā'bhidhīyamānapadārthaḥ kriyeti । anyathā hi pākadīnāmupasaṃhṛtakramāṇāmapi kriyātvaprasaṅgaḥ ।
te hi paryavasitāḥ svarūpatayopasaṃhṛtakramā eva svaśabdairabhidhīyante । teṣāṃ pūrvāparībhāvavirahānna
kriyātvam । ata eva te sādhanabhāvena taiśśabdairupādīyante, na sādhyabhāvena । pākaṃ karotītyādau
hi sādhanaviśeṣanibandhanā vibhaktirupalabhyate, dvitīyānirvṛttirūpaṃ ca sādhananamupapadyate ।</p>
<p>nanvevam asti vidyate tiṣṭhatītyādīnāmapi na kriyātvaṃ prasajet, yāvatā nehāpi
krama upalabhyate ।</p>
<p>naivam, atrāpi kramasya pratīyamānatvāt । tathā hi—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kālānupāti yadrūpaṃ tadastītyapadiśyate ।</l>
<l>paritastu paricchinnaṃ bhāva ityeva kathyate ॥ 23 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.8.12)
<p>evaṃ vidyate tiṣṭhatītyatrāpi draṣṭavyam; kālādhikāre caitad viśeṣato varṇayiṣyāmaḥ ।
nāpi kṣaṇaśaḥ kramajanmatā adhiśrayaṇādīnām, utpannamātrapradhvaṃsitvād, ayaugapadye
samūhānupapatteḥ । tadabhāve ca kathamiva abhinneṣu bhinnaśabdo vartatāṃ pacatīti ।</p>
<p>ucyate—kramopajātāvayavaparicchedaprāpta—saṃskārāntaṃ yadā sakalaṃ kriyākalāpatteḥ
(kalāpaṃ) kalayati, tadā pratyayaḥ parivarti samudāya ekakāryatvādapihitabhedaḥ pacatītyā—
diśabdavyapadeśanimittaṃ bhavati । tathā odanādikāryakriyākalāpastirodhāya bhedamabhedena
vyapadiś‍yate । pacatīti phalasya ca sakasakriyāvayavasādhyatvāt sādhanabhāvenāpi sa
evāpekṣyate । tadananta(tadanta ?)rgatāstvadhiśrayaṇādayaḥ pratyekaṃ phalamabhinirvartayitumaparyāp‍tāḥ
paryāp‍tasya samudāyasya rūpasampādanārthatvāt samudāyaṃ prati guṇabhūtā vijñāyante । tadāha—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>guṇabhūtairavayavaissamūhaḥ kramajanmanām ।</l>
<l>buddhyā prakalpitābhedaḥ kriyeti vyapadiś‍yate ॥ 24 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.8.4)
<p>yadyevaṃ pacatīti vyapadeśo nopapadyate, dhātūpādānā kriyā yadā nātītā na cānāgatā,
tadā vartamānakālavihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prayujyate । na cāsya kriyāpratānasyeyaṃ vyavasthā saṃbhavati,
adhiśrayaṇādīnāṃ pūrvāparībhāvaniyamāt । na caikaḥ kriyābhāgaḥ pacatiśabdanibandhanaṃ,
śabdaśaktisvabhāvāt । na hyupāttakriyāvayavārthapratyāyakaśśabdo yathābhūtamarthaṃ pratyāyayati;

<pb n="210"/>
tataś‍ca kathamekasya vartamānakālatāṃ pratyayo'nurudhyeta ?</p>
<p>naitadasti; śabdaśaktayo hi bhinnarūpāmabhinnāmarthavyaktimupāttabhedāṃ darśayanti; yataḥ
pūrvāparībhūtāvayavasamudāyāvagraharūpā buddhiryathā'vagṛhītaṃ samudāyākāramavayaveṣu pratyasyati;
te'vayavāḥ pratyayena samāropitasamudāyarūpāḥ pacatiśabdavācyāssantaḥ svarūpasannidhānāt
taṃvartamānādivyapadeśamanubhūya pratyayaviśoṣotpattinimittaṃ bhavanti । tathā hi—abhisamīhitaphaḻaḥ
kriyāyāṃ phalopajananasādhanabhūtāyāṃ pravartamānaḥ pumān samudāyamevādhāya cetasi
tāsvavayavakriyāsu pravartate । tato hyasya samudāyābhisandhisamutthāpitāḥ kriyābhāgāḥ
samudāyasaṃpādanārthatvāt samudāyarūpeṇādhyavasīyante । tathādhyavasitakriyārūpaistu tasya
kriyākṣaṇasya sannidhānād‌vartamānakālavihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prayujyate pacatīti । atra cotpannāmātra—
pradhvaṃsitvāt sarve kriyāvayavā vartamānā ca saṃbhavantīti sphuṭamevāvasīyate; kintu pratyekaṃ
samudāyiṣu samudāyādhyāsena prayujyate pacatīti । adhiśrayaṇādyavayavakriyāsamudāyavacaneṣu
pacādiṣu yasminnavayave'dhyāropya samudāyo'dhiśrayaṇādiḥ vilkittyantaḥ pratyāyyate,
tatkālapratyayo'nuvartate । tatra tadā vartamānāvayave samudāyādhyāsastadā pacatīti bhavati ।
yadā tu bhūtabhaviṣyayossamūhāropaṇe tadā'pākṣīt pakṣyatīti । yaduktam—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>samūhassa tathābhūtaḥ pratibhedaṃ samūhiṣu ।</l>
<l>samāpyate tato bhede kālabhedasya saṃbhavaḥ ॥ 25 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.8.5)
<p>samudāyasya ca samudāyiṣu pratyekaparisamāp‍tau nidarśanaṃ grāmo dagdhaḥ, paṭo dagdha
iti । yadi hyekasminnaṃśe samudāyo na syāt, pāṇimātrasyāṅgulimātrasya vā caṇḍālatvavirahāt
caṇḍālapāṇyaṅgulisparśe naivocyeta caṇḍālaḥ spṛṣṭa iti, na cāṅgavikāreṇāṅgino
vikṛtirlakṣyate, akṣṇā kāṇa iti ।</p>
<p>taduktam 'avayave hi spṛṣṭe samudāyo'pi spṛṣṭo bhavati; avayave hi kṛtaṃ liṅgaṃ
samudāyasyāpi viśeṣakaṃ bhavati (mabhā. 1.3.62); yaś‍ca samudāyaḥ so'vayavānna vyabhicarita ।
tasya viśeṣakaṃ yathā 'gossak‍thani kaṇṭhe'pi kṛtaṃ liṅgaṃ goreva viśeṣakaṃ na gomaṇḍalasya'
iti । tadevamukte kimuktaṃ bhavati upāttakramādhiśrayaṇādivik‍lityantānāmavavānāṃ samudāyaḥ
pacatikriyeti ? tarhi ciraṃ jīvatu bhavān; bhavataiva pratijñātā naiva kriyā pratyakṣeti ।
tasmādupāttakriyā kramāḥ kriyāvayavāḥ; tadasya kriyāsaṅghātasya kecidavayavā nivṛttāḥ,
kecidanivṛttāḥ, kaś‍cideva pratyupasthitaḥ । pratyupasthitaviṣayāḥ cakṣurādayaḥ; tato'tha

<pb n="211"/>
kriyākalāpāḥ pratyakṣayitum, cakṣurādibhiranabhisaṃbandhāt; na vyatītānāgatarūpasyāsataḥ
kriyāvayavasya sadasadanupātinā karaṇagrāmeṇa saṃbandhaḥ, na vā'nadhigatendriyasaṃbandhasya padārthasya
darśanaparicchedyatā saṃbhavati । taduktam—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kramāt sadasatāṃ teṣāmātmāno na samūhinām ।</l>
<l>sad‌vastuviṣayairyānti saṃbandhaṃ cakṣurādibhiḥ ॥ 26 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.8.6)
<p>darśanābhimānaḥ kathamiti cet, yathā gauraśva ityevamādiṣu padeṣu gakārādayo varṇabhāgāḥ
kramarūpānuvidhāyino vyaktāvupajane vā prāptayaugapadyāḥ saṅghātarūpeṇa na pāryante'vadhārayitum
indriyāyattayā buddhyā, tasyāḥ pratyupasthitākṣarāvasāyaśakteḥ pūrvottarabhāgayorasaṃsparśāt ।
samabhihitāvayavaparicchedaprāpitātiśayāstu buddhayaḥ svānurūpaṃ saṃskāraparamparāyāmante
samālocitaviśeṣavarṇabhāgāmupajanayanti buddhiṃ tasyāmuttīrṇamiva tatpadaṃ samudāyātmanā
nirūpyate । tadāha—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>yathā gauriti saṅghātassarvo nendriyagocaraḥ ।</l>
<l>bhāgaśastūlapalabdhasya buddhau rūpaṃ nirūpyate ॥ 27 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.8.7)
<p>kālpanikastu yugapad‌grahaṇābhimānaḥ pratyakṣabhramanibandhanam । yathā'lātasya
āviddhaviṣvaggate deśe nairantaryeṃṇa parivṛttirūpamavirāmeṇāvadhārayannana(vasitakālabhedo
yugapatsakaladeśavyāpi a) paricchindannadhyavasyati cakramiti; yathā kramavantaḥ kriyābhāgāḥ
krameṇaivāvasitā laghutaraṃ parivartitvādanavadhṛtakālabhedairyugapadevādhyavasīyante; yathādhyavasāyaṃ
ca darśanābhimānamutpādayantaḥ pratyakṣavyavahāraṃ vartayanti । yaduktam—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>indriyairanyathāprāptau bhedāṃśopanipātibhiḥ ।</l>
<l>alātacakravad rūpaṃ kriyāṇāṃ parivartate ॥ 28 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.8.9)
<p>(<b>kriyāyā apratyakṣatvam</b>)</p>
<p><b>apratyakṣaiva tu kriyā</b> । yadāha mahābhāṣyakāraḥ—kriyā nāmeyamatyantāparidṛṣṭā aśak‍yā
piṇḍībhūtā nidarśayituṃ, yathā garbho nirluṭhitaḥ sā'sāvanumānagamyeti । nanu pratyakṣāpravṛttau
saṃbandhagrahaṇābhāvāt kathaṃ kriyāviṣaye'numānaṃ pravartate ?</p>
<p>naiṣa doṣaḥ; dhātuvācyasya samūhasya yugapadasannidhānādapratyakṣatvam; ekaikasya tu
kṣaṇasya pratyakṣatve buddhyā saṅkalayya pacatīti prayujyate; yadāpyekasmin kṣaṇe pacatīti
prayogastadā tatra samūhāropaṇam । yadāha—</p>

<pb n="212"/>
<b><lg>
<l>pūrvottarairyadā bhāgaissamavasthāpitakramaḥ ।</l>
<l>ekasso'pyasadadhyāsādākhyātairabhidhīyate ॥ 29 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.8.11)
<b><lg>
<l>yaś‍cāpakarṣaparyantamanuprāptaḥ pratīyate ।</l>
<l>tatraikasmin kriyāśabdaḥ kevale na prayujyate ॥ 30 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.8.10)
<p>na tvevam; indrayairabhisaṃbandhāt sarūpasannidhānāya vartamānavyapadeśāc‍ca kathamapratyakṣatvaṃ
kriyāyāḥ ?</p>
<p>ucyate; neha vastvartho nirūpyate, api tu śabdārthaḥ tatra cānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ yaḥ
prakṛtyartho'vasthāpyate, yā kriyāvacanasya dhātusaṃjñā, nāsau śak‍yā sākṣādupalabdhum । tatra hi
ācāryāṇāṃ matabhedaḥ ।</p>
<p>eke manyante— adhiśrayaṇādīnāṃ samudāyo buddhyā nigṛhītaḥ, ekatvena sa pacatītyādīnāṃ
vācya iti । na ca samudāyaṃ pacatīti prayuñjānaḥ pratyekamadhiśrayaṇādiṣu pratyasyati, pratyayāś‍ca
na samudāya ityevaṃrūpaṃ pratyasyanti । nāpi 'ayaṃ ca ayaṃ ca' iti saṃbandhino buddhyāvagṛh‍ṇāti ।
kiṃ tarhyāśritakramarūpamiva pratyekamavayaveṣu pratyasya pacatīti prayuṅkte, tadā tasyaiva
samīhitaṃ bhavati, adhiśrayaṇādyānupūrvyā phalamodanādi nirvartayitavyamiti । yathā
prathamakriyāsaṃbhāge pacirityevādhyavasyati nādhiśrayaṇamiti । itarathā hyevaṃ prayogaḥ
tasyādhiśrayatīti; yadā cādhiśrayaṇe nirvṛtte nāgate vā bhūtabhaviṣyatkālābhidhāyinaṃ śabdaṃ
prayuṅkte, tadā samudāyarūpapratyāsenaiva tamavayavabuddhyā nigṛhya prayuṅkte apākṣīt, pakṣyatīti ।
na tvadhiśrayaṇarūpeṇa, anyathā hyevaṃ prayogassyāt adhyaśiśrayat, adhiśrayiṣyatīti ।
evamāvapane vicaṭane vā samūhini samudāyarūpapratyāsādeva dhātutāvyapadeśāt, pacatyapākṣīt
pakṣyati । evaṃbhūtaś‍cārthātmā'dhikṛtaḥ sādhanatantrasādhyāvasthaḥ śabdena prakrānto'śak‍ya
upalabdhum; yathā gauriti gakāraukāravisarjanīyā evopalabhyante, samudāyastu buddhinirgrāhya
eva, tathā pacatītyādiṣvevādhiśrayatītyādiṣu avayavā eva hastaprasaraṇasthālī—
vinyāsādayo'śabdavācyā, apratyakṣā eva । yāvadapakarṣaparyantaprāp‍tā kriyeti sāpi nāpratyaste
kramarūpe samudāye ākhyātaśabdenābhidhīyate । apakarṣaparyantā cet kramarūpeṇa na avagṛh‍ṇāditi
avācaka evākhyātaśabdaḥ । yathā ś‍lokaśabdaṃ prayuñjānaṃ ādyaṃ padaṃ padarūpeṇāvagṛh‍ṇāti na
tadā ślokassamuc‍cāryata iti prayuṅkte yadā vāśritottaraprabandhamavagṛh‍ṇāti tadā ślokaśabdaṃ
prayuṅ‌kte । evaṃ kṛtvā <b>nirukte</b>'pyuktaṃ 'pūrvāparībhūtaṃ bhāvamākhyātenācaṣṭa' iti ।</p>

<pb n="213"/>
<p>anyeṣāṃ darśanaṃ(vāpa. 3 kriyā) yad vicaṭanaṃ taṇḍulāvayavānāṃ taṇḍulāvayavebhyo vibhāgaḥ,
yadanantaraṃ mārdavādayo niṣpadyante, tadyadā'dhiśrayaṇādiṣu pratyastarūpaṃ bhavati tadā''khyātenā—
bhidhīyate । tatra yadupalabhyate'dhiśrayaṇaṃ tadaśabdavācyam; kārakanirākāṅkṣaṃ yacchabdenābhidhīyate
tadaniṣpannaṃ sādhanatantramapratyakṣam; niṣpannāniṣpannayoś‍caikātmyāpattau pacatyādiśabdaprayogaḥ । sa
cāyamevaṃrūpo'rthātmā guṇakriyāṇāṃ paurvāparyātmanāṃ na pūrvo na paraś‍ca pūrvāparībhūto vyapadiś‍yate ।</p>
<p>anye tu vicaṭanamevādhiśrayaṇādirūpaṃ pratipannāḥ, na rūpaśūnyānadhiśrayaṇādīn
apratyastavicaṭanarūpān; āhuś‍ca kaḥ punaḥ paceḥ pradhānārthaḥ? yā'sau taṇḍulānāṃ vik‍littiḥ ।
(mabhā. 3.1.26) ।</p>
<p>athavā yadabhisaṃdhipūrvakaṃ preṣaṇamadhyeṣaṇaṃ vā sa sarvaḥ pacyartha iti । sarvasminnapi
darśane yathābhūtākhyātaśabdena kriyā prakramyate, tathābhūtāyāḥ siddhamapratyakṣatvamiti phalenaiva
samādhigamo yuktaḥ । sa kathamiti cet, iha sarveṣu sādhaneṣu sannihiteṣu kadācit pacatītyetad
bhavati, kadācinna bhavati, yasminnimitte sannihite pacatītyetad, bhavati sā nūnaṃ kriyā,
'yathā devadatta iha bhūtvā pāṭaliputre bhavati, sā nūnaṃ kriyā' iti (mabhā. 1. 3. 1) ।
dvitīyahetuśak‍tyā so'pyartha iti cennaivam; iha kasyacideṣā buddhiḥ syāt; asatyevāsminnimitte
pacatyādibuddhayaḥ prabartante, yathā mṛgatṛṣṇikādiṣviti tadanena nirvartayati (vāpa. 3 kriyā) ।
mṛgatṛṣṇikādibhyo hi tṛp‍timalāpakarṣaṇagharmāpanodanādi na phalaṃ nirvartate । asarvagatayorhi
devaṃdattapāṭaliputrayorgamanakriyāntaranairantaryeṇāvasthānarūpaṃ phalamupalabhyate ।</p>
<p>athavā etadayaṃ pratipadyeta, śaktikṛtāḥ pacatyādayo viśeṣoḥ sapratyayāś‍ca syuḥ, na
kriyākṛtā iti, tadanena nirvartayati, yayā devadatta iha bhūtvā pāṭaliputre bhavati sā nūnaṃ
kriyeti । yadi hyete śaktikṛtāssyuḥ śak‍tyanantarameva pāṭaliputreṇa prāptiḥ syāt । na ca
bhavati, tasmād bhavitavyaṃ śaktikṛtenānyena dharmeṇa, yasya phalaṃ deśāntaraprāptiriti ।</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kriyāmanye tu manyante k‍vacidapyanapāśritām ।</l>
<l>sādhanekārthakāritve pravṛttimanapāyinīm ॥ 31 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.8.37)
<b><lg>
<l>sāmānyabhūtā dhātvarthaissā punaḥ pravibhajyate ।</l>
<l>tato vyāpārarūpeṇa sādhye paryavatiṣṭhate ॥ 32 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.8.38)
<b><lg>
<l>prakṛtissādhanānāṃ sā prathamaṃ tac‍ca kārakam ।</l>
<l>śaktirekādhikaraṇe strotovadapakarṣati ॥ 33 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.8.39)

<pb n="214"/>
<b><lg>
<l>apūrvaṃ kālaśaktiṃ vā kriyāṃ vā kālameva vā ।</l>
<l>tamevaṃlakṣaṇaṃ bhāvaṃ kecidāhuḥ kathañcana ॥ 34 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.7.34)
<p>sā tu yathā asti bhavati karotītyādyacchede bhedādabhinnāpi bhinneva prakāśate, tathā
kramarūpopādānānnityameva kālasaṃbandhopādhibhūta—bhūta—bhaviṣyadādivyapadeśamāsādayati ॥</p>
<p>(<b>2. kālaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>kaḥ punarayaṃ <b>kālo</b> nāma ?</p>
<p><b>kriyaiva, kriyāntarāvadhṛtaparimāṇavyavacchinnā vā kriyāparicchedahetuḥ kālaḥ ।</b></p>
<p>kathaṃ punaḥ kriyayaiva kriyāparicchitti ?</p>
<p>śrūyatām iha tu kriyāḥ kāś‍citkriyāntaraiḥ kaiś‍cid buddhyaiva parimīyante । yathā
arkādīnāṃ gatayaḥ, yathā ca godohādayaḥ, yathā'smadādivyāpārāḥ, yathā puruṣāyuṣādayasta—
trāvadhṛtaparimāṇābhiritarāḥ paricchidyante; yathā divisaṃ gacchati, varṣaśataṃ jīva, odanapākamāste,
godāhaṃ svapiti; tatra paricchedakālavyavahāraṃ vartayanti; yathā 'saviturudayādirastamayaparyantaḥ
kriyāprabandho divasaḥ, sa evāstamayādiḥ punarudayāvasāno niśā, sarvarkṣāṇāṃ sakṛtparivṛtti—
rahorātraḥ, kālabhirindorāpyāyanaṃ parikṣayo vā pakṣaḥ, candrasya sakalanakṣatrātikramo māsaḥ,
sūryācandramasorgati vibhāgādekāhorātrakṣayaḥ ṛtuḥ, raverdakṣiṇata uttarato vā gamanamayanam,
bṛhaspaterekārāśya tikramassaṃvatsara iti । tena coktānuktakriyayā kālo'vacchidyate । yathā
divā divasaḥ, divaso niśā cāhorātraḥ, pañcadaśāhorātraḥ pakṣaḥ, pakṣadvayaṃ māsaḥ, māsadvayamṛtuḥ,
ṛtutrayamayanaṃ, ayanadvayaṃ saṃvatsaraḥ, pañca saṃvatsarā yugam, yugāni dvādaśa kalpaḥ, kalpaśatāni
dvādaśa mahākalpaḥ, mahākalpaṣaṣṭiś‍caturyugam, caturyugāni dvisaptatirmanvantaram, manvantarāṇi
caturdaśa brahmadivasaḥ, tāvatyeva tanniśā pralayaḥ, tanmānena varṣaśatānte brahmaṇo'pavargo
mahāpralayaḥ । yathā vā sūryasya bhagaṇabhogo varṣaṃ, rāśibhogo māsaḥ, māsatriṃśāṃśo dinaṃ,
dinaṣaṣṭyaṃśaḥ kalā, kalāṣaṣṭyaṃśo vikalā, vikalāṣaṣṭyaṃśaḥ tatpareti । tatra 'yathā
rajatādyadhikaraṇagauravamavadhṛtaparimāṇadravyāntarasaṃbandhasamutkīrṇarekhastulādaṇḍaḥ rekhāsūtrāvasthānaḥ
palaśaḥ karṣaśo bhāgaśo paricchinatti, tathā kalādivyavasthānavaśena bhāgaśaḥ kālāntaraṃ
paricchinatti । parimāṇaṃ parimimītekriyāniyamaiḥ kālāvacchedaniyamaḥ, yathā paramāṇoḥ
svāvaṣṭabdhapradeśa kramalakṣaṇaḥ kālaḥ kṣaṇaḥ, pakṣmasaṃpāto nimeṣaḥ, iyatkṣaṇā iyannimeṣā vā
nāḍikā, dvināḍiko muhūrtaḥ, pādonacaturmuhūrto yāmaḥ, yāmāṣṭakamahorātra iti । buddhyavacchedena

<pb n="215"/>
vā kālaparicchedaḥ, yathā arkasya udayāvidūratā pratyūṣaḥ, (virāṭ)puruṣabhrūpradeśagatā dīrghatā
pūrvāh‍ṇaḥ, tapamā madhyāhnaḥ, parāvṛtya darśanamaparāh‍ṇaḥ, astamayāsannatābhisandhiḥ sandhyeti ।
rātreḥ prārambho niśāmukham, niśāmukhād rātresturyāṃśaḥ pradoṣaḥ, ardharātramubhayato niśāṣṭamo
niśīthaḥ, niśīthāt tāvanmātramapararātraḥ, parato niśāvaśeṣaḥ prabhāvamiti kriyāviśeṣaiḥ
kālaviśeṣāvagamaḥ । tathā hi—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>śayāne śorate rātrau divā jāgrati jāgrati ।</l>
<l>jagatpradīpe padmāni kalatrāṇīva bhartari ॥ 35 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>ratāntakālakāntastrīdṛgvilāsaikasākṣiṇī ।</l>
<l>niśā nīlotpalānīke nimīlati nimīlati ॥ 36 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>cañcvagracumbitā''tāmracūtāṅ‌kurakadambakaiḥ ।</l>
<l>kathyate kokilaireva madhurmadhurakūjitaiḥ ॥ 37 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>divākarakarālātapatānirdagdhavīrudhaḥ ।</l>
<l>mārgāssamallikāmodā bhāvigrīṣmasya śaṃsinaḥ ॥ 38 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>śikhaṇḍimaṇḍalārabdhacaṇḍatāṇḍavaḍambaraiḥ ।</l>
<l>prāvṛḍākhyāyate meghamedurairmedinīdharai ॥ 39 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>mauktikākāravistāri tārānikaracitritam ।</l>
<l>śarat piśunatāṃ yāti yāmunāmbhonibhaṃ nabhaḥ ॥ 40 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>āyāmiyāminībhogasaphalābhogavibhramāḥ ।</l>
<l>hemantamabhinandanti soṣmāṇastaruṇīstanāḥ ॥ 41 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>āskandana—dalatkundakalikotkaradanturāḥ ।</l>
<l>vadanti śiśiraṃ vātāstuṣārakaṇakarkaśāḥ ॥ 42 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>bālyakaumārayauvanādayo maugdhyamādhyaprāgalbhyādayaś‍ca kriyāviśeṣavyaṅgyāḥ
kālaviśeṣā eva । vayo hi dehināṃ vatsarādibhiḥ kālabhedaḥ; vayonimittāś‍ca teṣāṃ
maugdhyādaya iti । ucyate—</p>
﻿
<pb n="216"/>
<b><lg>
<l>uttālālakabhañjanāni kabarībhāreṣu śikṣāraso
dantānāṃ parikarma nīvinahanaṃ bhrūlāsyayogyāgrahaḥ ।</l>
<l>tiryaglocanaval‍gitāni vacasāṃ chekoktisaṅkrāntayaḥ
strīṇāṃ mlāyati śaiśave pratikalaṃ ko'pyeṣa kelikramaḥ ॥ 43 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(bārā. 3.23)</p>
<p>vyasanotsavanityanaimittikakṣaṇaprakīrṇacandrodayacandrāstamayaprabhṛtayaś‍ca kālavyapadeśa—
bhājo godohādivad veditavyāḥ । api ca</p>
<b><lg>
<l>parāva/para—cirakṣipra—kramotkrama—vibhāgavān ।</l>
<l>kālakriyāviśeṣābhivyaṅgyayarītiḥ pratīyatām ॥ 44 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>tathā hi— utpattyādikriyāṇāṃ prathamatve paraḥ; yatheyaṃ bālā jyeṣ‍ṭhā ca; vaiparītye
punaraparaḥ, yathaiṣā pragalbhā kaniṣ‍ṭhā ca । sādhanānāṃ mandasaṃpātitve ciraḥ, yathā vatsyati
kālaḥ pakṣyate tālaḥ, bhokṣyate tālaphalam; tadanyathātve kṣipraḥ, yathodbhinnaś‍ca vaṃśakarīraḥ
śirāgataś‍ca pramāṇam । kriyāṇāmapaurvāparye yugapat, yathā kapitthayoḥ pratibhedaḥ, meṣayorabhighātaḥ ।
paurvāparye tvayugapat, yathā divasāgrato niśā, niśāgrato divasa iti । seyaṃ vastunaśśaktiḥ
pākaprabhavā svābhāvikī kriyaiva; kriyāparicchedahetuḥ kālaḥ; kriyāś‍ca bhūtā bhaviṣyanti,	
vartamānāḥ avyaktāś‍ca । tatra vyatipatitasādhanabhūtā yathā'pākṣīditi; anāgatā'sannihita—
sādhanā ca bhaviṣyati yathā pakṣyatīti; āvāp‍tā apracyutasvarūpā vartamānā yathā pacatīti;
anirdhāritaviśeṣā avyaktā yathā pacedayamiti । tannibandhanaśca loke adya, śvaḥ, paraśvaḥ,
paredyuḥ, anyedyuḥ, ubhayedyuḥ, idānīm, etarhi, aiṣamaḥ, parūt, parāri, śaśvat, svaḥ, bhūḥ,
sadyuḥ, purā, ha, sma, yāvat, tadā, yadā, anyadā, ekadā, sadeti vyavahāraḥ luṅādīnāṃ
bhūtādiṣu smaraṇamiti ।</p>
<p>anye punaḥ kriyāvyatiriktamanudayāstamayamabhinnamanavacchinnadeśaṃ ca dravyaṃ
pṛthagvidhānekaśaktiśatasahastrapākāyatanaṃ jagatpravṛttiniyamakāraṇaṃ kriyāparicchedahetumadṛṣ‍ṭādyapekṣaṃ
kālamācakṣate । sa ca kriyāparicchedyaḥ kileti kecit; āhuś‍ca "nityo vyāpī
saṃpratibhūtabhaviṣyatkriyāsamāveśāt ākāśakalpa eko dravyātmā bhidyate kālaḥ ॥"
tac‍cāsamīcīnameveti brūmaḥ । kriyā hi sādhyatvāt sādhanamevāpekṣate । na ca kriyāviśiṣ‍ṭasyāpi
dravyātmanaḥ kālakārakeṇa saṃbandho ghaṭate, dvayorapi siddhatvāt । tasmād dravyarūpe kriyārūpe

vā kālaḥ kriyāmeva viśeṣayati । sā ca tadviśiṣ‍ṭā kārakaviśeṣamupatiṣṭhate । yadāha—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>guṇaḥ kṛtātmasaṃskāraḥ pradhānaṃ pratipadyate ।</l>
<l>pradhānasyopakāritve tathā bhūyasi vartate ॥ 45 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>kalābhiḥ pṛthagarthābhiḥ pravibhaktaṃ svabhāvataḥ ।</l>
<l>kecid‍buddhyanusaṃdhānalakṣaṇaṃ taṃ pracakṣate ॥ 46 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa.3.9.57)
<b><lg>
<l>sattālakṣaṇamanye tu kṣaṇarūpaṃ tathā'pare ।</l>
<l>devatāvastuśak‍tyātmasvarūpamapare viduḥ ॥ 47 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>tamasya lokayantrasya sūtradhāraṃ pracakṣate ।</l>
<l>pratibandhābhyanujñābhyāṃ tena viśvaṃ vibhajyate ॥ 48 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>pratibaddhāś‍ca yāstena citrā viśvasya śak‍tayaḥ ।</l>
<l>tāssa evānujānāti yathā tantraśakuntikāḥ ॥ 49 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa.3.9.15)
<b><lg>
<l>pratibandhābhyanujñābhyāṃ vṛttiryā tasya śāśvatī ।</l>
<l>tayā vibhajyamāno'sau labhate kramarūpatām ॥ 50 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa. 3.9.70)
<b><lg>
<l>tṛṇarājasya yā vṛddhistavacisārasya va dadhat ।</l>
<l>cirakṣiprādibhede ca kālatattvaṃ vikalpate ॥ 51 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>vyatikrame'pi mātrāṇāṃ na tasyāsti vyatikramaḥ ।</l>
<l>na gantṛgatibhedena mārgabhedo'sti kaś‍cana ॥ 52 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa.3.9.74)
<b><lg>
<l>dūrāntikavyavasthānamadhvādi karaṇaṃ yathā ।</l>
<l>cirakṣipravyavasthānaṃ kālo'dhikaraṇaṃ tathā ॥ 53 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa.3.9.47)
<b><lg>
<l>kriyopādhissa yā bhūtabhaviṣyad‍vartamānatāḥ ।</l>
<l>parāvaravibhāgārthe sa śaktīḥ pratipadyate ॥ 54 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa.3.9.37)
<b><lg>
<l>bhūtānāṃ caiva yad rūpaṃ rūpaṃ yad bhāvināmapi ।</l>
<l>sudurdarśa ivādarśe kāla evopalabhyate ॥ 55 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
﻿
<pb n="218"/>
<b><lg>
<l>kriyābhedād yathaikasmiṃstakṣādyākhyā pravartate ।</l>
<l>kriyābhedāt tathaikasmin nṛtvākhyā copajāyate ॥ 56 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa. 3.9.32)
<b><lg>
<l>viśiṣ‍ṭamavadhiṃ taṃ tamupādāyāvakalpate ।</l>
<l>kālaḥ kālavidāmekaḥ kalādipravibhaktaye ॥ 57 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa. 3.9.68)
<b><lg>
<l>tṛṇaparṇalatādīni yathā stroto'vakarṣati ।</l>
<l>pravartayati kālo'pi mātrā mātrāvatāṃ tathā ॥ 58 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa. 3.9.41)
<b><lg>
<l>prārambhāveśaniṣ‍ṭhāsu sthitivipratipattiṣu ।</l>
<l>sāmyotkarṣāpakarṣeṣu nimittaṃ kāla iṣyate ॥ 59 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>saṃsargiṇāṃ tu ye bhedā viśeṣāstasya te matāḥ ।</l>
<l>saṃbhinnastairvyavasthānāṃ kālo bhedāya kalpate ॥ 60 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa. 3.9.8)
<b><lg>
<l>prativyavasthaṃ kālasya vyāpāro'tra vyavasthitaḥ ।</l>
<l>kālo vā viśvarūpātmā vyāpāra iti kathyate ॥ 61 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa. 3.9.12)
<b><lg>
<l>kriyāvacchedahetuṃ vā kriyāvacchedyameva vā ।</l>
<l>kālatmānamanāśritya vyavahartuṃ na śakyate ॥ 62 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>tasyāvyaktasvarūpasya vyavahāre kriyākṛtāḥ ।</l>
<l>bhūtādayo mahābhedā yān loko nātivartate ॥ 63 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa.3.9)
<p>ke punaste? yān bhūta upādhau (bhūtādyupādhau) luṅādiviṣayānudāhariṣyāmaḥ ॥</p>
<p>tadetad dravyātmanaḥ kriyātmano vā kriyāparicchedinaḥ kālasya svarūpamabhihitam ।</p>
<p>athāparamaparimeyātmano devatādirūpasya svaśaktinimittaviśvapravṛttiparicchedyasya tasya
paricchedino vā kriyāhetuśak‍tyāyatanabhūtaṃ dravyarūpapariṇataṃ vivṛttaṃ vā, yat samastavivṛtta—
saṃgrahānugrahādinityanaimittikādirūpaṃ svarūpamastiḥ tat purastāt pratipāditaṃ, agrataś‍ca
viśeṣataḥ pratipādayiṣyata iti neha pratanyate, saṃbandhāvacchedārthaṃ tu leśato'—
bhidhīyata iti । tatprabhedād dravyarūpo'pi kālaś‍caturdhā— <b>nityo, naimittikaḥ, svābhāviko,
vaiparāmārśika</b> iti । teṣu —</p>
﻿
<pb n="219"/>
<p><b>1. nityaḥ</b> śāśvatiko, vaikalpikaḥ naiyogikaś‍ca tridhā ।</p>
<p><b>2. naimittiko</b>'pi audyogikaḥ, aupabhogikaḥ prāyogikaś‍ceti trividhaḥ । evaṃ</p>
<p><b>3. svābhāviko</b>'pi āgantukaḥ, naisargikaḥ, sāṃsargika iti tridhā ।</p>
<p><b>4. vaiparāmārśiko</b>'pi saṅkīrṇaḥ, prakīrṇo, viprakīrṇa iti tridhaiva ।</p>
<p>(<b>1. nityaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>(<b>śāśvatikaḥ</b>) teṣu kṣaṇanimeṣanāḍikāmuhūrtapraharāhorātrasvarūpa<b>śśāśvatikaḥ</b> ।</p>
<p>ayaṃ hi śaśvatpravartamāno nāvadhiviśeṣamapekṣate । yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kṣaṇe nimeṣe nāṅyā vā muhūrte prahare'hni vā ।</l>
<l>gate tvameṣyasītyukte rūrodha pathikaṃ priyā ॥ 64 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>vaikalpikaḥ</b>) dinarātripakṣamāsartvayanarūpo <b>vaikalpikaḥ</b> ।</p>
<p>ayaṃ hi suryodayādiviśiṣ‍ṭamavadhimapekṣamāṇo vikalpāya prabhavati । yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>dināni rātrayaḥ pakṣamāsāvṛturathāyanam ।</l>
<l>jarā vai yadyadaṅgānāṃ tat tatpremṇo rasāyanam ॥ 65 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>naiyogikaḥ</b>) saṃvatsarayugakalpamanvantarapralayamahāpralayarūpo <b>naiyogikaḥ</b> ।</p>
<p>ayaṃ hi bṛhaspatinārāyaṇapuramathanabrahmaṇāṃ rāśyādipravṛttiśeṣaviśiṣ‍ṭamevāvadhimapekṣamāṇaḥ
prāṇino viśiṣ‍ṭāsu pravṛttiṣu niyuṅkte । yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>saṃvatsarairyugaiḥ kalpairmanubhiḥ pralayaiḥ kṣayaiḥ ।</l>
<l>hīyate hi jagat sarvamekaḥ kāmo na hīyate ॥ 66 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>te'mī śāśvatikavaikalpikanaiyogikāsrayo'pi kālabhedā nityā ucyante,
nityarūpeṇaivānivāritapravṛttitvāt ।</p>
<p>(<b>2. naimittikaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>(<b>audyogikaḥ</b>) prātaḥpratyūṣaprāha‌ṇamadhyāhnasandhyārūpa <b>audyogikaḥ</b> ।</p>
<p>ayaṃ hyapekṣitāharbhāgapaurvāparyāvadhiḥ prāṇināṃ prabodhotthānas‍nānabhojanaprasādhana—
vihārāderūdyogasya nimittaṃ bhavati । yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>prātaḥpratyūṣayoss‍nāti bhuṅkte sandhyāparāhaṇayoḥ ।</l>
<l>prāhaṇamadhyāhnayoryūnāṃ śete manasi manmathaḥ ॥ 67 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
﻿
<pb n="220"/>
<p>ayaṃ hyapekṣitarātrivibhāgāpaurvāparyāvadhiḥ kāmināṃ dūtīsaṃpreṣaṇaprekṣānidrāsukha—
madhupānābhisaraṇāderūpabhogasya nimittaṃ bhavati । yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>niśāmukhe pradoṣe ca niśīthāpararāratrayoḥ ।</l>
<l>indoḥ prakaśe nāśe va sup‍taḥ kāmo vibudhyate ॥ 68 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>prāyogikaḥ</b>) śaraddhemantaśiśiravasantagrīṣmavarṣārūpaḥ <b>prāyogikaḥ</b> ।</p>
<p>ayaṃ hyapekṣitasaṃvatsaraviṣu— paurvāparyāvadhiṃ prāṇināṃ kāmakṛtacittavaikṛtānāṃ prayoganimittaṃ
bhavati । yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>śaraddhemantayoranyadanyad varṣāvasantayoḥ ।</l>
<l>himartugrīṣmayoranyat kāmāvasthā pravartate ॥ 69 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>te'mī trayo'pyaudyogikaupayogikaprāyogikāḥ kālabhedā <b>naimittikā</b> ucyante ।
nityatve'pyeṣāmudyogādernimittatvāt ।</p>
<p>(<b>3. svābhāvikaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>(<b>āgantukaḥ</b>) madapramadābhyudayotsavavyasanaparihāsābhirūpa <b>āgantukaḥ</b> ।</p>
<p>sa hi viśiṣ‍ṭakriyopanipatādikamavadhimapekṣamāṇaḥ prāṇināṃ madapramadādirūpeṇaivāgacchati ।
</p>
<p>yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>madapramadaharṣeṣu vyasaneṣūtsaveṣu ca ।</l>
<l>parihāseṣu ca prāyaḥ kāmassaṃmānamarhati ॥ 70 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>naisargikaḥ</b>) bālyakaumārayauvanamaugdhyamādhyasthyaprāgalbhyādirūpo <b>naisargikaḥ</b> ।</p>
<p>ayaṃ hi vayovibhāgādikaṃ viśiṣ‍ṭamevāvadhimapekṣamāṇaḥ prāṇināṃ nisargata eva bhavati ।</p>
<p>yathā—</p> 
<b><lg>
<l>maugdhyaprāgalbhyamādhyasthyabālyakaumārayauvanaiḥ ।</l>
<l>ātiṣ‍ṭhati padaiṣṣaḍ‌bhiḥ s‍trījātiṃ kāmaṣaṭpadaḥ ॥ 71 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>sāṃsargikaḥ</b>) parāparayaugapadyacirakṣiprarūpa<b>ssāṃsargikaḥ</b> ।</p>
<p>ayaṃ hi pravṛttisādhanānāṃ pūrvāparatve sahaikatve mandaśīghrasamapātitve ca kriyāsvapekṣamāṇo
mithaḥ saṃsargāya prabhavati । yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>krameṇa yugapat pūrvamagrato drāk cireṇa vā ।</l>
<l>samāsajantyaḥ cetāṃsi na jñāyante smarārtayaḥ ॥ 72 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>te'mī āgantukanaisargikasāṃsargikās‍trayo'pi kālabhedāḥ <b>svābhāvikā</b> ucyante, svabhāvata
eva pravartamānatvāt ।</p>

<pb n="221"/>
<p>(<b>4. vaiparāmarśikaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>(<b>saṅkīrṇaḥ</b>) deśyakrīḍākelikelidyūtavratagoṣṭhīprekṣādirūpa<b>ssaṅkīrṇaḥ</b> । sa hi viśiṣṭaṃ taṃ
tamavadhimapekṣamāṇassaṃbhūya pravartitassaṅkīrṇa eva bhavati । yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>vrateṣu goṣṭhīprekṣāsu kelidyūteṣu keliṣu ।</l>
<l>deśyakrīḍāsu cānaṅgaḥ punaraṅgena yujyate ॥ 73 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>prakīrṇaḥ</b>) viviktadīrghikodyānasaudhakrīḍādidarśanādirūpaḥ <b>prakīrṇaḥ</b> । sa hyekasya vā
parimitaparivārasya vā viśiṣṭāvadhika eva prakīrṇakanyāyena yadākadācidutpadyate ।</p>
<p>yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>vivikta—dīrghikodyāna—saudha—krīḍādi—darśane ।</l>
<l>latāveśmopaveśe ca kāmaḥ kāmena yujyate ॥ 74 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>viprakīrṇaḥ</b>) aṣṭamīcandrakendrītsavayakṣarātrikundacaturthīsuvasantakamadanatrayodaśyādirūpo
<b>viprakīrṇakaḥ</b> । sa hi viśiṣṭamaṣṭamyādikālabhedāvadhimapekṣamāṇaḥ kāmibhirnirvartyate ।
samasteṣvapi deśeṣu viprakīrṇa iva dṛśyate iti । yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>aṣṭamīcandrake kundacaturthyoṃ suvasantake ।</l>
<l>smarassmarārcā—śakrārcā—yakṣarātriṣu vardhate ॥ 75 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>sa eva kālaḥ kārtsnyena dvirūpa iva darśitaḥ ।</l>
<l>kriyāpadaikavācyo yaḥ kriyāyāssādhanaṃ ca yaḥ ॥ 76 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>3. kārakam</b> /dravyam (sādhanapadārthaḥ))</p>
<p>kiṃ <b>punassādhanam</b>? svaparāśritakriyābhinirvṛttihetuśśaktima<b>d‍dravyaṃ</b>, yat <b>kārakam</b>
ityācakṣate । kārakaśabdaś‍cāyamavyutpannaḥ <b>kriyānimittavacano lokatassiddhaḥ karotīti
vā kārakaśabdena śaktimad dravyamucyate</b> । tathā hi—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>niṣpannamātre kartṛtvaṃ sarvatraivāsti kārake ।</l>
<l>vyāpārabhedāpekṣāyāṃ karaṇāditvasaṃbhavaḥ ॥ 77 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>putrasya janmani yathā pitroḥ kartṛtvamucyate ।</l>
<l>ayamasmādiyaṃ tvasmāditi bhedavivakṣayā ॥ 78 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>śaktimātrāsamūhasya viśvasyānekadharmiṇaḥ ।</l>
<l>sarvathā sarvadā bhāvāt kvacit kiñcid vivakṣyate ॥ 79 ॥</l>
</lg></b>

<pb n="222"/>
<b><lg>
<l>sarvatra sahajā śaktiryāvad‍dravyamavasthitā ।</l>
<l>kriyākāle tvabhivyaktirāśrayaḥ parakāriṇī ॥ 80 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>svāṅgasaṃyoginaḥ pāśā daityānāṃ vāruṇā yathā ।</l>
<l>vyajyante vijigīṣūṇāṃ dravyāṇāṃ śaktayastathā ॥ 81 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa. 3.7.30)
<b><lg>
<l>taikṣṇyagauravakāṭhinyasaṃsthānaiḥ svairasiryadā ।</l>
<l>bhedyaṃ prati vyāpriyate śaktimān gṛhyate tadā ॥ 82 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa. 3.7.31)
<b><lg>
<l>svāśraye samavetānāṃ tadvadevāśrayāntare ।</l>
<l>kriyāṇāmabhiniṣpatternimittaṃ śaktiriṣyate ॥ 83 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>tattve vā vyatireke vā vyatirik‍taiva socyate ।</l>
<l>śabdapramāṇako lokassa śāstreṇānugamyate ॥ 84 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa. 3.7.38)
<p>tatra śaktimato <b>dravyasya</b> kārakākhyāyāmavāntaravyāpāranibandhanāḥ <b>ṣaḍupākhyā</b> bhavanti,
<b>1. kartā, 2. karma, 3. karaṇam, 4. saṃpradānam, 5. apādānam, 6. adhikaraṇam</b>
ceti । teṣu—</p>
<p><b>svatantraḥ kartā</b> ।</p>
<p>kiṃ punastasya svātantryam, yat karaṇādīni prayuṅkte, na taiḥ prayujyate, tāni
nyakkaroti, na tairnyakkriyate, na tairnirvartyate, tāni nirvartayati, tāni pratinidhatte, na taiḥ
pratinidhīyate; tebhyassaḥ prathamamātmānaṃ labhate, na tāni । tasmāt sa tairvinā'pi dṛśyate,
na tāni teneti । tadāha—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>prāganyataśśaktilābhānnyagbhāvāpādanādapi ।</l>
<l>tadadhīnapravṛttitvāt pravṛttānāṃ nivartanāt ॥ 85 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa. 3.7.101)
<b><lg>
<l>adṛṣṭatvāt pratinidheḥ praviveke ca darśanāt ।</l>
<l>ārādapyupakāritve prādhānyaṃ kartturucyate ॥ 86 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa. 3.7.102)
<p>kathaṃ tarhi kartṛśaktyā nyakkṛteṣu karaṇādiṣu kārakatvam, svavyāpāre pradhānavyāpāre
ca svātantryāt । taduktam—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>guṇakriyāṇāṃ kartāraḥ kartrā nyakkṛtaśaktayaḥ ।</l>
<l>karaṇatvādibharjātāḥ kriyābhedānuvādibhiḥ ॥ 87 ॥1</l>
</lg></b>
<!-- NOTES pg=222!-->
1. vākyapadīye 3.7.20—3.7.21 iti kārikayoḥ pūrvārddhe ।

<pb n="223"/>
<b><lg>
<l>vyastā(nyak‍tā)yāmapi saṃpūrṇaissvavyāpāraissamanvitāḥ ।</l>
<l>svātantryamuttaraṃ labdhvā pradhāne yānti kartṛtām ॥ 88 ॥1</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>yathā rājño niyukteṣu yoddha‍ṛtvaṃ yod‍dhṛṣu sthitam ।</l>
<l>teṣu vṛttau tu labhate rājā jayaparājayau ॥ 89 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa. 3.7.22)
<b><lg>
<l>tathā kartrā niyukteṣu sarveṣvekārthakāriṣu ।</l>
<l>kartṛtvaṃ karaṇāditvairuttaraṃ na virudhyate ॥ 90 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa. 3.7.23)
<p>kartrādīnāṃ ca ṣaṇṇāmapi pratyekaṃ triprakāratvā<b>daṣṭādaśaprabhedā</b> bhavanti । tatra —</p>
<p><b>kartā</b> svatantraḥ, hetuḥ, karmakartā ca ।</p>
<p><b>karma</b> nirvartyaṃ, vikāryaṃ prāpyaṃ ca ।</p>
<p><b>karaṇaṃ</b> bāhyamābhyantaraṃ bāhyābhyantaraṃ ca ।</p>
<p><b>saṃpradānaṃ</b> dadātikarmāpyaṃ, karmamātrāpyaṃ kriyāpyaṃ ca ।</p>
<p><b>apādānaṃ</b> nirdiṣṭaviṣayamanirdiṣṭaviṣayamupāttaviṣayamapekṣitakriyaṃ ca ।</p>
<p><b>adhikaraṇaṃ</b> vaiṣayikamaupaśleṣikaṃ naimiktikaṃ ceti ।</p>
<p>(<b>1. kartā</b>)</p>
<p>(<b>svatantraḥ —6</b>) tacca(tra)kartṛbhedeṣu <b>svatantraḥ</b> samartho'samarthassamarthāsamarthaḥ, saṃbandho'saṃbandha—
ssaṃbandhāsaṃbandhaś‍ca । teṣu—</p>
<p><b>samartho</b> yathā— vrajati, pacati, asti, śvetate ।</p>
<p><b>asamartho</b> yathā— jāyate, viramati, naśyati, vikaroti ।</p>
<p><b>samarthāsamartho</b> yathā— caitrasya rujati, caitrasyāmayati, coraṃ jvarayati, coraṃ saṃtāpayati ।</p>
<p><b>saṃbandho</b> yathā priyaṃ dṛṣṭvā sukhaṃ bhavati, ripuṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhamutpadyate, ramyaṃ śrutvā
didṛkṣā jāyate, rahaḥ prāpya ratirnirvartate ।</p>
<p><b>asaṃbandho</b> yathā— merau dogdhari dharitrīmadrayo duduhuḥ, pañcabhirhalaiḥ kṣetraṃ grāmaṇīḥ
karṣati, śailairvālmīkirammodhiṃ bandhayati, ujjaninyāḥ prasthito māhiṣmatyāṃ
sūryamudgamayati ।</p>
<p><b>saṃbandhāsaṃbandho</b> yathā— bhavati pacati, bhavati pakṣyati, bhavatyapākṣīt, bhavedapi
bhavet, syādapi syāt ।</p>
<!-- NOTES pg=223!-->
1. vākyapadīya 3.7.20—3.7.21 iti kārikayoḥ uttarārddhe ।

<pb n="224"/>
<p>(<b>hetuḥ —6</b>) karmaprayojakaḥ, kartṛprayojakaḥ, karmakartṛprayojakaḥ, hetuprayojakaḥ, ahetuprayojakaḥ
hetvahetuprayojakaś‍ca । teṣu—</p>
<p><b>karmaprayojako</b> yathā— gāṃ dogdhi payaḥ, pauravaṃ gāṃ yācate, gargāñchataṃ daṇḍayati,
kāśān kaṭaṃ karoti ।</p>
<p><b>kartṛprayojako</b> yathā— yajñadattaḥ pācayati, māṭharaḥ pāṭhayati, bhikṣā vāsayati,
kārīṣo'gniḥ adhyāpayati ।</p>
<p><b>karmakartṛprayojako</b> yathā— ārohayati hastitaṃ hastipakaḥ, ārohayate hastinaṃ hastipakaḥ,
ārohayate hastī, niṣādayati kramelakamauṣṭrikaḥ, śrapayati yavāgūṃ yajñadattaḥ,
sādhayati odanaṃ sūpakāra iti । kathaṃ punaḥ śrāyati—siyati—kartroryavāgvodanayoḥ
karmakartṛtvaṃ ghaṭate?</p>
<p>śrātisidhyatī akarmakau karmakartṛviṣayasya pacerarthe vartete । etau punaḥ prākṛtaṃ
pacyarthamāhaturiti ।</p>
<p><b>hetuprayojako</b> yathā—avīvadat pravīṇo vīṇāṃ parivādakena, apīpaṭhat kaṭho māṇavakaṃ
māṭhareṇa, ajighrapat priyaḥ kusumaṃ kāntayā, adūduhad gāṃ vallavo gopālakena ।
kathaṃ punaḥ duhikartuḥ kartṛprayojakasya hetutvam?</p>
<p>duherantarbhūtaṇijarthatvāt । vakṣyati hi—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>antarbhūtaṇijarthānāṃ duhādīnāṃ ṇijantavat ।</l>
<l>siddhaṃ pūrveṇa karmatvam (ṇijantaṃ niyamastathā) ॥ 91 ॥</l></lg></b> iti (vāpa. 3.7.73) ।
<p><b>ahetuprayojako</b> yathā— saṃvarmayati, atihastayati, abhiṣeṇayati, upaślokayati ।</p>
<p><b>hetvahetuprayojako</b> yathā— putra upādhyāyamadhyāpayati, kanyā nadau na (?) vartayati,
yājyayājakau yājayati, kanyāvarau vivāhayati ।</p>
<p>(<b>karmakartā —6</b>) vikarmakartā, prayojyakartā, karmaprayojyakartā, prakṛtikartā, vikārakartā
prakṛtivikārakartā ca । teṣu—</p>
<p><b>vikarmakartā</b> yathā— avakirate hastī, grathate mālā, prasnute gauḥ, cikīrṣate kaṭaḥ ।</p>
<p><b>prayojyakartā</b> yathā— pācayati devadattena, pāṭhayati viṣṇumitreṇa, bhārayati bhāraṃ
vāhakena, kārayati kaṭaṃ varuṭena ।</p>

<pb n="225"/>
<p><b>karmaprayojyakartā</b> yathā— ārohayate niṣādinaṃ kareṇuḥ, lāvayate pāmaraṃ kedāraḥ,
darśayate rājā bhṛtyaiḥ, abhivādayate gururdevadattena ।</p>
<p><b>prakṛtikartā</b> yathā—kāṣṭhāni bhasma bhavanti, mahadbhūtaś‍candramāḥ, tvad bhavanti jñātayaḥ,
mad bhavanti dāyādāḥ ।</p>
<p><b>vikārakartā</b> yathā—mūtrāya saṃpadyate yavāgūḥ, abhyūṣāya kalpate yavānī, ghaṭāya
kapālau bhavataḥ; suvarṇapiṇḍaṃ kuṇḍale bhavataḥ ।</p>
<p><b>prakṛtivikārakartā</b> yathā—saṅghībhavanti brāhmaṇāḥ, vargībhavanti gāvaḥ vatso vṛṣassaṃpadyate,
bālā pragalbhā bhavati ।</p>
<p>sa eṣo'ṣṭādaśaprakāro'pi abhihitānabhihitaprayujyamānā'prayujyamānaprasiddhaprakṛtā—
pekṣitaupacārikaprakalpitavikalpitānusyūtasāmānyādibhedādanekadhā kartṛbhedassaṃbhavati । tatra—</p>
<p><b>abhihito</b> yathā— sa āste, bhavān karoti ।</p>
<p><b>anabhihito</b> yathā— bhavatā kṛtaṃ, tena supyate ।</p>
<p><b>prayujyamāno</b> yathā— tvaṃ pacasi, ahaṃ pacāmi ।</p>
<p><b>aprayujyamāno</b> yathā— pacasi, pacāmi ।</p>
<p><b>prasiddho</b> yathā— varṣati, heṣate ।</p>
<p><b>prakṛto</b> yathā— bhremuḥ, vavalguḥ ।</p>
<p><b>apekṣito</b> yathā— ityācakṣate, yamayuṅkta ।</p>
<p><b>upacarito</b> yathā— dhunarvidhyati, mañcāḥ krośanti ।</p>
<p><b>prakalpito</b> yathā— ātmano'pi nātmāno jāyante, ātmaivātmānaṃ jānāti ।</p>
<p><b>vikalpito</b> yathā— ahamanyo vā gacchatu, anyo'haṃ vā gacchāmi ।</p>
<p><b>anusyūto</b> yathā— sa ca tvaṃ ca pacathaḥ, tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca pacāvaḥ ।</p>
<p><b>sāmānyo</b> yathā— pacati paṭhati ceti । ete ca bhedāḥ karmādiṣvapi yathāsaṃbhavamūhanīyā
iti vibhaktaḥ kartā ॥</p>
<p>(<b>2. karma</b>)</p>
<p>kriyāpyaṃ <b>karma</b>; yadāha 'karturīpsitatamaṃ karma' (1.4.49) iti ।</p>
<p>tattu trividhaṃ. <b>nirvartyaṃ, vikāryaṃ prāpyamiti</b> ।</p>
<p>tatra yadavidyamānamutpādyate vidyamānaṃ vā janmādinā prakāśyate <b>tannirvartyaṃ,</b>

<pb n="226"/>
yadabhinirvṛttameva prakṛtyucchedena guṇāntarādhānena vā vikāramāpadyate tad <b>vikāryaṃ</b>,
yasya kriyākṛtānāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ sarvathānupalabdhistat <b>prāpyam</b> । taduktam—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>yadasajjāyate sad‌vā janmanā yat prakāśate ।</l>
<l>tannirvartya vikāryaṃ tu karma dvedhā vyavasthitam ॥ 92 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa. 3.7.49)
<b><lg>
<l>prakṛtyucchedasaṃbhūtaṃ kiñcit‌kāṣṭhādibhasmavat ।</l>
<l>kiñcid guṇāntarāpattyā suvarṇādivikāravat ॥ 93 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa. 3.7.50)
<b><lg>
<l>kriyāgata/kṛtaviśeṣāṇāṃ siddhiryatra na gamyate ।</l>
<l>darśanādanumānād‌vā tat prāpyamiti kathyate ॥ 94 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.7.51)
<p>tatra nirvartye vikāryaḥ prāpyadharmassvadharmaś‍ca vikārye prāpyadharmassvadharmaś‍ca, prāpye tu
svadharma eva । kaḥ punarasau— (vāpa. 3.7.53)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>ābhāsopa/so'vagamo vyaktissoḍhatvamiti karmaṇaḥ ।</l>
<l>viśeṣāḥ prāpyamāṇasya kriyāsiddhau vyavasthitāḥ ॥ 95 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>nirvartyavikāryayostu nirvṛttivikāryāveva । yathocyate—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>nirvartyādiṣu tat pūrvamanubhūya svatantratām ।</l>
<l>kartrantarāṇāṃ vyāpāre karma saṃpadyate punaḥ ॥ 96 ॥ (vāpa. 3.7.54)</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>nirvartyam—6</b>)</p>
<p>tatra <b>nirvartyam</b> 'utpādyaṃ' prakāś‍yamupasarjanaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ vyavahitamaprāpyaṃ' ca । teṣu—
yadasadutpādyate <b>tadutpādyam</b>, yathā saṃyogaṃ vidhatte, sukhamutpādayati, vibhāgaṃ kurvate,
duḥkhaṃ janayati । vidyamānameva yadāvaraṇāpāyādāvirbhavati tat <b>prakāś‍yam</b>, yathā śabdaṃ
janayati, putraṃ sūyate, tailaṃ kurute, payo dogdhi । apradhānabhūta<b>mupasarjanam</b>, yathā kaṭaṃ
kartumārabhate, grāmo vāsayitumiṣyate, pak‍tvodano bhujyate, paktumodanaś‍cintyate ।
svānuraktapratyayajanakaṃ <b>viśeṣaṇam</b>, yathā bhīṣmamudāraṃ kaṭaṃ karoti, mahāntamavyaktaṃ
śabdamuccārayati, dīrghāyuṣaṃ guṇinamātmajaṃ prasūte, citramacchapaṭaṃ vayati । kriyāntareṇa
vyavadhānavad <b>vyavahitam</b>, yathā māsamāste, godohaṃ pacati, krośamadhīte, kurūn (gacchan)
svapiti ।</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kālādhvabhāvadeśānāmantarbhūta— kriyāntaraiḥ ।</l>
<l>sarvairakarmakairyoge karmatvamupajāyate ॥ 97 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.7.67)

<pb n="227"/>
<p>sakarmikāpi kriyā dravyādikarmaṇyeva niviśate, na kālādikarmaṇi, yathā māsamodanaṃ
pacati, krośamanuvākamadhīte ।</p>
<b><lg>
<l>ādhāratvamiva prāptāste punardravyakarmasu ।</l>
<l>kālādayo bhinnakakṣyā/kakṣyaṃ yānti karmatvamuttaram ॥ 98 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.7.68)
<p>kriyāviśeṣaṇam <b>aprāpyam</b>, yathā sukhamabhidhatte, duḥkhaṃ nirvartayati, mandaṃ gacchati,
śīghramāyāti ।</p>
<p>kathaṃ punarupasarjanādīnāṃ nirvartyamānatā ? yathā nirvartyamānasya 'yathā hyasau kaṭaṃ
nirvartayati, evaṃ tad‍gatabhīṣmodārādikaṃ taddharmamapi iti । evaṃ śabde'pi । pakvaudano bhujyata
iti । atra tu pākenaudano nirvartyate; kevalaṃ sāsya śaktiḥ; pradhānabhujikriyāviṣayakarma—
śaktisannidhau pak‍tyupasarjanībhūtākhyātena pradhānaśak‍tyabhidhāne'bhihitavat prakāśate ।
paktumodanaś‍cintyata ityatra pacyarthatvāt cintāyāḥ yadyapi pākasya vāstavaṃ pradhānatvaṃ
tathā'pyākhyātapratyayena prādhānyataś‍cintābhidhānāt pacikriyopasarjanaṃ bhavati । atastadviṣayā
karmaśaktiḥ pradhānaśak‍tyabhidhāne'bhihitavad bhavati । etena kaṭaḥ kartumārabhyate, grāmo gantumiṣyate
ityapi vyākhyātam ।</p>
<p>nanu gamergrāmaḥ, iṣerubhe karmaṇī, tat kasyātropasarjanatā ? naivam; iṣerubhe karmaṇī
iti yaducyate tatsāmarthyapradarśanaparamavagantavyam । iṣyate grāmaḥ kiṃ kartum? gantum, grāmo
grāmamiti vā । na punariṣeḥ yugapadubhe karmaṇī saṃbhavataḥ । evamahite'pi kaṭādivadeva
māsādīnāmāsanādibhirabhinirvartyamānatā pratīyate । tathā hi vaktāro bhavanti iha sthito'yaṃ
māsaṃ nirvartayatīti । evaṃ pacan godoham, adhīyānaḥ krośaṃ, svapan kurun iti kālabhāva
gantavyānāmeva kurukrośādīnāṃ karmatvam । yadāha—</p>
<p><b>kālabhāvādhvagantavyāḥ karmasaṃjñā hyakarmaṇām ॥ 99 ॥</b> (mabhā. 1.4.41) iti ।</p>
<p><b>aprāpyam</b>— yatkriyāviśeṣaṇatvāt kriyāvadeva nirvartyamānam । tatkriyāyāḥ kathamiti
cet, puruṣavyāpārasāmānyāśrayaṇāt । aprāpyatvaṃ punastasya dhātvarthābhiprāyeṇa । na hyasau
dhātvarthena prāpyate; api tu puruṣavyāpāreṇa । dhātvarthasya tu tatra karaṇatvam । viśvajitā
yajetetyādau dhātvarthanāmadheyebhyo viśvajidādibhyaḥ karaṇavibhaktidarśanādagniṣṭomayājī—
tyādisiddhyartha 'karaṇe yajaḥ' (3.2.85) iti ca sūtrārambhāt । agniṣṭomādayo hi
svargādiphalabhāvanāyāṃ karaṇam ।</p>

<pb n="228"/>
<p>(<b>vikāryaṃ—6</b>)</p>
<p><b>vikāryam</b>— avināś‍yaṃ vināś‍yamīpsitamanīpsitamāsthitaṃ kartṛkarma ca । tatra—</p>
<p><b>avināś‍yaṃ</b> yathā— suvarṇaṃ kuṇḍalīkaroti, kāṇḍaṃ lunāti, kāntāṃ kopayati,
priyaṃ prasādayati ।</p>
<p><b>vināś‍yaṃ</b> yathā— kusūlaṃ bhinatti, kāṣṭhaṃ dahati, dhānāḥ pibati, udapeṣaṃ pinaṣṭi ।</p>
<p><b>īpsitaṃ</b> yathā— striyaṃ gacchati, payaḥ pibati ।</p>
<p><b>anīpsitaṃ</b> yathā— corān paś‍yati, dhanaṃ tyajati, viṣaṃ bhakṣayati, ahiṃ laṅghayati ।
kaḥ punareṣāṃ vikāraḥ? prakṛteranyathātvam; na hi corādayo darśanādiviṣayā
bhavanti ।</p>
<p><b>āsthitaṃ</b> yathā— panthānaṃ gacchati, nadīṃ tarati, parvatamārohati, gartamuttarati । kaḥ
punaranyato'sya bhedaḥ ? । ucyate—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>tyāgarūpaṃ prahātavye prāpye saṃdarśanādike/saṃsargadarśanam ।</l>
<l>āsthitaṃ karma yat tatra dvairūpyaṃ bhajate kriyā ॥ 100 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.7.135)
<p><b>kartṛkarma</b> yathā— lūyate kedārassvayameva, pacyata odanassvayameva, bhidyate
kusūlassvayameva, bhajyate kāṣṭhaḥ svayameveti ।</p>
<p>(<b>prāpyam—6</b>)</p>
<p><b>prāpyamapi</b> prāpyaṃ, prayojyaṃ, aparihāryamabhihitamanabhihitamakathitaṃ ca । tatra
<b>prāpyaṃ</b> yathā— ādityaṃ paś‍yati, himavantaṃ śrṛṇoti, vedamadhīte, carcāḥ pārayati ।</p>
<p><b>prayojyaṃ</b> yathā— māṇavakaṃ gamayati, śiṣyaṃ bodhayati, brāhmaṇamāsādayati, patiṃ
śāyayati । nanu ca vikāryametat; tanna, prayojakavyāpāramātrasya
vivakṣitatvāt । vikāraś‍caiṣāṃ svakriyānibandhana iti ।</p>
<p><b>aparihāryaṃ</b> yathā— vibhāgaṃ janayan saṃyogamucchinatti, kaṭaṃ kurvan kāśānāharati,
grāmaṃ gacchan vṛkṣamūlānyupasarpati, āmikṣāṃ bhāvayan vājinamāpnoti ।</p>
<p><b>abhihitaṃ</b> yathā yathā— uṣṭrāsikāḥ āsyante, hataśāyikāśśayyante, raipoṣaṃ
puṣyati, udapeṣaṃ pinaṣṭi ।</p>
<p><b>anabhihitaṃ</b> yathā— 'paś‍ya mṛgo' dhāvati, smarasi devadatta kāś‍mīreṣu vatsyāmaḥ, na
marṣayāmi yat tatra bhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet ।</p>

<pb n="229"/>
<b><lg>
<l>bhāvarūpaṃ tu yat karma tadihābhihitaṃ viduḥ।
kriyārūpaṃ tu manyante karmā'nabhihitaṃ budhāḥ ॥ 101 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>atha <b>akathitam,</b> tadyathā— gāṃ dogdhi payaḥ, pauravaṃ gāṃ yācate, vrajaṃ gāmavaruṇaddhi,
māṇavakaṃ panthānaṃ pṛcchati, pauravaṃ gāṃ bhikṣate, vṛkṣamapacinute phalāni,
māṇavakaṃ dharmaṃ brūte, māṇavakaṃ dharmamanuśāsti, śatānīkaṃ śataṃ jayati,
gargāñchataṃ daṇḍayati, upasaramaśvaṃ muṣṇāti, ambunidhimamṛtaṃ manthāti,
śākhāṃ grāmaṃ karṣati, ajāṃ grāmaṃ nayati, edhān grāmaṃ harati, bhāraṃ grāmaṃ
vahati, evaṃ nagaraṃ harati bhāram, samāhartāramayutaṃ gṛh‍ṇāti, kāśān kaṭaṃ
karoti ।</p>
<p>kiṃ punarihākathitam?</p>
<p>payaḥprabhṛti ।</p>
<p>kenākathitam?</p>
<p>lakṛtyaktakhalarthādibhiriti । na hi payaḥprabhṛtayo lādibhiḥ kathyante, api tu
gavādayaḥ; yathā duhyate gauḥ payaḥ, dogdhavyā gauḥ payaḥ, suduhā gauḥ paya iti । yattu
tairākhyāyate tadīpsitatamaṃ pradhānakarma, prāgeva kriyāsaṃbandhāt । taduktam—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>tasmācchuddhasya duherbhavati gavā pūrvameva saṃbandhaḥ ।</l>
<l>gorduhinā payasastu prāk tasmāllādayastasmin ॥ 102 ॥1</l>
</lg></b>
<p>evaṃ grāmā diṣvapi ānayanādibhyaḥ prāgeva nayatyādisabaṃndhāt lādibhirabhidhāne
taddhitotpattiravagantavyā । taccākhyānataḥ kathitamucyate, tad‍ivaparītaṃ tvakathitamiti ॥
<b>'duhiyācirudhipracchibhikṣiciyām'</b> (mabhā. 1.4.51) ityādi,</p>
<b><lg>
<l>jidaṇḍimuṣimanthānāṃ gatyarthānāmakīrtite ।</l>
<l>nīhṛñvahigrahādīnāmupasaṃkhyānamiṣyate ॥ 103 ॥</l></lg></b> (mabhā. 1.4.51)
<p>asyārthaḥ duhyādīnāṃ ya upayogaḥ prapūraṇādistasya yannimittaṃ payaḥprabhṛti, yacca bruviśāsyoḥ
kriyā(kriyayā) dharmādikaṃ(ka)samavāyena saṃbadhyate tadapādānādisaṃjñānāmavidhāne dvitīyā—
vācyamapradhānakarmākathitam ucyate । jiprabhṛtīnāṃ cāpradhānakarmaṇastatraivopasaṃkhyānamiti ।</p>
<!-- NOTES pg=229!-->
1. tasmācchuddha = ya(ta)smācchabdasya śuddha rāghavaḥ

<pb n="230"/>
<p>anye tūpayujyata ityupayogaḥ payaḥprabhṛti, tasya yannimittaṃ gavādi ।
bruviśāsiguṇena ca pradhānena dharmādikarmaṇā māṇavakādi yat saṃbadhyate
tadakathitamityācakṣate । tatpakṣe lādivācyānāṃ gavādīnāṃ prādhānyaṃ (na) vyāhanyeta,
akathitasaṃjñā ca nārthā syāt । lādayaś‍ca teṣāmapi mate pradhānakarmaṇyeva, yathā ajā
nīyate grāmamiti । yathoktam—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>pradhānakarmaṇyākhyeye lādīnāhurdvikarmaṇām ।</l>
<l>apradhāne duhādīnāṃ ṇyante kartuś‍ca karmaṇaḥ ॥ 104 ॥</l></lg></b> (mabhā. 1.4.41) iti
<p>tanmitho viruddhārthatvādeṣāmevāvimṛś‍yavāditāmāpādayati । kathaṃ samāna eva
yogakṣeme gavādīnāmaprādhānyam, ajādīnāṃ ca prādhānyam, kathaṃ vā pradhānaṃ gavādi
lādibhirajādivadevābhidhīyate? kiṃ ca—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>antarbhūtaṇijarthānāṃ duhyādīnāṃ ṇijantavat ।</l>
<l>siddhaṃ pūrveṇa karmatvaṃ ṇijantaniyamastathā ॥ 105 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.7.73)
<p>asmin pakṣe gavādīnāṃ vyaktameva prayojyatvāt prāk‍sūtreṇaiva pradhānakarmatvam । tathā
ca gāṃ dogdhi paya ityatra gāṃ payaḥ kṣārayatītyarthaḥ । yato duhiḥ prapūraṇārthaḥ,
pūraṇamāpyāyanaṃ, prapūraṇaṃ tu virecanaṃ, preraṇaprasthānādāvivārthavaiparītyādhānāt । yastu
ṇijantādīnāmapi 'gatibuddhi'(1.4.52) ityādinā karmasaṃjñārambhaḥ, sa pācayati
devadattenetyādau prayojyasya kartuḥ karmasaṃjñā nirvartayanniyamārtho bhaviṣyatīti vibhaktaṃ karma ॥</p>
<p>(<b>3. karaṇam</b>)</p>
<p>karaṇamucyate; tatra kriyāṃ pratyupāttavyāpāreṣu karmādiṣu yad‍vyāpārānantaraṃ
kriyāsiddhivivakṣā tatkārakaṃ sādhakatamaṃ <b>karaṇamiti</b> । yadāha—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kriyāyāḥ pariniṣpattiḥ yad‍vyāpārādanantaram ।</l>
<l>yadā vivakṣyate tasya karaṇatvaṃ tadā smṛtam ॥ 106 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa. 3.7.90)
<p>tadapi tredhā <b>bāhyamābhyantaraṃ bāhyābhyantaraṃ</b> ca । teṣu—</p>
<p>(<b>bāhyam—6</b>)</p>
<p><b>bāhyaṃ</b> kartṛrūpaṃ, kartrāśritaṃ, karmarūpaṃ, karmāśritaṃ, kriyāśritamanāśritaṃ ceti । tatra—
<b>kartṛrūpaṃ</b> yathā— edhaiḥ pacati, senayā jayati, aśvena gacchati, nāvā tarati ।</p>
<p><b>kartrāśritaṃ</b> yathā—akṣairdīvyati, dātreṇa lunāti, dhanuṣā vidhyati, paraśunā chinatti ।</p>

<pb n="231"/>
<p><b>karmarūpaṃ</b> yathā— pathā gacchati, antikena yāti, payasā bhuṅkte, yavāgvā juhoti ।</p>
<p><b>karmāśritaṃ</b> yathā— payasā odanaṃ bhuṅkte, pathā grāmaṃ gacchati, dvidroṇena
dhānyaṃ krīṇāti, pañcakena, paśūn badhnāti ।</p>
<p><b>kriyāśritaṃ</b> yathā— māsenādhīte, krośenādhīte, viśvajitā yajate, vidhinā vidadhāti ।</p>
<p><b>anāśritaṃ</b> yathā— stokena muktaḥ, kṛccheṇa labdhaḥ ālokena paśyati, dīpikayā yāti ।</p>
<p>(<b>ābhyantaram—7</b>)</p>
<p><b>ābhyantaramapi</b> āntaram, avāntaram, ābhyantaram, anantaraṃ, samanantaraṃ, pratyanantaraṃ,
bāhyābhyantaramiti । tatra—</p>
<p><b>āntaraṃ</b> yathā— ātmanā budhyate, svayamupakramate, svataḥ prakāśate, anyonyato
jānāti ।</p>
<p><b>avāntaraṃ</b> yathā— jātyā durjanaḥ, prakṛtyā abhirūpaḥ, nisargeṇāryaḥ, svabhāvena
subhagaḥ ।</p>
<p><b>ābhyantaraṃ</b> yathā— ahaṅkāreṇa katthate, sattvena sahate, rajasā'nurajyate, tamasā muhyati ।</p>
<p><b>anantaraṃ</b> yathā— manasā modate, antareṇācarati, pratibhayā paś‍yati, saṃskāreṇa smarati ।</p>
<p><b>samanantaraṃ</b> yathā— prayatnenārabhate, buddhyā jānāti, sukhena śete, duḥkhena paṭhati ।</p>
<p><b>pratyanantaraṃ</b> yathā— dharmeṇa vardhate, adharmeṇa patati, avidyayā mṛtyuṃ tarati,
vidyayā'mṛtaṃ prāpnoti ।</p>
<p><b>bāhyābhyantaraṃ</b> yathā— cakṣuṣā paś‍yati, vācā vadati, iṅgitena kathayati,
ākāreṇa jñāpayati ।</p>
<p>(<b>bāhyābhyantaram —6</b>)</p>
<p><b>bāhyābhyantaramapi</b> bahirmukhamantarmukhaṃ, nirmukhaṃ, bahirudrekamantarudrekaṃ, nirudrekaṃ ca । teṣu
<b>bahirmukhaṃ</b> yathā— vidyayā'mṛtamāpnoti ।</p>
<p><b>antarmukhaṃ</b> yathā— ghrāṇena jighrati, jihvayā svādayati, sparśena budhyate, śrotreṇa
śrṛṇoti ।</p>
<p><b>nirmukhaṃ</b> yathā— niśśaṅkatvena yātaḥ, nirbhayatvena āyātaḥ, niṣkiñcanatvena
muktam(ktaḥ), nirāyudhatvena hataḥ ।</p>
<p><b>bahirudrekaṃ</b> yathā— padbha‍yāṃ ya‍ gacchati, pāṇibhyāṃ spṛśati, saṃjñayā gamayati, pauṃsnena
prīṇāti ।</p>

<pb n="232"/>
<p><b>antarudrekaṃ</b> yathā— balena varṣati, kauśalena rañjayati, abhiyogenādhīte,
abhyāsena dhārayati ।</p>
<p><b>nirudrekaṃ</b> yathā— prāyeṇa yājñikaḥ, gotreṇa gārgyaḥ, abhijanena sauhmaḥ, śākhayā
cchandoga iti ।</p>
<p>niṣkiñcanatvastokatvādīnāṃ sadabhāvāsattvarūpatvādasādhakatvamiti cet tanna ।</p>
<b><lg>
<l>yathaiva sannidhau tasya tathaivāsannidhāvapi ।</l>
<l>bhāvasya karaṇatvena kriyāsiddhiḥ pratīyate ॥ 107 ॥1</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.7.98)
<b><lg>
<l>stokatvasyābhinirvṛtteranirvṛtteś‍ca tasya vā ।</l>
<l>prasiddhiṃ karaṇatvasya stokādīnāṃ pracakṣate ॥ 108 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.7.99)
<p>na ca karaṇasya vāstavaṃ rūpamasti vivakṣānibandhanatvāt । taduktam—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>vastutastadanirdeś‍yaṃ na hi tad vastuni sthitam ।</l>
<l>sthālyā pacyata eṣāpi vivakṣā dṛś‍yate yataḥ ॥ 109 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa.3.7.91)
<p>na ca bhavati edhāḥ pacanti, dhanurvidhyati, cakṣuḥ paś‍yati, mano jānāti iti ॥
karaṇamuktam ।</p>
<p>(<b>4. saṃpradānam</b>)</p>
<p><b>saṃpradāna</b>mucyate; tattrividham— <b>dadātikarmāpyaṃ, karmamātrāpyaṃ kriyāpyaṃ</b> ceti । tatra
(<b>dadātikarmāpyam —6</b>)</p>
<p>saṃpradānamiti mahatyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ karaṇāt । samyagasmai pradīyate tad‍gavādinā <b>dadātikarmaṇā</b>
prāpyamupādhyāyādikaṃ saṃpradānasaṃjñaṃ bhavati । tat svatvanivṛttau, parasvatvāpattau,
ubhayayoge, svopayoge, paropayogo, ubhayopayoge ceti <b>ṣoḍhā</b> viprathate ।</p>
<p><b>svatvanivṛttau</b> yathā— śiṣyāya vidyāṃ prayacchati, varāya kanyāṃ viśrāṇayati,
āp‍tāyopadeśaṃ dadāti, gurubhya ātmānaṃ nivedayati ।</p>
<p><b>parasvatvāpattau</b> yathā— ripubhyo bhayaṃ dadāti, śatrave prahāraṃ prayacchati, vādine
uttaraṃ dadāti, dayitāyai vācaṃ prayacchati ।</p>
<p><b>ubhayayoge</b> yathā— karmakarāya chatramarpayati, mūkāya hitamupadiśati, saṃvāhakāya
kāyaṃ vitarati, priyatamāya śarīraṃ dadāti ।</p>
<!-- NOTES pg=232!-->
1. kārikāyā asyā vāk‍yapadīyasya mūle bhinna eva pāṭhaḥ, pṛ. 86, pūnāsaṃskaraṇam ।

<pb n="233"/>
<p><b>svopayoge</b> yathā— vātāya cakṣurdadāti, pṛṣṭhamātapāya sparśayati, gītāya karṇaṃ
dadāti, śrutāya ceto vitarati ।</p>
<p><b>paropayoge</b> yathā— putrāyāśiṣaṃ prayacchati, chātrāya capeṭāṃ dadāti, bhītāyābhayaṃ
prayacchati, ārtāyauṣadhaṃ dadāti ।</p>
<p><b>ubhayopayoge</b> yathā— nāpitāya kṣuraṃ prayacchati, maitrāvaruṇāya daṇḍaṃ dadāti,
priyatamāyādharaṃ prayacchati, priyāyā aṅkapālīṃ dadāti ।</p>
<p>'karmaṇā yamabhipraiti sa saṃpradānam' (1.4.32) iti paribhāṣayā lakṣyamāṇaṃ</p>
<p>(<b>karmamātrāpyam —6</b>)</p>
<p><b>karmamātrāpyam</b> tadapi <b>ṣoḍhā</b> prerakamanumantu, nirākartṛ, anirākartṛ, pratyarpakaṃ,
apratigrāhakamiti (vāpa. 3.7.129) । teṣu —</p>
<p><b>prerakaṃ</b> yathā— yācakāyānnaṃ dadāti, vṛddhimuttamarṇāya prayacchati, dvāḥsthāyopacāraṃ
kalpayati, dāyādāya bhāgaṃ nirdiśati ।</p>
<p><b>anumantṛ</b> yathā— gāmupādhyāya nivedayati, sevakāya grāmaṃ nirdiśati, patiṃvarāyai
varaṃ darśayati, dāsyai vastramatisṛjati ।</p>
<p><b>anirākartṛ</b> yathā— devāya puṣpaṃ kṣipati, kuberāya balimupaharati, rudrāya
paśumālabhate, somāyārghyaṃ dadāti ।</p>
<p><b>nirākartṛ</b> yathā— unmattāyauṣadhaṃ nirdiśati, vādine dūṣaṇaṃ dadāti, ṭaṅkāya daṇḍaṃ
karoti, śāk‍yāyāmiṣaṃ preṣayati ।</p>
<p><b>pratyarpakaṃ</b> yathā— sādine'śvaṃ nirdiśati, sannidhātre kośamarpayati, samāhartre rāṣṭraṃ
nivedayati, amātyāya mudrāmupanayati ।</p>
<p><b>apratigrāhakaṃ</b> yathā— devebhya uṣitānnaṃ dadāti, pitṛbhyo bhuktaśeṣaṃ prayacchati,
andhāya rūpaṃ darśayati, badhirāya śāstramupadiśati ।</p>
<p>(<b>kriyāpyam —6</b>)</p>
<p>karmagrahaṇena kriyāyā api saṅgrahāt kriyayā yadāpyate tadapi saṃpradānaṃ, <b>kriyāvyāpyamiti</b>
ca bhavati । karmaṇo'smāt ko viśeṣa iti cedīpsitatamatvaṃ nāmaṃ tadapi <b>ṣoḍhā</b> śeṣaḥ,
karmaśeṣaḥ, karma, vyavahitakarma, hetuḥ, nimittaheturiti ca । yadāha— (vāpa. 3.7.130)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>hetutve karmasaṃjñāyāṃ śeṣatve vā'pi kārakam ।</l>
<l>rucyarthādiṣu śāstreṇa saṃpradānākhyamucyate ॥ 110 ॥</l></lg></b> tatra—

<pb n="234"/>
<p><b>śeṣo</b> yathā— devadattāya rocate, devadattāya svadate, devadattāya tiṣṭhate, devadattāya namate ।</p>
<p><b>karmaśeṣo</b> yathā— devadettāya gāṃ pratiśrṛṇoti, devadattāya grāmaśrṛṇoti, devadattāya
śataṃ dhārayati, devadattāya daivamīkṣate ।</p>
<p><b>karma</b> yathā— devattāya rādhyati, puṣpāya spṛhayati, grāmāya gacchati, devebhyo
namati ।</p>
<p><b>vyavahitakarma</b> yathā— chātrāya ślāghate, caitrāya śapate, hotre pratigṛṇāti, potre
anugṛṇāti ।</p>
<p><b>hetu</b>ryathā— devadattāya krudhyati, devadattāya druhyati, devadattāyerṣyati,
devadattāyāsūyati ।</p>
<p><b>nimittahetu</b>ryathā— edhebhyo vrajati, śrāddhāya nigarhate, yuddhāya sannahyati, patye śete
iti । etena 'ruccarthānāṃ prīyamāṇaḥ' (1.4.33), 'ślāghahnuṅsthāśapāṃ
jñīpsyamānaḥ' (1.4.34), 'dhāreruttamarṇaḥ' (1.4.35) 'spṛherīpsitaḥ'
(1.4.36), 'krudhadruherṣyāsūyārthānāṃ yaṃ prati kopaḥ' (1.4.37),
'rādhīkṣyoryasya vipraś‍naḥ' (1.4.38), 'pratyāṅbhyāṃ śruvaḥ pūrvasya kartā'
(1.4.40), 'anupratigṛṇaś‍ca' (1.4.41) 'gatyarthakarmaṇi dvitīyācaturthyau
ceṣṭāyāmanadhvani' (2.2.12) 'kriyārthopapadasya karmaṇi sthāninaḥ'
(2.3.14) ityādivacana 'karmaṇā yamabhipraiti sa saṃpradānam' (1.4.32)
ityādyayogasyaiva prapañcārtham ityuktaṃ bhavatītyavasitaṃ saṃpradānam ॥</p>
<p>(<b>5. apādānam</b>)</p>
<p><b>apādāna</b>mucyate, 'dhruvamapāye'pādānam' (1.4.24); kāyasaṃsargapūrvake buddhisaṃsargapūrvake
vā apāye yaddhruvamavadhibhūtaṃ vivakṣitaṃ tasyāpādānamiti saṃjñā । yathocyate—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>apāye yadudāsīnaṃ tadrūpaṃ yadi vā calam ।</l>
<l>dhruvameva tadāveśāt tadapādānamucyate ॥ 111 ॥</l></lg></b> (pama.1.4.24)
<p>tadapi trividhaṃ <b>nirdiṣṭaviṣayamupāttaviṣayamapekṣitakriyaṃ</b> ceti । taduktam—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>nirdiṣṭaviṣayaṃ kiñcidupāttaviṣayaṃ tathā ।</l>
<l>apekṣitakriyaṃ ceti tridhā'pādānamucyate ॥ 112 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.7.136)

<pb n="235"/>
<p>(<b>nirdiṣṭaviṣayam —6</b>)</p>
<p>teṣu yatropāttakriyopādānenāpāyaḥ pratīyate, <b>tannirdiṣṭaviṣayam</b> ।</p>
<p>tat ṣoḍhā— ujjhitamanujjhitamīpsitaṃ jihāsitaṃ pariṇataṃ nivṛttamiti । tatra—
<b>ujjhitaṃ</b> yathā— grāmādāgacchati, vṛkṣāt parṇaṃ patati, meṣāde(nme)ṣo'pasarpati,
dhāvato'śvāt patitaḥ ।</p>
<p><b>anujjhitaṃ</b> yathā—śrṛṅgāccharo jāyate, himavato gaṅgā prabhavati, vaṭāt praroho
lambate, agnerdhūma uccarati ।</p>
<p><b>īpsitaṃ</b> yathā— yavebhyo gāṃ niṣedhati, māṣebhyo mahiṣān ruṇaddhi, kūpādandhaṃ
vārayati, agnermāṇavakamapasārayati ।</p>
<p><b>jihāsitaṃ</b> yathā— araṇyānniṣkrāmati, gartāduttarati, parvatādavarohati, ākāśāt
patati ।</p>
<p><b>pariṇataṃ</b> yathā— gomayāt vṛś‍ciko jāyate, golomāvilomabhyo dūrvā bhavanti,
suvarṇāt kuṇḍalamutpadyate, kāśebhyaḥ kaṭo bhavati ।</p>
<p><b>nivṛttaṃ</b> yathā— prabhāvāddhīyate, prajñāyāḥ prabhraś‍yate, nyāyādapaiti, svarūpāt
pracyavate ।</p>
<p>kathaṃ prabhāvādīnāṃ dhrauvyamiti cet śabdavyāpārato'pāyābhiniveśaḥ ।</p>
<p>(<b>upāttaviṣayam —6</b>)</p>
<p>audāsīnyād yatropāttakriyāsāmarthyādavagamyamānakriyāpadenāpāyapratītistad
<b>upāttaviṣayam</b> । tadapi <b>ṣoḍhā</b>— siddharūpaṃ, sādhyarūpaṃ, prāpyarūpamaprāpyarūpaṃ, parihartavyaṃ,
nirhartavyamiti । teṣu —</p>
<p><b>siddharūpaṃ</b> yathā— kūlāt patati, kusūlāt pacati, kāṃsyapātrato bhuṅkte,
brāhmaṇācchaṃsati, upādhyāyādadhīte ।</p>
<p><b>sādhyarūpaṃ</b> yathā— adhyayanāt parājayate, dharmāt pramādyati, adharmājugupsate,
akṛtyād viramati ।</p>
<p><b>prāpyarūpaṃ</b> yathā— āsanāt prekṣate, prāsādādavalokayati, balāhakād vidyotate,
yauvanato vikurute ।</p>
<p><b>aprāpyarūpaṃ</b> yathā— dvayahādannaṃ bhokṣyate, āmṛtyoḥ śriyāmākāṅkṣet, krośāllakṣyaṃ
vidhyati, āpāṭaliputrād vṛṣṭo devaḥ ।</p>
﻿
<pb n="236"/>
<p><b>parihartavyaṃ</b> yathā— corebhyo bibheti, durjanebhya udvijate, upādhyāyādantardhartta,
sahādhyāyibhyo nilīyate ।</p>
<p><b>nirhartavyaṃ</b> yathā— corebhyo guhyaṃ trāyate, rogebhya āturaṃ rakṣati, kākebhyo
dadhyavati, asatyādātmānaṃ pāti ।</p>
<p>(<b>apekṣitakriyam —6</b>)</p>
<p>yatrārthaprakaraṇādibhyo gamyamānāt kriyāpadādapāyabuddhista<b>dapekṣitakriyam</b> ।</p>
<p>tadapi <b>ṣoḍhā</b>— sāmānyakriyāpekṣaṃ viśeṣakriyāpekṣaṃ sattvabhūtāpekṣamasattvabhūtāpekṣaṃ
niyatarūpāpāyam aniyatarūpāpāyamiti । teṣu—</p>
<p><b>sāmānyakriyāpekṣaṃ</b> yathā— dānavebhyo devā buddhimantaḥ, surebhyo'surā yoddhāraḥ,
suhyā brahyottarebhya āḍhyatarāḥ, pāṭaliputrebhyaḥ sukumāratarāḥ ।</p>
<p><b>viśeṣakriyāpekṣaṃ</b> yathā— rohaṇād rat‍nam, payo vāridharāt, kuto bhavān?
pāṭaliputrāt ।</p>
<p><b>sattvabhūtāpekṣaṃ</b> yathā— anyo devadattāt, itaro devadattāt, pṛthak devadattāt,
nānā devadattāt ।</p>
<p><b>asattvabhūtāpekṣaṃ</b> yathā— ṛte devadattāt, vinā devadattāt, ārād devadattāt,
dūrād devadattāt ।</p>
<p><b>niyatarūpāpāyaṃ</b> yathā— kaumudyā yakṣarātriḥ pakṣe, kārtikyā āgrahāyaṇī māse,
gavīthumataḥ sāṃkāśyaṃ caturṣu yojaneṣu, pāṭaliputrād rājagṛhaṃ
sap‍tayojanāni ।</p>
<p><b>aniyatarūpāpāyaṃ</b> yathā— prāggrāmātṛ, dakṣiṇā grāmāt, tata upariṣ‍ṭāt ।</p>
<p>anye tu 'dhruvamapāye'pādānam' (1.4.24) iti nirdiṣ‍ṭaviṣayam; 'bhītrārthānāṃ
bhayahetuḥ' (1.4.24), 'parājerasoḍhaḥ' (1.4.26) 'vāraṇārthānāmīpsitaḥ' (1.4.27),
'antardhau yenādarśanamicchati' (1.4.28), 'ākhyātopayoge' (1.4.29), 'janikartuḥ
prakṛtiḥ' (1.4.30), 'bhuvaḥ prabhavaḥ' (1.4.31), 'lyablope karmaṇa upasaṃkhyānam'
(1.4.31, vā), 'sap‍tamīpañcamyau kārakamadhye' (2.3.7), ityādiyogoktamupāttaviṣayam;
'pañcamī vibhattke' (2.3.42), 'anyārāditarartedikśabdāñcūttarapadājāhiyukte' (2.3.29),
'pratiḥpatinidhipratidānayoḥ' (1.4.92), 'pratinidhipratidāne ca yasmāt' (2.3.11)
ityādikaṃ tvavadhibhāvādapekṣitakriyamiti tridhā'pādānaṃ manyante । āhuś‍ca—</p>
﻿
<pb n="237"/>
<b><lg>
<l>nirdhāraṇe vibhakte yo bhītrādīnāṃ ca yo vidhiḥ ।</l>
<l>upāttāpekṣitāpāyaḥ so'budhapratipattaye ॥ 113 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa.3.7.147)
<p>uktamapādānam ।</p>
<p>(<b>6. adhikaraṇam</b>)</p>
<p><b>adhikaraṇa</b>mucyate, 'ādhāro'dhikaraṇam'(1.4.45); karttuḥ karmaṇo vā
kriyāśrayasya kriyāṃ prati ya ādhārastadadhikaraṇam (kāśikā 1.4.45) taduktam—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kartṛkarmavyavahitāmasākṣād dhārayat kriyām ।</l>
<l>upakurvat kriyāsiddhau śāstre'dhikaraṇaṃ smṛtam ॥ 114 ॥</l></lg></b> (vāpa. 3.7.148)
<p>tat tredhā— <b>vaiṣayikamaupaśleṣikaṃ naimittikaṃ</b> ceti । tattrividhamāpi anekaprakāram ।</p>
<p>(<b>vaiṣayikam —3</b>)</p>
<p>visinotīti viṣayo jātiguṇakriyādīnāmāśrayaḥ, viṣaya eva vaiṣayikamiti;
'vinayādibhyaṣ‍ṭhak' (5.4.34) । tat <b>ṣoḍhā</b>— jātivaiṣayikaṃ guṇavaiṣayikaṃ kriyāvaiṣayikaṃ
dravyavaiṣayikaṃ saṃjñāvaiṣayikaṃ saṃketavaiṣayikamiti । teṣu</p>
<p><b>jātivaiṣayikaṃ</b> yathā— divi devāḥ, bhuvi manuṣyāḥ, jale matsyāḥ, pātāle
pannagāḥ ।</p>
<p><b>guṇavaiṣayikaṃ</b> yathā— āyuktaḥ kaṭakaraṇe kuśalaḥ, kaṭakaraṇe sādhuḥ, mātari
nipuṇaḥ, pitari pravīṇaḥ ।</p>
<p><b>kriyāvaiṣayikaṃ</b> yathā— prācyāmāditya udeti, dakṣiṇasyāmagastyo dṛśyate,
ākāśe śakuntāḥ patanti, śabdādiṣu śrotrādayo'bhiniviśante ।</p>
<p><b>dravyavaiṣayikaṃ</b> yathā— goṣu svāmī, goṣu dāyādaḥ, adhi brahmadatte pañcālāḥ,
adhi pañcāleṣu brahmadattaḥ ।</p>
<p><b>saṃjñāvaiṣayikaṃ</b> yathā— brahmaṇi pitāmahaḥ, viṣṇau puruṣottamaḥ, rudre maheśvaraḥ, indre śakraḥ ।</p>
<p><b>saṅketavaiṣayikaṃ</b> yathā— tarjanīmadhye udāttaḥ, kaniṣ‍ṭhikāmadhye'nudāttaḥ,
anāmikāmadhye svaritaḥ, madhyamāmadhye pracaya iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>aupaśleṣikam —6</b>)</p>
<p>upaśleṣo'vaṣ‍ṭambhaḥ tasmai prabhava<b>tyaupaśleṣikam</b>; tadapi <b>ṣoḍhā</b>— <b>ekadeśikamabhi</b>—
<b>vyāpakaṃ sāmīpyakamaupaśleṣikamaupaśalyakamaupacārikaṃ</b> ceti । teṣu—</p>
﻿
<pb n="238"/>
<p><b>ekadeśikaṃ</b> yathā— gṛhe tiṣ‍ṭhati, sthālyāṃ pacati, paryaṅke śete, śākhāyāṃ
lambate ।</p>
<p><b>abhivyāpakaṃ</b> yathā— tileṣu tailam, śaileṣu rāgaḥ, gavi gotvaṃ, tantuṣu paṭaḥ ।</p>
<p><b>sāmīpyakaṃ</b> yathā— gurau vasati, tīrthe vasati, gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ, kūpe gargakulam ।</p>
<p><b>aupaśleṣikaṃ</b> yathā—dva‍yahe bhoktā, kārtikyā āgrahāyaṇī māse,
ihastho'yamiṣvāsaḥ krośe lakṣyaṃ vidhyati, pāṭaliputrād rājagṛhaṃ
sap‍tasu yojaneṣu ।</p>
<p><b>aupaśalyakaṃ</b> yathā— upa khāryāṃ droṇaḥ, upa niṣke kārṣāpaṇam, upa vyāme
vitastiḥ, upa śate pañcāśat ।</p>
<p><b>aupacārikaṃ</b> yathā— yo yasya priyassa tasya hadaye vasati, yo yasya dveṣyassa
tasyākṣṇoḥ prativasati, samaḥ samagro muṣ‍ṭimadhye tiṣ‍ṭhati,
aṅgulyagre hastiyūthaśatamāsta iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>naimittikam —6</b>)</p>
<p>nimittameva <b>naimittikam</b>; tadapi ṣoḍhaiva— deśanaimittikaṃ kālanaimittikaṃ
bhāvanaimittikaṃ vastunaimittikaṃ karmanaimittikaṃ karmayoganaimittikamiti । teṣu —</p>
<p><b>deśanaimittikaṃ</b> yathā—gehe modate, araṇye bibheti, jale majjati, śvabhre patati ।</p>
<p><b>kālanaimittikaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kāśāḥ puṣpyanti meghānte madhau mādyanti kokilāḥ ।</l>
<l>puṣye pāyasamaśnīyānmaghāsu palalodanam ॥ 115 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>bhāvanaimittikaṃ</b> yathā— darśane prasīdati, virahe viṣīdati, arthalābhe hṛṣyati,
arivināśe tuṣyati ।</p>
<p><b>vastunaimittikaṃ</b> yathā— ātape klāmyati, chāyāyāmāśvasiti, doṣeṣūdvijate,
guṇeṣu rajyata iti ।</p>
<p><b>karmanaimittikaṃ</b> yathā— iṣ‍ṭī yajñe, parigaṇitī yājñikye, āmnātī chandasi,
adhītī vyākaraṇe ।</p>
<p><b>karmayoganaimittikaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ hanti dantayorhanti kuñjaram ।</l>
<l>vāleṣu camarīṃ hanti sīmni puṣkalako hataḥ ॥ 116 ॥</l></lg></b> (mabhā. 3.2.36)
﻿
<pb n="239"/>
<p>nanu ca nimittahetoḥ kārakatvāt kārakasya ca prayojakaparatantratvādiha kathaṃ
kārakatvamiti ।</p>
<p>ucyate, dvividhaḥ kārakahetuḥ <b>pravṛttaprerakaḥ apravṛttapreraka</b>ś‍ca । tatrādyo ṇijviṣayaḥ,
itarastu vidhyādyātmako nimittātmakaś‍ca । tayoś‍ca <b>prathamo</b> liṅloṭtavyādivācyaḥ ।</p>
<p>taduktam—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>dravyamātrasya tu praiṣe pṛcchyāderloḍ vidhīyate ।</l>
<l>sakriyasya prayogastu yadā sa viṣayo ṇicaḥ ॥ 117 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa. 3.7.126)
<p>(<b>adhikaraṇam</b>) <b>nimittātmakastu</b> kriyāśrayatvāt sap‍tamīvācyo naimittikamadhikaraṇamiti
vibhaktama<b>dhikaraṇam</b> ।</p>
<p>nanu ca upa khāryāṃ droṇaḥ, adhi pāñcāleṣu brahmadatta ityādau yadyadhikaraṇa eva
sap‍tamī adhikaṃ kimartham ucyate 'yasmādadhikaṃ yasya ceśvaravacanaṃ tatra sap‍tamī'
(2.3.9) iti । ucyate 'karmapravacanīyayukte dvitīyā (2.3.8) mā bādhiṣ‍ṭa' iti ।</p>
<p>nanu ca 'upapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktirbalīyasī' (mabhā. 2.3.4) iti dvitīyā
na bhaviṣyati, yathā goḥ svāmī vrajati, devān namaskarotīti ।</p>
<p>naivam; neyamupapadavibhaktiḥ, api tvantarbhūtakriyāntarasaṃbandhā karmavibhaktiḥ ।</p>
<p>tadyathā śākalyasya saṃhitāmanu prāvarṣat, saṃhitāmanu niśamya ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>tarhi kimarthaṃ vidhīyate?</p>
<p>kārakāntare'pi yathā syāt । tena upārjunaṃ yoddhāra ityapādāne'pi pañcamī
bādhate । ata eva 'pañcamyapāṅpari' (2.3.10) ityapādāne'pyārabhyata iti ।
etenādhītī vyākaraṇe, edhebhyo vrajatītyādayaḥ kārakavibhaktiviṣaye, goṣu svāmī,
prāggrāmādityādayaḥ saṃbandhavibhaktiviṣaye kārakavibhaktisamāveśāt prakāśitā bhavanti ।</p>
<p>nanu ca śaktissādhanaṃ, tad‍vaśena dravyasya kriyāsu yogitvāt । kiṃca dravyamapi
sādhanam, kalpayitvā sādhanabhedā(n), na punarāśrayitavyāḥ śaktayaḥ । saṃnyastā veti
(santyak‍taiveti) śaktiḥ ।</p>
<p>satyam, (śak‍ti—)bhedāssādhanamiti kalpitam । na ca tāmāmadhikaraṇaṃ dravyameveti
dravyānapekṣasādhanatvam, dravyasyāpi svakarmāyattajanmanastadapekṣayā tulyadoṣatvāt;
śaktīnāmeva ca sādhanatve pratyayābhihitāsu śaktiṣu dravyavacanānāmanuprayogo yujyate
'vardhate devadattaḥ, parigatamarthatattvam' iti । dravye tu sādhane tasyābhihitatvādanuprayogo na
prāpnoti । śaktīnāmeva ca sādhanatve 'adya bhuktvā devadatto dva‍yahe dva‍yahāda vā bhoktā'
﻿
<pb n="240"/>
iti śaktimadhyavartini kāle sap‍tamī vā kārakamadhye (2.3.7) labhyate ।
dravyasya devadattāderekatvānmadhye dva‍yahādikālo na saṃbhavati । śaktīnāmeva ca sādhanatve
'prāsāde asti' iti ghañādiviṣayamadhikaraṇamabhihitaṃ, na tvāsiviṣayamityanabhihita—
viṣayalakṣaṇā sap‍tamī labhyate; dravye satyabhihitatvād iti । śaktīnāmeva sādhanatve
yo'yamekadravyādhikaraṇaḥ sādhanabhedaḥ śrūyate, sa upapanno bhavati, 'vegena patito rūgṇaḥ',
'sphurato dhvanirudita' iti dravye tu tasyaikatvānna saṃbhavati । kriyābhedanibandhano
bhaviṣyatīti cet karmādiniyamo bādhyeta; pratītibhedaś‍ca na syāt ।</p>
<p>tanna, kriyāyā arthāntaratvāt na hyanyasya bhedaḥ, anyad bhidyate । api ca
dravyasyaikatve kutaḥ kriyābhedakāraṇabhedaḥ, kāryasyābhedāt । śaktīnāmeva ca sādhanatve
prātipadikād vibhaktayo yujyante । dravyasya tu prātipadikenābhihitatvād anarthakā notpadyeran ।</p>
<p>vacanāt svārthikā iti cet, karmādiḥ niyamo bādhyeta, pratītibhedaś‍ca na syāt
vṛkṣe vṛkṣeṇeti । asti cāsāvabhinne'pi prātipadikārthe tasmādarthāntaraṃ prātipadikārthād
vibhakta‍yarthaḥ kārakamiti ।</p>
<p>naivam; śakta‍yapekṣā tasya sādhanatvaṃ vihanti; śakterapi dravyāpekṣatve
tulyadoṣatvāt । na cānyāpekṣā kārakāṇāṃ kārakatvaṃ viruṇaddhi; kāryata
evānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kārakatvāvagateḥ । kāryaṃ hi kasyacit saṃbhave'pyanavāp‍tasattākaḥ
punaravāpnuvan sattāntarasya bhāva eva parigṛhītātiśayāntarasya kāraṇatāṃ sūcayati; na
tvakāraṇatāmeva । viśeṣaśālini tasminneva punarbhāvāt tadabhāve cābhāvāt । na khalu
kusūlādau bījasamavadhāne'pyalabdhopalabdheraṅkurasya kṣityādisahakārigrāmabījasya
samavadhānasadṛśyamānamūrtteranvayakāryaṃ na pratīyate, api tu tadeva bījaṃ samavahita—
kṣityādisahakāripratyayamasya janakamitaratheti gamyate ।</p>
<p>dravyasyaikatvāt sādhanabhedaḥ kathamiti cet ekadravyādhikaraṇāśśaktayo bhinnarūpāḥ
svarūpabhedenāśrayabhedamupadadhatyo'bhedamadhikaraṇasya darśayanti । ekasyāpi devadattādeḥ
śilpabhedāt takṣāyaskārādisasamākhyā arthabhedanibandhanāḥ saṃdṛśyante । śakta‍yastu
bhinnarūpā iti śaktisādhaniko'pi manyate । tāsāṃ ca vaśena tad‍dravyamāhitabhedaṃ
dravyasādhanikasyāpi sādhanabhedavyavasthāṃ racayati iti ।</p>
<p>yattūktam dravye sādhane pratyayābhihitatvāt tadanuprayogo na syāt, tatra
sāmānyamabhihitaṃ, viśeṣo na prayokṣyate iti;</p>

<pb n="241"/>
<p>na (tad) vaktavyama; sādhane vidhīyamānapratyayaḥ kathaṃ sādhanaṃ sāmānyama—
bhidadhīta ? sāmānyasya viśeṣāśrayatvād viśeṣa eva vā pratyayenaikarūpatvādanu—
prayogāpekṣiṇā'bhidhīyate gośabdenaiva prakaraṇādyapekṣiṇā gavādirartha iti ।</p>
<p>nanu cānyāpekṣayā viśeṣamabhidadhataḥ sāmānyasādhanaśaktīnāṃ viśeṣe śabdasyā—
bhidhānaśaktipratighāta iti ।</p>
<p>naivaṃ, śaktirviśeṣa evocyate । dhātoḥ kriyāviśeṣavacanādeva pratyayotpatteḥ । sa ca
kāryaviśeṣāśrayabhedābhyāmavadhāryate । tatra kāryabhedo dhātunaivābhihitaḥ; āśrayabhedaḥ punarapratītaḥ
padāntareṇaivocyate caitro maitra iti । tathāpyanyāpekṣā tulyaiva । na cāśritāśrayayossāmānā—
dhikaraṇyam । ataś‍caitro vartate iti na syāt, api tu caitro vardhata iti । api ca
dhātuḥ kriyāviśeṣavacana eveti kuta etad vardhate, yāvadanena vardhitavyam । idaṃ karma kuryāḥ,
'nāgarakavṛttaṃ' varteta, samān poṣān apuṣyat' ityādau sāmānyasya viśeṣaḥ pratīyate ।</p>
<p>yattu devadattāderdravyasyaikatvānmadhye dvyahādiḥ kālo na sambhavatītyuc‍yate, tadapi na
samyak; āśritopādhinimittasya bhedasyopapatteḥ । tathā hi vaktāro bhavanti, parud‌bhavān,
paṭurāsīt, paṭutaś‍caiṣamaḥ, adyānya evāsi saṃpanna (mabhā. 5.3.57) iti । tadevaṃ
sāmarthyabhedādāhitavibhāgamadhikaraṇaṃ bhāgaśo'vacchidya sādhanabhedaḥ prakalpyamāno
madhyamapyupakalpayati ।</p>
<p>na ca śaktipakṣe'pi sākṣānmadhyasambhavaḥ । pūrvaśaktikāle parasyāḥ, parakāle ca
pūrvasyā abhāvāt ।</p>
<p>athavā dvyahe bhoktetyavadhisap‍tamī dvyahād vā bhoktetyavadhereva pañcamī, sa
cāntyamojanenāvacchidyate । yadi tu madhyasiddhaye dravyabhedaḥ śaktibhedaś‍ca kal‍pyate, tadā
kartṛbhedād bhuk‍tveti k‍tvāpratyayaḥ 'samānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāle' (3.4.21) iti na syāt ।</p>
<p>upacaritābhedāśrayassa iti ced, madhyaṃ na sidhyati । athaikatvād bhuktikriyāyāṃ
kārakaikatvakālabhedāśrayaś‍ca kārakabhedaḥ, s‍nātvā vrajatīti na syāt;
s‍nānavrajikriyayoś‍ca bhedāt tannimittayoḥ kartṛśak‍tyorapi bhede samānakartṛkatvābhāvāt ।
nanu ca yasyāpi dravyamāśritaśaktibhedasaṃpāditanānātvaṃ sādhanaṃ tasyāpyeṣa doṣaḥ ।
a(nā)pi ca bhinnādhāravartitayā sāmarthyayorabhedamādheyaśaktivādinā śak‍yate vaktuṃ samānaḥ
karteti । yasya tu śaktibhedopanītastadādhārasya bhedaḥ, tasya nibandhanamupacaritamapyekatvaṃ
na vidyate, apekṣaṇīyaś‍cādhārabheda, kriyābhedasya paurvāparyavataḥ apekṣitatvāt ।</p>

<pb n="242"/>
<p>atrocyate—dravyasyaikatvena śaktyorekatvamucyate । śaktinānātvena ca dravyasyāpi
nānātvaṃ kariṣyate dravyasya tu pāramārthikamapyekatvaṃ na mṛṣyata ityaho kāmacāraḥ । api
tu śaktau sādhane paśau kartari hastikavāṭayoḥ kartroḥ iti (pamaḥ nyāsa. 3.2.54)
kathaṃ śaktirekādhārāvacchinnā pratipadyate ? pratipadyatām, sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pṛcchāmi; paśau
dravye yaḥ karteti cet, upamānāt karturiti na prāp‍noti ।</p>
<p>atha śaktibhedopakaraṇāḥ kartrādiśrutayaḥ tadadhikaraṇaṃ kāryayogitayā'vagamayanti,
śulkādaya iva rūpaviśeṣāśrayamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyopapatteḥ । jitaṃ tarhi bhavatā,
siddhaśśaktisādhanabhedaḥ, kartrādiśrutibhirāśrayasya śaktimato'bhidhānāt ।</p>
<p>kiñca śaktikārakapakṣe karmaṇa ekatve, karmaṇo dvitve, karmaṇo bahutve
vibhaktivacanādi na syāt; na hi guṇasya saṃkhyā saṃbandho'pi; dravye tu yujyate। yataḥ
karmādiśabdāḥ śaktimad‌dravyamaviruddhasaṃkhyāsambandhaṃ bodhayanti ।</p>
<p>nanu guṇasyāpi saṃkhyāsambandho dṛś‍yate pañca karmāṇi, catvāro'bhāvā—
strayassaṃyogā dve sāmānye ekassamavāya iti । na cāyamupacāraḥ pratyayāviśeṣāt evaṃ
śaktayo'pi kāryabhedabhinnāssaṅkhyābhedamanubhaviṣyanti ।</p>
<p>satyam,asti śaktīnāṃ bhedaḥ, na tu tatrāpi te vacanabhedaḥ, yasmādādityaṃ
paś‍yati stautīti darśanādikriyābhedād bhinnāsvapi śaktiṣu na bahavacanaṃ dṛś‍yate । na
paryāyoktau śaktayaḥ kriyābhirabhisaṃbadhyanta iti cet, tanna । pratyekasamāp‍tā api
kriyābhedāssamasyābhidhāneṣu vacanabhedaṃ prayuñjate । yathā pañca śarānasyati,
savyāpasavyābhyāṃ vidhyati, dvayoḥ paryaṅkyośśete iti ।</p>
<p>na ca paryāyeṇaiva darśanādayaḥ syuḥ, yaugapadyenāpi bhāvāt । tasmāt sāmarthyā—
dhāranibandhano vacanabhedo na śak‍tyāśraya iti । ata eva svātantryād vibhakta‌‍yā'pi
śaktirnābhidhīyate । yadi hi svatantrāṃ śaktiṃ vibhaktirabhidadhyāt tadā tad‌gatāmeva saṃkhyāṃ
vibhaktirabhidadhīta, samānaśabdopādānāt; na caitadasti । tasmād yasya saṃkhyāṃ
vibhaktirupādatte tadeva śaktimat kārakamiti ।</p>
<p>yattu śaktāveva vibhakta‍yarthe vartamānamavyayaṃ samasyate ityucyate tacchaktimatyapi
kārake avyayānāmapi sattvavacanāt tanmātrābhidhānamiti kathaṃ sattvabhūtaṃ
dravyamasattvārthenāvyayenābhidhīyeta ? yastu prāsāda āsta ityanabhihitalakṣaṇā sap‍tamī na
lakṣyata iti tatra yathā ghañādiviṣaye śaktimad‌dravyamabhihitaṃ, na tvāsiviṣayaśaktimaditi,

<pb n="243"/>
tatra kena sap‍tamī vāryate ? yadi ca ghañādayaḥ śaktimabhidadhīran tadā
śakterasiśabdābhihitāyāḥ śakta‍yantarāyogādāstāṃ, sap‍tamīdvitīyādayo'pi notpadyeran ।</p>
<p>kathaṃ caivamāha adhikaraṇādivacāni prāsādādayaḥ ।</p>
<p>te hi saṃjñāśabdā vṛkṣādivadeva keṣucidarthaviśeṣeṣu rūḍhāḥ kevalamamīṣāṃ
dharmaniyamā vā yathākathañcidutpattiṃ gamayanti । etena ca 'vegena patata' ityādau
yeyamekadravyādhikaraṇā sādhanabhedaśrutiḥ sāpi prativihitaiva bhavati ।</p>
<p>na caitāvad vācyaṃ, dravye kārake prātipadikādayo notpadyeran । dravyaṃ hi
vibhaktiliṅgaśaktisaṃkhyāsvarthaparimāṇavat sāmānyamātrayā prātipadikamātreṇābhidhīyate,
śaktisaṃkhyāliṅgavac‍ca vibhaktivacanasaṃskāro labhyata ityataḥ sthitametacchaktimad dravyaṃ
kārakamiti ।</p>
<p>(<b>4. puruṣaḥ</b>)</p>
<p>ākhyātapratyayābhidheyaḥ kārakaviśeṣaḥ <b>puruṣaḥ</b> ।</p>
<p>sa tridhā— <b>prathamo, madhyama uttamaś‍ca</b> । tatra parasmaipadātmanepadayoḥ prathamatrikā—
bhidheyaḥ <b>prathamaḥ</b>, madhyamatrikābhidheyo <b>madhyamaḥ</b>, antyatrikābhidheya <b>uttamaḥ</b> । tatra ca—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>pratyu/tyaktāparabhāvaś‍cedupādhiḥ/dhī kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ।</l>
<l>tayoḥ śrutiviśeṣeṇa vācakau madhyamottamau ॥ 118 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa. 3.10.1)
<p>tadāha— yuṣmadi madhyamaḥ, asmadyuttamaḥ, śeṣe prathama (1.4.105, 107, 108)
iti । tatra kartari puruṣatrayaprayoge yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.65)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>athāha varṇī vidito maheśvarastadarthinī tvaṃ punareva vartase ।</l>
<l>amaṅgalābhyāsaratiṃ vicintya taṃ tavābhyanujñā na tu kartumutsahe ॥ 119 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>karmaṇi yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>yadi tvaṃ manyase tena tvayā sa yadi toṣyate ।</l>
<l>tat kimasthānakopena dūti! dahyāmahe vayam ॥ 120 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>athaiṣāṃ k‍vacit prathama eva yathā— bhāvaprayogeṣu yuvābhyāmāsyate, asmābhirgaṇyate
iti k‍vacinmadhyama eva yathā kriyāsamābhihāre hisvābhyāṃ samuc‍cayeṣu lunīhi
lunīhityevāyaṃ lunāti, alāvīt laviṣyati vā, adhīṣvādhīṣvetyevamadhīyāte, adhyaiṣātāṃ
adhīṣyete vā, rāṣṭramaṭa, maṭhamaṭa khadūramaṭetyevāvāmaṭāvaḥ, aṭiṣva aṭiṣyāvo vā,
chando'dhīṣva vyākaraṇamadhīṣva, niruktamadhīṣvetyeva vayamadhīmahe, adhyagīṣmahi adhyeṣyāmahe
vā, saktūn piba, dhānāḥ, khādata, odanaṃ bhuṅkṣvaṃ ityevaṃ yūyamabhyavaharatha abhyavāhārṣṭa

<pb n="244"/>
abhyavahariṣyatha vā । k‍vaciduttama eva yathā prahāse manyate ehi manye rathena yāsyasi,
na hi yāsyasi, yātaste pitā; ehi manye odanaṃ bhokṣyase, na hi bhokṣyase,
bhuktasso'tithibhiriti । manyatestu uttamaviṣaye'pi madhyama eva;tatra hyayamarthaḥehi manyase rathena
yāsyāmi, ehi manyasa odanaṃ bhokṣyatha iti । yugapad‌vacane punaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ paro bhavati yathā
sa ca tvaṃ ca pacathaḥ, tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca pacāvaḥ, sa ca tvaṃ cāhaṃ caṃ pacāma iti । yugapadavacanatā
caikaśeṣasya dvandvasamānārthatvāc‍ca arthaviṣayaiva gṛhyate; na cārthaviṣayā (vāpa.—3) tena</p>
<b><lg>
<l>ahaṃ vā kumbhakarṇo vā tvaṃ vā rākṣasapuṅgava ।</l>
<l>indnajid‌‍vā nikumbho vā bhareyurbhāramīdṛśam ॥ 121 ॥</l></lg></b>(rāmā.6.7.6) iti ।
<p>śeṣe prathama eva bhavati, yathā tvamahamanyo vā gacchatviti ।</p>
<p>evaṃ tarhi cārthe yugapad‌vacanatāyāmabhāvāt vaheyuriti bahuvacanaṃ na prāp‍noti ।</p>
<p>naivam; vārtheṣu k‍vacidyugapad‌vacanatā dṛś‍yate, dvau vā trayo vā dvitrā iti ।
āha ca <b>mahābhāṣyakāraḥ</b>, 'dvau vetyukte trayo veti gamyate, trayo vetyukte dvau veti
gamyate । saiṣā pañcadhiṣṭhānā vāk । tatra yuktaṃ bahuvacanam । sāmānyāśrayaṃ vā bahuvacanam,
yathā kati bhavataḥ putrāḥ kati bhavato bhāryā iti ।</p>
<b><lg>
<l>atvaṃ saṃpadyate yasminna tasmin yuṣmadāśrayā ।</l>
<l>pravṛttiḥ puruṣasyāsti prakṛtessā vidhīyate ॥ 122 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa.3.7.117)
<p>yathā atvaṃ tvaṃ saṃpadyate tvad‌bhavati, ayūyaṃ yūyaṃ saṃpadyate yuṣmadbhavantīti ।
upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat । prakṛtivikṛtyāśrayapuruṣasaṃpradhāraṇāyāṃ prakṛtyāśraya eva puruṣo bhavati,
na vikṛtyāśraya iti । tena anahamahaṃ saṃpadyate mad‌bhavati, avayaṃ vayaṃ saṃpadyante
asmad‌bhavanti, asassa saṃpadyate tad‌bhavati, anahamahaṃ saṃpadyase madbhavasītyādyapi siddhaṃ
bhavati । kā punaratropapattiḥ ? abhūtatadbhāve prakṛtivikṛtyoḥ kartṛtvavivakṣāyāṃ kāmacāraḥ ।
tathā hi—k‍vacid‍‌vikṛteḥ kartṛtvaṃ vivakṣyate, yathā mūtrāya saṃpadyate yavāgūḥ, yathā ca
suvarṇapiṇḍaḥ punaraparayā ākṛtyā saṃvṛttaḥ khadirāṅgārasavarṇe kuṇḍale bhavata iti ।</p>
<p>tathā hi—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>k‍lṛpi saṃpadyamāne yā caturthī sā vikārataḥ ।</l>
<l>suvarṇapiṇḍe prakṛtau vacanaṃ kuṇḍalāśrayam ॥ 123 ॥</l></lg></b>(vāpa.3.7.115)
<p>k‍vacittu prakṛteḥ; yathā saghṅībhavanti brāhmaṇāḥ, mahadbhūtaś‍candramā (mabhā. 6.3.46) iti ।
atra yadi prakṛteḥ kartṛtvaṃ na vivakṣyate tadā vikṛtessaṅghasyaiva kartṛtvād‌bhavantīti

<pb n="245"/>
bahuvacanaṃ na prāp‍noti । mahad‌bhūtaḥ ityatra mahacchabdasya ca mukhyārthatvād
'ānmahatassamānādhikaraṇajātīyayoḥ' (6.3.46) ityātvaṃ syāt । prakṛtirhi
kācidupacaritavikārarūpā, yathā indraḥ sthūṇā, upendro grāva iti; kācit pariṇāminī
yathā dugdhaṃ dadhi bhavati, hema kuṇḍalībhavati । tatra vipariṇāminīṣu prakṛtiṣu
saṅghamahattvādibhirmukhyairapi yoge pūrvasyā avasthāyāḥ pracyutasyottarāmavasthāṃ prāp‍tasya
pūrvottarayoravasthayorāśritayosavyāpāratvāt pūrvasyāmavasthāyāṃ kartṛtvavivakṣāyāḥ
saṅghamahadādervikāraśabdasya prakṛtyupagrāhiṇo gauṇatvaṃ vijñāyate । taduktam— (vāpa.2.280)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>mahattvaṃ saṅghabhāvaṃ ca prakṛtiḥ pratipadyate ।</l>
<l>bhede nāpekṣitā sā tu gauṇatvasya prasādhikā ॥ 124 ॥</l></lg></b> iti ।
<p>yadyevam, atimahatī mahatī saṃpannā mahadbhūtā brāhmaṇīti puṃvadbhāvo na prāp‍noti ।
arthāśrayaḥ etadevaṃ bhavati (mabhā. 6.3.46); śabdāśrayaś‍ca puṃvadbhāvaḥ; 'goto ṇit'
(7.1.90), 'autoṃśasoḥ' iti (6.2.93) vāhīke vartamānasya gośabdasya
gaustiṣṭhati gāmanayeti vṛddhirātvaṃ ca bhavati (mabhā. 6.3.46) ॥</p>
<b><lg>
<l>te'mī kriyā ca kālaś‍ca kārakaṃ puruṣastathā ।</l>
<l>uktāḥ padārthāś‍catvārassvaissvairbhedaissamanvitāḥ ॥ 125 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>dravyātmā cāpi kālo yaḥ prasaṅgāt so'pi kīrtitaḥ ।</l>
<l>sa hi prāyaḥ prabandheṣu tatra tatropayujyate ॥ 126 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b><lg>
<l>kriyāyāṃ kālo'ntarbhavati puruṣaḥ kārakapade
pradhāne sopādhidvayamapi tadetanniviśate ।</l>
<l>pradhānaṃ taṃ prāhuryamabhidadhate ghañprabhṛtayaḥ
sahopaskārārthorniviśati sa tu prātipadike ॥ 127 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>iti mahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śrṛṅgāraprakāśe
kriyādyarthacatuṣṭayaprakāśo nāma
॥ caturthaḥ prakāśaḥ ॥ 4 ॥</b></p>
<lg>
<l>revāprasādasya sanātanasya prakāśasaṃśodhanakāryametat ।</l>
<l>prakāśametaṃ tu turīyamāp‍taṃ prasīdatādatra mahān sa devaḥ ॥</l>
</lg>

<pb n="246"/>
<p>atha</p>
<p><b>śrṛṅgāraprakāśe pañcamaḥ prakāśaḥ</b></p>
<p>upādhyādyarthacatuṣṭayaprakāśo nāma</p>
<p>(<b>5. upādhiḥ</b>)</p>
<p>(<b>kriyopādhiḥ—12</b>)</p>
<p>prakṛtyarthapratyayārthabhedeṣu kārakāṇāṃ pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ <b>kriyāḥ</b> tāmanupahitāṃ
kṛbhvastayo vadanti । teṣāṃ parasparamasaṃbhedasaṃbhedābhyāṃ sāmyotkarṣāpakarṣajanmāno dvādaśa
<b>dhātvarthabhedāḥ kriyā</b> bhavanti । tadyathā —</p>
<p><b>akarmakāḥ antaḥkarmakāḥ, arthāntarakarmakāḥ, avivakṣitakarmakāḥ,
prasiddhakarmakāḥ, dvikarmakāḥ, prasiddhakartṛkāḥ, bhāvakartṛkāḥ, karmakartṛkāḥ,
kartṛsthakriyāḥ, karmasthakriyāḥ, ubhayasthakriyāś‍ceti ।</b></p>
<p>te <b>cāparispandasaparispandabhedāt</b> pratyekaṃ dvidhā bhūtvā caturviṃśatirjāyante ।</p>
<p>tatra svabhāvato'stistu udāsīnakartṛkatvād <b>aparispandaḥ</b> ।</p>
<p>karotiḥ prayuñjānakartṛkatvāt <b>saparispandaḥ ।</b></p>
<p>bhavatiḥ vikurvāṇakartṛkatvāt <b>saparispandāparispanda</b> iti sthitam ।</p>
<p>(<b>1. akarmakāḥ</b>) ato'styarthā bhavatyarthāś‍ca nyagbhavatayo nyagatayaś‍cākarmakā bhavanti । teṣu—</p>
<p>pūrve aparispandā yathā— bhidyate, svadate, vartate, prīyata iti ।</p>
<p>uttare saparispandā yathā— jāyate, vivardhate, X X X X X X te, sphuratīti ।</p>
<p>(<b>2. antaḥ karmakāḥ</b>) ta eva nyakkarotayo'ntaḥ karmakāḥ; teṣu —</p>
<p>pūrve aparispandā yathā— jīvati, mriyate, putrīyati, prāṇitīti ।
uttare saparispandā yathā— nṛtyati, śvasiti, bāṣpāyate, roditīti ।</p>
<p>(<b>3. arthāntarakarmakāḥ</b>) astikarotyarthāḥ karotibhavatyarthāś‍cārthāntarakarmakāḥ । teṣu —</p>
<p>pūrve aparispandā yathā— tarati kāṣṭhaṃ, tarati vipadaṃ, viparyasyati matiṃ,
viparyasyati hastamiti ।</p>
<p>uttare saparispandā yathā— vahati nadī, vahati bhāraṃ, patati parṇaṃ, patatyadhvānamiti ।</p>

<pb n="247"/>
<p>(<b>4. avivakṣitakarmakāḥ</b>) ta evānutkarotayo'pi avivakṣitakarmakāḥ । teṣu —</p>
<p>pūrve aparispandā yathā— saṃjñā saṃjñinyabhiniviśate, buddhistattvamabhiniviśate,
tīrtha upavisati, trirātramupavasatīti ।</p>
<p>uttare saparispapandā yathā— caitro hasati, maitraṃ hasati, cakraṃ bhramati, deśān bhramatīti ।</p>
<p>(<b>5. prasiddhakarmakāḥ</b>) utkarotayastu ta eva prasiddhakarmakāḥ । teṣu—</p>
<p>pūrve aparispandā yathā— vapatītyukte bījamiti gamyate, prasūta ityukte
garbhamiti gamyata iti ।</p>
<p>uttare saparispandā yathā— kṛṣatītyukte kṣetramiti gamyate, pariṇayatītyukte
kanyāmiti gamyata iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>6. dvikarmakāḥ</b>) satyevotkarotitve nyagastayo nyagbhavatayaś‍ca ta eva dvikarmakāḥ । teṣu—</p>
<p>pūrve aparispandā yathā— liṅgaṃ liṅginamavagamayati jñātāraṃ, jayati
śatamaśvānaśvasenamiti ।</p>
<p>uttare saparispandā yathā— gāṃ dogdhi payaḥ, vṛkṣamapacinoti phalānīti । evamete
ṣaṭ dviyogavikalpāḥ । paraṃ triyogavikalpāḥ ṣaḍbhavanti ।</p>
<p>(<b>7. prasiddhakartṛtāḥ</b>) tatrodastaya udbhavatayo vā prasiddhakartṛkāḥ । teṣu—</p>
<p>pūrve aparispandā yathā— dahatītyuttke vahniriti gamyate ।</p>
<p>uttare saparispandā yathā— kūjatītyukte (pika iti gamyate), (heṣata ityukte)
aś‍va iti gamyata iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>8. bhāvakartṛkāḥ</b>) nyagbhavatikarotayo nyagastikarotayo vā bhāvakartṛkāḥ । teṣu—
pūrve aparispandā yathā —corasya rujati, corasyāmayati, coraṃ jvarayati, coraṃ
saṃtāpayatīti ।</p>
<p>uttare saparispandā yathā— bhavati pakṣyati, bhavatyapākṣīt, bhavedapi bhavet,
syādapi syāditi ।</p>
<p>(<b>9. karmakartṛkāḥ</b>) udastinyakkarotaya udbhavatinyakkarotayo vā karmakartṛkāḥ । teṣu—</p>
<p>pūrve aparispandā yathā— dugdhe gaussvayameva, pras‍nute gaussvayameva, bhūṣayate
kanyā svayameveti ।</p>
<p>uttare saparispandā yathā—avakirate hastī svayameva, namate daṇḍaḥ svayameva,
ucchrayate daṇḍassvayameva, ārohayate hastī svayameveti ।</p>

<pb n="248"/>
<p>(<b>10. kartṛsthakriyāḥ</b>) udastikarotayaḥ udbhavatikarotayo vā kartṛsthakriyāḥ । teṣu—</p>
<p>pūrve aparispandā yathā—arhati pūjāṃ, jānāti varṇaṃ, paś‍yati rūpaṃ, śṛṇoti śabdamiti ।
uttare saparispandā yathā— gacchati, grāmam, ārohayatyaśvam iti ।</p>
<p>(<b>11. karmasthakriyāḥ</b>) nyagbhavatyutkarotayo nyagastyutkarotayo vā karmasthakriyāḥ । teṣu—</p>
<p>pūrve aparispandā yathā— dunoti śatruṃ, dhinoti mitraṃ, madayati suhṛdaṃ, sukhayati
sakhāyamiti ।</p>
<p>uttare saparispandā yathā— pacatyodanaṃ, bhinatti kusūlaṃ, saṃkṣṇute śastraṃ, takṣṇoti yūpamiti ।</p>
<p>(<b>12. ubhayasthakriyāḥ</b>) nyagbhavatyudastikarotayo nyagastyudbhavatikarotayo vā ubhayasthakriyāḥ । teṣu—</p>
<p>pūrve aparispandā yathā— labhate pūjāṃ, prāp‍noti dharmam . . . . . . . . . ।</p>
<p>uttare saparispandā yathā— bhuṅkta odanam, adhīte svādhyāyaṃ, tapyate tapaḥ,
sādhayati svargamiti ।</p>
<p>nanu ca bhavati pakṣyati, bhavatyapākṣīt, bhavedapi bhavet, syādapi syāditi
naitāvastibhavatyarthau, api tu sākṣādastibhavatī । tau cānupahitakriyābhidhāyakāviti
nopādhī bhavitumarhataḥ । ucyate— 'asa bhuvi', 'bhū sattāyām' iti dhātupāṭhādanu—
prayogavarjamārdhadhātuke'sterbhūvidhānāt saṅkara eveti vijñāyate । evamapi karotyarthānupraveśo
durupapādaḥ । so'pi kartṛtvānyathānupapatterupapatsyate ।</p>
