<p>(<b>9. prakīrṇakarmāṇi —11</b>)</p>
<p>atha pratibodhanaṃ, parihāsaḥ, upadeśa; pratibo/ṣedhanaṃ, upajāpaḥ, skhalitagopanamiti
prakīrṇakarmāṇi । tāni prāyaśaḥ sakhīdūtyoreveti tayorevodāhriyante । tatra—</p>
<p>1. <b>sakhīpratibodhanaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 1.10)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>sahi erisi c‍cia gaī mā ruvvasu taṃsa—valia—muhaaṃdaṃ ।</l>
<l>eāṇaṃ	bāla—bāluṃki—taṃtukuḍilāṇaṃ	pemmāṇaṃ ॥ 220 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(sakhi īdṛśyeva gatiḥ, mā rodīḥ tryasravalitamukhacandram ।</l>
<l>eteṣāṃ	bālakarkaṭītantukuṭilānāṃ	premṇām ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>yathā vā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>yad vaco viparītakāriṇi mayi premaskhale na śrutā
yat kalyāṇaparāṅ‌mukhi! priyatamaḥ pādānato nekṣitaḥ ।</l>
<l>paśyaitannanu	paśya	durnayatarorasyāpi	pāpaṃ	phalaṃ
yenendurdahano	tathā	malayajo	vāyuḥ	kuṭhārīkṛtaḥ! ॥ 221 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>2. <b>dūtīpratibodhanaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 6.16)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kiṃ ruvasi kiṃ viva soasi kiṃ kuppasi suaṇu ek‍kamek‍kassa ।</l>
<l>pemmaṃ	visaṃ	va	visamaṃ	sāhasu	ko	ruṃdhiuṃ	tarai ॥ 222 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(kiṃ rodiṣi kimiva śocasi kiṃ kupyasi sutanu ekaikasmai ।</l>
<l>prema	viṣamiva	viṣamaṃ	kathaya	ko	roddha‍uṃ	śak‍noti ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>yathā vā—(amaru. 80)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>anālocya premṇaḥ pariṇatimanāpṛcch‌ya suhṛda—
stvayā darpānmānaḥ saralahṛdaye! samprati kṛtaḥ ।</l>
<l>samākṛṣ‍ṭā	hyete	virahadahanodbhāsuraśikhāḥ
svahastenāṅgārāstadalamadhunāraṇyaruditaiḥ	॥ 223 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<pb n="1361"/>
<p>3. <b>sakhīparihāso</b> yathā—(kavyāda. 2.289)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>idamamlānamālāyā lag‍naṃ ‍ stanataṭe tava ।</l>
<l>chādyatāmuttarīyeṇa	navaṃ	nakhapadaṃ	sakhi ॥ 224 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>yathā vā—(gāsa. 1.87)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>avalaṃbiamāṇaparammuhīe eṃtassa māṇiṇi! piassa ।</l>
<l>puṭṭha	pulauggamo	tuha	kahei	samuhaṭṭhiaṃ	hiaaṃ ॥ 225 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(avalaṃmbitamānaparāṅ‌gamukhyā prāp‍tasya mānini! priyasya ।</l>
<l>pṛṣ‍ṭhapulakodgamastava	kathayati	sammukhasthitaṃ	hṛdayam ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>yathā vā—(gāsa. 928ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>ḍhakkesi caliavalae hatthe muṃcasi ahomuhī bāhaṃ ।</l>
<l>parirumbhasi ṇīsāse bahuaṃ te māṇaviṇṇāṇaṃ ॥ 226 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(sthagayasi calitavalanau hastau muñcasyadhomukhī bāṣpam ।</l>
<l>pratiruṇatsi niḥśvāsān bahulaṃ te mānavijñānam ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>4. <b>manopadeśeṣu sakhyupadeśo</b> yathā—(gāsa. 5.65)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>pāapaḍaṇāṇa	muddhe! rahasa-balāmoḍi-cuṃbiavvāṇa ।</l>
<l>daṃsaṇamettapasijjiri! cukkasi	suhāṇaṃ	bahuāṇaṃ ॥ 227 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(pādapatanānāṃ	mugdhe	rabhasabalātkāracumbitavyānām ।</l>
<l>darśanamātraprasādaśīle vañcitāsi sukhānāṃ bahukānām ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>yathā vā—(gāsa. 5.32)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>pāapaḍio ṇa gaṇio, piaṃ bhaṇaṃto vi appiaṃ bhaṇio ।</l>
<l>vaccaṃto vi ṇa ruddho, bhaṇa kassa kae kao māṇo ॥ 228 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(pādapatito na gaṇitaḥ priyaṃ bhaṇannapyapriyaṃ bhaṇitaḥ ।</l>
<l>gañchannapi na niruddho bhaṇa kasya kṛte kṛto mānaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>5. <b>dūtyupadeśo</b> yathā—(gāsa. 895ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>jai puttali! bahuehiṃ aṇuṇaasokkhehi atthi de kajjaṃ ।</l>
<l>rua	tāva	geṇha	māṇaṃ	khaṇamettaṃ	tammi	suhaammi ॥ 229 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<pb n="1362"/>
<lg>
<l>(yadi putrike bahubhiranunayasaukhyairasti te kāryam ।</l>
<l>ruda tāvat gṛhāṇa mānaṃ kṣaṇamātraṃ tasmin subhage ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>yathā vā—(gāsa. 894ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>aṇuṇaapasaraṃtapiapaḍaṇūsavaṃ	sarahasaṃ	cuṃbaṇasuhelliṃ ।</l>
<l>eāi a aṇṇāi a avasovva kao phalai māṇo ॥ 230 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(anunayaprasaratpriyapatanotsavaṃ sarabhasaṃ cumbanasukhakelim ।</l>
<l>etāni cānyāni cāvaśa eva kṛtaḥ phalati mānaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>6. <b>mānapratiṣedhe sakhīpratiṣedho</b> yathā—(gāsa. 6.22)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>māṇummattāem̐ tae akāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ kuṇaṃtīe ।</l>
<l>addaṃsaṇeṇa	pemmaṃ	viṇāsiaṃ	poḍhavāeṇa ॥ 231 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(mānonmattayā tayā akāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ kurvatyā ।</l>
<l>adarśanena	prema	vināśitaṃ	prauḍhavādena ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>yathā vā—(gāsa. 4.9)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>jaṃ jaṃ pihulaṃ aṃgaṃ taṃ taṃ jāaṃ kisoari kisaṃ te ।</l>
<l>jaṃ jaṃ taṇuaṃ taṃ taṃ vi ṇiṭṭhiaṃ kiṃ tha māṇeṇa ॥ 232 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(yadyadvikalamaṅga tattajjātaṃ kṛśodari kṛśaṃ te ।</l>
<l>yadyattanukaṃ tattadapi niṣ‍ṭhitaṃ kimatra mānena ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>7. <b>dūtīpratiṣedho</b> yathā—(gāsa. 126ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>suhaā vi suṃdari vi hu taruṇī vi hu māṇaṇitti ā putti ।</l>
<l>caṃdaṇalaṭṭhi	vva	bhuaṃgadūmiā	kiṃ	ṇu	dūmesi ॥ 233 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(subhagāpi sundaryapi khalu taruṇyapi khalu māninīti ā putri ।</l>
<l>candanalateva	bhujaṅgadūnā	kiṃnu	dunoṣi ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>yathā vā—(gāsa. 1.45)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>ṇaiūrasaccahe jovaṇammi diahesu ṇiccapahiesu ।</l>
<l>aṇiattāsu	a	rāīsu	putti	kiṃ	daḍḍhamāṇeṇa ॥ 234 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>{nadīpūrasadṛśe	yauvane	divaseṣu	nityapathikeṣu ।</l>
<l>anirvṛtāsu ca rātriṣu putri kiṃ dagdhamānena ॥}</l>
</lg>
<pb n="1363"/>
<p>8. <b>nāyakopajāpeṣu sakhyupajāpo</b> yathā—(gāsa. 121ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kajjaṃ viṇa vi kaamāṇaḍaṃbarā pulaabhiṇṇasavvaṃgī ।</l>
<l>ujjallāliṃgaṇasokkhalālasā putti muṇiāsi varāī ॥ 234 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(kāryaṃ	vināpi	kṛtamānaḍambarā	pulakabhinnasarvāṅgī ।</l>
<l>ujvalāliṅganasaukhyalālasā putri jñātāsi varākī ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>yathā vā—(gāsa. 3.77)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>aṇuṇaapasāiāe tujjha varāhe ciraṃ gaṇaṃtīe ।</l>
<l>apahuttohaahatthaṃgulīe	tīe	ciraṃ	ruṇṇaṃ ॥ 236 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(anunayaprasāditayā tavāparādhāṃś‍ciraṃ gaṇayantyā ।</l>
<l>aprabhūtobhayahastāṅragulyā tayā ciraṃ ruditam ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>9. <b>dūtyupajāpo</b> yathā—(gāsa. 4.52)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kaṃḍujjuā varāī ajja tae sā kaāvarāheṇa ।</l>
<l>alasāiaruṇṇaviaṃbhiāi diaheṇa sikkhaviā ॥ 237 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(kāṇḍarjukā varākī adya tvayā kṛtāparādhena ।</l>
<l>alasāyitaruditavijṛmbhitāni divasena śikṣitā ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>yathā vā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>sabbhāvasiṇehavevirīe	jeṇa	tumaṃ	nivattaṃto ।</l>
<l>sā suhaa patta dūīkulavilakkhevva se didṭhī ॥ 238 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(sadbhāvas‍nehavepanaśīlāyāḥ yena tvaṃ nivartamānaḥ ।</l>
<l>sā subhaga! patradūtīkulavilakṣeva tasyāḥ dṛṣ‍ṭiḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>10. <b>skhalitagopaneṣu sakhīgopanaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 909ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>veārijjasi muddhe gottakkhalaṇeṇa mā khu tuṃ ruvasu ।</l>
<l>kiṃ va ṇa pecchasi aṇṇaha eddahamettehi acchīhiṃ ॥ 239 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(vyākulīkriyase mugdhe! gotraskhalanena mā khalu tvaṃ rodīḥ।
kiṃ vā na paśyasyanyathā etāvanmātrābhyāmakṣibhyām॥)</p>
<p>yathā vā—(gāsa. 908ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>ai caṃḍi kiṃ ṇa pecchasi jai so vāharai aṇṇagotteṇa ।</l>
<l>aha de icchai maccharapaṇacciacchaṃ muhaṃ dad‌ṭhuṃ ॥ 240 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<pb n="1364"/>
<lg>
<l>(ayi caṇḍi! kiṃ na paśyasi yat sa vyāharatyanyagotreṇa ।</l>
<l>asau ta icchati matsarapraṇartitākṣi! mukhaṃ draṣ‍ṭum ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>11. <b>dūtīgopanaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 967ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>keligottakkhalaṇe vi kuppae kaiaaṃ aāṇaṃtī ।</l>
<l>dud‌dama! mua parihasaṃ ajjā saccaṃ cia paruṇṇā ॥ 241 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(kelīgotraskhalane'pi kupyati kaitavamajānantī ।</l>
<l>durdama! muñca parihāsaṃ āryā satyameva praruditā ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>yathā vā—(gāsa. 907ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>mā velavesu bahuaṃ puttaa! aliaihi gottehiṃ ।</l>
<l>esā vi jāṇaiccia parihāsonmissabhaṇiāiṃ ॥ 242 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(mā vyākulaya bahukaṃ putraka! alīkairgotraiḥ ।</l>
<l>eṣāpi	jānātyeva	parihāsonmiśrabhaṇitāni ॥)</l>
</lg>
<b>(10. mānavikārāḥ—6), (11. manopalakṣaṇasthānāni—6)</b>
<p>athāsya ṣaḍ <b>vikārā</b> bhavanti—'jāyate, vivardhate, vivartate, vipariṇamate,
apakṣīyate, vinaśyatīti ।</p>
<p>ṣaṭ <b>copalakṣaṇasthānāni</b>—'hṛdayaṃ, cakṣuṣī, vaktraṃ, vāgvapuśceṣ‍ṭe'ti । teṣu—</p>
<p>1. <b>jāyate</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>dhūmāyate manasi mūrcchati ceṣ‍ṭiteṣu sanadīpyate vapuṣi cakṣuṣi jājvalīti ।</l>
<l>vaktre parisphurati vāci vijṛmbhate'syāḥ kāntāparādhajanito bata mānavahriḥ ॥ 243 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>2. <b>vivardhate</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>bhruvorbhedaḥ śedo manasi vacasi śvāsabhṛśatā
dṛśorbāṣpaḥ	kampo	vapuṣi	kucayoraśrunicayaḥ ।</l>
<l>vimohaśceṣ‍ṭāsu	sphuritapunaruktānyadharayo—
stavākalpaḥ ko'yaṃ bata taruṇi manena vihitaḥ ॥ 244 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>3. <b>vivartate</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>tadevajihyākṣaṃ	mukhamaviśadāstā	gira	imāḥ
sa	evāṅgakṣepo	mayi	sarasamāśliṣyati	tanum ।</l>
</lg></b>
<pb n="1365"/>
<b><lg>
<l>yaduktapratyuktaṃ	tadapadu	śiraḥ	kampanaparaṃ
priyā	manenāho	punarapi	kṛtā	me	navavadhūḥ ॥ 245 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>4. <b>vipariṇamate</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>āruṇyaṃ paripīya gaṇḍaphalake labdhodayaḥ pāṇyimā
viśrāntasphurito'dharastaralatāṃ	śvāsānilairnīyate ।</l>
<l>muktā sauṣ‍ṭhavakarkaśā ca valanā kārśyaślathairaṅgakaiḥ
kaṣ‍ṭo mānakalistanurna sahate tvaṃ kopanā kiṃ bruve ॥ 246 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>5. <b>apakṣīyate</b> yathā—(amaru. 28)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>bhrūbhede racite'pi dṛṣ‍ṭiradhikaṃ sotkaṇṭhamud‌vīkṣate
ruddhāyāmapi vāci sāsmitāmidaṃ dagdhānanaṃ jāyate ।</l>
<l>kārkaśyaṃ janite vicetasi tanū romāñcamālambate
dṛṣ‍ṭe nirvahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati kathaṃ mānasya tasmiñ jane ॥ 247 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>6. <b>vinaśyati</b> yathā—(amaru. 160)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>dṛṣ‍ṭe locanavartmanā mukulitaṃ pārśvasthite vaktrava—
nnyagbhūtaṃ bahirāsitaṃ pulakavat sparśaṃ samātanvatī ।</l>
<l>nīvībandhavadāgataṃ śithilatāṃ sambhāṣamāṇe priye
manenāpasṛtaṃ hriyeva sudṛśaḥ pādaspṛśi preyasi ॥ 248 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<b>(12. manotpattikāraṇāni—12)</b>
<p>athāto mānotpattikāraṇāni—'vipriyakaraṇaṃ,	priyākaraṇaṃ,	vāritavāmatā,
kāmacāraḥ,	svarūpatānyatvaṃ,	śāṭhyaṃ,	pratāraṇaṃ,	khaṇḍanam,	avajñānam,	akṛtajñatā,
sapat‍nī—nāmagrahaṇaṃ,	gotraskhalanami'ti । teṣu—</p>
<p>1. <b>vipriyakaraṇaṃ</b> yathā—(harivi.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>taṃ tiasakusumadāṇaṃ/maṃ hariṇā ṇimmahia—surahi—gaṃdhāmoaṃ ।</l>
<l>appaṇaaṃ pi dūmia—paṇaiṇi—hiaeṇa ruppiṇie viiṇṇaṃ ॥ 249 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(tat tridaśakusumadāma hariṇā nirmathitasurabhigandhāmodam ।</l>
<l>apraṇayitamapi dūnapraṇayinīhṛdayena rukmiṇyai vitīrṇam ॥)</l>
</lg>
<pb n="1366"/>
<p>2. <b>priyākaraṇaṃ</b> yathā—(śāku. 5.23)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>mayyeva	vismaraṇadāruṇacittavṛttau	vṛttaṃ	rahaḥpraṇayamapratipadyamāne ।</l>
<l>bhedād bhruvoḥ kuṭilayoratilohitākṣyā	bhagnaṃ śārāsanamivātiruṣā smarasya ॥ 250 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>3. <b>vāritavāmatā</b> yathā—(gāsa. 4.4)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>jaha jaha vāei pio taha taha ṇaccāmi caṃcale pemme ।</l>
<l>vallī	valei	aṅgaṃ	sahāvathaddhe	virukkhammi ॥ 251 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(yathā yathā vādayati priyastathā tathā nṛtyāmi cañcale premṇi ।</l>
<l>vallī	valayatyaṅgaṃ	svabhāvastabdhe'pi	vṛkṣe ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>4. <b>kāmacāro</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>dūsahakaāvarāhaṃ avarahe vi gurue pasāāhimuhaṃ ।</l>
<l>appacchaṃdapaataṃ piaṃ ca pemmaṃ ca doṇṇa vi huuccaṃti ॥ 252 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(dussahakṛtāparādhaṃ aparādhe'pi guruke prasādābhimukham ।</l>
<l>ātmachandapravṛttaṃ priyaṃ ca prema ca dve api khalūcyete ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>5. <b>svarupatānyatvaṃ</b> (gāsa. 6.6)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>īsāmacchara—rahiehiṃ ṇivviārehi māmi acchīhiṃ ।</l>
<l>eṇhiṃ jaṇo jaṇaṃ miva ṇirikkhae kahaṃ ṇa jhijjāmo ॥ 253 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(īrṣyāmatsararahitābhyāṃ nirvikārābhyāṃ mātulānyakṣibhyām ।</l>
<l>idānīṃ jano janamiva nirīkṣate kathaṃ na kṣīyāmahe ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>6. <b>śāṭhyaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>paḍibhiṃdai hoṃtavaraṃ ghariṇī daiaṃ paraṃmuhaṇuvaṇṇaṃ ।</l>
<l>vāsagharadīraeṇaṃ	ṇīsāsaṃdoliasiheṇa ॥ 254 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(pratibhinatti bhavadvaraṃ gṛhiṇī dayitaṃ parāṅ‍mukhasup‍tam ।</l>
<l>vāsagṛhadīpakena	niśvāsāndolitaśikhena ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>7. <b>pratāraṇaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 4.52)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kaṃḍujjāā varāī sā ajja tae sā kaāvarāheṇa ।</l>
<l>alasāiaruṇṇaviaṃbhiaṃ	diaheṇa	sikkhaviā ॥ 255 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<pb n="1367"/>
<lg>
<l>(kāṇḍarjukā varākī sā'dya tvayā kṛtāparādhena ।</l>
<l>alasāyitasaṃjñāvijṛmbhitaṃ	divasena	śikṣitā ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>8. <b>khaṇḍanaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 7.53)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>paccūsāgaa	ṇavarattapiāloaloaṇāṇaṃda ।</l>
<l>aṇṇatthakkhaviasavvari ṇahahūsaṇa diṇavai ṇamo de ॥ 256 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(pratyūṣāgata!	navarak‍tapriyāloka!	locanānanda! ।</l>
<l>anyatrakṣapitaśarvarīka! nakha/bhobhūṣaṇa! dinapate! namaste ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>9. <b>avajñānaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 2.46)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>ummūlaaṃti va hiaaṃ imā ire tuha virajjamāṇassa ।</l>
<l>avahīraṇavasavisaṃṭhula—valaṃta—ṇaaṇaddha—diṭṭhāiṃ ॥ 257 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(unmūlayantīva hṛdayaṃ imāni re tava virajyamānasya ।</l>
<l>avadhīraka—savisaṃṣ‍ṭhula—valannayanārdhadṛṣ‍ṭāni ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>10. <b>akṛtajñatā</b> yathā—(gāsa. 5.45)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>akaaṇṇua tujjha kae pāusarāīṃsu jaṃ mae khuṇṇaṃ ।</l>
<l>uppekkhimo alajjira ajja vi taṃ gāmacikkhillaṃ ॥ 258 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(akṛtajña! tava kṛte prāvṛḍrātriṣu yo mayā kṣuṇṇaḥ ।</l>
<l>utpaśyāmi alajjāśīla! adyāpi taṃ grāmapaṅkam ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>11. <b>sapat‍nīnāmagrahaṇaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>nirmagnena	mayāmbhasi	smarabharādālissamāliṅgitā
kenālīkamidaṃ tavādya kathitaṃ rādhe! mudhā tāmyasi ।</l>
<l>ityutsvapnaparamparāsu śayane śrutvā vacaśśārṅgiṇaḥ
savyājaṃ śithilīkṛtaḥ kamalayā kaṇṭhagrahaḥ pātu vaḥ॥ 259 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>12. <b>gotraskhalanaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>agghai	gottakkhalaṇe	paccakkha-ṇigalia-saṃgalaṃta-visāo ।</l>
<l>eṃtaṇiattia—bāho ṇetta—ṇiatta—dai—uttaro juaijaṇo ॥ 260 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(arghati gotraskhalane pratyakṣanirgalad/saṅgalad‌viṣādaḥ ।</l>
<l>etannivartitabāṣpo	netranivṛttadayitottaro	yuvatijanaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<pb n="1368"/>
<p>(<b>13. manopalakṣaṇāni—12</b>)</p>
<p>mānopalakṣaṇāni—'avajñānam,	atyādaraḥ,	vikṛtavīkṣaṇam,	anālokaḥ,
asambhāṣaṇaṃ,	vākpāruṣyam,	aśrūdgamaḥ,	dīrghaniḥśvāsaḥ,	avilakṣasmitaṃ,	vyājanivṛttiḥ,
atyantānukūlyaṃ,	prasādhanāgrahaṇamiti । teṣu</p>
<p>1. <b>avajñānaṃ</b> yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.49)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>nirvibhujya daśanacchadaṃ tato vāci bharturavadhīraṇāparā ।</l>
<l>śailarājatanayā samīpagāmālalāpa vijayāmahetukam ॥ 261 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>2. <b>atyādaro</b> yathā—(amaru. 14)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kṛto	dūrādeva	smitamadhuramabhyudgamavidhiḥ
śirasyājñā	nyastā	prativacanamapyānatimati ।</l>
<l>na dṛṣ‍ṭeḥ śaithilyānmilanamiti ceto dahati māṃ
nigūḍhāntaḥkopā	kaṭhinahṛdaye	saṃvṛtiriyam ॥ 262 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>3. <b>vikṛtavīkṣaṇaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 920 ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>dāvaṃteṇa tuha muhaṃ bhumaā/bhaṅgammi hoṃta—ṇava—soham ।</l>
<l>akaeṇa uvakaaṃ ajja maṇṇuṇā majjha pasiacchi ॥ 263 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(darśayatā tava mukhaṃ bhrūbhaṅge bhaviṣyatravaśobham ।</l>
<l>akṛtenopakṛtamadya manyunā mama, prasṛtākṣi! ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>4. <b>anāloko</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>sphurasi bāhulate! kimanarthakā tvamapi locana! vāma bhava sthiram ।</l>
<l>tamahamāgatamapyaparādhinaṃ	na	parirabdhumalaṃ na ca vīkṣitum ॥ 264 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>5. <b>asambhāṣaṇaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>vāhippaṃtīva-vahū-ullāvaṃ-ṇavavarassa ṇa hu dei ।</l>
<l>dāvei	appaṇo	hatthaṃ	vāragaā	sā	ṇāhaṃ ॥ 265 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(vyāhriyamāṇaiva vadhūḥ ullāpaṃ navavarasya na khalu dadāti ।</l>
<l>darśayati	ātmano	hastaṃ	dvāragatā	sā	nātham ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>6. <b>vākpārupyaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 946ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>huṃ ṇillajja samosara taṃ cia aṇuṇesu jaā de vaaṇe ।</l>
<l>pāaṃguṭṭhālattaaraseṇa	tilaaṃ	viṇimmaviaṃ ॥ 266 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<pb n="1369"/>
<lg>
<l>(huṃ nirlajja samapasara tāmevānunaya yayā te vadane ।</l>
<l>pādāṅguṣ‍ṭhālaktakarasena	tilakaṃ	vinirmitam ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>7. <b>aśrūdgamo</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>dūsahamaṃtupautto	muhutta—saṃgalia—dhīra—paḍiutto/ṇivvatto ।</l>
<l>ṇaaṇaṃtaparikkhalio ṇa paḍai tīe maḍaaṃ baholai/vahai vāho ॥ 267 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(dussahamanyupravṛttaḥ	muhūrtasaṅgalitadhairyapratigup‍taḥ ।</l>
<l>nayanāntapariskhalito na patati tasyā mṛdukaṃ vahati bāṣpaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>8. <b>dīrghaniḥśvāso</b> yathā—(gāsa. 6.18)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>dhīrakkhaliaṇiattā	dūraviaṃbhaṃtarosapaḍivajjhaṃtā ।</l>
<l>pasaraṃti seagaruā vīsamiūṇa piammi se ṇīsāsā ॥ 268 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(dhairyaskhalitanivṛttā	dūravijṛmbhamāṇaroṣapratipadyamānāḥ ।</l>
<l>prasaranti svedagurukā viśramya priye tasyā niḥśvāsāḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>9. (a) <b>vilakṣasmitaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 6.18)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>bāhollaphuria—gaṃḍāharāe bhaṇiaṃ vilakkhahasirīe ।</l>
<l>ajja vi kiṃ rūsijjai savahāvatthaṃ gaaṃ pemmaṃ ॥ 261 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(bāṣpārdrasphuritagaṇḍādharayā bhaṇitaṃ vilakṣahasanaśīlayā ।</l>
<l>adyāpi	kiṃ	ruṣyate	śapathāvasthāṃ	 gataṃ	prema ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>10. <b>vyājanivṛtti</b>ryathā—(gāsa. 917ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>piaamaviiṇṇacasaaṃ acakkhiaṃ piasahīem̐ deṃtīe ।</l>
<l>abhaṇaṃtīem̐ vi māṇaṃsiṇīe kahio ccia viroho ॥ 270 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>{priyatamavitīrṇacaṣakam asvaditaṃ priyasakhyai dadatyā ।</l>
<l>abhaṇantyāpi	manasvinyā	kathita	eva	virodhaḥ ॥}</l>
</lg>
<p>11. <b>atyantānukūlyaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>jalaviṇabījasikāmaṃ bhaṇiaṃ cakareḍitaṃ tahā turiaṃ ।</l>
<l>paṃsātubharodevaṃghaliaṃ	ṇa	ccia	kabhei	bhoi ॥ 271 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>12. <b>prasādhanāgrahaṇaṃ</b> yathā—(harivi.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kīsa	maliāvaaṃsaṃ	vaṇṇa—ṇīsāsa—paṃḍurāhararāaṃ ।</l>
<l>vaaṇaṃ vahasi kisoari karasaṃkāmiakapolapattālekkhaṃ ॥ 272 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<pb n="1370"/>
<lg>
<l>(kasmāt	malināvataṃsaṃ	bahalaśvāsapraguṇitādharatāpam ।</l>
<l>vadanaṃ vahasi kṛśodari karasaṅkrāmitakapolapatrālekhyam ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>(<b>14. mānoddīpanāni—12</b>)</p>
<p>atha	mānoddīpanāni—'vayasyāvākyaṃ,	vipakṣasatridhiḥ,	sakhīvailakṣyaṃ,
sapat‍nyupahāsaḥ,	saubhāgyadarśanaṃ,	dākṣiṇyoktiḥ,	atyantopekṣā,	draṣ‍ṭavyapralāpaḥ,
aparādhasmaraṇaṃ,	vivakṣānukampā,	ārdrāparādhatā,	priyānunaya iti । teṣu'</p>
<p>1. <b>vayasyāvākyaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>sakhi sthitvā sthitvā kucakalaśayoraśruvisarai—
rupāntau siñcantī kimidamadhunā rodiṣi mṛṣā ।</l>
<l>alaṃ cāsmābhirvā niravadhi tadaivātra ruditaṃ
tṛṇacchanne kūpe kathamapi yadaivāsi patitā ॥ 273 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>2. <b>vipakṣasannidhi</b>ryathā—(harivi.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>sarisa-paḍivakkha-purao hiaammi auvva-māṇa-bhaṃga-kalusie ।</l>
<l>samasuhadukkhammi jaṇe virikkaseso vi se ṇa māi amariso ॥ 274 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(sadṛśapratipakṣapurato	hṛdaye	apūrvamānabhaṅgakaluṣite ।</l>
<l>samasukhaduḥkhe jane viriktaśeṣo'pi tasyā na māti amarṣaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>3. <b>sakhīvailakṣyaṃ</b> yathā—(harivi.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>gottakkhaliammi pie maṇṇe pāuḍia-sāhi-ṇivesia-ṇaaṇaṃ ।</l>
<l>āūramāṇa-vāhaṃ	kīem̐	vi	ṇivvoliāharaṃ	ṇīsasiaṃ ॥ 275 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(gotraskhalite priye manye prakaṭitasakhī—niveśitanayanam ।</l>
<l>āpūryamāṇa—bāṣpaṃ kayāpi malinitādharaṃ niḥśvasitam ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>4. <b>sapat‍nyupahāso</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>'sahiaṃ māṇakkhalaṇam' ॥ 276 ॥ (pṛ. 1358)</l></lg></b> ityādi ।
<p>5. <b>saubhāgyadarśanaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 6.28)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>thorasuehiṃ	ruṇṇaṃ	savattivaggeṇa pupphavaiāe ।</l>
<l>bhuasiharaṃ	paiṇo	pecchiūṇa	siramaggatuppaliaṃ ॥ 277 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<pb n="1371"/>
<lg>
<l>(sthūlāśrubhī	ruditaṃ	sapat‍nīvargeṇa	puṣpavatyāḥ ।</l>
<l>bhujaśikharaṃ patyuḥ prekṣya śiromagnavarṇalip‍tam ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>6. <b>dakṣiṇyokti</b>ryathā—(gāsa. 4.53)</p><b><lg>
<l>avarāhehiṃ vi ṇavi taha patia jaha maṃ/taṃ imehiṃ dūmesi ।</l>
<l>avahatthiasabbhāvehiṃ	suhaa	dakkhiṇṇabhaṇiehiṃ ॥ 278 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(aparādhairapi naiva tathā pratīhi yathā mamebhirdunoṣi ।</l>
<l>apahastitasadbhāvaiḥ	subhaga!	dākṣiṇyabhaṇitaiḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>7. <b>atyantopekṣā</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>priyasakhi! yayoḥ premagranthistathā prathamaḥ sa nau
sphuṭitapiṭharībandhaślāghyo	vipakṣagṛhe'pyabhūt ।</l>
<l>janavadadhunā	sadmanyāvāṃ	vasāva	ihaiva	tau
dhigaparicitaṃ	prema	strīṇāṃ cirāya ca jīvitam ॥ 279 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>8. <b>draṣ‍ṭavyapralāpo</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>auoccia accasure kajjaliāharakaresi kīsavahe ।</l>
<l>kiṇṇai	ua	sassaṃlajjaṇijjai	hatthavāeṇa ॥ 280 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>9. <b>aparādhasmaraṇaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 913ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kaaviccheo	sahībhaṃgibhaṇiasaṃbhāviāparāhāe ।</l>
<l>jhaḍiā pallavai puṇo ṇaaṇa—kaolesu kovatarū ॥ 281 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(kṛtavicchedaḥ	sakhībhaṅgibhaṇitasambhāvitāparādhāyāḥ ।</l>
<l>jhaṭityāpallavayate	punarnayanakapoleṣu kopataruḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>10. <b>vipakṣānukampā</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>jāmiahiaapaharisā agahiāattaṇa vimukkamaccharamahurā ।</l>
<l>aṇuaṃpaṃtī ṇa/vavioaṃ jasavattīṇa me suā uvvahai ॥ 282 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(yāmikahṛdayapraharṣā agṛhītātmanāṃ vimuktamatsaramadhurā ।</l>
<l>anukampamānā navaviyogaṃ sapat‍nīnāṃ me sutā ud‌vahati ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>11. <b>ārdrāparādhatā</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>sāhasu vilāsiṇiaṇaṃ je āhileṃti sarasāvarāhā piaā ।</l>
<l>kiṃ	haa	dakkhaṇaguṇā	pahavaṃtāṇa	suhaa	esa	sahāo ॥ 286 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<pb n="1372"/>
<lg>
<l>(kathaya vilāsinījanameva abhilīyante sarasāparādhāḥ priyāḥ ।</l>
<l>kiṃ	hatadākṣiṇyaguṇānāṃ	prabhavatāṃ/subhaga	eṣa	svabhāvaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>12. <b>priyānunayo</b> yathā—(kirātā. 8.64)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>priyeṇa siktā paramaṃ vipakṣataś‍cukopa kācinna tutoṣa sāntvanaiḥ ।</l>
<l>janasya rūḍhapraṇayasya cetasaḥ kimapyamarṣo'nunaye bhṛśāyate ॥ 284 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>15. mānavilāsāḥ—12</b>)</p>
<p>atha mānavilāsāḥ । tatra <b>savyalīkapreyaso vāṅ‌manaḥkāyakṛtapravṛttidarśanajanmā
priyāvakroktivinyāso mānavilāsaḥ ।</b> sa dvidhā, sammukhaḥ parāvṛttaśca । tayoḥ
priyābhimukhye sammukhaḥ । so'pi dvidhā—śuddho miśraśca । tayorapi śuddhastridhā—
vākpavṛttijaḥ, manaḥpravṛttijaḥ, kāyapravṛttijaśca । miśro'pi tridhā । vāṅ‌manaḥpravṛttijaḥ,
vākkāyapravṛttijaḥ, kāyapravṛttijaśca । priyamuddiśya sakhyānyābhimukhye parāvṛttaḥ । so'pi
dvidhā—cetanaviṣayo'cetanaviṣayaśca । tayoścetanaviṣayastridhā sāmānyaniṣ‍ṭhaḥ, viśeṣaniṣ‍ṭhaḥ,
kalpanāniṣ‍ṭhaśca ।	acetanaviṣayo'pi tridhā—pratyakṣaviṣayo'pratyakṣaviṣayo'nirdhārita—
viṣayaśca । tatra</p>
<p>1. <b>sammukhabhedeṣu vākpravṛttijaḥ śuddho</b> yathā—(gāsa. 942ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>āma ṇa tuhāvarāho piaama me loaṇāṇa iha doso ।</l>
<l>māṇāsahammi	caḍulehiṃ	vāsio	jo	hiaaṃmi ॥ 285 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(āma na tavāparādhaḥ priyatama! me locanayoriha doṣaḥ ।</l>
<l>mānāsahe	caṭulābhyāṃ	vāsito	yo	hṛdaye ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>2. <b>sa eva manaḥpravṛttijo</b> yathā—(gāsa. 2.85)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>aṇṇaa! ṇāhaṃ kuviā, uvaūhia, kiṃ muhā pasāesi ।</l>
<l>tuha maṇṇusamuppaṇṇeṇa majjha maṇeṇa vi ṇa kajjaṃ ॥ 286 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(ṛjuka/ajñaka! nāhaṃ kupitā, upagūhasva, kiṃ mudhā prasādayasi ।</l>
<l>tava	manyusamutpannena	mama	mānenāpi	na	kāryam ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>3. <b>kāyapravṛttijo</b> yathā—(gāsa. 706ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>avasara rottuṃ cia ṇimmiāiṃ mā pusaa me haacchīiṃ ।</l>
<l>daṃsaṇamettuṃmaiehiṃ jahi hi sīlaṃ tuha ṇa ṇāaṃ ॥ 287 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<pb n="1373"/>
<lg>
<l>(apasara roditumeva nirmite mā pusaya me hatākṣiṇī ।</l>
<l>darśanamātronmattābhyāṃ yābhyāṃ khalu śīlaṃ tava na jñātam ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>4. <b>vāṅ‌manaḥpravṛttijo miśro</b> yathā—(saka. 5.109)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>pahavaṃti ccia purisā mahisā mahilāṇaṃ kiṃttha suhaa! viḍiosi ।</l>
<l>aṇurāaṇolliāe	ko	doso	āhiāīe ॥ 288 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(prabhavantyeva puruṣāḥ mahilānāṃ kimatra subhaga! vihito'si ।</l>
<l>anurāganoditāyāḥ	ko	doṣa	ābhijātyāyāḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>5. <b>sa eva kāyapravṛttijo</b> yathā—(gāsa. 1.51)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>āma jaro me maṃdo, ahava ṇa maṃdo, jaṇassa kā tattī ।</l>
<l>suha pṛcchia suhaa suaṃdhaandha mā aṃdhiaṃ chivasu ॥ 289 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(āmajvaro me mando'thavā na mando janasya kā cintā ।</l>
<l>sukhapṛcchaka subhaga sugandhagandha mā gandhikāṃ spṛśa ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>6. <b>manaḥkāyapravṛttijo</b> yathā—(gāsa. 945ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>aṇuvattaṃto	amhārisaṃ	jaṇaṃ	suhaa! āhijāīe ।</l>
<l>ciṃtesi uṇo ṇa hiae aṇāhijāī suhaṃ jiaī ॥ 290 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(anuvartamāno'smādṛśaṃ	janaṃ	ābhijātyā ।</l>
<l>cintayasi punarna hṛdaye anābhijātyā sukhaṃ jīyate ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>7. <b>parāvṛttaviṣayeṣu</b> cetanaviṣayaḥ sāmānyaniṣ‍ṭho yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>peśche māpasi bhiṃdaha pie jaṇe daṃsaṇaṃ vi ramaṇijjaṃ ।</l>
<l>paḍibhiṇṇuvvaṭṭharadisopuaṃ	jamāāhiālaṃvi ॥ 291 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>8. <b>sa eva sakhāyābhimukhye viśeṣaniṣ‍ṭho</b> yathā—(gāsa. 2.31)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>vāharau maṃ sahīo tissā gotteṇa kiṃttha bhaṇieṇa ।</l>
<l>thirapemmā hou jahiṃ tahiṃ mā kiṃ pi ṇaṃ bhaṇaha ॥ 292 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(vyāharatu māṃ sakhyastasyā gotreṇa kimatra bhaṇitena ।</l>
<l>sthiraṃ prema bhavatu yatra tatrāpi mā kimapyenaṃ bhaṇata ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>9. <b>gotraskhalanataḥ sapat‍nyanusandhāne kalpanāniṣ‍ṭho</b> yathā—(gāsa. 4.90)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>pāapaḍiaṃ ahavve kiṃ dāṇiṃ ṇa uṭṭhavesi bhattāraṃ ।</l>
<l>eaṃ cia avasāṇaṃ dūraṃ pi gaassa pemmassa ॥ 296 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<pb n="1374"/>
<lg>
<l>(pādapatitaṃ abhavye kimidānī notthāpayasi bhartāram ।</l>
<l> etadevāvasānaṃ	dūramapi	gatasya	premṇaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>10. <b>acetanaviṣayaḥ pratyakṣaviṣayo</b> yathā—(gāsa. 1.50)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>suhaucchaaṃ jaṇaṃ dullahaṃ pi dūrāhi amha āṇeṃta ।</l>
<l>uaāraa jara jīaṃ pi ṇeṃta ṇa kaāvarāho si ॥ 294 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(sukhapṛcchakaṃ janaṃ durlabhamapi dūrādasmākamānayan ।</l>
<l>upakāraka jvara jīvamapi nayan na kṛtāparādho'si ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>11. <b>sa evāpratyakṣaviṣayo</b> yathā—(gāsa. 1.24)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>piaviraho appiadaṃsaṇaṃ a guruāiṃ do vi dukkhāi ।</l>
<l>jissā tumaṃ kārijjasi tīe ṇamo āhiāīe ॥ 295 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(priyaviraho'priyadarśanaṃ ca guruke dve api duḥkhe ।</l>
<l>yayā	tvaṃ	kāryase	tasye	nama	ābhijātyai ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>12. <b>anirdhāritaviṣayo</b> yathā—(gāsa. 3.65)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>aṇuvattaṇāṃ kuṇaṃto vese vi jaṇe a—hiṇṇa—muharāo ।</l>
<l>appavvaso	vi	suaṇo	paravvaso	āhijāīe ॥ 296 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(anuvartanāṃ kurvan dveṣye'pi jane abhitramukharāgaḥ ।</l>
<l>ātmavaśo'pi	sujanaḥ	paravaśa	ābhijātyāḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>(<b>16. mānamoṭṭāyitāni—12</b>)</p>
<p>atha mānamoṭṭāyitāni । vilāsa eva kākvādinātivakro <b>mānamoṭṭāyitam ।</b>
so'pi dvidhā <b>agotraskhalanaviṣayo gotraskhalanaviṣayaśca ।</b> tayorādyaḥ prāgvadeva śuddho
miśraśca । dvitīyastvabhihitanimitto gatinimittaśca । tatra śuddhamiśrau pūrvavadeva tridhā ।
abhihitanimittastu tridhā—vidhimukhena, pratiṣedhamukhena pratiṣedhavidhimuśena ca ।
gatinimitto'pi tridhaiva vṛttānuṣaṅgataḥ, vartamānānuṣaṅgataḥ, bhaviṣyadanuṣaṅgataśca । teṣu—</p>
<p>1. <b>vākyapravṛttijaṃ śuddhaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 750ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>saddhā me tujjha piattaṇassa kaha taṃ ti ṇea āṇāmo ।</l>
<l>de pasia tumaṃ cia sikkhavesu jaha te piā homi ॥ 297 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(śraddhā me tava priyatvasya kathaṃ tadityetanna jānāmi ।</l>
<l>prārthaye tāvat prasīda tvameva śikṣaya yathāsya priyā bhavāmi ॥)</l>
</lg>
<pb n="1375"/>
<p>2. tadeva <b>manaḥpravṛttijaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>etthaccia vasasi tumaṃ sāhasu mā kuṇasu suhaa ṇīsāsaṃ ।</l>
<l>esaccia	hoi	gaī	pariṇaiparusāṇaṃ	pemmāṇaṃ ॥ 298 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(atraiva vasāsi tvaṃ mā kuru subhaga! niḥś‍vāsam ।</l>
<l>eṣaiva	bhavati	gatiḥ	pariṇatiparuṣāṇāṃ	premṇām ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>3. <b>kāyapravṛttijaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>uṇṇamasu suhaa eaṃ kaheu paḍisiddha—daḍḍhahiaassa ।</l>
<l>paṃsulika	aṇimmaeṇa	kiṃ	pāapaḍaṇeṇa ॥ 299 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(annama subhaga! etat kathayitvā utpīḍayasi dagdhahṛdayasya ।</l>
<l>pāṃsulika!	anirmalenaitena	kiṃ	pādapatanena ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>4. <b>vāṅ‌manassammiśraṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>rakkhaṃti āhiāaṃ sahaṃtī virahaṃ piaṃ pajaṃpati ।</l>
<l>kiṃ khu purisā—viaḍḍhā āhiṇaṃdijjaṃti mahilāhiṃ ॥ 300 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(rakṣantyābhijātyaṃ sahante virahaṃ priyaṃ prajalpanti ।</l>
<l>kiṃ khalu puruṣā vidagdhā abhinandyante mahilābhiḥ ॥)</l></lg> ku.
<p>5. tadeva <b>vākkāyajaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 5.89)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>dīsasi piāiṃ jaṃpasi sabbhāo suhaa ettio ccea ।</l>
<l>phāleiūṇa vi hiaaṃ sāhasu ko dāvae kassa ॥ 301 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(dṛśyase priyāṇi jalpasi sadbhāvaḥ subhaga etāvaneva ।</l>
<l>pāṭayitvāpi hṛdayaṃ kathaya ko darśayati kasya ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>6. <b>manaḥkayajaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 4.76)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>avarajjhasu vīsaddhaṃ saccaṃ(vvaṃ) te suvia visāhimo amhe ।</l>
<l>guṇaṇibbharammi	hiae	pattia	dosā	ṇa	māaṃti ॥ 302 ॥ </l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(aparādhyasya vistrabdhaṃ satyaṃ sarvaṃ te śrutvāṃ viṣahāmahe vayam ।</l>
<l>guṇanirbhare	hṛdaye	pratīhi	doṣā	na	mānti ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>7. <b>abhihitanimittato vidhimukhena</b> yathā—(gāsa. 905ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>eaṃ cia maha ṇāmaṃ bhaṇa bhaṇa de suhaa kīsa viliosi ।</l>
<l>paḍibhāi jaṃ ṇa tujjha vi mama pi kiṃ teṇa teṇa ṇāmeṇa ॥ 303 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<pb n="1376"/>
<lg>
<l>(evameva mama nāma bhaṇa bhaṇa tāvat subhaga kasmāt vrīḍito'si ।</l>
<l>pratibhāti	yanna	tavāpi	mamāpi	kiṃ	tena	nāmnā ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>8. tadeva <b>pratiṣedhamukhena</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>tujjha vaaṇairacchaa kiṃ imiṇā vimakkhareṇa ṇāmeṇa ।</l>
<l>jaṇṇa ūṇāūṇa	a	ahyasu	bhaṇṇaṃ	tae	ṇāṃma ॥ 304 ॥</l></lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(tava vadanacirasthitena kimanena viṣamākṣareṇa nāmnā ।</l>
<l>yena	punaḥpunaśca	asmāsu	bhaṇitaṃ	tvayā	nāma ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>9. <b>pratiṣedhavidhimukhena</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>hou ṇa suaṃ cia mae ṇea tume suhaa kiṃ ci vi pauttaṃ ।</l>
<l>ettāhe	saṃbhariūṇa	bhaṇasu	re	majjha	jaṃ	ṇāmaṃ ॥ 305 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(bhavatu na śrutameva mayā naiva tvayā subhaga kiñcidapi pravṛttam ।</l>
<l>idānīṃ	saṃsmṛtya	bhaṇa	re	mama	yannāma ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>10. <b>gatinimittako vṛttānuṣaṅgato</b> yathā—(gāsa. 1.32)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>aha saṃbhāviamaggo suhaa tue jevva ṇavara ṇivvūḍho ।</l>
<l>eṇhiṃ	hiae	aṇṇaṃ	aṇṇaṃ	vāāem̐	loassa ॥ 306 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(atha sambhāvitamārgaḥ subhaga! tvayaiva kevalaṃ nirvyūḍhaḥ ।</l>
<l>idānīṃ	hṛdaye	anyadanyad	vāci	lokasya ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>11. <b>vartamānānuṣaṅgato</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>ettha ahaṃ cea piā ṇa a sā mā lajja bhaṇasu vīsattho ।</l>
<l>veso	suhaa	purao	ṇa	ṇivvarijjaṃti	sabbhāvā ॥ 307 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(atrāhameva priyā na ca sā mā lajjasva bhaṇa vistrabdhaḥ ।</l>
<l>dveṣyasya	subhaga	purato	na	kathyante	sad‌bhāvāḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>12. <b>bhaviṣyadanuṣaṅgato</b> yathā—(gāsa. 906ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>suhaa muhuttaṃ suppau jaṃ jaṃ pahibhāi taṃ bhaṇissihisī ।</l>
<l>ajja	ṇa	pecchaṃti	tuhaṃ	ṇid‍dāgaruāi	acchīi ॥ 308 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(subhaga! muhūrtaṃ supyatāṃ, yadyat pratibhāti tad bhaṇiṣyasi ।</l>
<l>adya	na	prekṣete	tava	nidraguruke	akṣiṇī ॥)</l>
</lg>
<pb n="1377"/>
<p>(<b>17. manasukhānubhāvāḥ—6</b>)</p>
<p>atha mānasukhānubhāvāḥ । tatra māne bahumānādisampad‌yogādayaṃ bahumataḥ;
jighṛkṣito'nubaddhaḥ, śikṣitaḥ, upadrutaḥ, vidrutaśceti ṣoḍhā sambhavati । teṣu</p>
<p>1. <b>bahumato</b> yathā—(gāsa. 7.75)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>atthakka-rūsaṇaṃ khaṇa-pasaṃjaṇaṃ alia-vaaṇa-ṇibbaṃdho ।</l>
<l>ummaccharasaṃdāo	puttaa	paaī	siṇehassa ॥ 309 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(akasmād roṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇaprasādanam alīkavacananirbandhaḥ ।</l>
<l>unmūrcchitasantāpaḥ	putraka!	padavī s‍nehasya ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>yathā vā—(gāsa. 829ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>jattha ṇa ujjaggirao jattha ṇa īsā visūraṇaṃ māṇo ।</l>
<l>sabbhāvacāḍuaṃ jattha ṇatthi ṇeho tahiṃ ṇatthi ॥ 310 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(yatra nāstyujjāgarako yatra nerṣyā khedo mānaḥ ।</l>
<l>sadbhāvacāṭukaṃ yatra nāsti s‍nehastatra nāsti ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>2. <b>jighṛkṣito</b> yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.243)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>mānayogyāṃ karomīti priyasthāne sthitāṃ sakhīm ।</l>
<l>bālā bhrūbhaṅgajihyākṣī	paśyati	sphuritādharā ॥ 311 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>yathā vā—(amaru. 97)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>bhrūbhedo	guṇitaściraṃ	nayanayorabhyastamāmīlanaṃ
rod‌dhuṃ śikṣitamādareṇa hāsitaṃ maune'bhiyogaḥ kṛtaḥ ।</l>
<l>dhairyaṃ dhartumiha sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathāñcinmayā</l>
<l>baddho mānaparigrahe parikaraḥ siddhistu daive sthitā ॥ 312 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>3. <b>anubaddho</b> yathā—(gāsa. 2.29)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>taha	māṇo	māṇatīe	emea	dūramaṇubaddho ।</l>
<l>jaha saviṇīa vivio pio ekkaggāmaccia paramattho/pauttho ॥ 313 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(tathā māno mānavatyā evameva dūramanubaddhaḥ ।</l>
<l>yathā suvinīya vividhaḥ priya ekagrāma eva proṣitaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<pb n="1378"/>
<p>yathā vā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>līlāvatīcaraṇacumbitamaulimagre kāntaṃ vidhūya vihitāgasamuc‍cacāla ।
atrāntare mukharanupurayugmamasyāḥ saubhāgyagandhagajaḍiṇḍimatāṃ ॥314॥</l></lg></b>
<p>4. <b>śikṣito</b> yathā—(gāsa. 1.26)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>paṇaakuviāṇa doṇha vi aliapasuttāṇam̐ māṇaillāṇa ।</l>
<l>ṇic‍cala-ṇiruddha-ṇīsāsa-diṇṇa-aṇṇaṇaṃ ko mallo ॥ 315 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(praṇayakupitayoḥ dvayoḥ apyalīkaprasup‍tayoḥ mānavatoḥ ।</l>
<l>niścalaniruddhaniḥśvāsadattakarṇayoḥ	ko	mallaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>yathā vā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>cuṃbasu sahassauttaṃ muhamiṇamo hāriam̐ mae jūe ।</l>
<l>māṇo uṇa muc‍cai sāmalaṃ kaha māṇaittīe ॥ 316 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(cumba sahasrakṛtvo mukhamidaṃ hāritaṃ mayā dyūte ।</l>
<l>mānaḥ punarmucyate śyāmalāṅga kathaṃ mānavatyā ॥)*</l>
</lg>
<p>6. <b>vidruto</b> yathā—(māgha. 10.63)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>granthimud‍grathayituṃ hṛdayeśe vāsasaḥ spṛśati mānadhanāyāḥ ।</l>
<l>bhrūyugena sapadi pratipede romabhiśca samameva vibhedaḥ ॥ 317 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>yathā vā—(gāsa. 779ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kāraṇagahio vi mae māṇo emea jaṃ samosario ।</l>
<l>atthakkapulliaṃkolla tujjha taṃ matthae paḍau ॥ 318 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(kāraṇagṛhīto'pi mayā māna evameva yat samavasṛtaḥ ।</l>
<l>akāṇḍapuṣpitāṅkola!	tava	mastake	patatu ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>(<b>18. mānotpattiprakīrṇāni —11</b>)</p>
<p>atha mānotpattiprakīrṇakāni । tatra mānavatyāḥ svahṛdayasakhīpriyatamādiṣu
vaimanasyāt <b>prakīrṇakāni ।</b> tatra —</p>
<p>1. <b>svahṛdaye śaṅkāyāṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 3.2)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>appacchaṃda—pahāvira dullahalambhaṃ jaṇaṃ vimaggaṃta ।</l>
<l>āāsapahehiṃ bhamaṃta hiaa kaiā vi bhajjihisi ॥ 319 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
 NOTES pg=1378!
*ataḥ paraṃ upadrutaḥ nopalabhyate ।
<pb n="1379"/>
<lg>
<l>(ātmacchanda—pradhāvanaśīla durlabhalambhaṃ janamapi vimārgayat ।</l>
<l>ākāśapathairbhramadhṛdaya	kadāpi	bhaṅkṣyase ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>2. <b>vipriyapravṛttau</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>sahiaṃ gottakkhalaṇaṃ diṭ‌ṭho a pio ahiṇṇamuharāo ।</l>
<l>eṇhiṃ vittavi (pijjai) vāhovāhivva paḍia ॥ 320 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(soḍhaṃ gotraskhalanaṃ dṛṣ‍ṭaśca priyo'bhinnamukharāgaḥ ।</l>
<l>idānīṃ pīyate tayā bāṣpodadhiriva pathika ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>3. <b>॰ ॰ ॰ hyapravṛttau</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>vilīno visrambhaḥ sapadi tadapi prema galitaṃ
cyutāścitrākārāḥ praṇayasubhagāstā api giraḥ ।</l>
<l>priyasyaivaṃ		tattad‍‌vinayabahiraṅgavyavasitaṃ
kimanyad duḥśānāṃ hṛdaya nagarīcatvaramasi ॥ 321 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>4. <b>sakhyā dayitadoṣākhyāne</b> yathā—(amaru. 94)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>idaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ priyatama nanu śvetamadhikaṃ
gamiṣyāmo yāmo bhavatu gamanenāpi bhavatu ।</l>
<l>purā yeneyaṃ me ciramanusṛtā vākyapadavī
sa evānyo jātaḥ sakhi paricitāḥ kasya puruṣāḥ ॥ 322 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>5. <b>hṛdaye śaṅkāyāṃ</b> yathā—(amaru.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>sakhi! sa subhago mandaḥ s‍neho mayīti na me vyathā
vidhiviracitaṃ yasmāt sarvo janaḥ sukhamaś‍nute ।</l>
<l>mama tu manasaḥ santāpo'yaṃ jane vimukhe'pi yat
kṣaṇamapi hatavrīḍaṃ ceto na yāti virāgitām ॥ 323 </l>
</lg></b>
<p>6. <b>dai ॰ ॰ ॰</b></p>
<b><lg>
<l>jyotirbhyastadidaṃ tamassamuditaṃ jāto'yamad‍bhyaśiśakhī
pīyūṣādidamutthitaṃ	viṣamayaṃ	chāyāp‍tajanmātapaḥ ।</l>
<l>ko nāmāsya bhavet praśāntiṣu vidhirbāḍhaṃ draḍhīyānayaṃ
granthiryat priyato'pi vipriyamidaṃ samyakkṛtaṃ sāntvanaiḥ ॥ 324 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<pb n="1380"/>
<p>7. <b>priye taddoṣāpādane</b> yathā—(gāsa. 904ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>bhaṇa bhaṇa jaṃ jaṃ paḍihāi tujjha taṃ taṃ sahāri/mimo amhe ।</l>
<l>asahattaṇaṃ ca jīaṃ ca vallabhe dovii ṇa ghaḍaṃti ॥ 325 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(bhaṇa bhaṇa yad yat pratibhāti tava tat tad sahāmahe vayam ।</l>
<l>asahamānatvaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ca vallabhe dvāvapi na ghaṭete ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>8. <b>svadoṣāpādane</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>॰ ॰ ॰ gahikkhe vaaṇaṃ saha tīṇa taṇṇā ।</l>
<l>haṇaosi pio jīaṃ cia kalisiaṃ pi maha piaṃ ॥ 326 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>9. <b>ubhayadoṣāpādane</b> yathā—(gasa. 4.76)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>avarajjhasu ettāhe vīsaddho c‍cia jaṇammi ṇipphalamaue ।</l>
<l>kāuṃ ṇik‍kiva dukkhaṃ pattia sahau a ekkassa c‍cia hiaaṃ ॥ 327 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>{aparādhyasvedānīṃ viśvasta eva jane niṣphalamṛduke ।</l>
<l>kṛtvā niṣkṛpa duḥkhaṃ pratīhi sahatāṃ caikasyaiva hṛdayam ॥}</l>
</lg>
<p>yathā vā—(gāsa. 910ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>sottuṃ suhaṃ ṇa labbhai avvo pemmeṇa vaṃkavisamassa ।</l>
<l>dugghaḍia—maṃcaassa va khaṇe khaṇe pāapaḍaṇeṇa ॥ 328 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(svap‍tuṃ sukhaṃ na labhyate aṃbo premṇā vakraviṣamasya ।</l>
<l>durghaṭitamañcasyeva	kṣaṇe	kṣaṇe	pādapatanena ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>10. <b>priyaviṣayo</b> yathā—(gāsa. 931ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>tā sokkhaṃ tāva raī tā raṇaraṇaassa ṇatthi oāso ।</l>
<l>jā dukkhekkaṇihāṇe ṇa hoi bahuvallahe pemmaṃ ॥ 329 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(tāvatsaukhyaṃ tāvad ratistāvad raṇaraṇakasya nāstyavakāśaḥ ।</l>
<l>yāvad duḥkhaikanidhāne na bhavati bahuvallabhe prema ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>11. <b>devaviṣayo</b> yathā—(gāsa. 844ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>jai devva tuṃ pasaṇṇo mā kāhisi majjha māṇusaṃ jammaṃ ।</l>
<l>aha jaṃmaṃ mā pemmaṃ jai pemmaṃ mā jaṇe julahe ॥ 330 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(yadi deva tvaṃ prasanno mā kuruṣva mama mānuṣaṃ janma ।</l>
<l>atha janma mā prema, yadi prema mā jane durlabhe ॥)</l>
</lg>
<pb n="1381"/>
<p>(<b>19. manopādhibhaṅgāḥ —11</b>)</p>
<p>atha mānopādhibhaṅgāḥ । te cāṅgacakṣuścittacāṭudhairyakāryaśak‍tyākāradeśakāla—
pātrasaṃjñādyupādhibhyo bhavanti । tatra —</p>
<p>1. <b>aṅgopādhi</b>ryathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>aṇṇatthapesi eṇehe ॰ ॰ ॰ ॥ 331 ॥ (?)</l>
</lg></b>
<p>2. <b>cittopādhi</b>ryathā—(gāsa. 903ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>avarāhasahassāiṃ bharimo hiaeṇa tammi addiṭṭhe ।</l>
<l>diṭṭhammi uṇo piasahi ekkaṃ pi khu ṇaṃ ṇa saṃbharimo ॥ 332 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(aparādhasahasrāṇi bharāmo hṛdayena tasmitradṛṣ‍ṭe ।</l>
<l>dṛṣ‍ṭe punaḥ priyasakhi! ekamapi khalu na smarāmaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>3. <b>cāṭūpādhi</b>ryathā—(gāsa. 902ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>jāṇimi kaāvarāhaṃ jāṇimi aliāi bhaṇai saalāi ।</l>
<l>aṇuṇaṃte uṇa jāṇe kaāparāhaṃ vi appāṇaṃ ॥ 333 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(jānāmi kṛtāparādhaṃ jānāmi alīkāni bhaṇāti sakalāni ।</l>
<l>anunayati	punarjāne	kṛtāparādhāmivātmānam ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>4. <b>dhairyopādhi</b>ryathā—(līlāvaī 716 tulyam)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>bhaṇa sahio ॰ ॰ ॰ tammi ॥ 334 ॥ (?)</l>
</lg></b>
<p>5. <b>kāryopādhi</b>ryathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>bhiuḍīe vāhāro aṃgakkhivaṇāi visahi kīraṃti ।</l>
<l>sahasā diṭṭhammi pieṃ tā piasahi suṃdaro māṇo ॥ 335 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(bhrukuṭyā vyāhāraḥ aṅgakṣepaṇāni yadā kriyante ।</l>
<l>sahasā dṛṣ‍ṭe priye tāvat priyasakhi! sundaro mānaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>6. <b>śaktyupādhi</b>ryathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>॰ ॰ ॰ uṇa asammohā tassa uppariuṃ ॥ 336 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>7. <b>ākāropādhi</b>ryathā—(gāsa. 4.14)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>acchīi tāṃ thaissaṃ dohiṃ vi hatthehiṃ tammi diṭṭhammi ।</l>
<l>aṃgaṃ kalaṃbakusumaṃ va pulaiaṃ kaha ṇu ḍhakkhissaṃ ॥ 337 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<pb n="1382"/>
<lg>
<l>(akṣiṇī tāvatsthagayiṣyāmi dvābhyāmapi hastābhyāṃ tasmin dṛṣ‍ṭe ।</l>
<l>aṅaṃga kadambakusumamiva pulakitaṃ kathaṃ nu sthagayiṣye ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>8. <b>deśopādhi</b>ryathā—(gāsa. 901ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>jaiā pio ṇa dīsai bhaṇaha halā kassa kīrae māṇo ।</l>
<l>aha diṭṭhammi vi māṇo tā tassa piattaṇaṃ katto ॥ 338 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(yadā priyo na dṛśyate bhaṇata sakhyaḥ kasya kriyate mānaḥ ।</l>
<l>atha dṛṣ‍ṭe'pi mānastāvattasya priyatvaṃ kutaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>9. <b>kālopādhi</b>ryathā—(gāsa. 745ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kassa ṇa saddhā garuattaṇammi paiṇā pasajjamāṇassa ।</l>
<l>jai	māṇabhaṃjaṇīo	ṇa	hoṃti	hemaṃtarāīo ॥ 339 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(kasya na śraddhā gurutve patyā prasādyamānena ।</l>
<l>yadi mānabhañjinyo na bhavanti hemantarātrayaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>10. <b>pātropādhi</b>ryathā—(gāsa. 743ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>bhiuḍīe puloissaṃ ṇibbhacchissaṃ parammuhī hossaṃ ।</l>
<l>jaṃ bhaṇaha taṃ karissaṃ sahio jai taṃ ṇa pekkhissaṃ ॥ 340 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(bhrakuṭyā pralokayiṣyāmi nirbhartsayiṣyāmi parāṅ‍mukhī bhaviṣyāmi ।</l>
<l>yadbhaṇatha tatkariṣyāmi sakhyo yadi taṃ na prekṣiṣye ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>11. <b>saṃjñopadhi</b>ryathā—(gāhāko. 440)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>māṇo māe do akkharāi piasaggamotti bahuāi ।</l>
<l>bahuaṃ jaṃpai thoehi ettha tumaṃ c‍cia pamāṇaṃ ॥ 341 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(māno mātaḥ dve akṣare, priyasaṅgama iti bahukāni ।</l>
<l>bahukaṃ jalpati stokaiḥ atra tvameva pramāṇam ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>(<b>20. mānabhaṅgakāraṇāni —12</b>)</p>
<p>atha mānabhaṅgakāraṇāni । madaḥ, trāsaḥ, bhayam, ṛtūpagamaḥ, upavanavikāsaḥ,
surabhivanavātaḥ, kokilādyālāpaḥ, prabhātaṃ, pradoṣaścandrodayaḥ, pravāsārambhaḥ, viviktamiti ।
yathocyate—</p>
<pb n="1383"/>
<b><lg>
<l>trāso bhayaṃ mada ṛtūpagamaḥ pradoṣaścandrodayaḥ pikarutaṃ rajanīvirāmaḥ ।</l>
<l>hṛdyo marud vikasitopavanaṃ viviktamādyaḥ pravāsa iti mānanivarhaṇāni ॥ 342 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>1. teṣu <b>mado</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>gheppaṃti appaṇa c‍cia kaāvarāhā vi kāmiṇīhi viaamā ।</l>
<l>kiṃ ia sikkhāvaṃto avarajjhai vi piaṃ karei mahumao ॥ 343 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(gṛhyanta ātmanaiva kṛtāparādhā api kāminīmiḥ priyatamāḥ ।</l>
<l>kimiti śikṣayannaparādhyati, priyaṃ karoti madhumadaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>2. <b>trāso</b> yathā—(harivi.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>caṃdāmaa-paḍijīvia-kavāla-mukka-ṭṭahāsa-bhīāe ।</l>
<l>gorīe māṇa-vighaḍaṇa-ghaḍaṃta-deho haro jaai ॥ 344 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(candrāmṛtapratijīvitakapālamuktāṭṭahāsabhītāyāḥ ।</l>
<l>gauryā mānavighaṭanaghaṭamānadeho haro jayati ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>3. <b>bhayaṃ</b> yathā—(urā. 1.1)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>paulastyapīnabhujasampadudasyamāna—
kailāsasambhramaviloladṛśaḥ priyāyāḥ ।</l>
<l>śreyāṃsi vo diśatu nih‍nutakopacihna—
māliṅganotpulakamāsitamindumauleḥ ॥ 345 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>4. <b>ṛtūpagamo</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>tānyetāni śikhaṇḍitāṇḍavagurūnambhodharānambare
tanvānāni dināni nūnamamṛtasyandīni vandāmahe ।</l>
<l>udgāḍhā	navanīlanīrajadṛśāmatyantamāyāmino
bhidyante svayameva yeṣu viṣamā mānagrahagranthayaḥ ॥ 346 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>5. <b>upavanavikaso</b> yathā—(gāsa. 779ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kāraṇagahio vi mae māṇo emea jaṃ samosario ।</l>
<l>atthakka—phulliaṃkolla tujjha taṃ matthae paḍau ॥ 347 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(kāraṇagṛhīto'pi mayā māna evameva yatsamapasṛtaḥ ।</l>
<l>akāṇḍapuṣpitāṅkola tava tat mastake patatu ॥)</l>
</lg>
<pb n="1384"/>
<p>6. <b>surabhivanavātaḥ</b> yathā—(līlāvatī 32)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>aha ṇavara tattha doso jaṃ gimha-paosa-malliāmoo ।</l>
<l>aṇuṇaasuhāi māṇaṃsiṇīṇa bhottuṃ c‍cia ṇa dei ॥ 348 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(atha kevalaṃ tatra doṣaḥ yat grīṣmapradoṣamallikāmodaḥ ।</l>
<l>anunayasukhāni manasvinīnāṃ bhok‍tumeva na dadātu ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>7. <b>kokilādyālāpo</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kalakaṃṭhīkalaraommūliassa māṇassa kiṃsuataruassa ।</l>
<l>bhūipatao		hoi	mahuṃmi	māhavībhamarajhaṃkāro ॥ 349 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(kalakaṇṭhīkalaravonmūlitasya mānasya kiṃśukatarukasya ।</l>
<l>bhūmau patato bhavati madhau mādhavībhramarajhaṅkāraḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>8. <b>prabhātaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 1.29)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>ajja sahi rāisese māṇamahūsava—suhacchiārad‍dhe ।</l>
<l>sahasatti kukkuḍarao ṇisāmio vajjhapaḍaho vva ॥ 350 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(adya sakhi rātriśeṣe mānamahotsavasukhakṣayārabdhe ।</l>
<l>sahaseti kukkuṭaravo niśāmitaḥ vadhyapaṭaha iva ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>9. <b>pradoṣo</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>jaha jaha atthamai ravī vialiasajjhāvo padosāmmi ।</l>
<l>taha taha māṇo māṇaṃsiṇīṇa hiaesu vijjhāi/vivujjhai ॥ 351 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(yathā yathā'stameti ravirvigalitasacchāyaḥ pradoṣe ।</l>
<l>tathā tathā māno manasvinīnāṃ hṛdayeṣu vidhyati/budhyate ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>10. <b>candrodayo</b> yathā—(harivi.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>aṇuṇaasuhaṃ ṇa pattaṃ piāhi daiesu khijjai vi ṇa calaṇo ।</l>
<l>osoriaṃmi paḍhamaṃ dūīevva dosiṇāe māṇaggahaṇe ॥ 352 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>11. <b>pravāsārambho</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>jā aṇuṇaaṃ ṇa gehaṇai māṇakkhalaṇaṃmi sahiaṇeṇa vi bhaṇiā ।</l>
<l>pāapaḍaṇehiṃ ṇeṃtaṃ saccia kaāvi piaṃ ṇivārei piā ॥ 353 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(yā anunayaṃ na gṛh‍ṇāti mānaskhalane sakhījanenāpi bhaṇitā ।</l>
<l>pādapatanaiḥ yāntaṃ saiva kadāpi priyaṃ nivārayati priyā ॥)</l>
</lg>
<pb n="1385"/>
<p>12. <b>viviktaṃ</b> yathā—(māgha. 4.45)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>yā na yayau priyamanyavadhūbhyaḥ sāratarāgamanā yatamānam ।</l>
<l>tena saheha bibharti rahaḥ strī sā ratarāgamanāyatamānam ॥ 354 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>(<b>21. mānopaśāntayaḥ —12</b>)</p>
<p>atha mānopaśāntayaḥ । virodhiprādurbhāvaḥ, pratipakṣābhiyogaḥ, pratyanīkadharṣaṇaṃ,
vipakṣābhibhavaḥ, paribhraṃśaḥ, avasraṃsanaṃ, calanaṃ, skhalanaṃ, vighaṭṭanam, unmūlanam,
palāyanam, apunarbhāva iti । teṣu —</p>
<p>1. <b>virodhiprādurbhāvo</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>avalambiovaāraṃ abhagga-māṇa-pasaraṃ paatta-paharisaṃ ।</l>
<l>ekkaṃ a ekkarāaṃ (jāaṃ) se daiadaṃsaṇa c‍cia hiaaṃ ॥ 355 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(avalambitopacāramabhag‍namānaprasaraṃ	pravṛttapraharṣam ।</l>
<l>ekaṃ ca ekarāgaṃ ca jātaṃ dayitadarśana eva hṛdayam ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>2. <b>pratipakṣābhiyogo</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>to ia—maṇorahehiṃ vi alaṃghaṇijjagaruaṃ piammi bhaṇaṃte ।</l>
<l>ādattā lakkheu aṇṇa c‍cia se rasaṃtaraṃ muhasohā ॥ 356 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(tata ito manorathairalaṅghanīyagurukaṃ priye bhaṇati ।</l>
<l>āttā lakṣayitumanyameva tasyā rasāntaraṃ mukhaśobhā ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>3. <b>pratyanīkadharṣaṇaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>thoatthoa—pasario tīe ṇiraṃtara—pariṭṭhiāmarisa—rasaṃ ।</l>
<l>laṃghei c‍cia hiaaṃ paḍivallehoṇṇaa/isaho parioso ॥ 357 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(stokastokaprasṛtaḥ tasyāḥ nirantaraparisthitāmarṣarasam ।</l>
<l>laṅghayatīva hṛdayaṃ pratipallekhonnatisakhaḥ paritoṣaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>4. <b>vipakṣābhibhavo</b> yathā—(harivi.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>thoosaraṃtarosaṃ	thoatthoa—parivaḍ‍ḍhamāṇa—paharisaṃ ।</l>
<l>hoi adūrapasāaṃ uhaa—rasāatta—vibbhamaṃ tīe muhaṃ ॥ 358 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(stokāpasarad‍roṣaṃ	stoka—stoka—parivardhamānapraharṣam ।</l>
<l>bhavati ca dūraprasādamubhayarasāyattavibhramaṃ tasyā mukham ॥)</l>
</lg>
<pb n="1386"/>
<p>5. <b>prabhātaparibhraṃśo</b> yathā—(gāsa. 933ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>uvvahai daia—gahiāharoṭṭha—jhijjaṃta—rosa—paḍirāaṃ ।</l>
<l>pāṇosaraṃtamairaṃ va phalihacasaaṃ muhaṃ bālā॥359॥</l></lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(udvahati dayitagṛhītādharoṣ‍ṭhakṣīyamāṇaroṣapratirāgam ।</l>
<l>pānāpasaranmadiramiva sphaṭikacaṣakaṃ mukhaṃ bālā ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>6. <b>avasraṃsanaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 1.74)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>diḍhamaṃtudūmiāem̐ vi gahio daiammi pecchaha imāe ।</l>
<l>osarai vāluāsuṭṭhiovva māṇo surusūraṃto ॥ 360 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(dṛḍhamanyudūnayā gṛhīto dayite paśyatānayā ।</l>
<l>apasarati vālukāmuṣ‍ṭiriva mānassurusurāyamāṇaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>7. <b>calanaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>aha o tti ṇavaria ac‍cāsaṇṇo pi sac‍cabhāmāe hari ।</l>
<l>pariaṇamuha c‍cia suo vāhajalattaria—ṇoaṇāeॅ, ṇa diṭṭho ॥ 361 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(athāgata iti sahasā atyāsanno'pi satyabhāmayā hariḥ ।</l>
<l>parijanamukhādeva śruto bāṣpajalāntaritalocanayā, na dṛṣ‍ṭaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>8. <b>skhalanaṃ</b> yathā—(harivi.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>tīe vialaṃttadhīraṃ abbhuṭṭhaṃtīeॅ thaṇa—paholira—vāhaṃ ।</l>
<l>dūrosaraṃta		raṇaṃ	dūraara—valaggaveaṇaṃ	ṇīsasiaṃ ॥ 362 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(tasyāḥ vigaladdhairyaṃ abhyutthitāyāḥ stanapravahanaśīlabāṣpam ।</l>
<l>dūrāpasaratsmaraṇaṃ	dūratarāvarūḍhavedanaṃ	niḥśvasitam ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>9. <b>vighaṭṭanaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 935ve., vala. 361)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>tuṃgo tthiro visālo jo sahi me māṇapavvao raio ।</l>
<l>so daiadiṭṭhivajjāsaṇīem̐	ghāammi	ṇa	pahutto ॥ 363 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(tuṅgaḥ sthiro viśālo yassakhi me mānaparvato racitaḥ ।</l>
<l>sa dayitadṛṣ‍ṭivajrāśanyāghāte'pi na paryāp‍taḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>10. <b>unmūlanaṃ</b> yathā—(harivi.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>to ia suraaru—kāraṇa—maulia—hiaāe sāvasesalahuo ।</l>
<l>saṃbhāvia c‍cia hio hariṇā pāapaḍaṇammi tīem̐ amariso ॥ 364 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<pb n="1387"/>
<lg>
<l>(tata iti suratarukāraṇamukulitahṛdayāyāḥ sāvaśeṣalaghukaḥ ।</l>
<l>sambhāvita eva hṛto hariṇā pādapatane tasyā amarṣaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>11. <b>palāyanaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 2.44)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>jo kaha vi sahīhi maha chiddaṃ lahiūṇa pesio hiae ।</l>
<l>so māṇo coriakāmua vva diṭṭhe pie ṇaṭṭho ॥ 365 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(yaḥ kathamapi sakhībhirmama chidraṃ lambhayitvā preṣito hṛdaye ।</l>
<l>sa mānaścoritakāmuka iva dṛṣ‍ṭe priye naṣ‍ṭaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>12. <b>apunarbhāvo</b> yathā—(harivi.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>to se rubbhaṃta c‍cia hiaa—viaṃbhaṃta—harisa—veauc‍ciliā ।</l>
<l>pāapaḍiassa hariṇo paḍiā puṭṭhīe bāhasalilatthevā ॥ 366 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(tatastasyāḥ rudhyamānā eva hṛdayavijṛmbhamāṇaharṣavegoc‍cilitāḥ ।</l>
<l>pādapatitasya hareḥ patitāḥ pṛṣ‍ṭhe bāṣpasalilabindavaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>(<b>22. mānopaśamalakṣaṇāni —12)</b></p>
<p>atha mānopaśamalakṣaṇāni— nayananimīlanam, mukhaprasādaḥ, bāṣpamokṣaḥ,
pulakodbhedaḥ, doṣapratibhedaḥ, akramanindā, upālambhaḥ, pratyupālambhaḥ, manojugupsā,
mānānuśayaḥ, mānayogyā, mānānuyoga iti । teṣu —</p>
<p>1. <b>nayananimīlanaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>daiāloapaattā aṃtocchīṇa pasaraṃta-vāha-vialiā ।</l>
<l>maulai-aṃbua-pasarā tīse dasaṇasuhaṃ ṇa pāvai diṭhṭhī ॥ 367 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(dayitālokapravṛttā'vyucchinna—prasarad—bāṣpavikalitā ।</l>
<l>mukulitā'mbuja—prasarā tasyā darśanasukhaṃ na prāp‍noti dṛṣ‍ṭiḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>2. <b>mukhaprasādo</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>āloie c‍cia pie ṭhavio tīe maaṇeṇa mohaṇasuhao ।</l>
<l>kusumadhaṇummi bāṇo valaiavibbhamauṇe muhammi pahariso ॥ 368 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(ālokita eva priye sthāpitaḥ tasyā madanena mohanasubhagaḥ ।</l>
<l>kusumānamita—dhanuṣi bāṇo valayitavibhramaguṇe mukhe praharṣaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<pb n="1388"/>
<p>3. <b>bāṣpamokṣo</b> yathā—(amaru. 50)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>aṅganāmatitānavaṃ kuta idaṃ kampaśca kasmāt kuto
mugdhe pāṇḍukapolamānanamiti prāṇeśvare pṛcchati ।</l>
<l>tanvyā sarvamidaṃ svabhāvajamiti vyāhṛtya pakṣmāntara—
vyāpī bāṣpabharastayā calitayā niḥśvasya mukto'nyataḥ ॥ 369 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>4. <b>pulakodbhedo</b> yathā—(kirātā. 9.46)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>śaṅkitāya kṛtabāṣpanipātāmīrṣyayā vimukhitāṃ dayitāya ।</l>
<l>māninīmabhimukhasthitacittāṃ śaṃsati sma ghanaromavibhedaḥ ॥ 370 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>5. <b>doṣapratibhedo</b> yathā—(gāsa. 3.1)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>acchau tā aṇṇajaṇo hiaaṃ cia appaṇo tuha pamāṇaṃ ।</l>
<l>taha	taṃsi	maṃdaṇeho	jaha	ṇa	uvālaṃbhajoggo si ॥ 371 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(āstāṃ tāvad anyajano hṛdayamevātmanaḥ tava pramāṇam ।</l>
<l>tathā tvamasi mandas‍neho yathā nopālambhayogyo'si ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>6. <b>aprakramanindā</b> yathā—(gāsa. 7.17)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kiṃ bhaṇaha maṃ sahīo karehi māṇaṃti kiṃttha māṇeṇa ।</l>
<l>sabhāvabāhire tammi majjha māṇeṇa vi ṇa kajjaṃ ॥ 372 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(kiṃ bhaṇatha mā sakhyaḥ kuru mānamiti kimatra mānena ।</l>
<l>svabhāvabāhye tasmin mama mānenāpi na kāryam ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>7. <b>upālambho</b> yathā—(amaru.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>sakhi sa subhago mandas‍neho mayīti na me vyathā
vidhiviracitaṃ	yasmāt	sarvo	janassukhamaś‍nute ।</l>
<l>mama tu manasassantāpo'yaṃ jane vimukhe'pi yat
kṣaṇamapi hatavrīḍaṃ ceto na yāti virāgitām ॥ 373 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>8. <b>pratyupālambho</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>mānonnatetyasahanetyatipaṇḍiteti
mayyeva dhikkṛtiranekamukhī sakhīnām ।</l>
<pb n="1389"/>
<l>dākṣiṇyamātramasṛṇena viceṣ‍ṭitena
dhūrtasya tasya hi guṇānupavarṇayanti ॥ 374 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>9. <b>manojugupsā yathā—</b></p>
<b><lg>
<l>ṇa vi teṇa tahā taviā jaha imiṇā māmi daḍ‍ḍhahiaeṇa ।
bahu ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ tiṃ kuṇaṃteṇa ॥ 375 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(nāpi tena tathā tāpitā tathā'nena māmi dagdhahṛdayena ।</l>
<l>bahu ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ nti kurvatā ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>10. <b>mānānuśayo</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>yaḥ	sakhi	mānānuśayodayastena	bhavatu	pāpena ।</l>
<l>॰ ॰ ॰ tī bhavituṃ kalaprāṇaiḥ krīṇāni bhaiṣajyam ॥ 376 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>11. <b>mānayogyā</b> yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.246)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>mānayogyāṃ karomīti priyasthāne sthitāṃ sakhīm ।</l>
<l>bālā	bhrūbhaṅgajihmākṣī	paśyati	sphuritādharā ॥ 377 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>12. <b>mānānuyogo</b> yathā—(gāsa. 898ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>alliai diṭṭhiṇibbhacchio vi vihuo vi laggae siae ।</l>
<l>pahao vi cumbai balā alajjae kaha ṇu kuppissaṃ ॥ 378 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(ālīyate dṛṣ‍ṭinirbhartsito'pi vidhuto'pi lagati sicaye ।</l>
<l>prahato'pi cumbati balādalajjakāya kathaṃ nu kopiṣyāmi ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>(<b>23. mānabhaṅgopādhayaḥ —12</b>)</p>
<p>atha mānabhaṅgopādhayaḥ । te ca nidrā, madaḥ, trāsaḥ, bhayam, ajñānam, prasaṅgaḥ,
pramādaḥ, deśaḥ, kālaḥ, kāryam, pātram, sup‍tamityādayo bhavanti । teṣu—</p>
<p>1. <b>nidropadhānaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>praṇayiṣu purā mithyāmānī na cāṭuśatairapi
praṇayamabhajanyassaubhāgyagrahāttaruṇījanaḥ ।</l>
<l>svayamanunaye	hūṇasteṣāmihānuśayādayaṃ
nayati vivaśo nidrāṃ dūtye mṛṣāpraṇayāmapi ॥ 379 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<pb n="1390"/>
<p>2. <b>madopadhānaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>agahiadaiāṇuṇao pacchā aṇuṇei aṇuṇasaāvisaṃvalio ।</l>
<l>kaiavaṇirūviamao vi kaiavamaaṇaummūlio juvajaijaṇo ॥ 380 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(agṛhītadayitānunayaḥ paś‍cāt anunayati anuśayavisaṃvalitaḥ ।</l>
<l>kaitava—nirūpita—mado niṣkaitavamadanonmūlito yuvatijanaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>3. <b>trāsopadhānaṃ</b> yathā—(kirātā. 8.46)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>bhayādivāśliṣya ruṣāhate'mbhasi priyaṃ mudānandayati sma māninī ।</l>
<l>akṛtrimapremarasāhitairmano	haranti	rāmāḥ	kṛtakairapīhitaiḥ ॥ 381 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>4. <b>bhayopadhānaṃ</b> yathā—(kirātā. 8.48)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>karau dhunānā navapallavākṛtī payasyagādhe kila jātasambhramā ।</l>
<l>sakhīṣu nirvācyamadhārṣṭayadūṣitaṃ priyāṅgasaṃśleṣamavāpa māninī ॥ 382 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>4. <b>ajñānopadhānaṃ</b> yathā—(amaru. 75)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kathamapi	kṛtapratyāpattau	priye	skhalitottare
virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaṃ prakalpitamadrutam ।</l>
<l>asahanasakhīśrotraprāp‍tipramādasasambhramaṃ
vivalitadṛśā śūnye gehe samucch‌vasitaṃ punaḥ ॥ 383 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>6. <b>prasaṅgopadhānaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>māṇo vā'māṇo c‍cia māṇaṃ bāreha gharabbhāraṃ ।</l>
<l>pecchāmutāva	kaiā	kaāvarāho	samalliai ॥ 384 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>7. <b>pramādopadhānaṃ</b> yathā—(saka. 5.322)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>thoārūḍhamahumaā	khaṇapamhaṭṭhāvarāhadiṇṇullāvā ।</l>
<l>hasiūṇa saṃṭhavijjai pieṇa saṃbharialajjiā kāvi piā ॥ 385 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(stokārūḍhamadhumadā	kṣaṇaprabhraṣ‍ṭāparādhadattollāpā ।</l>
<l>hasitvā saṃjñāpyate priyeṇa saṃsmṛtā lajjitā kāpi priyā ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>8. <b>deśopadhānaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>ajjaṃ vaheṇa kahaāhatthābha tthivva uvaṇiātassa ।</l>
<l>majjaṇiā	mūlālaggathoacchāhiṃ	kuṇaṃteṇa ॥ 386 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<pb n="1391"/>
<p>9. <b>kālopadhānaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 899ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>himacuṇṇajoahatthāo jassa dappaṃ kuṇaṃti rāīo ।</l>
<l>kaha tass piassa mae tīrai māṇo halā kāuṃ ॥ 387 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(himacūrṇayogahastā	yasya	darpaṃ	kurvanti	rātrayaḥ ।</l>
<l>kathaṃ tasya priyasya mayā śakyate mānaḥ sakhyaḥ kartum ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>10. <b>kāryopadhānaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>cuṃbasu sahassahuttaṃ muhamiṇamo hāriaṃ mae jue ।</l>
<l>māṇo	uṇa	muc‍cai	sāmalaṃ	kaha	māṇaittīe ॥ 388 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(cumba	sahasrakṛtvo mukhamidaṃ hāritaṃ mayā dyūte ।</l>
<l>mānaḥ punarmucyate śyāmalāṅgi kathaṃ mānamuk‍tāyāḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>11. <b>pātropadhānaṃ</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>sahi pāesu chivaṃti viovvakivelavesumaṃsuaiṃ ।</l>
<l>ehiṇuvajjasu pāsepāiamuhiāviṇaṃ muṇiomo ॥ 389 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p><b>12. sup‍topadhānaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 4.68)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>bharimo se saaṇaparammuhīe vialaṃtamāṇapasarāe ।</l>
<l>kaiavasuttavvattaṇatthaṇabharuppellaṇasuhelliṃ ॥ 390 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(smarāmastasyāḥ śayanaparāṅ‌mukhyā vigalanmānaprasarāyāḥ ।</l>
<l>kaitava—sup‍todvartana—stanabharotpreraṇa—sukha—kelim ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>(<b>24. mānānubhāvasaukhyāni—12</b>)</p>
<p>atha	mānānubhāvasaukhyāni । teṣu pādapatanaṃ, prasahyāśleṣaḥ, haṭhakacagrahaḥ,
cumbanabalātkāraḥ, priyapraṇayoktiḥ, upālambhasūktiḥ, s‍nehaparīkṣā, vipakṣābhibhavaḥ,
sakhīślāghā, bandhubahumānaḥ, lābhaviśeṣaḥ, śṛṅgāravṛddhiriti । tatra —</p>
<p>1. <b>pādapatanaṃ</b> yathā—(gāsa. 893ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>paṇamaha māṇassa/maaṇassa halā calaṇe kiṃ devaehi aṇṇehiṃ ।</l>
<l>jassa	pasāeṇa	pio	lolai	pāaṃtapāsesu ॥ 312 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(praṇamata mānasya/madanasya sakhyaścaraṇau kiṃ daivatairanyaiḥ ।</l>
<l>yasya	prasādena	priyaḥ	lolati	pādāntapārśveṣu ॥)</l>
</lg>
<pb n="1392"/>
<p>2. <b>prasahyāśleṣo</b> yathā—(gāsa. 929ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kajjaṃ viṇā vi kaamāṇaḍaṃbarā pulaabhiṇṇasavvaṃgī ।</l>
<l>ujjalāliṃgaṇa-sokkha-lālasā	putti	muṇiāsi ॥ 392 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(kāryaṃ vināpi kṛtamānaḍambarā pulakajīrṇasarvāṅgī ।</l>
<l>ujjvalāliṅganasaukhyalālasā putri! jñātāsi ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>3. <b>haṭhakacagraho</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>unnamayya	sakacagrahamāsyaṃ	cumbati	priyatame	haṭhavṛttyā ।</l>
<l>huṃhu muñca ma ma meti ca mandaṃ jalpitaṃ jayati mānavatīnām ॥ 393 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>4. <b>cumbanabalātkāro</b> yathā—(gāsa. 5.35)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>pāapaḍaṇāṇa	muddhe	rabhasabalāmoḍicuṃbiavvāṇaṃ ।</l>
<l>daṃsaṇamettapasajjiri	cukkāsi	suhāṇaṃ	bahuāṇa ॥ 394 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(pādapatanānāṃ mugdhe! rabhasabalātkāracumbitavyānām ।</l>
<l>darśanamātraprasannaśīle cyutāsi sukhānāṃ bahukānāṃ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>5. <b>priyapraṇayokti</b>ryathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>śvāsotkampitakampi ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ।</l>
<l>॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ tvayi ॥ 395 ॥</l></lg></b> (?)
<p>6. <b>upālambhokti</b>ryathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>aparikkhia	dosaguṇaṃ	avamaṇṇaa	cirapparūḍhavīsambharasaṃ ।</l>
<l>avahīriāṇurāaṃ tume vi maha rūsiuṃ jaṇeṇa vi khiṇṇaṃ ॥ 396 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(aparīkṣya	doṣaguṇaṃ	avamatya	ciraprarūḍhavisrambharasam ।</l>
<l>avadhīryānudūtaṃ tvamapi mahyaṃ ruṣ‍ṭvā janena na vidīrṇam ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>7. <b>s‍nehaparīkṣā</b> yathā—(gāsa. 927ve.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>paḍipakkhassa vi purao samuhaṃ bhaṇiā si teṇa pasia tti ।</l>
<l>avalaṃbiassa	māṇiṇi	māṇassa	vi	kiṃ	phalaṃ	aṇṇaṃ ॥ 397 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(pratipakṣasyāpi purataḥ sammukhaṃ bhaṇitāsi tena prasīdeti ।</l>
<l>avalambitasya mānini! mānasyāpi kiṃ phalamanyat ॥)</l>
</lg>
<pb n="1393"/>
<p>8. <b>vipakṣābhibhavo</b> yathā—(harivi.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>tīe savisesadūmiasavattihiaāem̐ ṇivvalaṃta—siṇehaṃ ।</l>
<l>piagaruiāa ṇimiaṃ sohaggaguṇāṇa aggabhūmīem̐ paaṃ ॥ 398 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(tayā	saviśeṣadūnasapat‍nīhṛdayayā	nirbalas‍neham ।</l>
<l>priyagurūkṛtayā	nyastaṃ	saubhāgyaguṇānāmagrabhūmau padam ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>9. <b>sakhīślāghā</b> yathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>kṣutaiḥ k‍vāpi prītiḥ k‍vacidapi nimittaiḥ pulakitā
(k‍vacinmithyāvādaira)mitaparitāpo vikasitaḥ ।</l>
<l>prasādārthaṃ mugdhe tava vigatalajjo'nṛtaśate—
ṣvabhijño daivajñaṃ janamapi ca te pṛcchati patiḥ ॥ 399 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>10. <b>bandhubahumāno</b> yathā—(sūmu. 205)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>cakṣurlup‍tamaṣīkaṇaṃ	kabalitastāmbūlarāgo'dhare
viśrāntā kabarī kapolaphalake lup‍teva gātradyutiḥ ।</l>
<l>manye mānini! sāmprataṃ praṇayinā kairapyupāyakramai—
rbhag‍no	mānatarustathāpi	phalitaścetasthalīvardhitaḥ ॥ 400 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<p>11. <b>lābhaviśeṣo</b> yathā—(harivi.)</p>
<b><lg>
<l>dāra-ṭṭhavia-sura-dumaṃ	taṃ	cia	kusumovaāragghaviaṃ ।</l>
<l>aṇṇaṃ ca sac‍cavijjai pariosa-paritta-pariaṇaṃ tīeॅ gharaṃ ॥ 401 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(dvārasthāpitasuradrumaṃ	tadeva	kusumopahārārghitam ।</l>
<l>anyac‍ca saṃvīkṣyate paritoṣaparītaparijanaṃ tasyā gṛham ॥)</l>
</lg>
<p>12. <b>śṛṅgāravṛddhi</b>ryathā—</p>
<b><lg>
<l>paṇaaparipūraṇeṇa aviraabhūsiapiaamāgameṇa a garuo ।</l>
<l>pasarai laddhatthāmo aṇṇaṇṇarasaṃtarehiṃ tīe pahariso ॥ 402 ॥</l>
</lg></b>
<lg>
<l>(praṇayaparipūraṇenāviratabhūṣita—priyatamānamena	ca	gurukaḥ ।</l>
<l>prasarati	labdhasthāmā'nyānyarasāntaraistasyāḥ	praharṣaḥ ॥)</l>
</lg>
<pb n="1394"/>
<b><lg>
<l>evamete	trayo	mānāsrayaśca	tadupādhayaḥ ।</l>

</lg></b>
